sa0-paGka-kardamaH| CaivAlaH-Caivalam| tRNaM-khaTaH| parNaM-patram| AvilaM cAstRtaM cAvilAstRtam, paGkAdibhirAvilAstRtaM paGkAdyAvilAstRtam| yathAsambhavamatra sambandhaH, tena paGkenAvilaM-kaluSaM, CaivAlAdibhirAstRtaM-saJchAditamiti bodhyam| tathA, sUryendupavanairadRSTaM-anAsevitaM, na pibet| tathA, abhivRSTaM-tatkAlapatitAnyavarSamiCrIbhUtaM kAlAntarACritam| kharanAde tvevamuktam- "vArSikaM tadaharvRSTaM bhUmiSThamahitaM jalam| vyuSTaM dvirAtraM taccaiva prasannamamRtopamam||" iti| tathA, ghanaM-asvaccham| tathA, guru-guruguNam| tathA, phenilaM phenavat| tathA, jantumat-kITayuktam| tathA, taptaM-uSNam| tathA, atiCaityataH-atijADyAt, dantagrAhi-dantAn gRhNAti kAryAkSamAn karoti, tacchIlam| na pibediti pratipadaM yojyam| ityayaM prAyo bhUmiSThatoyasya niSedhaH| adhunA AntarikSaM yanna peyaM tadAha-anArtavamityAdi| yaddivyaM jalamArtavaM na bhavati, tacca na pibet| nanu, sarvameva divyaM jalamArtavam, kAlasya RturUpatvAt| Rtau ca bhavamArtavam| evaM ca na kiJcidanArtavaM sambhavati| ucyate| anArtavaM na pibet| arthAdArtavaM pibedityuktaM bhavati| tadatra sAmAnyoktAvapi viCiSTo divyasya jalasya kAla RturUpo bodhyo varSAkhyaH, yasmin kAle divyaM jalaM peyatvenAbhyanujJAyate| yathA-"varSAsu divyanAdeye" ityAdi| anyartubhavaM tvanArtavatvAnna peyam| atra ca varSAkhya RtuCcAturmAsiko~abhipretaH| ata evACvayuje mAsi divyaM jalaM peyatvenAnujajJe| anyathA hyanArtavatvAttadapeyameva syAt| ArtavaM prathamaM ca yat - na kevalamanArtavaM na pibet yAvadArtavamapi prathamaM na pibet| kuto heto: ? ityAha-lUtAdItyAdi| lUtA AdiryeSAM te lUtAdayaH,-kSudrajantavaH prANiviCeSAH, teSAM tantuviNmUtraviSANi| tantuH-sUtrAkAraviCeSo, lAletyanye| teSAM lUtAditantuviNmUtraviSANAM saMCleSaH-samparkaH, tena dUSitaM yataH, tatastadArtavamapi na peyam| kecittvevaM vyAkhyAnayanti-ArtavaM prathamaM ca yattanna peyam, lUtAditantvAdidUSitaM ca na peyamiti|  saGgrahe cAdhyagISTa (sU.a.6)- "tatkuryAtsnAnapAnAbhyAM tRSNAdhmAnodarajvarAn| kAsAgnisAdAbhiSyandakaNDUgaNDAdikAnataH|| tadvarjayedabhAve vA toyasyAnyasya Casyate| ghanavastraparisrAvaiH kSudrajantvabhirakSaNam|| vyApannasyAsya tapanamagnyarkAyasapiNDakaiH| parNIMmUlabisagranthimuktAkatakaCaivalaiH|| vastragomedakAbhyAM vA kArayettatprasAdanam| pATalAkaravIrAdikusumairgandhanACanam||' iti|

 athAto dravadra athAto dravadravyavijJAnIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-apAmevAyaM svAbhAviko guNo yat dravatvam| ato yAni kAnicit dravarUpANi dravyANi tAni sarvANi ApyAnyeva kSIradadhyAdIni| tadarthaM dravadravyaCabdaH sAmAnyena sarvadravavyaktiparigrahArthaH CAstrakRtA prayuktaH| dravANi ca tAni dravyANi ca dravadravyANi, teSAM vijJAnaM-avabodhaH, tasmai hito dravadravyavijJAnIyo~adhyAyaH, taM vyAkhyAsyAmaH-prathayiSyAmaH|

atha toyavargaH|||1|| jIvanaM tarpaNaM hRdyaM hlAdi buddhiprabodhanam||1||  tanvavyaktarasaM mRSTaM CItaM laghvamRtopamam||1|| gaGgAmbu nabhaso bhraSTaM spRSTaM tvarkendumArutaiH||2||  hitAhitatve tadbhUyo deCakAlAvapekSate||2||

sa0-jIvanaM-ojovRddhikaram,saumyadhAtuvardhanamityanye| tarpaNaM-klamahRt,[trptikRdityanye]|hRdyaM-hRdayAya hitam, na tu hRdayasya priyaM hRdyamiti vyAkhyeyam| evaM hi vyAkhyAyamAne,"amlaM hRdyAnAm"[ca.sU.a.25/39]ityagryANAM madhye tatpAThaM munirnaivAkariSyat| yasmAtkiJcit dravyaM kasyacitpriyaM bhavati,na sarvaM sarvasya| tasmAddhRdayAya hitaM hRdyamiti bodhyam| tathA,hlAdi-AhlAdakaram| tathA, buddheH prabodhanam,yAvanmAtrA yasya CemuSI sA tasya sphuTapratibhAsA tadyogAdbhavatItyarthaH| tanu- svaccham| avyaktarasaM- anabhivyaktaSaDrasamityarthaH| mRSTaM-atyAsvAdasukham| santi hi bhUrirasakvAthacUrNavaTakAdInyapyavyaktarasAni, na tu kArtsnyena tAnIndriyaprasAdAsvAdaprItikarANi| tathA, anurasabAhulyAtpRthagapi dravyANyabhayAmalakAdInyavyaktarasAni, na tu punastAni tathA manaHprINanAni| pAnIyasya cAvyaktarasasyApyACrayavaCAt kaSAyatvasvAdutvAdi bhavatyeva| tathA cASTAGgasaGgrahe~apaThat[sU.a.6]-"Cvete kaSAyaM, tatsvAdu kRSNe, tiktaM ca pANDure" ityAdi| mRSTaM- Cuddhamiti na vyAkhyeyam| tathA ca muniH [ca. sU. a. 27/193]-"CItaM Cuci CivaM mRSTaM vimalaM laghu SaDguNam| prakRtyA divyamudakam" iti | atra hi mRSTavimalayordvayorupAdAne paunaruktyaM syAt| tasmAnmRSTaCabdo~atra manaHprINanArthaH | tathA, CItaM- vIryeNa ca sparCena ca| tathA, laghu - laghuguNayuktam| tathA , amRtopamaM- yathA  kilAmRtaM tridoSaghnatvadhAtusAmyakRttvaviSArtijittvAdiguNairaCeSairyuktaM tathaivaitajjalamapItyarthaH| tathA coktaM saGgrahe [sU.a.6]-"sUryoddhRtapramuktatvAllaghu vAtakaphApaham|CaityajIvanasaumyatvaiH pittaraktaviSArtijit||iti| tathA, nabhaso bhraSTaM- antarikSAtpatitamAtraM, vastrAdigRhItaM gAGgaM  jalamIdRgguNaM bhavati| tuCabdaH punararthe| arkendumArutaiH - ravicandrAnilaiH, spRSTaM- sambaddhaM sat, punaH hitAhitatve- pathyApathyatve, deCakAlAvapekSate- deCakAlAvanuvartate| deCo viSayaH pAtramACraya iti paryAyAH | tatra kimanUpadeCe jAGgale vA tatpatitam ? tatha, kimasitaCvetAdyanyatame va? iti deCAnuvartanam| tatha, CIte kimutoSNe~athavA varSAkhye patitam? iti kAlAnuvartanam| ravicandrAnilairiti samastanirdeCo yadA samastairetaiH spRSTaM na tu vyastaiH, tadA hitAhitatve deCAdyapekSata iti dyotayati| sadyo vastrAdigRhItasya jalasya tu na sarvairetairyogaH sambhavatIti tatprAyeNa hitameva|

A0 ra0-tatrAdau toyavargaH|  tattoyaM dvedhA,- divyaM bhaumaM ca|  divyaM caturdhA,- dhAraM kAraM tauSAraM haimaM ca|  dhAraM dvedhA,-gAGgaM sAmudraM ca|  tatra gAGgaguNAnAha-jIvanamiti|  jIvanaM prANadhAraNam|  tarpaNaM-tRptijananam|  hRdyaM-hRdayasya priyam, tatprasAdakaratvAt|  hlAdi-sukhajanakam|  buddhiprabodhanaM-prajJAvikACajanakam|  tanu-sarvebhyo~api viralam|  avyaktarasaM-rasavadapyanabhivyaktamadhurAdirasaviCeSam|  mRSTaM-jihvendriyapriyam|  CItaM-sparCavIryAbhyAm|  laghu-CIghrapAkam|  amRtopamaM-devAnAmamRtamivedaM manuSyANAm|  gaGgAmbu-AkACagaGgAtoyaM meghairAnItam|  nabhaso bhraSTaM-AkACAtpatitam, divyamityarthaH|  gaGgAmbviti sAmudrasya vyAvRttyartham|  nabhaso bhraSTamiti bhaumasya|      divyasya bhaumAdviCeSamAha-spRSTamiti|  divyameva bhUsambandhAdbhaumamucyate-|  taccArkAdibhiH spRCyate|  spRSTaM ca vyaktarasatvAdidoSasambandhAddhitAhitatve bhUyo deCakAlAvapekSate|  bhUyograhaNaM divyasyApi kiJciddeCakAlApekSatvaM dyotayati|  deCApekSA yathA-supAtrasthaM hitam, ahitaM duSpAtrastham|  vakSyati hi-"aindramambu supAtrasthamavipannaM sadA pibet|" iti|  kAlApekSA yathA-ArtavaM hitam, anArtavamahitam|  vakSyati hi-"anArtavaM ca yaddivyamArtavaM prathamaM ca yat " iti|  bhaumaM tu bhUyastato~apyadhikamapekSate|  tatra deCApekSA yathA-jAGgale hitam, ahitamanUpe|  tatrApi CucyAdau hitam, ahitamaCucyAdau|  tatrApi kUpAdau hitam, ahitaM palvalAdau|  tatrApi supAtre hitam, ahitaM duSpAtre|  tatrApi kvaciddehe hitam, ahitaM kvacit ityAdi|  kAlApekSA yathA- CaradgrISmayorhitam, ahitamanyadA|  tatrApi divA hitam, ahitaM rAtrau|  tatrApi bhuktasya madhye hitam, ahitamantAdyoH, ityAdi|  divyaM sarvadA sarvatra sarveSAM hitam|

sa0-paGka-kardamaH| CaivAlaH-Caivalam| tRNaM-khaTaH| parNaM-patram| AvilaM cAstRtaM cAvilAstRtam, paGkAdibhirAvilAstRtaM paGkAdyAvilAstRtam| yathAsambhavamatra sambandhaH, tena paGkenAvilaM-kaluSaM, CaivAlAdibhirAstRtaM-saJchAditamiti bodhyam| tathA, sUryendupavanairadRSTaM-anAsevitaM, na pibet| tathA, abhivRSTaM-tatkAlapatitAnyavarSamiCrIbhUtaM kAlAntarACritam| kharanAde tvevamuktam- "vArSikaM tadaharvRSTaM bhUmiSThamahitaM jalam| vyuSTaM dvirAtraM taccaiva prasannamamRtopamam||" iti| tathA, ghanaM-asvaccham| tathA, guru-guruguNam| tathA, phenilaM phenavat| tathA, jantumat-kITayuktam| tathA, taptaM-uSNam| tathA, atiCaityataH-atijADyAt, dantagrAhi-dantAn gRhNAti kAryAkSamAn karoti, tacchIlam| na pibediti pratipadaM yojyam| ityayaM prAyo bhUmiSThatoyasya niSedhaH| adhunA AntarikSaM yanna peyaM tadAha-anArtavamityAdi| yaddivyaM jalamArtavaM na bhavati, tacca na pibet| nanu, sarvameva divyaM jalamArtavam, kAlasya RturUpatvAt| Rtau ca bhavamArtavam| evaM ca na kiJcidanArtavaM sambhavati| ucyate| anArtavaM na pibet| arthAdArtavaM pibedityuktaM bhavati| tadatra sAmAnyoktAvapi viCiSTo divyasya jalasya kAla RturUpo bodhyo varSAkhyaH, yasmin kAle divyaM jalaM peyatvenAbhyanujJAyate| yathA-"varSAsu divyanAdeye" ityAdi| anyartubhavaM tvanArtavatvAnna peyam| atra ca varSAkhya RtuCcAturmAsiko~abhipretaH| ata evACvayuje mAsi divyaM jalaM peyatvenAnujajJe| anyathA hyanArtavatvAttadapeyameva syAt| ArtavaM prathamaM ca yat - na kevalamanArtavaM na pibet yAvadArtavamapi prathamaM na pibet| kuto heto: ? ityAha-lUtAdItyAdi| lUtA AdiryeSAM te lUtAdayaH,-kSudrajantavaH prANiviCeSAH, teSAM tantuviNmUtraviSANi| tantuH-sUtrAkAraviCeSo, lAletyanye| teSAM lUtAditantuviNmUtraviSANAM saMCleSaH-samparkaH, tena dUSitaM yataH, tatastadArtavamapi na peyam| kecittvevaM vyAkhyAnayanti-ArtavaM prathamaM ca yattanna peyam, lUtAditantvAdidUSitaM ca na peyamiti|  saGgrahe cAdhyagISTa (sU.a.6)- "tatkuryAtsnAnapAnAbhyAM tRSNAdhmAnodarajvarAn| kAsAgnisAdAbhiSyandakaNDUgaNDAdikAnataH|| tadvarjayedabhAve vA toyasyAnyasya Casyate| ghanavastraparisrAvaiH kSudrajantvabhirakSaNam|| vyApannasyAsya tapanamagnyarkAyasapiNDakaiH| parNIMmUlabisagranthimuktAkatakaCaivalaiH|| vastragomedakAbhyAM vA kArayettatprasAdanam| pATalAkaravIrAdikusumairgandhanACanam||' iti|

 anabhiSyandi laghu ca toyaM kvathitaCItalam||18||  pittayukte hitaM doSe, vyuSitaM tattridoSakRt||18||

sa0-anabhiSyandi-na CleSmakAri| laghuguNayogo~ambhaso~astyeva, punarlaghutvakathanamagnisaMskAravaCAllaghutaratvapratipattyartham| athavA, AdhArAdivaCAdakvathitamambho laghvapi yadguru sampannam, tadapi kvathitaCItalaM laghu bhavati| CItalatvAdabhiSyanditvaM yattoyasya prAptam, tatkvathitaCItalatvenAsya niSiddham| madAtyayAdihantRtvaM tu yacchItalatvasAmAnyAttadasyAstyeva, na kenacinniSeddhuM sambhAvyate| pittayukta ityekavacanamavivakSitam, tena vAtapitte pittaCleSmaNi sannipAte ca yatra pittayogaH-pittAdhikatvaM dRCyate, tatraitat kvathitaCItalaM jalaM hitam| saGgrahoktaM (sU.a.6) tatkvathanalakSaNaM saGkSepAbhiprAyeNeha noktam| yathA-"kSINapAdatribhAgArdhaM deCartugurulAghavAt| kvathitaM phenarahitamavegamamalaM hitam||" iti| asyArthaH CiSyavyutpattyai darCyate-dhanvasAdhAraNAnUpeSu deCeSu kramaCaH kSapitacaturbhAgatribhAgArdhaM salilamadhiCrapet| jAGgalo hi deCo~anilAnalAbhyAM bhUyiSThamadhiSThitaH, tenAtra toyaM lAghavAdACu viCuddhiM prApnoti| AnUpastu bhUmisomaguNabahulaH, tatra gurutvAdiguNayogAccireNa viCuddhimaCnute| evaM sAdhAraNo deCaCcintyaH| tathA, RtuSvapi yathAyogamayameva kramo bodhyaH| suCrute tUktam (sU.a.45|40)- "yatkvAthyamAnaM nirvegaM niSphenaM nirmalaM laghu| caturbhAgAvaCiSTaM tu tattoyaM kapharoganut|| tatpAdahInaM pittaghnaM, hInamardhena vAtanut|" iti| saGgrahoktameva (sU.a.6) granthamimaM kecidatrA~api paThanti| yathA_    "pAnIyaM na tu pAnIyaM pAnIye~anyapradeCaje|         ajIrNe kvathitaM cAme pakve jIrNe~api netarat||         CIte vidhirayaM, tapte tvajIrNe CiCiraM tyajet|         atiyogena salilaM tRSyato~api prayojitam||         prayAti CleSmapittatvaM jvaritasya viCeSataH|" iti|    anyapradeCaje pIte pAnIye ajIrNe pAnIyaM-jalaM, na pAnIyaM-na peyam| etaduktaM bhavati-pAnIye pIte tajjaraNAntaM yAvat vijAtIyaM jalaM na peyamiti| anyapradeCaja iti ko~arthaH? kaupe pIte tADAgaM na peyam, tADAge pIte kaupaM na peyam, evaM sarvatra cintyam| tathA, Ame-apakve jale, ajIrNe kvathitaM ca jalaM na peyam| pakve-kvathite, pIte jIrNe~api, itarat-AmaM jalaM na peyam, yAvanna bhuGkte tAvatsajAtIyamapi na peyamityarthaH| CIte vidhirayaM-kvathitaCIta etadvidhAnamityarthaH| turavadhAraNe| tapte~ajIrNa eva CiCiraM tyajet, jIrNe tu CItaM pibedityarthaH| atiyogena-atibAhulyena, tRSyataH-tRSNAvato~api prayojitaM-upayuktaM, sarvasyApi narasya CleSmapittatAM yAti| jvaritasya viCeSataH-yata AmenAgnau bahiSkRte jvarasyotpattiH, Amasya ca pAnIyaM vardhakamiti| saGkSepatayA~alpopayogitvAcca avaCyAyAdiguNA granthakRtA noktAH| tAMCcAtra CiSyahitAya brUmaH-"rUkSastanuravaCyAyaH CIto vAtAsrakopanaH| pAnatRDdAhapittAsrakuSThorustambhamehajit|| grISme tu sarvajantUnAM sparCanAdapi Casyate| padminyambu ca pittaghnaM kaphakRdvirasaM guru|| himaM tu CItalaM rUkSaM dAruNaM sUkSmameva ca| kaphaM na sandUSayati na pittaM na ca mArutam|| tathA~aCmavarSaM prAleyaM himAdalpAntaraM guNaiH| carAcarANAmahitaM, tuSAraM tvagninACanam|| (suCrute sU.a.45|35)-  'vaikiraM laghu sakSAraM CleSmaghnaM vahnidIpanam| kaidAraM madhuraM proktaM vipAke guru doSalam|| tadvatpAlvalamuddiSTaM vipAke doSalaM tu tat| anekadoSamAnUpaM vAryabhiSyandigarhitam|| ebhirdoSairasaMyuktaM niravadyaM tu jAGgalam| pAke~avidAhi tRSNAghnaM praCastaM prItivardhanam|| dIpanaM svAdu CItaM ca toyaM sAdhAraNaM laghu|' candrakAntabhavaM rakSoviSapittajvarApaham|| ratnAkarasamutthaM ca sarvadoSakaraM matam||" iti|

 alpAmbupAnavyAyAmakaTutiktACanairlaghu|||24||  AjaM CoSajvaraCvAsaraktapittAtisArajit||24||

vamanakAryaM karoti, na tu vamananivAraNaM madhukAryam| evaM madhu harItakIsaMyogAdvirecanakAryameva karoti, na madhukAryaM stambhanarUpamiti| ye tvatraivaM pratipannAH,-madanaphalAdeH CaktyutkarSastathAvidho~asti yena madhusambandhikAryamavadhUya, svaM kAryaM karotIti, te caivaM codayanto bhavantIti vacanIyAH| yataH stambhanadravyeNAnyena yena kenacitsaMyuktasya sudhAkSIrasyApi CaktiH kiJcidapahIyamAnA dRSTA, madhunA tu stambhanasvabhAvenApyasya nApahIyate manAgapi| ato madhvAdereva yogavAhitvaM nAnyasya| api cAnyadA yogavAhi dravyaM trivRtAdimadanaphalena yuktaM sadvirecanaM vamanaM cobhayakAryaM kurvaddRSTam, na kevalaM vamanameva virecanameva vA| tasmAnmadhvAdereva yogavAhitvamiti sthitametat| tattulyeti madhusamA guNairmadhuCarkarA

A0 ra0-madhuguNAnAha-cakSuSyamiti|  yatsaMhatAn kaphAdIn viCleSayati tat-chedi|  CodhanaM-duSTapUyAdinirharaNam|  sandhAnaM-vicchinnAsthyAdisaMCleSakam|  ropaNaM-kSINamAMsAdivardhanam|  nanu, iha vAtalaM suCrutavAkye tridoSaCamanamiti virodhaH|  maivam|  viSayabhedAt|  yatra Cuddho vAyuH CuddhaM madhu, tatra vAtalatvam|  yatra vAtaghAtibhirmiCraM madhu pittAdyairvyAmiCro vAyuH, tatra vAtaghnatvam|  ubhayoryogavAhitvAt|  suCrutena hi pittaCleSmaghnatvaM paThitvA tridoSaCamanatvaM paThatA pittaCleSmANau Cuddhau vAtamiCrau vA, vAyu tu miCrameva madhu hantIti dyotitam|  yacca carakeNa madhuno gurutvamuktaM suCrutena laghutvamuktam, tatra gurutvaM guNena, laghutvaM pAkenetyavirodhaH|  carako hi gurulaghuguNAvevecchati|  suCrutastu pAkAvapi|  tatra yaccireNa pacyate tadguruguNam, yacchIghraM tallaghuguNam, yatpakvaM viNmUtre sRjati CleSmANaM karoti tadgurupAkam, yadviNmUtre gRhNAti vAyuM karoti tallaghupAkam|       madhuCarkarAguNAnAha-tattulyeti|  tattulyA-madhusadRCaguNA|  vahnipAkAtkAlapAkAdvA CarkarArUpatAM gataM madhu-madhuCarkarA|

pracchardane nirUhe ca madhUSNaM na nivAryate||54|| alabdhapAkamACveva tayoryasmAnnivartate||54|| itIkSuvargaH||54||

sa0-tacca madhu pracchardane-vamane, tathA nirUhe ca uSNaM na nivAryate-na niSidhyate| yasmAtkAraNAt, tayoH-vaminirUhayoH, alabdhapAkaM-apakvamevACu nivartate-punarAgacchati| itIkSuvargaH|

A0 ra0-uSNavirodhasyApavAdamAha-pracchardana iti|  alabdhapAkamapi cirakAlasthitaM viruddhopakramairajIrNAdivikArairmadhu hantItyACcevoktam|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a.6)-"viSAnvayatvena viSapuSpebhyo~api yato madhu|  kurvate te svayaM yacca saviSA bhramarAdayaH||  gururUkSakaSAyatvAcchaityAccAlpaM hitaM madhu|  na hi kaSTatamaM kiJcittadajIrNAdyato naram||  upakramavirodhitvAtsadyo hanyAdyathA viSam|  nAnAdravyAtmakatvAcca yogavAhi paraM madhu||  vRSyayogairato yuktaM vRSyatAmanuvartate|  bhrAmaraM pauttikaM kSaudraM mAkSikaM ca yathottaram||  [varaM syAdbhrAmaraM CuklaM, ghRtavarNaM tu pauttikam|  kSaudraM tu kapilaM proktaM tailAbhaM mAkSikaM smRtam||  viCeSAdgurvabhiSyandi bhrAmaraM svAdu tarpaNam|  kSaudraM satiktamadhuraM laghu rUkSaM viCodhanam||  pauttikaM bRMhaNaM rUkSaM kaphavraNahitaM laghu|  maNDaH purANo madhurastIkSNo rUkSo laghustanuH||] varaM jIrNaM ca teSvantye dve eva viniyojayet|" iti|  itIkSuvargaH|

atha tailavargaH||55|| tailaM svayonivattatra mukhyaM tIkSNaM vyavAyi ca||55|| tvagdoSakRdacakSuSyaM sUkSmoSNaM kaphakRnna ca||55||   kRCAnAM bRMhaNAyAlaM sthUlAnAM karCanAya ca||56|| baddhaviTkaM kRmighnaM ca saMskArAtsarvarogajit||56||

sa0-sarvaM tailaM svakAraNasamaguNaM bhavati| yato yadabhinirvRttaM tatsvarUpameva tadityarthaH| tatra-taileSu madhye, mukhyaM-tilodbhavaM, yattailaM tattIkSNaM-mandaviparItam| tathA, vyavAyi-vyAptiCIlam, yaddehaM vyApya pAkaM yAti| tathA, tvagdoSakRt-pAnAbhyAsena tvacaM dUSayati| acakSuSyaM-cakSuSe hitaM na bhavati| sUkSmaM-sUkSmasrotogAmi| uSNaM-uSNavIryam| svayonivadityatideCAtkaphakRttvaM prAptamityAha-kaphakRnna ca,-kaphaM na karoti| saGgrahe~apyuktam (sU.a.7)-"medhyastilaH sparCaCIto, medhyaM tailaM, khalo himaH| tasyaiva CleSmakartRtvaM, na tailasya khalasya vA||" iti| pAnakastvAyurvedAvatAre~adhijage-"vipAke kaTukaM tailaM vAtaghnaM kaphapittakRt|" iti| nanu ca, tailamiti kathamasya mukhyaM nAma ? yato yathA tilasya vikAraH snehastailamityucyate, tathairaNDAdInAmapi yo vikAraH snehaH so~api tailamityucyate| munirapyAha (ca.vi.a. 8|21)- "atailamapi tailameva kRtvopadekSyate, tailaprAdhAnyAt|" snehaprAdhAnyAditi yAvat| sAmAnAdhikaraNyaprayogo~ata evopapannaH| yathA-kausumbhaM tailamairaNDaM tailamiti| atrocyate| tilasyedaM vastu tailamityanvarthatA tilodbhavasyaiva tailasya sambhavati, na kausumbhAdInAm| api ca, kausumbhaM tailamityAdau tailaCabdaH kANDAdivyavacchedaparaH sambhAvyate| yathA-kausumbhaM tailaM, na patraM kANDaM veti| idaM tailaM tailamityatra tu sAmAnAdhikaraNyena yadi tailaCabdo nirdiCyate tataH pUrvasmAttailaCabdAtsnehAbhidhAyino~adhikamarthAntaraM na vakti| nanu, atrApi tailaCabdaH kasmAtkANDAdivyavacchedaparo  na bhavati ? iti cet brUmaH| rUDhirUpatvAttailaCabdasya| snehaviSaya eva tailaCabdo rUDhaH, na kANDapatrAdiviSaye| tilasya hi kANDaM patraM vA na tailamityucyate, kiM tarhi ? tilapatraM tilakANDamiti| ata eva  tailaCabdoccAraNasya samanantaraM snehaviSayaiva dhIrjAyate, na patrakANDAdiviSayA| tasmAdasyaivaitanmukhyaM nAmeti yuktamuktam| saMskArAnuvartitvena sarvarogajittvAccAsya mukhyatvam| tathA coktam-"saMskArAtsarvarogajit" iti| kusumbhAdInAM tilaCabdasya ca snehanArthavAcye vikAre snehe tailacpratyaye sati kusumbhatailameraNDatailaM tilatailamiti rUpaM bhavati| kRCAnAM puMsAM bRMhaNAya-bRhattvAya, alaM-paryAptam| sthUlAnAM ca karCanAyAlam| nanu, kathamekasmAdvastuno viruddhaM kAryadvayaM karCanatvabRMhaNatvarUpaM syAditi ? brUma:| kRCAnAM tAtvatsrotAMsi saGkocamAyAnti| saGkucitasrotasAM ca narANAM tailamantareNAnyAni dravyANi bRMhaNaguNayuktAnyapi na tathA praveSTuM samarthAni bhavanti| tailaM punaH saGkucitAni srotAMsi tIkSNAdibhirguNairjhaTityeva praviCya Codhayati| srotaHCuddhyA ca CarIrapuSTiH| tathA ca vakSyati (hR. ci. a. 8|43)- " srotaHsu takraCuddheSu raso dhAtUnupaiti yaH| tena tuSTirbalaM varNaH paraM puSTiCca jAyate||" iti| tasmAtkRCAnAM bRMhaNAyAlamityupapannam| tathA, sthUlAnAM sUkSmasrotogAmitvAtsarvasrotaHsu tailaM praviCya tIkSNoSNAdiguNayogAnmedaH kSapayati| tatkSapaNAcca karCanaM sampadyate, iti sthUlAnAM karCanAya cetyapyupapannam| snehAdiguNayogAttailasya bRMhaNatvakarCanatve siddhe sati 'kRCAnAM bRMhaNAyAlaM sthUlAnAM karCanAya ca|' ityuktaM jJApanArtham| yaditthaMbhUtaM tIkSNAdiguNayuktamanyadapi, tat kRCAnAM bRMhaNAyAlaM sthUlAnAM karCanAya ceti| baddhetyAdi| baddhA viT yena tadbaddhaviTkam| kapsamAsAntaH| grathitapurISamityarthaH| tathA, kRmighnam| saMskArAdityAdi| viCiSTadravyakRtaM saMskAramACrityACeSarogajit|

A0 ra0-atha tailavargaH|  tatra tailasAmAnyaguNAnAha - tailamiti|  svayonivat-svakAraNavat|  yathA-tilatailaM tilaguNam, sarSapatailaM sarSapaguNamiti|          tatra yAni tailAni svayonerviCiSTAni teSAM guNAH|  tatra tilatailaguNAnAha-tatra mukhyamiti|  mukhyaM-tilatailam|   mukhyamiti vadatA tailaCabdaprayoge tilatailaM grAhyamiti dyotayati, 'gauNamukhyayormukhye kAryasampratyayaH' iti nyAyAt|  yadAdau dehaM vyApnoti paCcAjjIryati tat-vyavAyi|  uSNaM-uSNasparCam|  uSNavIryatvaM ca svayonivadityanena labdham|  alaM-samartham|  nanu, ekasya bRMhaNasamarthatvakarCanasamarthatve anupapanne|  maivam|  kRCasya hi srotAMsi saGkucitatvAtsamyagrasaM na vahanti, sthUlasya tu pUrNatvAt|  tailaM tu sUkSmavyavAyitIkSNoSNatvAt srotAMsi Codhayati|  CuddheSu srotaHsu rasaH samyagvahan kRCasya dhAtupuSTiM vidhatte, sthUlasya dhAtusAmyam|  baddhaviTkaM-baddhapurISam|  dravyAntarasaMyogajanitaM guNAntaraM-saMskAraH|  nanu, atra "tvagdoSakRdacakSuSyaM kaphakRnna ca" iti|  suCrute tu (sU.a.45|112)-"tvakprasAdanaM...cakSuSyaM...anilabalAsakSayakaram|" iti virodhaH|  maivam|  tvagdoSakaratvamacakSuSyatvaM cAbhyavahAre|  tvakprasAdanatvaM cakSuSyatvaM cAbhyaGge|  uktaM hi (hR. sU. a. 2|8)-"dRSTiprasAdapuSTyAyuHsvapnasutvaktvadArDhyakRt|" iti|  anilabalAsakSayakaratvaM saMsargaviSayam|  uktaM hi saGgrahe (sU.a.13) agryeSu samudAyanirdhAryeSu-"tailaM vAtaCleSmapraCamanAnAm" iti|

vasA majjA ca vAtaghnau balapittakaphapradau||61|| mAMsAnugasvarUpau ca, vidyAnmedo~api tAviva||62|| iti tailavargaH||62||

sa0- vasA-tanurUpeNa CuddhamAMsasya snehaH| majjA-dhAtuH| tau vAtanACanau| tathA, mAMsAnugasvarUpau-yasya prANinaH sambadhi mAMsaM tatsadRCarUpau| medo~api tAviva-vasAmajjJoH sadRCasvarUpaM vidyAt| saMkSepatayA cAyaM tailavarga ihoktaH| tathA ca saGgrahe~adhikamapyuktam (sU.a.6)-"dantImUlakarakSoghnakaraJjAriSTaCigrujam| suvarcaleGgudIpIluCaGkhinInIpasambhavam|| saralAgurudevAhvaCiMCapAsArajanma ca| tuvarAruSkarotthaM ca tIkSNaM kaTvasrapittakRt|| arCaHkuSThakRmiCleSmaCukramedo~anilApaham| karaJjanimbaje tikte nAtyuSNe tatra nirdiCet|| kaSAyatiktakaTukaM sAralaM vraNaCodhanam| bhRCoSNatIkSNakaTuke tuvarAruSkarodbhave|| viCeSAtkRmikuSThaghne tathordhvAdhovirecane| akSAtimuktakAkSoDanAlikeramadhUkajam|| trapusairvArukUSmANDaCleSmAtakapriyAlajam| vAtapittaharaM vRSyaM CleSmalaM guru CItalam|| pittaCleSmapraCamanaM CrIparNIkiMCukodbhavam| tilatailaM varaM teSu kausumbhamavaraM param|| vasA majjA ca vAtaghnau balapittakaphapradau| mAMsAnugasvarUpau ca vidyAnmedo~api tAviva|| taulUkI CaukarI pAkahaMsajA kukkuTodbhavA| vasA CreSThA svavargeSu kumbhIramahiSodbhavA|| kAkamadguvasA tadvatkAraNDotthA ca ninditA| CAkhAdamedasAM chAgaM hAstinaM ca varAvaram||" iti|  iti tailavargaH|

A0 ra0-vasAmajjaguNAnAha-vasA majjA ceti|  vasAmAMsasnehaH|  majjA-SaSTho dhAtuH|  mAMsAnugasvarUpau-yasya prANino yau vasAmajjAnau, tasya mAMsena tau sadRCaguNau|         medoguNAnAha-vidyAditi|  medaH-caturtho dhAtuH|  tAviva-vasAmajjavadvAtaghnAdiguNam|  tailavarge snehatvasAmyAdvasAdInAmuktiH|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a.6)-"tailaprayogAdajarA nirvikArA jitaCramAH|  AsannatibalA yuddhe daityAdhipatayaH  purA||  dantImUlakarakSoghnakaraJjAriSTaCigrujam|  suvarcaleGgudIpIluCaGkhinInIpasambhavam||  saralAgurudevAhvaCiMCipAsArajanma ca|  tuvarAruSkarotthaM ca tIkSNaM kaTvasrapittakRt||  arCaH-kuSThakRmiCleSmaCukramedo~anilApaham|  karaJjanimbaje tikte nAtyuSNe tatra nirdiCet||  kaSAyatiktakaTukaM sAralaM vraNaCodhanam|  bhRCoSNatIkSNakaTuke tuvarAruSkarodbhave||  viCeSAtkRmikuSThaghne tathordhvAdhovirecane|  akSAtimuktakAkSoDanAlikeramadhUkajam||  trapusairvArukuSmANDaCleSmAtakapiyAlajam|  vAtapittaharaM keCyaM CleSmalaM guru CItalam||  pittaCleSmapraCamanaM CrIparNIkiMCukodbhavam|  tilatailaM varaM teSu kausumbhamavaraM param||  caulUkI saukarI pAkahaMsajA kukkuTodbhavA|  vasA CreSThA svavargeSu kumbhIramahiSodbhavA||  kAkamadguvasA tadvat kAraNDotthA ca ninditA|  CAkhAdamedasAM chAgaM hAstinaM ca varAvaram||" iti|  iti tailavargaH|

atha madyavarga||62|| dIpanaM rocanaM madyaM tIkSNoSNaM tuSTipuSTidam||62|| sasvAdutiktakaTukamamlapAkarasaM saram||63|| sakaSAyaM svarArogyapratibhAvarNakRllaghu||63|| naSTanidrA~atinidrebhyo hitaM pittAsradUSaNam||64|| kRCasthUlahitaM rUkSaM sUkSmaM srotoviCodhanam||64|| vAtaCleSmaharaM yuktyA pItaM viSavadanyathA||65||

sa0-sarvaM madyaM dIpanAdiguNayuktam| tuSTiH-cittaparitoSaH, puSTiH-CarIrapoSaH, te dadAti-janayati, yattattuSTipuSTidam| Ato~anupasarge kaH| tathA ISanmadhuratiktakaTukam| tathA, amlau pAkarasau yasya tadevam| tathA, saram| tathA sakaSAyam| tathA, svaraCcArogyaM ca pratibhA ca varNaCca tAn karoti| nanu, sarvANyeva dravyANyArogyArthamupadiCyante| tasmAdArogyakRtvaM sarveSAmeva dravyANAM prAptam| kimiti madyasyaivArogyakRttvamucyate ? yuktamAha bhavAn| kintvatiCayakhyApanArthametat| madyamatiCayenArogyakRdityarthaH| tathA, laghu| tathA, naSTanidrebhyo narebhyo~atinidrebhyaCca hitam| sarvameva madyaM prabhAvAditi kecit| anye tvevaM manyante, yathA-surAdi yanmadyaM CleSmAdivardhanaM, tannaSTanidrebhyo hitam| yacca mAdhavAdi madyaM CleSmAdihantR, taccAtinidrebhyo hitamiti| tathA, pittAsradUSaNam| tathA, kRCebhyaH sthUlebhyaCca hitam, iti sAmAnye~api nirdeCe~atrAyaM viCeSo bodhyaH,-kiJcinmadyaM kRCAya hitaM kiJcitsthUlAyeti| athavA, tailoktanyAyena kRCasthUlahitatvaM bodhyam| tathA, rUkSaM| tathA, sUkSmaM-srotogAmi| tathA, sroto viCodhayati| tathA, vAtaCleSmaharam| yuktyA pItaM sadevaMguNaM madyaM bhavati| yuktistu-madAtyayanidAne cikitsite ca vakSyamANA| anyathA-ayuktyA pItaM sat, viSatulyaM bhavati|

A0 ra0-atha madyavargaH|  drAkSAdisandhAnaM madyamucyate|  uktaM hi saGgrahe (sU.a.6)-"drAkSekSumAkSikaM CAliruttamA vrIhipaJcamAH|  madyAkarA yadebhyo~anyattanmadyapratirUpakam||" iti|  tatra sAmAnyamadyaguNAnAha-dIpanaM rocanamiti|  tuSTiH-santoSaH|  puSTiH-balavRddhiH, CarIravRddheH kRCahitatvena labdhatvAt|  saCabdastribhiH sambadhyate|  pratibhA-prajJA|  nanu, ekameva nidrAM karoti hanti ceti viruddham|  maivam|  pravRddhavAto hi naSTanidro bhavati, tasyAmavasthAyAM vAtaghnatvAnnidrAM  karoti|  pravRddhaCleSmA cAtinidraH, tasyAmavasthAyAM CleSmaghnatvAnnidrAM hanti|  kRCasthUlahitaM tailoktanyAyena|  yuktyA pItamevaMvidham|  vakSyati hi (hR. ni. a. 6/41)-"balakAladeCasAtmyaprakRtisahAyAmayavayAMsi|  pravibhajya tadanurUpaM yadi pibati tataH pibatyamRtam||" iti|

 guru taddoSajananaM navaM, jIrNamato~anyathA||65||

peyaM noSNopacAreNa na viriktakSudhAturaiH||66|| nAtyarthatIkSNamRdvalpasambhAraM kaluSaM na ca||66||

sa0-tacca madyamuSNopacAreNa na peyam|  uSNo-vihArAhArAdika upacAro yasya sa evam, tena|  na viriktetyAdi|  kRtavirecanena na peyam, doSAsAmyAditi bhAvaH|  tathA, kSudhArtena na peyam|  tathA, atitIkSNamatimRdu ca madyaM na peyam|  alpasambhAramiti|  yadyAvatA sambhAreNa lokaprasiddhena sandhIyate surAdi, tatra tadapekSayA cAlpasambhAraM na peyam|  tathA, kaluSaM-asvacchaM pAMsuCarkarAdibhiryuktaM, ca na peyam|

A0 ra0-madyapAnaM niyacchati-peyaM noSNopacAreNeti|  uSNopacAreNa-uSNamAhAraM sUryasantApAdikaM vA sevamAnena|  viriktaiH-kRtavirecanaiH|  kSudhAturaiH-atikSudhitaiH|  atyarthaM tIkSNaM-atitIvramadam|  atyarthaM mRdu-madAnutpAdakam|  alpasambhAraM-asampUrNakAraNasAmagrIkam|  kaluSaM-malinam|

 gulmodarArCograhaNICoSahRt snehanI guruH||67|| surA~anilaghnI medo~asRkstanyamUtrakaphAvahA||67||

sa0--surA gulmAdihRdbhavati|  tathA, snehayatIti snehanI|  tathA, gururvAtanACinI ca|  tathA, medaCcAsRk ca stanyaM ca mUtraM ca kaphaCca tAnAvahati|

A0 ra0-surAguNAnAha-gulmeti|  CAlipiSTakRtaM madyaM -surA|  snehanI-dehasnigdhatvakRt|  medaHprabhRtInAvahati-karotIti tathA|

tadguNA vAruNI hRdyA laghustIkSNA nihanti ca||68|| CUlakAsavamiCvAsavibandhAdhmAnapInasAn||68||

sa0-evaM vAruNI-prasannA|  ta eva suroktA guNA yasyAH sA tadguNA, surAsamaguNetyarthaH|  tathA, hRdayAya hitA-hRdyA|  tathA, laghustIkSNA ca|  CUlAdInnihanti ca|  vibandhaH-srotasAmupalepena doSAdInAmavahanam|  jagalamedakabakkasAnAM sutarAmanupayogitvAdguNA nehoktAH|  saGgrahe (sU.a.6) tUktA eva|  yathA-"jagalaH pAcano grAhI rUkSastadvacca medakaH|  bakkaso hRtasAratvAdviSTambhI doSakopanaH||" iti|  vAruNyA adhobhAgo ghano-jagalaH|  jagalasyAdhobhAgo-medakaH|  pAnIyena madyakalkapIDa(ne)notpanno-bakkasaH|

A0 ra0-vAruNIguNAnAha-tadguNeti|  vAruNI-CvetasurA|  sA ca CvetapunarnavAdimUlayuktena CAlipiSTena kriyate|  tadguNA-surAtulyA|  vibandhaH-vAtarodhaH|  AdhmAnaM-udarApUraH|  vAruNI-acchasureti kecit|  tanna|  tasyAH kaphaghnatvAt|  uktaM hi suCrutena (sU.a.45/178)-"prasannA kaphavAtArCovibandhAnAhanACinI" iti|

nAtitIvramadA laghvI pathyA baibhItakI surA||69|| vraNe pANDvAmaye kuSThe na cAtyarthaM virudhyate||69|| viSTambhinI yavasurA gurvI rUkSA tridoSalA||70||

sa0-bibhItakAnAmiyaM baibhItakI|  nAtitIvro mado yasyAH saivam|  tIvramadaM na janayatItyarthaH|  tathA, laghvI|  tathA, pathyA|  tathA, vraNAdiSu cAtyarthamanyamadyavanna virudhyate|

A0 ra0-baibhItakIguNAnAha-nAtitIvramadeti|  bibhItakavalkalayuktaCAlipiSTakRtA-baibhItakI surA|  nAtitIvramadA-madhyamamadA|  pathyA-svasthahitA|  yavasurAguNAnAha-viSTambhinIti|  yavapiSTakRtaM madyaM-yavasurA|

yathAdravyaguNo~ariSTaH sarvamadyaguNAdhikaH||70|| grahaNIpANDukuSThArCaH CophaCoSodarajvarAn||71|| hanti gulmakRmiplIhnaH kaSAyakaTuvAtalaH||71||

sa0-ariSTo yo yairdravyaiH siddhaH, sa tadguNAnanugacchati|  sarvaiCca dIpanatvAdibhirmadyaguNairadhikaH|  tantrAntare coktam-"madyAkarAdhikadravyaM madirAdyAtmakaM tvataH|  yathAdravyaguNo~ariSTaH sarvamadyaguNAdhikaH||" iti|  grahaNyAdikAMCca rogAn hanti|  tathA, kaSAyakaTuCcAsau vAtalaCca sa evam|  lakSaNaM cAsya prAguktam (a. 3|22)|

A0 ra0-ariSTaguNAnAha-yathAdravyaguNa iti|  auSadhayuktairmadyAkaraiH kRtaM madyaM-AsavaH|  sa eva kvathitauSadhaiH-ariSTaH|  yathAdravyaguNaH-svauSadhAnurUpaguNaH|  auSadhagarbhatvAt sarveSu madyeSvadhikaguNaH|  CoSo-rAjayakSmA|  kaSAyakaTuCcAsau vAtalaCca, kaSAyakaTuH san vAtala ityarthaH|  amlAdirasastu vAtaghnaH|  yathoktaM suCrutena (sU.a.45/194)-"ariSTo dravyasaMyogasaMskArAdadhiko guNaiH|  dIpanaH kaphavAtaghnaH saraH pittAvirodhanaH||" iti|

mArdvIkaM lekhanaM hRdyaM nAtyuSNaM madhuraM saram||72|| alpapittAnilaM pANDumehArCaHkRminACanam||72||

sa0-mArdvIkaM-drAkSArasodbhavaM, lekhanatvAdiyuktam|  tathA, alpau pittAnilau yasya tadevam|  anyamadyApekSayA~alpatarau karotItyarthaH|  tathA, pANDvAdinACanam|  "vilikhatyatitaikSNyAdyaddhAtUMstallekhanaM matam|"

A0 ra0-mArdvIkaguNAnAha-mArdvIkamiti|  mArdvIkaM -drAkSAkRtaM madyam|  lekhanaM-lInamalotkhananam| alpapittAnilakaraM-anyamadyApekSayA|

 asmAdalpAntaraguNaM khArjUraM vAtalaM guru||73||  CArkaraH surabhiH svAduhRdyo nAtimado laghuH||73||

sa0-khArjUraM madyamasmAt-mArdvIkAdalpAntaraguNam|  alpAntarAH-kiJcidviCeSA guNA yasya tadevam|  tathA, vAtalaM guru ca|  drAkSAsavaCcAnyatroktaH|  yathA-"CuSkadrAkSAmbusambhUto viCado rocano himaH|  drAkSAsavo madhusamo bRMhaNo bhRCadIpanaH||' iti|  CArkaraH-CarkarAsambandhI madyaviCeSaH, surabhiH-sugandhirbhavati|  tathA, svAduCca (CcAsau) hRdyaCca svAduhRdyaH|  tathA, nAtimado laghuCca bhavati|

sRSTamUtraCakRdvAto gauDastarpaNadIpanaH||74||

sa0-guDasambandhI-gauDaH, sRSTamUtratvAdibhirguNairyuktaH|  tathA, tarpaNaCcAsau dIpanaCca tarpaNadIpanaH|

A0 ra0-gauDaguNAnAha-sRSTamUtreti|  guDakRtaM madyaM-gauDaH|  sRSTAH-pravartitAH, mUtrAdayo yena sa tathA|  tarpaNaH-tRptijananaH|

vAtapittakaraH sIdhuH snehaCleSmavikArahA||74|| medaH CophodarArCoghnastatra pakvaraso varaH||75||

sa0-sIdhuH vAtapittakaraH|  tathA, snehavikArAn CleSmavikArAMCca hanti|  brahmabhrUNavRtreSvityatra caturvidhasya niyamasya prAyikatvAt kvip|  sIdhuH-apakvekSurasakRtaH pakvekSurasakRtaCca|  tatra sIdhvormadhye, pakvaraso medaHCophodarArCAMsi hanti, CreSThaCca bhavati|  medaHCophodarArCoghna iti "amanuSyakartRke ca" iti Thak|

A0 ra0-sIdhuguNAnAha-vAtapittakara iti|  ikSurasakRtaM madyaM-sIdhuH|  snehavikArAn-snehavyApadaH, CleSmavikArAMCca hantIti tathA|  sa ca sIdhurdvividhaH,- CItarasaH pakvarasaCca|  apakvenekSurasena kRtaH-CItarasaH, pakvena-pakvarasaH|  tayormadhye pakvarasaH CreSThaH|

chedI madhvAsavastIkSNo mehapInasakAsajit||75||

sa0-madhvAsavo-mAkSikeNa sandhIyate mAdhavAkhyo madyaviCeSaH, chedI tIkSNo mehAdinACanaCca|  aSTAGgasaGgrahe tu (sU.a.6) surAsavAdayo gaditAH|  tathA cApaThat-"surAsavastIvramadaH svAdustIkSNo~anilApahaH|  maireyo madhuro vRSyaH saraH santarpaNo guruH||" ityAdi|  tatra madhunaiva surAsandhAnena yA kriyate, tAM surAM surAsavamAhuH|  maireyaH-kodravairjAyate|

A0 ra0-madhvAsavaguNAnAha-chedIti|  madhukRtaM madyaM - madhvAsavaH|  AsavaCabdo madyamAtravacanaH|  chedI-saMhatakaphAdiviCleSI|

annasvarUpavijJAnIyaH     adhyAyaH

athAto~annasvarUpavijJAnIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-annasya svarUpaM-svabhAvo rasavIryavipAkaprabhAvaguNakarmAdi, tasya vijJAnaM-avagama:, tasmai hito~adhyAyaH-annarUpavijJAnIyaH, taM vyAkhyAsyAmaH| CeSaM pUrvavadvyAkhyeyam| dravyaCabdaCcAprayukto~apyarthasya gamaka ityannadravyasvarUpavijJAnIya iti draSTavyam| tathA hi pUrvasminnadhyAye mandamatiprabodhanAya prayukto dravyaCabdaH|AcAryA hi vaicitryeNa grantharacanAM vidadhati| tatra   prAk svarUpaCabdo na nirdiSTaH, iha ca dravyaCabdaH| athavobhayamaprayuktamapi gamyate madhyalopAkhyayA tantrayuktyA~antalopAkhyayA ca| adyate yattat-annaM dhAnyamAMsAdi|  dhAnyaM ca dvidhA CUkaCimbIdhAnyabhedena| tatra prAdhAnyAcchUkadhAnyasya pUrvamupanyAsaH| prAdhAnyaM cAsya bhUyastvopayogitvAt|CimbIdhAnyasya tu tadvyaJjanatvena svalpopayogitvAt prAyeNApathyatvAccApradhAnyam, ityAha--

A0 ra0-annasvarUpavijJAnIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-atheti|  yataH pUrvAdhyAye drava AhAra uktaH, iha tvadravaH|  sa cAnnaCabdavAcyaH|  ata evAyamannasvarUpavijJAnIyaH|  tatra saptavargAH|  vakSyati hi (hR.sU.a. 6/172)- "CUkaCimbijapakvAnnamAMsaCAkaphalauSadhaiH|  vargitairannaleCo~ayamukto nityaupayogikaH||" iti|

atha CUkadhAnyavargaH|||1|| rakto mahAn sakalamastUrNakaH CakunAhRtaH||1||  sArAmukho dIrghaCUko rodhraCUkaH sugandhikaH||1|| puNDraH pANDuH puNDarIkaH pramodo gaurasArivau||2||  kAJcano mahiSaH CUko dUSakaH kusumANDakaH||2|| lAGgalA lohavAlAkhyAH kardamAH CItabhIrukAH||3|| pataGgAstapanIyACca ye cAnye CAlayaH CubhAH||3|| svAdupAkarasAH snigdhA vRSyA baddhAlpavarcasaH||4|| kaSAyAnurasAH pathyA laghavo mUtralA himAH||4||

sa0- tatra raktaCAlimahACAlI-suprathitAveva| kalamo -magadhAdiSu prasiddhaH| sa eva mahAtaNDula iti kACmIreSu| tUrNakaCca-tatraiva Ajava iti prasiddhaH| CakunAhRto-yo magadheSu buddhotpAdakAla uttarakurubhyo haMsairAnIto bhRGgArapAtre viCAkhAkhyayA vApito vistaraM gataH| ata eva CakuninA~~AhRtaH CakunAhRta ityanvarthA~asya saMjJA| sArAmukhaH-kRSNaCUkaH| CuklAkAro- dIrghaCUkaH| rodhraCUko- rodhrapuSpAkAraCUkaH| sugandhiko- gandhaCAlisaMjJayA jAlandharamagadhAdiSu khyAtaH, devaCAlirityaparanAmA mAlavadeCe gauDe cAtiprasiddhaH| evaM pataGgAdayo nAnAdeCeSu kArSakAdibhyo~avadhAryAH| CUke jAtAH CUkajAH, teSu madhye raktAdyAstapanIyAntA anye ca ye CAlayaH CubhAH- raktAdisadRCAH, te sarve svAdupAkarasatvAdiyuktAH| baddhaM- grathitamalpaM ca  varcaH- purISaM kurvantIti baddhAlpavarcasaH, te evaM kAraNe kAryopacArAduktAH| kaSAyo~anuraso yeSAM ta evam| pathyAH- svabhAvenaiva hitAH | tathA, laghavo mUtrakAriNaH CItavIryACca|

A0 ra0-tatrAdau CUkadhAnyavargaH|  tatrAdau CAlayaH|  tatra raktaCAlyAdiguNAnAha-rakto mahAniti|  raktAdayo-deCabhedena svanAmaprasiddhAH|  CubhAH-nirdoSAH|  baddhAlpavarcasaH,- baddhaM-piNDIkRtaM, alpaM-stokaM, varcaH-purISaM, yebhyaste tathA|  nanu, iha CAlayo madhurapAkA uktAH, suCrutena (sU.a. 46/5)-"madhurA vIryataH CItA laghupAkA balAvahAH|" iti virodhaH, laghupAkatvameva hi kaTupAkatvam|  maivam|  rasavadavirodhaH|  pAko-rasaviCeSaH|  rasAstvekasmin dravye bahavo~anubhUyante|

 CUkajeSu varastatra raktastRSNAtridoSahA||5||

sa0-tatra-teSu mahACAlikalamAdiSu madhye, rakto-raktaCAlisaMjJo varaH, tRSNAM vAtAdIMCca tridoSAnnihanti| asya ca   prAgupAdAnenaiva varatve labdhe varagrahaNaM yuktyA~agnyAdisaGgrahArtham| tathA ca, -"varSAsu divyanAdeye  paraM toye varAvare|" iti | tathA,-"gavye kSIraghRte CreSThe" tathA ,- CarkarekSuvikArANAM phANitaM ca varAvare" tathA,- " varo~atra mudgo~alpacalaH" " mASo~atra sarveSvavaro yavakaH CUkajeSu ca |" ityAdIni vAkyAni pradeCAntareSvayamevAvocadAcAryaH

A0 ra0-raktaCAliguNAnAha-CUkajeSviti|  tatra-teSu CAliSu madhye, rakto-raktaCAliH, CUkajeSu varaH|  tathA ca khAraNAdiH-"pathyatve CUkadhAnyAnAM pravarA raktaCAlayaH|" iti|  ata eva 'CUkajeSu CAlayo varAH, teSu CAliSu rakto varaH' iti vyAkhyAnamasat|  tRSNAtridoSahA-tRSNAghnastridoSaghnaCca|

mAhAMstamanu kalamastaM cApyanu tataH pare||5||

sa0-tasyAnu-raktaCAleH paCcAt, mahAn CAlirvaraH| taM   ca-mahAntamanu kalamaH, mahatsaMjJAt kalamaH kiJcidUna ityarthaH|  tataH-anantaram, pare-anye CAlayo~avarA jJeyAH

A0 ra0-mahACAlyAdInAM guNAnAha-mahAMstamanviti|  tamanu-raktaCAlerhIno mahAn|  taM cApyanu-kalamo mahato hInaguNaH|  pare-tUrNakAdayaH, tenaiva nyAyena hInAH|  tena yo yasmAduttaraH sa  tasmAddhInaH|  nanu, raktaCAlyAdInAM yathottaramapakarSa ucyate, sa ca pAThakramamapekSate, sa tu pratitantraM bhidyate|  tadyathA-"lohitaCAlikalamakadambakapANDukasugandhikaCakunAhRtapuSpANDakapuNDarIkamahACAliCItabhIrurodhrapuSpakadIrghaCUkakAJcanamahiSaCUkahAyanadUSakamahAdUSakaprabhRtayaH CAlayaH|  madhurA vIryataH CItA laghupAkA balAvahAH|  pittaghnAlpAnilakaphAH snigdhA baddhAlpavarcasaH||  teSAM lohitakaH CreSTo doSaghnaH CukramUtralaH|  cakSuSyo varNakRtsvaryo hRdyo balyastRSApahaH||  vraNyo jvaraharaCcaiva sarvadoSaviSApahaH|  tasmAdalpAntaraguNAH kramaCaH CAlayo~aparAH||' iti suCrutaH (sU. a. 46/4)|  "raktaCAlirmahACAliH kalamaH CakunAhRtaH|  tUrNako dIrghaCUkaCca gauraH pANDukalAGgalau||  sugandhikA lohavAlAH sArivAkhyAH pramodakAH|  pataGgAstapanIyACca ye cAnye CAlayaH CubhAH||  CItA rase vipAke ca madhurAH svalpamArutAH|  baddhAlpavarcasaH snigdhA bRMhaNA mUtraCukralAH||  raktaCAlirvarasteSAM tRSNAghnastrimalApahaH|  mahAMstamanu kalamastaM cApyanu tataH pare||" iti carakaH (sU.a. 27/7)|  "raktaH CyenAhRto gauraH sugandhaH kAJcano mahAn|  pataGgaH kalamaH pANDurlohavAlaH pramodakaH|| dIrghanAlaH CItabhIruH sArivaH CaGkhamauktikaH|  tUrNako dIrghaCUkAkhyo lAGgalAdyACca CAlayaH|| CItalA madhurAH snigdhA grAhiNo mAMsaCukralAH|  vAtapittaharA balyAH sRSTamUtrAH sahAyanAH||  snigdhaH CIto laghurgrAhI tRSNAghnaH CukramUtralaH|  raktaCAlistridoSaghnaH kalamo~anu  mahAMstataH||' iti khAraNAdiH|  "rakto mahAn sakalamaH"  ityAdyayam|  evameva saGgrahe (sU.a.7)|  tasmAtko~atra kramaH?  ucyate|  iha raktaCAliCabdena mRdumadhurasnigdhasurabhiCuklaviCadasthUlAyatatvAdInAM lokaprasiddhAnAM svaguNAnAmutkarSa upalakSyate|  teSu yathA yathA samutkarSasta uttamAH|  yathA yathA apakarSaste hInAH|  upalakSaNAni punarvakturvivakSAbhedAdbhinnAni|  yAneva guNAn suCrutakhAraNAdI kalamaCabdenopalakSayataH, tAneva carakavAgbhaTau mahACAliCabdena|  nanu, sambandhaM vinA nopalakSaNatvam, na ca kalamasya mahACAliguNairmahACAlervA kalamaguNaiH kadAcitsambandhaH|  maivam|  yada kalamo mahACAlikSetre niSpadyate, tadA tayostulyaguNatvAt|  svakSetrajAdeva mahACAleH svakSetraja eva kalamo hInaH|  evamitareSvapi vAcyam|  tasmAtsarvameva pramANam, uktaprakAreNAvirodhAt|

yavakA hAyanAH pAMsubASpanaiSadhakAdayaH||6|| svAdUSNA guravaH snigdhAH pAke~amlAH CleSmapittalAH||6|| sRSTamUtrapurISACca pUrvaM pUrvaM ca ninditAH||7||

sa0-yavakAdayaH CAliviCeSAH svAdavaH| tathA, uSNAdiguNayuktAH| tathA, sRSTe mUtrapurISe yaiste sRSTamUtrapurISAH| pUrvaM   pUrvaM ca ninditAH-tena yavakAH sarvebhyo~api garhitAH, tadanvanye  kiJcitkiJcitkrameNa garhitA iti vijJeyam| naiSadhakAdaya ityatrA~~AdiCabdena campakapatrikAdayaH CAliviCeSA gRhyante|

A0 ra0-yavakAdiCAliguNAnAha-yavakA iti|  *pAMCubASpaH-korakaH|  pUrvaM pUrvaM ca ninditAH-yo yasmAtpUrvaH sa tasmAddhInaguNaH, mRdvAdiviparItaguNAnAmutkarSAt|

snigdho grAhI laghuH svAdustridoSaghnaH sthiro himaH||7|| SaSTiko vrIhiSu CreSTho gauraCcAsitagaurataH||8||

sa0-vrIhiSu madhye SaSTikaH CreSThaH, raktaCAliriva CAliSu| tathA, snigdhAdiguNayuktaH| sthiro hima iti CarIrasthairyakaro jvaraCramaklamaglAniharaH| ata eva rasAyanaprayoge jvarAdau   ca tatra tatra kSAmavapuSAmupadiSTaH| yavastu sthairyakaro~api nAmnAto guruvAtalatvAditi vedyam| SaSTikaCca dvividhaH,-gauraH kRSNagauraCca| atrAsitagaurato gauraH SaSTikaH CreSTaH| (tathA ca suCrute (sU.a.46|9)-"rase pAke ca madhurAH pittAnilaharAstathA|  CAlInAM ca guNaistulyA vijJeyAH kaphaCukralAH|| SaSTikaH pravarasteSAM kaSAyAnuraso laghuH|" kRSNAtreyaH:-SaSTikaH surakavrIhipATaloTakanAlakAH| kRSNavrIhiH CItabhIruH pramodo hAyanastathA|| anabhiSyandinaH snigdhAH kaSAyamadhurA himAH| laghavaH kaTupAkACca SaSTiko~atrApi pUjitaH||" khAraNAdiH- "kaSAyamadhuro grAhI doSaghnaH SaSTiko laghuH|" parACare~apyuktam- "rakto mahAMcchakunAhRtaH SaSTikakalamapramodapataGgAH CItagauradIrghaCUkasugandhikapANDutapanIyAH CAlaya evaMbhUtAH| madhurabahalAH sthirAH snigdhAH pittAnilapraCamanA laghavaH saGgrAhikAH CItAH|" iti| carake tvevaM paThyate (sU.a.5|3)-"tatra  CAliSaSTikamudgalAvakapiJjalaiNaCaCaCarabhavarAhAdInyAhAradravyANi prakRtilaghUnyapi mAtrApekSINi bhavanti|" tathA ca carako jvare paThati (ci.a.3|176)-"raktaCAlyAdayaH CastAH purANAH SaSTikaiH saha| yavAgvodanalAjArthe jvaritAnAM jvarApahAH||" iti|)

A0 ra0-SaSTikaguNAnAha-snigdha iti|  grAhI-stambhanaH|  sthiraH-sthiraguNaH, kAryarUpeNa CarIre cirakAlaM tiSThatItyarthaH|  yo vrIhiH SaSTirAtreNa pacyate sa SaSTikaH|  sa cAnyebhyo vrIhibhya uttamaH|  sa ca trividhaH,- gauraH kRSNaH kRSNagauraCca|  tatrAsitagaurAdgauraH CreSThaH|  pAriCeSyAdasito hInaH|

tataH kramAnmahAvrIhikRSNavrIhijatUmukhAH||8|| kukkuTANDakalAvAkhyapArAvatakaCUkarAH||9|| varakoddAlakojjvAlacInaCAradadardurAH||9||  gandhanAH kuruvindACca guNairalpAntarAH smRtAH||10||

sa0-tataH-SaSTikAt, mahAvrIhyAdayaH kramAdguNairalpAntarAH-guNairhInAH|

athAto~annasvarUpavijJAnIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-annasya svarUpaM-svabhAvo rasavIryavipAkaprabhAvaguNakarmAdi, tasya vijJAnaM-avagama:, tasmai hito~adhyAyaH-annarUpavijJAnIyaH, taM vyAkhyAsyAmaH| CeSaM pUrvavadvyAkhyeyam| dravyaCabdaCcAprayukto~apyarthasya gamaka ityannadravyasvarUpavijJAnIya iti draSTavyam| tathA hi pUrvasminnadhyAye mandamatiprabodhanAya prayukto dravyaCabdaH|AcAryA hi vaicitryeNa grantharacanAM vidadhati| tatra   prAk svarUpaCabdo na nirdiSTaH, iha ca dravyaCabdaH| athavobhayamaprayuktamapi gamyate madhyalopAkhyayA tantrayuktyA~antalopAkhyayA ca| adyate yattat-annaM dhAnyamAMsAdi|  dhAnyaM ca dvidhA CUkaCimbIdhAnyabhedena| tatra prAdhAnyAcchUkadhAnyasya pUrvamupanyAsaH| prAdhAnyaM cAsya bhUyastvopayogitvAt|CimbIdhAnyasya tu tadvyaJjanatvena svalpopayogitvAt prAyeNApathyatvAccApradhAnyam, ityAha--

atha CUkadhAnyavargaH|||1|| rakto mahAn sakalamastUrNakaH CakunAhRtaH||1||  sArAmukho dIrghaCUko rodhraCUkaH sugandhikaH||1|| puNDraH pANDuH puNDarIkaH pramodo gaurasArivau||2||  kAJcano mahiSaH CUko dUSakaH kusumANDakaH||2|| lAGgalA lohavAlAkhyAH kardamAH CItabhIrukAH||3|| pataGgAstapanIyACca ye cAnye CAlayaH CubhAH||3|| svAdupAkarasAH snigdhA vRSyA baddhAlpavarcasaH||4|| kaSAyAnurasAH pathyA laghavo mUtralA himAH||4||

sa0- tatra raktaCAlimahACAlI-suprathitAveva| kalamo -magadhAdiSu prasiddhaH| sa eva mahAtaNDula iti kACmIreSu| tUrNakaCca-tatraiva Ajava iti prasiddhaH| CakunAhRto-yo magadheSu buddhotpAdakAla uttarakurubhyo haMsairAnIto bhRGgArapAtre viCAkhAkhyayA vApito vistaraM gataH| ata eva CakuninA~~AhRtaH CakunAhRta ityanvarthA~asya saMjJA| sArAmukhaH-kRSNaCUkaH| CuklAkAro- dIrghaCUkaH| rodhraCUko- rodhrapuSpAkAraCUkaH| sugandhiko- gandhaCAlisaMjJayA jAlandharamagadhAdiSu khyAtaH, devaCAlirityaparanAmA mAlavadeCe gauDe cAtiprasiddhaH| evaM pataGgAdayo nAnAdeCeSu kArSakAdibhyo~avadhAryAH| CUke jAtAH CUkajAH, teSu madhye raktAdyAstapanIyAntA anye ca ye CAlayaH CubhAH- raktAdisadRCAH, te sarve svAdupAkarasatvAdiyuktAH| baddhaM- grathitamalpaM ca  varcaH- purISaM kurvantIti baddhAlpavarcasaH, te evaM kAraNe kAryopacArAduktAH| kaSAyo~anuraso yeSAM ta evam| pathyAH- svabhAvenaiva hitAH | tathA, laghavo mUtrakAriNaH CItavIryACca|

A0 ra0-tatrAdau CUkadhAnyavargaH|  tatrAdau CAlayaH|  tatra raktaCAlyAdiguNAnAha-rakto mahAniti|  raktAdayo-deCabhedena svanAmaprasiddhAH|  CubhAH-nirdoSAH|  baddhAlpavarcasaH,- baddhaM-piNDIkRtaM, alpaM-stokaM, varcaH-purISaM, yebhyaste tathA|  nanu, iha CAlayo madhurapAkA uktAH, suCrutena (sU.a. 46/5)-"madhurA vIryataH CItA laghupAkA balAvahAH|" iti virodhaH, laghupAkatvameva hi kaTupAkatvam|  maivam|  rasavadavirodhaH|  pAko-rasaviCeSaH|  rasAstvekasmin dravye bahavo~anubhUyante|

 atha CimbIdhAnyavargaH||17|| mudgADhakImasUrAdi CimbIdhAnyaM vibandhakRt||17|| kaSAyaM svAdu saGgrAhi kaTupAkaM himaM laghu||17|| medaHCleSmAsrapitteSu hitaM lepopasekayoH||18||

sa0- CimbyAH-koCyAH, dhAnyaM-mudgAdikaM, yat CimbIdhAnyaM tadvibandhakRt| keSAM vibandhaM karoti ? sAmarthyAt srotasAm, na tu purISAdInAm| tathA ca saGgrAhItyatraiva paThati CAstrakRt| saGgrAhilakSaNaM ca tantrAntare| yathA-"bhedi tatpiNDitAn bhAvAn CakRdAdInbhinatti  yat| viparItamato grAhi" iti| tasmAdvibandhaM  srotasAmevetyavehi| tathA, kaSAyaM svAdu kaTupAkaM CItavIryaM laghu ca| masUrAdItyatrA~~AdiCabdena makuSThacaNakAdInAM grahaNam| tathA, medaAdiSu hitam, prakRtatvAdabhyavahAre tathA lepa upaseke ceti| caCabdo~atra luptanirdiSTo bodhyaH| lepaH-pradehaH| upasekaH-pariSekaH| kaSAyaCItarUkSatvena kaTupAkitvena ca vAtakRttvaM CimbIdhAnyasya CAstrakRtoktam| ata evedamupapannam-"mudgo~alpacalaH" iti| yadi hi CimbIdhAnyasya mArutakRttvaM sameyAt, tadaitadvaktuM yujyate| tasmAt vAtakRttvamasyAstIti sthitam| tasmiMCca satyAdhmAnakAritvamapyupapannameva| ata eva saGgrahe~asyAdhmAnakAritvamuktam| mudgAdInAM ca viCeSAstatraivoktAH (saM. sU. a. 7)| yathA-"haritAsteSvapi varA makuSThAH kRmikAriNaH| varNyAH paraM pralepAdyairmasUrA grAhiNo bhRCam||" iti|

A0 ra0-atha CimbidhAnyavargaH|  tatra mudgAdiguNAnAha -mudgADhakIti|  mudgo dvividhaH,-kSetramudgo vanamudgaCca|  ADhakI -tuvarI|  masUro dvividhaH,- kRSNaH pANDuCca|  tatra pANDuH-maGgalyAkhyaH|  AdiCabdAtsaGgrahoktAH (sU. a. 7)- "CimbijA mudgamAGgalyavanamudgamakuSThakAH|  masUracavalADhakyaCcaNakACca pRthagvidhAH||" iti|  CimbibhavaM dhAnyaM-CimbidhAnyam|  vibandhakRt-vAtAvarodhakam|  saGgrAhi-malAvarodhakam|  lepopasekayoH prayuktaM medaH prabhRtiSu hitam|  upaseko-vyaJjanam, yena miCrIkRtyaudanAdi bhujyate|  sa cAtra yogyatvAtsUpaH|  uktaM ca carakeNa (sU. a. 27/27)- "pittaCleSmaNi Casyante sUpeSvAlepaneSu ca|" iti|

 varo~atra mudgo~alpacalaH, kalAyastvativAtalaH||18|| rAjamASo~anilakaro rUkSo bahuCakRdguruH||19||

A0 ra0-tilaguNAnAha-uSNa iti|  uSNaH-uSNavIryaH|  tvacyaH-tvagdoSaharaH, bahiHprayogAt| "kuSThaM tatkAryapi tilo hanti bhallAtakaiH saha|" iti saGgrahe (sU. a. 7) kuSThakartRtvaCravaNAt|  nanu, "tilo vipAke madhuro~atibalyaH snigdho vraNe lepana eva pathyaH|" iti suCrutena (sU. a. 46/39) vipAke madhuratvamuktam, iha tu kaTukatvamiti virodhaH|  maivam|  rasavadavirodhaH|  ekasmin dravye hi bahavo rasA anubhUyanta iti|  bhinnatilayorbhinnarasayorvA vipAkaH|  sa ca kRSNaH CreSThaH|  uktaM ca saGgrahe (sU.a. 7)-kRSNaH praCastastamanu Cuklastamanu cAruNaH|" iti|

 mASo~atra sarveSvavaro, yavakaH CUkajeSu ca||25||

sa0-atra-CimbIdhAnyeSu, mASo~aCreSThaH| CUkajeSu-CUkadhAnyeSu, yavako~aCreSThaH|

A0 ra0-mASasya sarvadhAnyAvaratvamAha-mASo~atreti|         yavakasya CUkadhAnyeSvavaratvamAha-yavakaH CUkajeSviti|  cakAro~avaratvAkarSaNArthaH|

iti CimbidhAnyavargaH||1||  navaM dhAnyamabhiSyandi, laghu saMvatsaroSitam||25||  CIghrajanma tathA sUpyaM nistuSaM yuktibharjitam||26||

sa0- navaM pratyagraM, dhAnyamabhiSyandi-Abhimukhyena syandayati| tAcchIlye NiniH| mAlinyAtsrotasAM srutirUpaM CleSmANaM karotItyarthaH| arthAtpurANamanabhiSyandi| saMvatsaroSitaM-varSAtItaM, laghu bhavati| navaM cArthAdgurvityanuktamapyuktaM bhavati| tantrAntare~apyuktam- "varSasthitaM sarvamannaM parityajati gauravam| na tu tyajati tadvIryaM vIryaM muJcatyataH kramAt||" iti| CIghretyAdi| laghvityanuvartate| sUpyaM-mudgAdi yacchIghrajanma, tallaghu bhavati| tathA, vigatatuSaM yuktyA bharjitaM-bhRSTaM laghu bhavati| saGgrahe tvevamuktam (sU.a.7)-"navaM dhAnyamabhiSyandi sekyaM kedArajaM ca yat| laghu varSoSitaM dagdhabhUmijaM sthalasambhavam|" iti| iti CimbIdhAnyavargaH|   

A0 ra0-navadhAnyaguNAnAha-navaM dhAnyamiti|  abhiSyandi-srotaHsrAvi|       purANadhAnyaguNAnAha-laghu saMvatsaroSitamiti|  saMvatsaroSitaM-saMvatsaramevoSitam, saMvatsaradvayAdyuSitasya nirvIryatvAt|  yadAha khAraNAdiH-"varSasthitaM sarvadhAnyaM parityajati gauravam|  na tu tyajati tadvIryaM, vIryaM muJcatyataH kramAt "|| iti|       CIghrajanmAdisUpyaguNAnAha-CIghrajanmeti| sUpe hitaM sUpyaM CimbIdhAnyam, tathA-tadvat, laghu ityarthaH|  CIghraM alpena kAlena, janma-niSpattiryasya tattathA|  nistuSaM-apanItatvak|  yuktyA-samyagyogena, bharjitaM-dravaM vinA sveditam|  navasyAbhiSyanditvAt purANasyAnabhiSyanditvam|  purANAdInAM laghutvAttadviparItAnAM gurutvamarthasiddham|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 7)-"haritAsteSvapi varA, makuSThAH kRmikAriNaH|  varNyAH paraM pralepAdyairmasUrA grAhiNo bhRCam||  kuCAmraCimbI madhurA vAtapittaharA himA|  madhurAH CItalA gurvyo balaghnyo rUkSaNAtmikAH||  snehADhyA balibhirbhojyA vividhAH CimbIjAtayaH|" iti|  iti CimbIdhAnyavargaH|

atha kRtAnna(pakvAnna)vargaH||26|| maNDapeyAvilepInAmodanasya ca lAghavam||26||  yathApUrvaM Civastatra maNDo vAtAnulomanaH||27|| tRDglAnidoSaCeSaghnaH pAcano dhAtusAmyakRt||27|| srotomArdavakRtsvedI sandhukSayati cAnalam||28||

sa0-maNDAdInAM yathApUrvaM lAghavam| tenaudanamapekSya laghvI vilepI, tato~api peyA, peyAto  maNDo laghutara ityartho~avatiSThate| maNDapeyAvilepyodanAnAM yathApurvaM lAghavamityeva vaktavye yadatraudanasya pRthakpAThaH, sa idaM jJApayati,-maNDAdayo lAjopAdAnA vedyAH, na tu taNDulopAdAnAH, yathA-odanaH, iti| tathA ca muniH (ca, sU,a.27/252)-"CRtaH pippaliCuNThIbhyAM yukto lAjAmbudADimaiH| maNDaH sandIpayatyagniM vAtaM cApyanulomayet||" iti| taduktam_"dravyasyArdhapalaM dattvA toyasya prasthamAvapet| ardhaCeSaM gRhItvA tatkarSau dvau dADimasya ca|| yuktaM saindhavaviCvAhvadhAnyakaiH CANamAtrakaiH| dvikarSamAtrairlAjaiCca bhUyaH saMkvathitaM ca tat|| pippalIjIrakAbhyAM ca CANaikenAvacUrNitam| peyAsveSa vidhiH kalpyo dADimAdikRtAsvapi||" iti| tathA (suCrute sU. a. 46|345)-"sikthairvirahito maNDaH peyA sikthasamanvitA| ghanasikthA vilepI syAdyavAgUrviraladravA||" iti| anye tu maNDalakSaNaM peyAlakSaNaM cAnyathaivecchanti| tathA tallakSaNam-"lAjAmbusaindhavakaNAdhAnyanAgaradADimaiH| yukto vimRditaH pUto maNDaH saMskRta ucyate|| nirdravyA prAkRtA peyA takradADimataNdulaiH|" iti| sAmAnyapeyAyACca takradADimalAjAdisAdhitAyA guNanirdeCo~ayam, na tu viCiSTAyA jvaracikitsAdivihitAyA iti draSTavyam| tasyAstu tatraivetyarthaH, viCeSagrahaNAtkarmAntaranirdeCAcca| tatra-teSu maNDAdiSu madhye, maNDaH CivaH| tathA, vAtAnulomanaH| tathA, tRSaM glAniM doSaCeSaM ca hantIti tRDglAnidoSaCeSaghnaH| "amanuSyakartRke ca" ityatra Thak| doSasya CeSo doSaCeSaH| eSa eva hi vihitavamanasya vihitavirecanasya vA kiJciccheSo yo doSaH, tasya| doSaCeSeti vacanajJApakAt kRtavamanavirecanasya doSaCeSakaraNam| tena ca vamanakarmaNi virecanakarmaNi vA kartavye~atiyogabhayAt doSaCeSaH kAryaH, ityayamartho yuktyA pratipAditaH| tathA, maNDaH pAcano dhAtusAmyakaraCca| tathA, srotasAM mArdavaM karoti| tathA, svedayatIti svedI, vahniM ca dIpayati|

A0 ra0-atha kRtAnnavargaH|  tatra maNDAdInAM laghutve tAratamyamAha-maNDapeyeti|  asiktho dravo-maNDaH, sasiktho-yavAgUH|  sA dvividhA,- alpasikthA-peyA, bahusikthA-vilepI|  adravANi sikthAni-odanaH|  yathApUrvaM odanAdvilepI laghuH tataH peyA, tato maNDa iti|       maNDaguNAnAha-Civastatreti|  CivaH-ArogyapradaH|  vamanalaGghanAdyavaCiSTo doSo-doSaCeSaH|  dhAtusAmyakRt-laGghanAdikRtadhAtuvaiSamyaCamanAt|  srotomArdavakRt-laGghanAdikRtasrotaHkAThinyaCamanAt|  svedI-svedavahasrotorodhaCamanAt|

kSuttRSNAglAnidaurbalyakukSirogajvarApahA||28|| malAnulomanI pathyA peyA dIpanapAcanI||29||

sa0-kSucca tRSNA ca, tAbhyaM glAniH, sA ca daurbalyaM ca kukSirogaCca jvaraCca, tAnapahanti yA saivaMbhUtA peyA| daurbalyaM- kArCyam| tathA, malAn-vAtAdIn, anulomayati-svamArgasthAn karoti| tathA, pathyA-CarIrasya hitA| tathA, dIpanI cAsau pAcanI ceti "puMvatkarmadhAraya" iti puMvadbhAvaH|

sudhautaH prasrutaH svinno~atyaktoSmA caudano laghuH||30|| yaCcAgneyauSadhakvAthasAdhito bhRSTataNDulaH||31|| viparIto guruH kSIramAMsAdyairyaCca sAdhitaH||31||

sa0-odanaH suSThu dhautastathA prasruto-niCcotitaH svinno~atyaktabASpaCca laghurbhavati| yaCcaudana AgneyauSadhAnAM-marIcacitrakAdInAM kvAthena sAdhitaH, so~atilaghuH| tathA, bhRSTAstaNDulA yasminnodane so~atilaghutamaH| yathoktalakSaNAdodanAdviparIto-yo~adhautAdiH, sa guruH| kSIramAMsAdibhiH-madhurairyaCca sAdhitaH, so~atiguruH|

A0 ra0-odanaguNAnAha-sudhauta iti|  sudhautAdiviCiSTa odano laghuH|  tadviparItaH kSIrAdisAdhitaCca guruH|  sudhautaH-samyakprakSAlitataNDulaH|  prasrutaH-samyakprasrAvitamaNDaH|  svinnaH-samyakpakvaH|  atyaktoSmA-CItatvamaprAptaH|  AgneyauSadhakvAthasAdhitaH- citrakAdikvAthaM dravasthAne datvA sAdhitaH|  bhRSTataNDulaH-bhRSTaistaNDulaiH sAdhitaH|  viparItaH-adhautataNDulAdiH|  yaCca kSIrAdIni dravasthAne datvA sAdhitaH|  mAMsaCabdenAtra mAMsarasaH|  AdyaCabdAtsnehAdayaH|  kSIrAdisAdhane udakaM prakSepyameva|  uktaM ca saGgrahe (ka. a. 8)-"kSIrAdisAdhitaM dravyaM na samyaGmuktarasaM bhavatIti vArikvAthapUrvakaM kSIrAdyaistadupadeCe~anupadagdhaM kvAthayet|" iti|

 iti dravyakriyAyogamAnAdyaiH sarvamAdiCet||32||

sa0-iti-anayA diCA, sarvaM-peyAdikaM pUrvoktaM vakSyamANaM ca bhakSyAdikaM, dravyeNa kriyayA saMyogena mAnena cAdiCet|  tatra dravyato yathA-odanasya raktaCAlyAdijasya lAghavam, yavakAdijasya tu gauravam| kriyAto yathA-sAkSAdagnipAkAdisaMskArAcchUlyasya mAMsasya laghvAdiguNayogaH, aparasya tvanyathAtvaM dRCyate| tathA coktaM tantrAntare-"vRSyaM vAtaharaM balyaM pathyaM CUlyAmiSaM laghu| apathyaM guru viSTambhi mAMsaM yacca rasoddhatam||" iti| tantrAntare coktam-"svinnaM mAMsaM guru stambhi CUlapakvaM tridoSajit|" iti| kriyA-saMskAra ityarthaH|  yogaH-saMyogaH, tena yathA-AgneyacitrakAdyauSadhakvAthaiH sAdhitasya lAghavam| mAnato yathA-bahubhirlaghubhiralpaiCca gurubhiryuktairlaghureva, viparItaistu viparIta eva| AdyagrahaNena deCAdiparigrahaH| jAGgaladeCaprabhavataNDulakRto laghuH, AnUpadeCataNDulakRto gururityAdi bodhyam|

A0 ra0-odanaprasaGgAdodanodAharaNAM paribhASAmAha-iti dravyeti|  iti-evamodanavat|  dravyAdInAM kAraNAnAM svarUpaM CAstreNa buddhvA kAryANAM svarUpamakathitamapi svabuddhyA nirdhArya mandabuddhInAM kathayedityarthaH|  tatra, kAryatvena pariNataM kAraNaM-dravyam|  tatpariNAmahetuH kartRvyApAraH-kriyA|  pradhAnadravye dravyAntarasamparko-yogaH|  saMyoginAM nyUnAdhikasamatvaM-mAnam|  AdyaCabdAddeCakAlau|  tatra, dravyasyotpattisthitipariNAmasthAnaM-deCaH|  utpattyAdisamaya AmAdyavasthACca-kAlaH|  tatra, dravyeNAdeCo yathA -raktaCAlInAmodanaH pathyo, yavakAnAmapathyaH|  kriyayA yathA-bhRSTavidalitanistuSIkRtAnaM sUpyAnAM sUpo laghuH, itareSAM guruH|  yogena yathA-marIcAdiyuktA mAMsabhakSyA laghavaH, marIcAdyayuktA guravaH|  mAnena yathA-miCrakaudane mudgAdyalpatvabahutvAbhyAM laghutvagurutve|  utpattideCena yathA-dagdhAvanijAtAnAM CAlInAmannaM laghu, itareSAM guru|  uktaM hi suCrutena (sU. a. 46/15)- "dagdhAyAmavanau jAtAH CAlayo laghupAkinaH|" iti|  sthitideCena yathA-durbhAjanasthAbhirdrAkSAbhiH kRtaM pAnakaM doSalam, itarAbhiradoSalam|  uktaM hi (saGgrahe sU.a.7)-"durbhAjanasthA drAkSA~amlA doSalA ca prajAyate|" iti|  pariNAmadeCena yathA-mRNmaye pAtre siddhAnAM tanDulAnAmodano guruH, tAmramaye laghuH|  utpattikAlena yathA-Artavena divyodakena siddhamannaM pathyam, anArtavenApathyam|  sthitikAlena yathArAtrimuSitena CRtaCItenAloDitamapathyam, itareNa pathyam|  pariNAmakAlena yathA-CIghrajanmanA sUpyena kRtaH sUpo laghuH, cirajanmanA guruH|  AmAdyavasthAkAlena yathA-Amena CuSkeNa vA mUlakena kRto yUSaH pathyaH, jIrNenArdreNa vA kRto~apathyaH|  ityAdi svabuddhyA sarvamUhyam|

 bRMhaNaH prINano vRSyaCcakSuSyo vraNahA rasaH||32||

sa0-rasa iti mAMsarasaH, AdiCabdalopAt| sa bRMhaNAdiguNayuktaH| kRtAkRtasya ca rasasyAyaM guNanirdeCo bodhyaH| raso hi snehaCuNThyAdiyutaH-kRta ityucyate, viparItastu-akRtaH| tatra kRtasya tantrAntare vidhAnamuktaM guNACca| yathA-"chAgalaM sakthijaM mAMsaM nirasthi taittiraM tathA| catuSpalonmitaM sUkSmaM kalpitaM kSAlitaM jale|| pippalIpippalImUlaCuNThIcitrakadhAnyakaiH| dviCANaiH saMyute toye kvAthyaM sArdhADhakonmite|| mAMse~asmin dvipalaM tatra dADimAtkuTTitAtkSipet| taM rasaM marditaM pUtaM hiGgusaindhavajIrakaiH|| yuktaM sudhUpitaM pathyaM CuddhAnAM CuddhikAGkSiNAm| CuSyatAM vyAdhimuktAnAM vraNinAM vAtarogiNAm|| bhagnaviCliSTasandhInAM kSINadhAtvindriyaujasAm|" iti| tantrAntare coktam-"rasastatra varo~anamlaH CAkuno bRMhaNaH saraH| takrasiddhastu viSTambhI laghurvAtakaphApahaH|| phalAmlagorasodAraM saviCvAjAjidhAnyakam| snigdhaM mAMsaM hitaM balyaM bRhaNaM rocanaM guru|| kAsamardakadhAnyAmladADimAdirajaHkRtAH| lehAstakrAdijACcAnye yonivadgururocanAH|| mAludhAnIyavAsAdipuSpairyo~atiguNaH khalaH| phalamUlairghanAdAnaM vyaJjanaM pAkato ghanam|| lehavatkhala ityanye doSalaH svasvayonivat| tadvacca tilakalkAmlaprAyaH kAmbaliko mataH|| kaTvaraH kaphajidgrAhI pittalo rocako laghuH| mAMsAdajAjiCuNThyAdigalitaH saTTako laghuH|| iti|

A0 ra0-mAMsarasaguNAnAha-bRMhaNa iti|  prINanaH-tRptijananaH|  raso-mAMsarasaH|  uktaM hi saGgrahe (sU.a.7)-"piCitena rasastatra, yUSo dhAnyaiH, khalaH phalaiH|  mUlaiCca tilakalkAmlaprAyaH kAmbalikaH smRtaH||" iti|  sa ca kRtAkRtadakalAvaNikabhedAttridhA|  uktaM hi saGgrahe (sU. a.7)-"jJeyAH kRtAkRtAste tu snehAdiyutavarjitAH|  alpamAMsAdayaH svacchA dakalAvaNikAH smRtAH||' iti|  tathA, tanusAndrabhedAdamlasvAdubhedAcca dvidhA|  uktaM hi saGgrahe (sU. a. 7)-"vidyAdyUSe rase sUpe CAke caivottarottaram|  gauravaM tanusAndrAmlasvAduSveSu pRthak pRthak||" iti|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 7)-"CuSyatAM vyAdhimuktAnAM narANAM CuddhikAGkSiNAm|  kRCakSAmakSatoraskakSINadhAtvindriyaujasAm||  dRSTiCravaNavanhyAyurbalavarNasvarArthinAm|  bhagnaviCliSTasandhInAM vraNinAM vAtarogiNAm||  hRdyaH pathyaH paraM vRSyo bRMhaNaH prINano rasaH|" iti|  CuSyatAM-vRddhiM tyajatAm|  kRCAnAM-sthUlatvaM tyajatAm|  kSAmANAM-balaM -tyajatAm|

 maudgastu pathyaH saMCuddhavraNakaNThAkSirogiNAm||33||

sa0-maudgo raso-yUSo, vraNinAM kaNTharogiNAM akSirogiNAM ca pathyaH| asya ca saMskRtasya vidhAnamuktam-"mudgAnAM dvipalaM toye CRtamardhADhakonmite| pAdasthaM marditaM pUtaM dADimasya palena tu| yuktaM saindhavaviCvAhvadhAnyakaiH pAdakArSikaiH| kaNAjIrakayoCcUrNAcchANaikenAvacUrNitam| saMskRto mudgayUSo~ayaM pittaCleSmaharo mataH|" tathA-"paTolapatrAcchANe dve mudgAnAM dvipalaM jale| dravyAddvAtriMCadguNite ardhasthe dADimAtpalam|| karSamAmalakAnAM ca kSiptvA punaradhiCrayet| pUrvaM tatsaindhavAdyaiCca yuktamAjyena yojitam|| paTolapatrakAkhyo~ayaM yUSaH pittottharogajit| nimbapatrairnimbayUSamevameva prakalpayet|| mulakAcchuNThikA svinnA ghRtabhRSTA sadhAnyakA| hiGgujIrakasaMyuktA tato mathitadADime|| sasaindhave vinikSipya punaragnAvadhiCrayet| tAvadyAvanmRdUbhUtaM tatastryUSaNasaMyutam|| sudhUpitaM hiGgughRtaiCcAturjAtAvacUrNitam|  CuNThIrasaM dIpanIyaM vAtaCleSmAmayApaham|| akRtAkRtayUSAcca rasAcca jalasAdhitAt| snehAmlapaTuyuktAcca pUrvaH pUrvo laghurmataH||  (saGgrahe sU. a. 7)-vidyAdyuSe rase sUpe CAke caivottarottaram| gauravaM tanusAndrAmlasvAduSveSu pRthak tathA||" tathoktam (saGgrahe sU.a.7)-"khalakAmbalikau hRdyau chedinau svauSadhAnugau| piCitena rasastatra, yUSo dhAnyaiH khalaH phalaiH|| mUlaiCca tilakalkAmlaprAyaH kAmbalikaH smRtaH| jJeyAH kRtAkRtAste tu snehAdiyutavarjitAH|| alpamAMsAdayaH svacchA dakalAvaNikAH smRtAH|" iti| svalpena mAMsena CuNThyadibhiH svalpaiH svacchA ye kriyante, te dakalAvaNikA bodhyAH| evaM yUSe yatra dhAnyamalpaM, khalAdau vA mUlAdInyalpAni, tatrApi dakalAvaNikatvaM bodhyam| tantrAntare coktam (suCrute sU.a.46|380)-"atha gorasadhAnyAmlaphalAmlairanvitaM ca yat| yathottaraM laghu hitaM saMskRtAsaMskRtaM tathA|| prabhUtAstamalo yUSaH sUpAllaghutaraH smRtaH| sUpastu rasayUSAbhyAM sthairyAdgurutaro mataH|| taM sarogo na cACnIyAnna cAlpACI kathaJcana|" iti|

A0 ra0-mudgayUSaguNAnAha-maudga iti|  rasa ityanuvartate|  maudgo raso-mudgayUSaH, "yUSo dhAnyaiH" (saM.sU.a.7) ityuktatvAt|  saMCuddhAdInAM pathyo-hitaH|  kaNThAkSibhyAM rogaCabdaH sambadhyate|

 tilapiNyAkavikRtiH CuSkaCAkaM virUDhakam||34||  CaNDAkIvaTakaM dRgghnaM doSalaM glapanaM guru||34||

A0 ra0-tilavikRtyAdInAM guNAnAha-tilapiNyAkavikRtiriti|  tilavikRtiH-mayUrANDakAdiH|  uddhRtatailastilAdipiNDaH, piNyAkaH tadvikRtiH-piNDavaTakAdideCIyA|  CuSkaCAkaM-CuSkavArtAkakaccarikAdi|  virUDhakaM-aGkuritaM dhAnyam|  kRtAnnaprastAvAdaGkuritadhAnyakRtamannaM grAhyam|  yena vaTakena CANDAkI kriyate tat-CANDAkIvaTakam|  dRgghnaM -dRSTinACanam|  doSalaM-tridoSakaram|  glapanaM-glAnikaram|

 rasAlA bRMhaNI vRSyA snigdhA balyA rucipradA||35||

sa0-rasAlA-karamathitena marIcaCarkarAdiyuktena dadhnA kRtA ullekhikAsaMjJA, bRMhaNI-dehasya bRhattvakarI, vRSyAdiguNayuktA ca|

 CramakSuttRTklamaharaM pAnakaM prINanaM guru||35|| viSTambhi mUtralaM hRdyaM yathAdravyaguNaM ca tat||36||

sa0-pAnakaM CramAdiharaM prINanAdiguNayuktam| prINanaM-manaH prItikaram| yathAdravyaguNaM ca-svasvadravyaguNena ca yuktam| parpaTAdInAM lAghavAdiha guNA noktAH| yathA (saGgrahe sU. a. 7)-"parpaTA laghavo rucyA laghIyAn kSAraparpaTaH| hRdyA vRSyA rucikarA guravo rAgakhANDavAH|| prINanA bhramatRTchardimadamUrcchACramacchhidaH|" iti|

A0 ra0-pAnakaguNAnAha-CramakSuttRDiti|  guDAmlikAdisaMskRtamudakAdi dravaM-pAnakam|  yathAdravyaguNaM-yairdravyaiH kriyate tadguNAnanuvartate|  etena suCrutAdibhiruktAnAM drAkSAdipAnakAnAM guNA uktAH|

 saktavo laghavaH kSuttRTCramanetrAmayavraNAn||38|| ghnanti santarpaNAH pAnAtsadya eva balapradAH||39||  nodakAntaritAnna dvirna niCAyAM na kevalAn||39|| na bhuktvA na dvijaiCchittvA saktUnadyAnna vA bahUn||40||

sa0-saktavo laghavaH, kSudhAdIMCca ghnanti| tathA, udakapItAH santarpaNAH, sadya eva balaM kurvanti| tAMCca jalenAntaritAn-vyavahitAn, nACnIyAt| anyabhojaneSu hyantarApAnaM vihitam, na tathA saktuSu kAryamiti bodhayati| (apare tvevamAhuH-Adau piNDI madhye jalamante ca piNDItyudakAntaritA iti|) tathA, na dviH-dvau vArau nAdyAt| na niCAyAM- rAtryAm| na kevalAn-udakAdirahitAn| na bhuktvA-anyadbhojanAdi| na dvijaiCchittvA-dantaiH karasthAM piNDIM chittvetyarthaH| bahUMCca saktUnnAdyAt| tantrAntare coktaM rUkSavAtalatvaM saktUnAmiha noktam, laghutvAdinaivAvagatatvAt| nanu, rUkSavAtalatvaM cedabhyupagamyate saktUnAm, tataH santarpaNA ityanupapannam| sadya eva balapradA ityetadapyayuktam| bhukto hyAhAraH pariNaman rasadhAtugato dhAtupuSTaye, nAnyathA| atrAcakSmahe| prabhAvAdubhayamapyetaduktam| saktUnAM hyayamacintyaH pratyakSavedyaH prabhAvaH,yatpItAH santaH sadyaH santarpayanti| sadya eva ca balaM prayacchanti| vAjIkaraNaM hi-apariNatameva svakAryaM janayati| tathA ca madyaM,-apariNatameva madaM janayati| tasmAtsantarpaNatvaM balapradatvaM caiSAmupapannameva| tantrAntare coktam-"tulyAjyaH saktuprACastu vRSyo bhedI rasAyanam| (saM.sU.a.7)-'tRTchardiCramanunmanthaH CItastRSNAnivartakaH|| pramehakSayakuSThAni na ca syurmanthapAyinAm| nicayAtkaThinA gurvI piNDI proktA mRdurlaghuH|| saktUnAM dravatAyogAllaghIyasyavalehikA|' lAjasaktukRtA~api syAdvilepI tu garIyasI||" iti|

A0 ra0-saktuguNAnAha-saktava iti|  bhRSTAnAM nistuSayavAnAM cUrNaM-saktavaH|  pItA eva balapradAH, na tu bhakSitA lIDhA vA|  sadya eva, na tUttarakAlamityevaCabdArthaH|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a. 7)-"nicayAtkaThinA gurvI proktA piNDI laghurmRduH|  saktUnAM dravatAyogAllaghIyasyavalehikA||  CaSkulImodakAdInAM vyAkhyAtaivaM ca kalpanA|  karkandhubadarAdInAM CramakSuttRTklamacchidaH||  saktavo~amlarasA hRdyA yathAdravyaguNACca te|" iti|         saktubhakSaNaM niyamayati-nodakAntaritAniti|  yeSAM bhojanamadhye udakaM pIyate te-udakAntaritAH|  dvau vArau - dviH|  kevalAn-udakAdirahitAn|  dvijaiCchittvA-karasthAM piNDIM dantairvicchidya bhakSitAn|  bahUn-atimAtrAn|  udakAntaritAdInAM pratyekaM niSedhakaraNatvAt pRthak nakArakaraNam|

 piNyAko glapano rUkSo viSTambhI dRSTidUSaNaH||40||

sa0-piNyAkAkhyo-yastilAdInAM niSpIDitatailaH kalko, glapano-glAnikaraH| glapana iti glAyaterNijantAt "glAsrAvanuvamAM ca" iti mittvAddhrasvaH, bAhulakAtkartari lyuT| tathA, viSTambhI dRSTivikArakRcca|

A0 ra0-piNyAkaguNAnAha-piNyAka iti|  uddhRtatailastilAdipiNDaH-piNyAkaH|  glapano-glAnikaraH|  dRSTidUSaNaH-dRSTirogapradaH|

 vesavAro guruH snigdho balopacayavardhanaH||41||

sa0-vesavAro-nAgaradhAnyakAjAjihiGgughRtAdisaMskRtaM kuTTitaM mAMsam| sa guruH snigdho balavardhanaH CarIropacayavardhanaCca|

A0 ra0-vesavAraguNAnAha-vesavAra iti|  svinnaM piSTaM guDajIrakAdivimiCritaM mAMsaM-vesavAraH|  upacayaH-vapuSpuSTiH|

 mudgAdijAstu guravo yathAdravyaguNAnugAH||41||

sa0-mudgAdijAstu vesavArA ye iNDarikAdibhirdravyaiH sUkSmacchinnaiH kriyante loke pUraNaCabdena prasiddhAH, te guravaH prakRtidravyaguNACca| AdiCabdena mASAdayo gRhyante| (anye tvAdiCabdAt vArtAkasUraNAlUkAdIn gRhyante|) tantrAntare coktam-"sarpistailaguDakSIrairyavagodhUmapaiSTikAH| pUpA viSTambhinaH CItAH paiSTikA vAtalAH kharAH|| vRSyA balyAH sarA mASairvAtaghnA mRdupicchilAH| yathAnnaM guravo balyAH sthUlACca kaThinACca ye|| tailapakvAstu tvagdRgghnA garIyAMso vidAhinaH| kAsArasArA laghavo lAjairlaghutarAH smRtAH|| vAtapittaharo vRSyo ghRtapUraH kaphapradaH| sadyaH prANakaro rucyo mAMsalo raktalo guruH|| laghIyAn maNDakakRto garIyAn phalapUritaH madhurotkArikA vRSyA, kAsAraH picchilo guruH|| guDamatsyaNDikAkhaNDakSIrekSurasamAkSikaiH| pUpAH CukrabalaCleSmarucidAstarpaNAH kSaNAt|| nAnAdravyaiH samAyuktAH pakvAmaklinnabharjitaiH| nimardako guruH snigdho vRSyo balavatAM hitaH|| ghArikeNDarikApUravaTikAvaTakAdayaH| viCadA rocanA balyA guravaH syuH svayonivat|| yAvakaH picchilaH snigdhaH plIhodAvartahA guruH| bhRSTasvinnatayA vA~~aadyo laghu kaNThyo~atikAsinAm|| jvarodAvartamehAnAM pathyo vAtAnulomanaH| olakaM haritAvasthaM CimbijatvAtkharaM guru|| mandajaryo yavAditvAdabhyoSo bRMhaNaH saraH||" iti|siddhasAre coktam-"atyuSNA maNDakAH pathyAH CItalA guruvo matAH|' iti|

A0 ra0-mudgAdivesavAraguNAnAha-mudgAdijA iti|  yeSu mAMsasthAneSu mudgacaNakAdayo gRhyante te-mudgAdijAH|  yathAdravyaguNamanugacchantIti-yathAdravyaguNAnugAH, yAvantaH prakRtidravyaguNAstAvantasteSAM bhavantItyarthaH|  sAkalye~avyayIbhAvaH|

   iti  kRtAnna[pakvAnna] vargaH||2|| kukUlakarparabhrASTrakandvaGgAravipAcitAn||42|| ekayonIMllaghUnvidyAdapUpAnuttarottaram||42||

sa0-apUpAn kukUlAdisiddhAn ekayonIn-ekakAraNAn yathottaraM laghUnvidyAt|  tena kukUlapakvAt sajAtIyAdapUpAtkarparapakvo laghuH| karparapakvAcca bhrASTrapakvaH| bhrASTrapakvAtkandupakvaH| kandupakvAccAGgArapakvaH| kukUlaH-apAM bASpasvedaH, goCakRdAdicUrNasantApa ityanye| karparo-jvAlAsantaptaM kapAlam| bhrASTrakandU prasiddhAveva| aGgArAH-bRhantaH kASThasambhUtA iti| iti kRtAnnavargaH|  kRtAnnavargAdanantaraM mAMsaCakavargayostadvyaJjanabhUtayornirdeCaH| tatrApi prAdhAnyAnmAMsavargasya pUrvaM nirdeCaH| prAdhAnyaM cAsya bhaktena saha pracuropayoge~apyadoSAt| CAkasya tu bahUpayoge doSaM vakSyati (hR. sU. a. 8|39)- "CAkAvarAnnabhUyiSThamatyuSNalavaNaM tyajet|" ityanena-

A0 ra0-pacanapAtraviCeSAdguNaviCeSAnAha-kukUleti|  kukUlaM-Cvabhram, "kukUlaM CaGkubhiH kIrNe Cvabhre nA tu tuSAnale|" iti (viCvaprakACamedinIkoCayoH) vacanAt|  tena ca mRnmayamuttAnamapUpapacanapAtraM lakSyate CvabhrAkAram|  tadeva nyubjaM-kharparam|  tadeva sacchidraM-bhrASTram|  lohamayaM nyubjaM-kanduH|  aGgAraCabdena aGgArapUrNaM pAtram, hasantItyAdi|  piSThakRtAstanavo vistRtAH- apUpAH|  ekayonigrahaNaM prakRtidravyAdyaviCeSe~api pAtrakRtamevottarottaraM lAghavamiti jJApanArtham, yathA yathA~agnisannikarSastathA tathA lAghavamityarthaH|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a.a7)-"prabhUtAbhyantaramalomASasUpaH  paraM smRtaH|  khalakAmbalikau hRdyau chedinau svauSadhAnugau||  parpaTA laghavo rUkSA laghIyAn kSAraparpaTaH|  hRdyA vRSyA rucikarA guravo rAgakhANDavAH|  prINanA bhramatRTchardimadamUrcchAbhramacchidaH|  tRTchardiCramanunmantha CItaH sadyo balapradaH||  pramehakSayakuSThAdyA na ca syurmanthapAyinAm|" iti  iti kRtAnnavargaH|

sa0-puMstriyoH pUrvapaCcArdhe yathAsaMkhyaM guruNI| pUrvaM ca paCcaM ca pUrvapaCce, tayorardhe| puMsaH pUrvArdhaM guru, striyaH paCcArdhaM gurvityarthaH| garbhiNI guruH-garbhiNImAMsaM guru| catvAraH pAdA yeSAM te catuSpAdaH, teSu catuSpAtsu-gavAdiSu madhye, strI laghuH| catuSpAditi "saMkhyAsu pUrvasya" ityantalopaH| vihaGgeSu-dvijeSu tu, pumAn laghuH| CiraHprabhRtInAM mAMsAnAM yathApUrvaM gurutvaM nirdiCet| evaM sakthyAdimAMsebhyaH CiromAMsaM gurutamamityavatiSThate| AmapakvACayayoCca yathApUrvaM gurutvanirdeCaH| tena pakvACayAdAmACayo guruH| raktAdInAM dhAtUnAM yathottaraM gurutvaM nirdiCet| tena lohitAnmAMsaM guru, mAMsAnmeda ityAdi| "mAMsAdgarIyo vRSaNameDhravRkkayakRdgudam|" ityatrA~apyuttarottaramityanuvartate| tena mAMsAdgurutaro vRSaNaH tasmAnmeDhraH, yAvatsarvagariSThaM gudaM nirdiCediti| iti mAMsavargaH|

A0 ra0-paTolAdiguNAnAha-paToleti|  paTolaM-rAjIphalam|  saptalA-sAtalA|  ariSTo-nimbaH|  CArGgeSTA-aGgAravallI|  avalgujo-bAkucI|  amRtA-guDUcI|  vetro-vaMCasadRCaH, tasyAgraM-agrabhAgaH|  bRhatI dvidhA,-siMhI vyAghrI ca|  vAsA-ATarUSakaH|  kuntilI-caJcusadRCI dIrghapatrA|  tilaparNikA-badarakaH|  maNDUkaparNI-brAhmI|  karkoTaM-karkoTIphalam|  kAravellakaM-suSavIphalam|  parpaTo-jvaraghnaH|  nADIkalAyo-matsyAkSaH|  gojihvA-dArvipatrikA|  vArtAkaM-vRntAkam|  vanatiktakaM-kirAtatiktam|  karIraM-gUDhapatram|  kulakaM - athAto~annarakSAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||   iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-annasya rakSA-annarakSA| sopadiSTA yatrAdhyAye, so~apyupacArAdannarakSetyucyate| yathA, CiCupAlavadhaH kAvyamiti| CeSaM vyAkhyAnamatra pUrvavatkAryam|

A0 ra0- annarakSAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-atheti yataH pUrvayoradhyAyayorAhAra uktaH| sa cArakSito rogahetuH ato rakSA vaktavyA| sA cAsminnadhyAye, ata evAyamannarakSAkhyaH|

 rAjA rAjagRhAsanne prANAcAryaM niveCayet||1||  sarvadA sa bhavatyevaM sarvatra pratijAgRviH||1||

sa0-rAjA-nRpaH, prANAcAryaM-vaidyaM, rAjagRhAsanne niveCayet-AvAsayet| evaM sati yo guNaH syAttamAha-sarvadetyAdi| sarvadA-sarvakAlaM rAtridivasameva, nRpabhavanasamIpasthitaH saH-vaidyaH sarvatra-annapAnaCayanamAlyAdau, pratijAgRviH-dattAvadhAno bhavati|

A0 ra0- annarakSA ca viSaviruddhAvidhisevanaCayana sambhogebhyaH| te ca rAjJaH prAyeNa sambhavanti, tebhyaCca rakSA vaidyAdhInA| tasmAdrAjJo vaidyasannidhiM vidhatte-rAjeti| prANAcAryaM-vaidyam,evaM-sannidhau satyAm, saH-vaidyaH, sarvadA-sarveSu kAleSu, sarvatra-sarveSu kAryeSu, pratijAgRviH-pratipadArthaM jAgarUkaH samyagavahito bhavati|

  annapAnaM viSAdrakSedviCeSeNa mahIpateH||2||  yogakSemau tadAyattau dharmAdyA yannibandhanAH||2||

sa0-mahIpateH sambandhyannapAnaM viSAt-viSasaMsparCAt, viCeSeNa-atiCayena rakSet| annapAnamityupalakSaNam| CayanavastragandharatnamAlyAdInAmapi parirakSyatvAt| nanu, kimiti, nRpAnnapAnAdi viCeSeNa rakSet ? ityAha-yogetyAdi| yogaH-annavastrAdibhiH sambandhaH| kSemaH-teSAmannAdInAM caurAdyupadravarakSaNAt| dvAvapyetau tadAyattau-nRpAyattau syAtAm| kSemaCabdo~ardharcAdiH| dharmAdyA iti dharmArthakAmamokSAH| yannibandhanAH-yogakSemanibandhanAH|

A0 ra0- atha viSarakSA| vaidyasya viSAdannapAnarakSAM vidhatte-annapAnamiti| sa ityanuvartate| viCeSeNa-anyapadArthebhyaH, anyanararakSAto viCeSato rAjJaH, annapAnaM rakSet| kutaH? yataH yogakSemau tadAyattau,-tasya-rAjJo~adhInau| alabdhalAbho-yogaH| labdhaparipAlanaM-kSemaH| kIdRCau tau? yannibandhanA dharmAdyAH,-dharmArthakAmamokSaNAM yasmAdyogakSemau sAdhanam,tayoCca rAjA,tataH so~atiCayena viSAdibhyo rakSaNIyaH|

 odano viSavAn sAndro yAtyavisrAvyatAmiva||3|| cireNa pacyate pakvo bhavetparyuSitopamaH||3|| mayUrakaNThatulyoSmA mohamUrchAprasekakRt||4||  hIyate varNagandhAdyaiH klidyate candrikAcitaH||4||

sa0-viSavAnodanaH sAndro-vilepyAkAraH| tathA, visrAvayituM Cakyo-visrAvyaH, naivaM yo~asau-avisrAvyaH, tasya bhAvaH, avisrAvyatAmiva yAti| cireNa kAlena pacyate| pakvaCca paryuSitabhaktamupamA yasya sa paryuSitopamo bhavet, nirUSmA stabdhaCca sadyo~avatArito~api syAdityarthaH| tasya ca bhaktasya sambandhI mayUrakaNThatulyoSmA mohAdIn karoti| mayUrakaNThena tulyo nAnAvarNo mayUrakaNThatulyaH, sa cAsAvUSmA ceti| USmA-bASpaH| tathA, asAvodano varNagandhAdyairhIyate| Adi (dya) Cabdena rasAdInAM grahaNam| klidyate-praklinno bhavati| tathA, jalamadhyakSiptatailabindusadRCaiCcandrikairAcito bhavati| iti cakSurAdibhiH parIkSA|

A0 ra0- atha saviSAnnapAnalakSaNam| tatra odanaM lakSayati-odana iti| sAndra ivAvisrAvyatAM yAti-sadravo~apyadrava iva srAvayituM na Cakyate| pakvaH paryuSitopamo bhavet-sadyasko~apyahorAtroSitavannirUSmA stabdhaCca syAt| mayUrakaNThatulyoSmA-nIlabASpaH| mohAdikartRtvamUSmasambandhAt, sAkSAtsambandhe doSANAM vakSyamANatvAt| moho-vicArACaktiH,mUrcchAntarbhUtasyApi tasya mUrcchAvasAne~apyanuvRttyarthaM pRthaggrahaNam| AdyaCabdAdrasAdayaH| klidyate-samyak srAvito~api kledaM dhatte| candrikAnvitaH- candrikairanvito bhavati,- mayUrapicchatulyo jalakSitptailabindusadRCo bhavati|

 vyaJjanAnyACu CuSyanti dhyAmakvAthAni tatra ca||5|| hInA~atiriktA vikRtA chAyA dRCyeta naiva vA||5|| phenordhvarAjIsImantatantubudbudasambhavaH||6||  vicchinnavirasA rAgAH khANDavAH CAkamAmiSam||6||

sa0-vyaJjanAni-vArtAkAdIni dadhitakradADimAdisaMskRtAni, ACu-kSipraM CuSyanti| tathA, dhyAmo-malinaH kvAtho yeSAM tAnyevam| tatra ca-teSu vyaJjanavatsu kvAtheSu, hInA-bhujAdihInA, adhikA, vikRtA-CirovirahAdilakSaNavikAropetA cAtmIyA chAyA-pratibimbaM, dRCyate| naiva vA-kIdRCyapi chAyA na dRCyate| na cedamariSTam, sanimittatvAt| teSveva vyaJjaneSu phenAdInAM sambhavaH| tatreti prakRtavyaJjanopalakSiteSu sarvadraveSveva| viCeSeNa punarlavaNolbaNadrave phenamAlA| UrdhvarAjIsambhavaM tu rasakAdiSu svayaM darCayiSyati| vicchinnavirasA rAgA iti| rAgAH-drAkSAdikRtAH, RtucaryoktalakSaNAH, vicchinnA virasACca bhavanti| kvacidrAgo dRCyate kvacinneti vicchinnatvam| kvacidraso dRCyate kvacinneti virasatvam| evaM khANDavo~api| CAkamAmiSaM ca vicchinnaM-sthAne  sthAne truTitam, virasaM ca|

A0 ra0- vyaJjanAni lakSayati-vyaJjanAnIti| vyaJjnAni-sUpyAdIni, ArdrANyapyACu viSavanti CuSyanti-CoSaM yAnti| dhyAmakvAthAni- malinadravANi bavanti| tatra-teSu kvAthavatsu vyaJjaneSu, hInAdikA chAyA-pratibimbaM, dRCyate naiva vA dRCyate| hInA-bimbapramANanyUnA| atiriktA - adhikA| vikRtA-tulyapramANApyanyajAtIyA| phenAdInAM ca sambhavaH| UrdhvarAjI-uparibhAge rekhA| sImanto-vicchedaH| tantuH-picchA|    atha vyaJjanaviCeSAH| tatra rAgAdIn lakSayati| vicchinneti| vicchinnAH- naSTakSIravat pRthagbhUtaghanadravabhAgAH| virasAH-vikRtarasAH| rAgAH khANDavACca-pAnakabhedAH| evaM CAkaM pAThAdi| AmiSaM-mAMsam| tAni sarvANi rAgakhANDavAdIni saviSANi vicchinnavirasAni bhavanti|

 nIlA rAjI rase, tAmrA kSIre, dadhani dRCyate||7||  CyAvA~~ApItAsitA takre, ghRte pAnIyasannibhA||7||  mastuni syAtkapotAbhA, rAjI kRSNA tuSodake||8|| kAlI madyAmbhasoH, kSaudre harittaile~aruNopamA||8|| pAkaH phalAnAmAmAnAM pakvAnAM parikothanam||9|| dravyANAmArdraCuSkANAM syAtAM mlAnivivarNate||9||  mRdUnAM kaThinAnAM ca bhavetsparCaviparyayaH||10||  mAlyasya sphuTitAgratvaM mlAnirgandhAntarodbhavaH||10|| dhyAmamaNDalatA vastre, CadanaM tantupakSmaNAm||11|| dhAtumauktikakASThACmaratnAdiSu malAktatA||11|| snehasparCaprabhAhAniH saprabhatvaM tu mRNmaye||12||

sa0-rase-mAMsarase viSavati, nIlA-nIlavarNA, rAjI dRCyata iti prakRtena sambandhaH| evaM cAgre~api rAjI dRCyata iti yojyam| kSIre-kSIramadhye, tAmrA-tAmravarNA| dadhani-dadhni CyAvA| takre ApItAsitA-AnIlapItA| ghRte salilanibhA| mastuni kapotAbhA| tuSodake-kAJjike, rAjI kRSNA| madye~ambhasi ca kAlI| mAkSike haridvarNA| taile~aruNopamA-ISallohitavarNA| udAharaNamAtraM tvetat, tena vasAgandhasya ca taile sambhavaH, dravauSadhasya kapilA, iti|  tathA, AmAnAM phalAnAM pAkaH| pakvAnAM parikothanaM-CAtanaM bhavati| ArdraCuSkANAM yathA saMkhyaM mlAnatA-CuSkAbhAsatvam, tathA vivarNatA-CyAvatvAdi lakSaNA| mRdUnAM kaThinatvam, kaThinAnAM mRdutvam, ayaM sparCaviparyayaH| mAlyasya-puSpasya, sphuTitaM-viCIrNaM, agraM-prAnto yasya tatsphuTitAgram, tasya bhAvastattvam| tathA, mlAnyudbhavo-mlAnatA, gandhAntarodbhavaH-svagandhanACo~anyagandhasambhavaCca| dhyAmAni-malinAni, maNDalAni-vRttAni, teSAM bhAvo dhyAmamaNDalatA, vastre-AstaraNaprAvaraNAdirUpe syAt| CadanaM-CAtaH pAtaH syAt| keSAm ? tantupakSmaNAm,-tantUnAM-sUtrANAM pakSmaNAM ca pArCvavartinAM, vastrasambandhinAmeva| dhAtuH-suvarNAdiH mauktikaM-muktA, kASThaM-dAru, aCmA-pASANaH, ratnAni-vajramarakatAdIni, AdiCabdena CaGkhaCuktyAdiparigrahaH, teSu malAktatA-paGkamalopadigdhatA| snehahAniH-teSAmeva dhAtvAdInAM snehasya vyapagamaH| evaM sparCaprabhAhAniH| mRNmaye tu bhANDe saviSe niSprabhe~api saprabhatvam|

A0 ra0- mAMsarasAdIn rAjIviCeSeNa lakSayati-nIleti| rase-mAMsarase, nIlavarNA rajI-rekhA| kSIre tAmrA| dadhni syAvA-kapiCA| takre pItA~asitA-gauraCyAmA| ghRte pAnIyasannibhA-udakavarNA| madye~ambhasi ca kAlI-kRSNA| kSaudre harit-marakatavarNA| taile aruNopamA|   phalAni lakSayati-pAka iti| apakvAnAM phalAnAM viSaduSTAnAM pAka upajAyate, pakvAnAM parikothanaM-pUtIbhAvaH|    ArdraCuSkANi lakSayati-dravyANAmiti| ArdrANAM dravyANAM mlAniH-kiJcicchuSkatvam, CuSkAnAM vivarNatA-vikRtavarNatvam|   mRdukaThinAni lakSayati-mRdUnAmiti| sparCaviparyayaH-mRdUnAM kAThinyaM kaThinAnAM mRdutvam|   mAlyaM lakSayati-mAlyasyeti| mAlyasya-puSpasya, agrabhAgeSu CIrNatvam|   vastraM lakSayati-dhyAmamaNDalateti| dhyAmamaNDalatA-malinamaNDalotpattiH| tantUnAM pakSmANi-sUkSmAvayavAH,teSAM CadanaM-CAtaH|     dhAtvAdIn lakCayati-dhAtumauktiketi| dhAtavaH-suvarNAdayaH| ratnaM-mANikyAdi| AdiCabdena CaGkhaCuktyAdayaH| malAktatA-malinachaitvam| snehAdInAM ca hAniH,- snigdhAnAM snehasya, CItAdInAM sparCasya, tejasvinAM prabhAyAH|     mRNmayaM lakSayati-saprabhatvamiti| saprabhatvaM-niSprabhasyApi prabhotpattiH|

viSadaH CyAvaCuSkAsyo vilakSo vIkSate diCaH|||12||  svedavepathumAMstrasto bhItaH skhalati jRmbhate||13||

sa0-viSaM dadAtIti-viSado naraH, CyAvaM-CyAmaM CuSkamAsyaM - mukhaM, yasyAsau CyAvaCuSkAsyaH,-CyAmaCuSkavadanaH| kiM karoti? vilakSo vIkSate diCaH,- diCa iti samantAdityarthaH, vilakSa iti lajjAvAn, vIkSate-avalokayati| kiJca, svadoSaCaGkayA svedavAn, vepathumAn, trastaH-CarIreNa jAtakampatvAt, bhItaH-cittena sodvegatayopalakSyamANatvAt|  stambhakuDyAdibhirAtmAnamantardhApayitumicchannitastato gacchaMCca skhalitagatirbhavati, tata Aha-skhalati| punaHpunaCca jRmbhAM karoti, tenAha jRmbhate| upalakSNaM cedaM tattatkAlabhAvinInAM kriyANAm| tadyathA (saGgrahe sU.a.8)-"asthAnahAsI, pRSTo~asambaddhamuttaraM dadAti naiva vA dadAti, vivakSurmuhyati, aGgulIH sphoTayati, CiraH kaNDUyate, oSThau leDhi, bhuvaM vilikhati, kriyAsu tvarate, viparItamAcarati, svabhUmau ca nAvatiSThate|" iti|

sa0-saviSamannamityanuvartate|  makSikAH saviSamannaM prApya mriyante-makSikAH saviSe~anne na nilIyante, nilInAstu sadyo vipadyante| viSaduSTAhArAt kAkaH kSAmasvaro bhavet|  utkroCanti-uccaiH kUjanti, darCanAdeva CukadAtyUhasArikAH| viSadarCanamAtrAdeva ca haMsagatiH skhalati| glAnirjIvaJjIvasya jAyate| upalakSaNaM cedam| maraNamapi kasyacinna glAnireva, evaM jIvaJjIvakasya| cakorasya akSiviraktatA| 'dRSTvaitat' iti sarvatra yojanIyam| krauJcasya madodayo-madotpattiH syAt| kapotaparabhRddakSacakravAkAstyajantyasUn-prANAnvimuJcanti, cAtyarthaM maraNaduHkhAbhyAhatAH| udvijate~atyarthaM mArjAraH| vAnarastu CakRt - purISaM muJcati| upalakSaNaM cedam| pRSThatomukho roditi ca|  tathA, hRSyenmayUrastaddRSTvA| taditi saviSAnnaparAmarCaH| dRSTvetyanuvartamAne~api punardRSTveti vacanaM sarvatra madhye sampratyayArtham, AdyantAbhyAM gRhItatvAt| viSaM cAsya darCanAdeva mandatejaskaM bhavati| iti-evaM pUrvoktAbhiH parIkSAbhiH, annaM-bhaktAdi, viSavat-viSasaMsRSTaM, jJAtvA tyajedetat| katham? prayatnataH-prayatnena| tameva prayatnaM darCayannAha-yathA-yena prakAreNa tyajyamAnena, kSudrajantavo-makSikAdayo~api, tena-viSeNa, na vipadyeran na naCyeyuH tathA tyajet| kSudrajantavo~api kiM punarmahAntaH, ityapi CabdArthaH|
