annarakSA adhyAyaH

athAto~annarakSAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||   iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-annasya rakSA-annarakSA| sopadiSTA yatrAdhyAye, so~apyupacArAdannarakSetyucyate| yathA, CiCupAlavadhaH kAvyamiti| CeSaM vyAkhyAnamatra pUrvavatkAryam|

A0 ra0- annarakSAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-atheti yataH pUrvayoradhyAyayorAhAra uktaH| sa cArakSito rogahetuH ato rakSA vaktavyA| sA cAsminnadhyAye, ata evAyamannarakSAkhyaH|

 rAjA rAjagRhAsanne prANAcAryaM niveCayet||1||  sarvadA sa bhavatyevaM sarvatra pratijAgRviH||1||

sa0-rAjA-nRpaH, prANAcAryaM-vaidyaM, rAjagRhAsanne niveCayet-AvAsayet| evaM sati yo guNaH syAttamAha-sarvadetyAdi| sarvadA-sarvakAlaM rAtridivasameva, nRpabhavanasamIpasthitaH saH-vaidyaH sarvatra-annapAnaCayanamAlyAdau, pratijAgRviH-dattAvadhAno bhavati|

A0 ra0- annarakSA ca viSaviruddhAvidhisevanaCayana sambhogebhyaH| te ca rAjJaH prAyeNa sambhavanti, tebhyaCca rakSA vaidyAdhInA| tasmAdrAjJo vaidyasannidhiM vidhatte-rAjeti| prANAcAryaM-vaidyam,evaM-sannidhau satyAm, saH-vaidyaH, sarvadA-sarveSu kAleSu, sarvatra-sarveSu kAryeSu, pratijAgRviH-pratipadArthaM jAgarUkaH samyagavahito bhavati|

  annapAnaM viSAdrakSedviCeSeNa mahIpateH||2||  yogakSemau tadAyattau dharmAdyA yannibandhanAH||2||

sa0-mahIpateH sambandhyannapAnaM viSAt-viSasaMsparCAt, viCeSeNa-atiCayena rakSet| annapAnamityupalakSaNam| CayanavastragandharatnamAlyAdInAmapi parirakSyatvAt| nanu, kimiti, nRpAnnapAnAdi viCeSeNa rakSet ? ityAha-yogetyAdi| yogaH-annavastrAdibhiH sambandhaH| kSemaH-teSAmannAdInAM caurAdyupadravarakSaNAt| dvAvapyetau tadAyattau-nRpAyattau syAtAm| kSemaCabdo~ardharcAdiH| dharmAdyA iti dharmArthakAmamokSAH| yannibandhanAH-yogakSemanibandhanAH|

A0 ra0- atha viSarakSA| vaidyasya viSAdannapAnarakSAM vidhatte-annapAnamiti| sa ityanuvartate| viCeSeNa-anyapadArthebhyaH, anyanararakSAto viCeSato rAjJaH, annapAnaM rakSet| kutaH? yataH yogakSemau tadAyattau,-tasya-rAjJo~adhInau| alabdhalAbho-yogaH| labdhaparipAlanaM-kSemaH| kIdRCau tau? yannibandhanA dharmAdyAH,-dharmArthakAmamokSaNAM yasmAdyogakSemau sAdhanam,tayoCca rAjA,tataH so~atiCayena viSAdibhyo rakSaNIyaH|

 odano viSavAn sAndro yAtyavisrAvyatAmiva||3|| cireNa pacyate pakvo bhavetparyuSitopamaH||3|| mayUrakaNThatulyoSmA mohamUrchAprasekakRt||4||  hIyate varNagandhAdyaiH klidyate candrikAcitaH||4||

sa0-viSavAnodanaH sAndro-vilepyAkAraH| tathA, visrAvayituM Cakyo-visrAvyaH, naivaM yo~asau-avisrAvyaH, tasya bhAvaH, avisrAvyatAmiva yAti| cireNa kAlena pacyate| pakvaCca paryuSitabhaktamupamA yasya sa paryuSitopamo bhavet, nirUSmA stabdhaCca sadyo~avatArito~api syAdityarthaH| tasya ca bhaktasya sambandhI mayUrakaNThatulyoSmA mohAdIn karoti| mayUrakaNThena tulyo nAnAvarNo mayUrakaNThatulyaH, sa cAsAvUSmA ceti| USmA-bASpaH| tathA, asAvodano varNagandhAdyairhIyate| Adi (dya) Cabdena rasAdInAM grahaNam| klidyate-praklinno bhavati| tathA, jalamadhyakSiptatailabindusadRCaiCcandrikairAcito bhavati| iti cakSurAdibhiH parIkSA|

A0 ra0- atha saviSAnnapAnalakSaNam| tatra odanaM lakSayati-odana iti| sAndra ivAvisrAvyatAM yAti-sadravo~apyadrava iva srAvayituM na Cakyate| pakvaH paryuSitopamo bhavet-sadyasko~apyahorAtroSitavannirUSmA stabdhaCca syAt| mayUrakaNThatulyoSmA-nIlabASpaH| mohAdikartRtvamUSmasambandhAt, sAkSAtsambandhe doSANAM vakSyamANatvAt| moho-vicArACaktiH,mUrcchAntarbhUtasyApi tasya mUrcchAvasAne~apyanuvRttyarthaM pRthaggrahaNam| AdyaCabdAdrasAdayaH| klidyate-samyak srAvito~api kledaM dhatte| candrikAnvitaH- candrikairanvito bhavati,- mayUrapicchatulyo jalakSitptailabindusadRCo bhavati|

sa0-vyaJjanAni-vArtAkAdIni dadhitakradADimAdisaMskRtAni, ACu-kSipraM CuSyanti| tathA, dhyAmo-malinaH kvAtho yeSAM tAnyevam| tatra ca-teSu vyaJjanavatsu kvAtheSu, hInA-bhujAdihInA, adhikA, vikRtA-CirovirahAdilakSaNavikAropetA cAtmIyA chAyA-pratibimbaM, dRCyate| naiva vA-kIdRCyapi chAyA na dRCyate| na cedamariSTam, sanimittatvAt| teSveva vyaJjaneSu phenAdInAM sambhavaH| tatreti prakRtavyaJjanopalakSiteSu sarvadraveSveva| viCeSeNa punarlavaNolbaNadrave phenamAlA| UrdhvarAjIsambhavaM tu rasakAdiSu svayaM darCayiSyati| vicchinnavirasA rAgA iti| rAgAH-drAkSAdikRtAH, RtucaryoktalakSaNAH, vicchinnA virasACca bhavanti| kvacidrAgo dRCyate kvacinneti vicchinnatvam| kvacidraso dRCyate kvacinneti virasatvam| evaM khANDavo~api| CAkamAmiSaM ca vicchinnaM-sthAne  sthAne truTitam, virasaM ca|

A0 ra0-  atha virodhAdannapAnarakSA| viruddhAnnasya doSahetutvamAha-viruddhamapIti| viruddhaM-saMyogAdivirodhavat| kasyacidviruddhAhArasya viSavatsadyo nACakatvAt kasyacidgaravatkAlAntaranACakatvAdrogajanakatvAccopamAnadvayamuktam| uktaM ca saGgrahe( sU. a. 9 ) "visphoTagulmamadavidradhiCophayakSmatejobalasmRtimatIndriyacittanACAn| kuyAdviruddhamaCanaM jvaramasrapittamaSTau gadAMCca mahato viSavacca mRtyum|| " iti "| virodhaCca saptadhA,-saMyogasaMskAramAtrAdeCakAlAvasthAsvabhAvabhedAt| saMyogastridhA,- balavadguNAnAM sAmyAt vaiSamyAt sAmyavaiSamyAbhyAM ca| evaM nava bhedAH| te ca sodAharaNAH saGgrahe darCitAH (sU. a. 9)-  " balinAM mitho guNAnAM viSamatayA samatayA~apyubhayathA~api| saMskarAdivaCAdapi bhavati nisargAdapi virodhaH|| kSIraM kulatthaiH panasena matsyaistaptaM dadhi kSaudraghRte samAMCe| vAryUSare rAtriSu saktavaCca toyAntarAste yavakAstathA ca||" iti| te ca vakSyamANeSu svabuddhyA vivecanIyAH|

sa0-amlaM dravyaM payasA saha sarvaM viruddham| sarvagrahaNaM dravAdravagrahaNArtham| dravaM-kAJjikAdi, adravaM-cukrikAdikamityarthaH| anyathA payaso dravasamAnajAtIyatvAt kAJjikAdyeva dravadravyaM virudhyeta, na cukrikAdikamapi| nanu, tRtIyayaiva sahArtho labdha eva| yathA-"vArAhaM CvAvidhA nAdyAt" ityatra| tataH kiM sahaCabdena| satyametat| sahagrahaNaM tu niyamArtham| sahaikadhyamamlenopayujyamAnaM viruddham| yadA tvamlena gorasAdinA kSIraCAkasaMjJavyaJjanakaraNArthaM payaH saMskriyate tadA tasya dravyAntaratvApattervirodho nAsti| tathA, dadhikSIrAdinA ghRtaM pacyate tatrA~apyavirodha eva, dravyAntaratvAt| pUrvasyA~api sahaCabdasyaivaM prAyameva prayojanamabhyUhyamiti| api ca, kSIre bhukte uttarakAlamapyamlaM na bhojyamiti pratipAdanArthaM ca sahagrahaNam| tathA coktaM saGgrahe (sU.a.)-"sarvaM cAmlaM payasA sahaikadhyaM taduttaraM vA viruddham" iti| phalaM tatheti| phalaM-akSoDAdi ca, payasA saha viruddham| sarvaCabdaH sarvatra na sambandhanIyaH, yato na sarvaM phalaM payasA sahAbhyavahartuM viruddham| api tu kiJcideva| tathA ca muniH parisaMkhyayaivA~apaThat(ca.sU.a.26|86)- "tathA~~AmrAmrAtakalakucakaramardamocadantaCaThabadarakoCAmrabhavya jAmbavakapitthatintiDIkapAlevatAkSoDapanasanArikeradADimAmalakAnyevaM prakArANi cAnyAni" iti| tasmAnna sarvaM phalaM payasA sahAbhyavahartuM viruddham, kintu munyuktameva| tadvaditi phalavat,  kulatthAdayaH payasA saha viruddhAH| varako-vrIhibhedaH, "varakoddAlaka" iti prAgukteH (hR.sU.a.6|9)|  vallamakuSTakau CimbIdhAnyaviCeSau| upalakSaNaM cedam| 'mASaniSpAvAvapi' hi viruddhau payasA saheti saGgrahe (sU.a.9) kathitam|

A0 ra0-  vyAyAmAdInAmanutpattihetutvamAha-vyAyAmIti| vyAyAmino-vyAyAmanityAH| snigdhAH-snehabhAvitaCarIrAH| vayaHsthAH-taruNAH| balaCAlinaH-sahajabalayuktAH| sahAtmanA bhUtaM-sAtmyam, AtmanaH sahAyabhUtamanukUlaM sukhAvahamityarthaH| tacca dvividhaM,-kRtrimamakRtrimaM ca| tatra yadabhyAsena kriyate tat-kRtrimam| uktaM ca saGgrahe (sU. a. 9)- "ahitAnyapi cAnyeSAmabhyAsAdupaCerate|" iti| akRtrimaM tu dvividhaM,-nirupAdhikaM sopAdhikaM ca| tatra doSAdinirapekSaM-nirupAdhikam, taddoSasAtmyAkhyam| yadAha carakaH-"upaCete yadaucityAddoSasAtmyaM taducyate|" iti| doSAdisApekSaM-sopAdhikam| tatra doSAdiviparItaguNatvaM - upAdhiH|  yadAha khAraNAdiH- "doSaprakRtideCartuvyAdhInAM svaguNaiH pRthak| viparItaguNaiH sAtmyaM tulyaM cAsAtmyamucyate||" iti| asAtmyaM tu-yathAyathaM sAtmyaviparItam| tattu kRtrimaM ciraparityAgena kriyate| sopAdhike doSAditulyaguNatvaM-upAdhiH| sAtmyAsAtmye eva nirupAdhike pathyApathye  ucyete| sopAdhike tvauSadhAnauSadhe| tatra viruddhabhojanasya nirupAdhikAsAtmyasya kRtrimatvena sopAdhikatvena vA sAtmyatve sati na pIDAkaratvam| nirupAdhikasopAdhikakRtrimANAmuttarottaraM balavattvAt| kimatra pramANam ? abhyAsAtsAtmyatAM yAtaM, yadapathyaM tat pAdena-caturthAMCena, pAdapAdena-SoDaCAMCena vA tyajet| tadvat-apathyavat, hitaM-pathyaM, niSeveta-yAvatAMCenApathyaM tyaktaM tAvatAMCena pathyaM bhajet, nityasevyasyAhArarACeryadapathyena nyUnatvaM tatpathyena pUrayedityarthaH| kathaM tyajet ? ekadvitryantarIkRtamiti,-ekadvitribhirdivasairantarIkRtaM-vijAtIyabhojanena vyavahitam| etaduktaM bhavati,-yadA pAdena tyAgaH kriyate tadA prathame~ahanyapathyasya pAdAstrayaH, pathyasyaikaH| dvitIye~ahani catvAro~apyapathyasya| tRtIye prathamavat| ityekAntarIkaraNam| caturthe~ahani dvau pAdAvapathyasya, dvau pathyasya| paJcamaSaSThayostRtIyavat| saptame caturthavat| iti dvyantarIkaraNam| aSTame tvapathyasyaikaH, pathyasya trayaH| navamadaCamaikAdaCeSu saptamavat| dvAdaCe~aSTamavat| iti tryantarIkaraNam| trayodaCe catvAro~api pathyasya| caturdaCe dvAdaCavat| paJcadaCe trayodaCavat| iti punarekAntarIkaraNam| dvyantaratryantarIkaraNaM punarnAsti, caturNAmapi pAdAnAM pUrNatvAt| SoDaCAMCapakSe tvekadvitryantarIkaraNasya paJcakRtva AvRttiH| tata ekamekAntarIkaraNam| evaM triSaSTyA divasaiH SoDaCAMCAH pUryante| atra yadyapi vyavadhAyakaviCeSo noktaH, tathA~api pUrvasminnantare yadvyavadheyaM, tadevottarasmin vyavadhAyakaM jJeyam| evamapathyatyAge pathyasevAyAM ca krama AdRto bhavet| yadi tvapathyameva vA sarvatra vyavadhAyakaM kriyate, tadA na krama AdRto bhavet| kramaCcAtra pradhAnam| antaraM ca dinaireva, na bhojanakAlaiH| uktaM ca tantrAntare-"apathyaM sAtmyamapyannaM ceSTAM vA pAdaCastyajet| bhajecca pAdaCaH pathyamekadvitridinAntaram||" iti| caturbhAgaSoDaCabhAgayoradharottarakalpanAniSedhaparatvAt paJcaSaTsaptabhAgAdikalpanAnAM na niSedhaH| atastA apyavasthAnusArataH svayamUhyAH| yadyapyatra vAkye bhaTTArakahariCcandrAdibhirbahavaH pakSA darCitAH, tathApyayameva pakSo jyAyAnityasmAbhirdarCitaH| jyAyastvaM tvasya vAkyasyArjavenaiva pratIyamAnatvAt caturdaCAhartusandhikaraNenAcAryasyAbhipretatvAcca|

A0 ra0- ekasyA nidrAyAH parasparaviruddhasukhaduHkhAdihetutvAyogAdaupAdhikabhedamACritya vibhAgamAha-akAla iti| akAle sevitA-mithyAyogarUpA, atiprasaGgAtsevitA-atiyogarUpA, na ca sevitA-hInayogarUpA, niSevitA-niyatatvena sevitA samyagyogarUpA ceti caturdhA nidrA| tatra parA-caturthI nidrA, sukhAyuSI kuryAt| aparA-trividhA asamyagyogarUpA, kAlarAtririva-saMhArapravRttamahAkAlIva, sukhAyuSI hanyAdityarthaH| sukhAyuSorAdyantayorgrahaNAt pANinipratyAhAravat sukhapuSTibalavRSatAjJAnajIvitAni gRhyante| "kAlasvabhAvAmayacittadehakhedaiH kaphAgantutamobhavA ca| nidrA bibharti prathamA CarIraM pApmA~antagA vyAdhinimittamanyAH||" iti saGgrahoktAnAM (sU. a. 9) saptAnAM catasRSvevAntarbhAvaH|

 rAtrau jAgaraNaM rUkSaM, snigdhaM prasvapanaM divA||55|| arUkSamanabhiSyandi tvAsInapracalAyitam||56||

sa0-apiCabdAvatra sAmarthyalabdhau boddhavyau| tena rAtrAvapi jAgaraNaM rUkSam, divA tvAgneyamatyarthaM rUkSaM kAlenAhitabalatvAt| tathA, prasvapanaM divA~api snigdham, rAtrau tu saumye kAle~atiCayena snigdhamityavatiSThate| apiCabdAbhyAmantareNa tu rAtrAveva jAgaraNaM rUkSam, divA tu snigdhamityartho jAyate|  vyavacchedyaphalatvAdvAkyAnAm| evaM divasa eva snigdhaM prasvapanam, rAtrau tu rUkSamiti| na caitadyujyate| yadi jAgaraNaM sadA rUkSaM nAbhaviSyat, tatkathamidamupapatsyate ?  "bahumedaHkaphAH svapyuH snehanityACca nAhani| viSArtaH kaNTharogI ca naiva jAtu niCAsvapi||" iti| eSAM hyapatarpaNameva hitam| yaccApatarpaNaM tadavaCyaM rUkSam| tasmAdetairapatarpaNasvabhAvaM jAgaraNameva sevyam|  tathA, "grISme vAyucayAdAnaraukSyarAtryalpabhAvataH| divAsvapno hito~anyasmin kaphapittakaro hi saH|| muktvA tu bhASyayAnAdhvamadyastrIbhArakarmabhiH| krodhaCokabhayaiH klAntAn CvAsahidhmAtisAriNaH|| vRddhabAlAbalakSINakSatatRTCUlapIDitAn| ajIrNyabhihitonmattAn divA svapnocitAnapi||" tadeteSAM santarpaNArhatvAtsantarpaNameva hitam| yacca santarpaNaM tadavaCyaM snigdham| tasmAdetaiH santarpaNasvabhAvameva sadA prasvapanaM sevyam| evaM ca pUrvameva vyAkhyAnaM yuktam| prasvapnajAgaraNakriyayoradravyayorapi rUkSasnigdhatvamupacArAdupapannam| yathA,-rUkSaM dravyaM guggulvAdi kaphamedaHprabhRtIn saumyAn bhAvAn kSapayati, tathaiva yadA jAgaraNamapi tatkSapayaddRSTaM tadA tadrUkSakAryakaraNAdarUkSamapi rUkSamityupacaryate| tathA, prasvapanAdarvAk kaphamedaHprabhRtInAM saumyAnAM bhAvAnAM svahetorutpAdastathA nopalabhyate, yathA prasvapanAdanantaram| tasmAtprasvapanamasnigdhamapi snigdhamityupacaryate| pracala ivAcaratIti kyaGantAnniSThA| AsInasya upaviSTasya, pracalAyitaM-avaghUrNitaM,-AsInapracalAyitam, na tu prasvapanaM sarvasarvikayA| yena snehanahetuH syAt| rUkSakAryAkaraNAdarUkSam| anabhiSyandi tu viCeSeNa| AsInapracalAyitaM punarIdRgrUpamityarthaH|

A0 ra0- caturvidhAyAH svarUpamAha-rAtrAviti| rAtrau jAgaraNaM-kAle~apyaCayanaM,hInayogAkhyam| tadrUkSaM-vAtavyAdhihetuH| divA prasvapanaM-akAle Cayanam| tacca kAle~atisuptasyAtiyogAkhyam, akAle suptasya mithyAyogAkhyam, tadubhayamapi snigdhaM-kaphapittavyAdhihetuH| AsInapracalAyitaM-kAle CayanaM, samyagyogAkhyam| taddhyAsInapracalAyitasya bhavati| sa hi sukhopaviSTaH CayanaM yadaiva cala ivAcaritumArabhate, tadaiva svapiti| na tvanudIrNAM nidrAmudIrayati, nApyudIrNAM dhArayati| tacca na rUkSam, nApi snigdham| uktaM ca khAraNAdinA-"indriyAtiCramAdrUkSo vAtalo jAgaro niCi| tadAlasyAddivAsvapnaH snigdhaH pittakapholbaNaH|| AsInapracalaH svapno nirabhiSyandibRMhaNaH|" iti| pracalAyita iti pracalaprAtipadikAtkaNDvAdiyagantAdAdikarmaNi niSThAyAM rUpam| anye tvAsInapracalAyitaCabdenopaviSTasyaiva CayanamAhuH| te ca divetyanuvartya divaiva tatkAryamityAhuH| yadAha bheDaH-svapnakAmo divA kAmamupaviStaH CayIta vA| prastIrNAGgasya jantorhi CleSmA koSThe pravartate||" iti|

 grISme vAyucayAdAnaraukSyarAtryalpabhAvataH||56|| divAsvapno hito~anyasmin kaphapittakaro hi saH||57||  muktvA tu bhASyayAnAdhvamadyastrIbhArakarmabhiH||57||   krodhaCokabhayaiH klAntAn CvAsahidhmAtisAriNaH||58|| vRddhabAlAbalakSINakSatatRTCUlapIDitAn||58||  ajIrNyabhihatonmattAn divAsvapnocitAnapi||59|| dhAtusAmyaM tathA hyeSAM CleSmA cAGgAni puSyati||59||

sa0-grISmakAle divAsvapno hitaH| yatastasmin kAle pavanacayo bhavati| AdAnasya ca paripuSTatvAdatiraukSyaM bhavati| rAtrayaCca nidrAsamAptyayogyA alpA bhavanti| divAsvapnaCca santarpakaH| grISmAdaparasmin kAle kaphapittakaraH| so~acintyatvAddhetuprabhAvasya| bhASyAdiklAntAdIn muktvA-varjayitvA| tenaitaduktaM bhavati,-grISmAdaparasminnapi kAle svapna eSAM hita eva| yAnaM aCvAdi| kSataH-khaDgAdicchinnaH| abhihato-laguDAdinA| divAsvapnocitAH-CIlitadivAsvapnAH| tatra bhASyAdiklAntAnAM pavanakopAt svapno~anujJAtaH| CvAsahidhmAdInAM vegavismaraNArtham| vRddhAdInAM yathAyathaM santarpaNArthaM vegavismaraNArthaM ca| ajIrNinAM divAsvapnocitAnAM ca dhAtuvaiSamyaparihArArthaM divAsvapno~anumatastantrakRtA| tathA coktam-"ucito hi divAsvapno yeSAM nityaM CarIriNAm| vAtAdayaH prakupyanti teSAmasvapatAM divA||" iti| nanu, ajIrNinAM divAsvapno na yuktaH, divAsvapnasya kaphavRddhikaratvAt| kaphavRddhyA cAgnimAndyam| agnimAndyAdajIrNAnnasyApAka ityayuktasteSAM divAsvapnaH| atrocyate| divAsvapnenAjIrNinAM dhAtusAmyaM bhavati| dhAtusAmye ca sati svasthAnasthitairdoSairanupahato vahniH pacanakSamo bhavati| kaphastu vRddho~api naiteSAmagnimAndyaM vidhatte| api tvaGgAnAM puSTimAdadhAti| ata evAnantaramevovAca CAstrakAraH-"dhAtusAmyaM tathA hyeSAM CleSmA cAGgAni puSyati|" iti|

A0 ra0- divAsvanpasyAsamyagyogatvamapavadati-grISma iti| grISme vAyucayAdInAM sadbhAvAt divAsvapno hitaH| AdAnagrahaNaM CiCiradinAdArabhya pratidinavRddhyA~atiCayitasya raukSyasya rAtryalpabhAvasya ca prAptyartham| anyathA vAyucayavattayorapi grISmamAtrahetukayoH prAptiH| tatra divAsvapnaH snigdhatvAdvAyucayaM raukSyaM ca hanti, mAtrApUraNAdrAtryalpatvakRtaM hInayogaM ca| nanu, vAtaghno~api divAsvapaH kaphapittakaratvAdahitaH| vakSyati hi (hR. sU. a. 13/16)- "prayogaH CamayevdyAdhiM yo~anyamanyamudIrayet| nAsau viCuddhaH, Cuddhastu Camayedyo na kopayet||" iti| ata Aha-anyasminnityAdi| hi-yasmAt, saH-divAsvapno, grISmAdanyasminnRtau bhASyaklAntadIn muktvA kaphapittakaraH| na ca grISme, na ca bhASyaklAntAdInAm| tatra grISme kAlasvabhAvAt| uktaM ca carakeNa (sU. a. 21/44)- "grISmavarjyeSu kAleSu divAsvapnAtprakupyataH| CleSmapitte divAsvapnastasmAtteSu na Casyate||" iti| bhASyaklAntAdInAM tu kutaH ? ityAha-dhAtvityAdi| hi-yasmAt, eSAM-bhASyaklAntAdInAm, tathA -tena prakAreNa,dhAtusAmyaM bhavati| samIbhUtaH CleSmA CiraHkaracaraNAdInyaGgAni puSNAti| dhAtavo-vAtAdayo rasAdayaCca| dhAtusAmyahetutvAnna kaphapittakaratvam| kaphapittavRddheH sAmyArthatvAnna vikArArambhakadoSahetutvam| bhASyaM-vAgvyApAraH| yAnaM-aCvAdinA gamanam| adhvA-padbhayAM gamanam| madyaM-madyapAnam| strI-sambhogaH| bhAraH-CiraH skandhAdibhirguruvastuvahanam| karma-kAyavyApAraH| kSataH-kSatakAsI| abhihataH-CastraprahArAdipIDitaH| divAsvapnocitaH-sAtmyIbhUtadivAsvapnaH| ayaM ca divAsvapno muhUrtameva kartavyaH| yadAha suCrutaH (CA. a. 4/38)- "pratiSiddheSvapi bAlavRddha" ityAdi yAvat "muhUrtamAtraM svapanam" iti|

tatropavAsavamanasvedanAvanamauSadham||62||  yojayedatinidrAyAM tIkSNaM pracchardanAJjanam||62||  nAvanaM laGghanaM cintAM vyavAyaM CokabhIkrudhaH||63||  ebhireva ca nidrAyA nACaH CleSmAtisaGkSayAt||63||

sa0-tatra-teSvakAlasvapnajeSu rogeSu, upavAsAdyauSadhaM yojayet| nidrAyACca bAhulyena rAtriH kAlaH| tathA coktam (saGgrahe sU.a.9)-"lokAdisargaprabhavA tamomUlA tamomayI| bAhulyAttamaso rAtrau nidrA prAyeNa jAyate||" iti| atinidrAyAM satyAM tIkSNAni vamanAJjananasyAni yojayet, laGghanAdi ca| ebhireva ca-tIkSNavamanAdibhirnidrAyA nACo bhavati| CleSmAkhyasya dhAtoratiCayenApacayAt|

 yathAkAlamato nidrAM rAtrau seveta sAtmyataH||65||  asAtmyAjjAgarAdardhaM prAtaH svapyAdabhuktavAn||65||

sa0-yataCca samyak sevitAyA nidrAyA asamyak sevitAyACcA~anantaroktA guNadoSAH| ataH-asmAddhetoH, kAlAnatikrameNa sAtmyato-yAmadvayaM trayaM vA, niCi nidrAM bhajet| asAtmyAjjAgarAdarddhena prAtaH svapyAt| abhuktavAn-abhukte sati| asAtmyagrahaNenaitat dyotayati,-na sarvasya rAtrAvasuptasya jAgaraNakAlAdardhena divAsvapna iSyate, kiM tarhi ? yo yAvantaM kAlamucitaM svapiti tasmAtkAlAdyAvantaM kAlaM niCi jAgRyAttAvato~ardhenAsau prAtaH svapyAt| keciddhi svalpanidrAH svabhAvato bhavanti|

A0 ra0- asamyagyogaM niSidhya samyagyogaM vidhatte - yathAkAlamiti| nidrAM rAtrau seveta, na divA| rAtrAvapi yathAkAlaM-pravRttikAlAnatikrameNa, yasya yasmin rAtrivibhAge nidrA pravartate sa tasminneva sevetetyarthaH| sAtmyataH-yAmadvayayAmatrayAdisAtmyAnurodhena|    rAtrAvanidritasya divA svanpaM vidhatte-asAtmyeti| prAtaH pUrvAhNe svapyAt| abhuktavAn-akRtabhojanaH| asAtmyarAtrijAgaraNakAlAdarddhakAlam| sAtmyaCcedrAtrijAgarastadA prAtarnaiva svapyAt| arddhamityasAtmyajAgarajanitadoSanivartakanidrAparyAptakAlopalakSaNam| ata evAha khAraNAdiH-" asuptAnAM tathA rAtrau tanmAtraM svapanaM divA||" iti| bhedo~api rAtrau svapyAnna yAmAMstriMstAnsvapyAddvirdivA naraH| etadapyAhurArogyaM nAtra doSo~asti kaCcana||" iti|

CIlayenmandanidrastu kSIramadyarasAn dadhi||66|| abhyaGgodvartanasnAnamUrdhakarNAkSitarpaNam||66||  kAntAbAhulatACleSo nirvRtiH kRtakRtyatA||67||  mano~anukUlA viSayAH kAmaM nidrAsukhapradAH||67|| brahmacaryaratergrAmyasukhaniHspRhacetasaH||68||  nidrA santoSatRptasya svaM kAlaM nAtivartate||68||

sa0-yo mandanidraH sa kSIrAdIn CIlayet| kAntAbAhulatACleSAdayo nidrAsukhahetavaH| kAntAbAhulatACleSagrahaNamACleSamAtrameva nidrAsukhahetuH, na tu grAmyadharmaseveti darCanArtham| ata evAnantaramAha-"brahmacaryaraternidrA svaM kAlaM nAtivartate|" iti| brahmacaryaratasyApyanurAgato maithunAbhilASo nidrAM nACayedityAha-grAmyasukhe niHspRhaM ceto yasya sa tasya| tathA, santoSatRptasya|

A0 ra0- atha samyagyogahetuH| sa trividhaH,-jaghanyamadhyamottamabhedAt| tatra jaghanyamAha-CIlayediti| mandA - mUDhA svakAlAnabhijJA, nidrA yasya saH-mandanidraH| rasAn -mAMsarasAn| mUrddhatarpaNaM-mUrddhatailam| karNatarpaNaM-karNapUraNam| akSitarpaNaM-prasiddham| madhyamamAha-kAnteti| nirvRtiH-sukham| kRtakRtyatA -pUrNamanorathatvam| viSayAH-CabdAdayaH|  kAmaM-atyantam|    uttamamAha-brahmacaryarateriti| brahAcaryarateH-brahmacaryAsaktasya| grAmyasukhaM sambhogaH, tatra niHspRhaM-tato nivRttaM, ceto yasya| santoSatRptasya- yathAlAbhatuSTasya| svaM kAlaM nAtivartate-ucita eva kAle AyAtItyarthaH|

grAmyadharme tyajennArImanuttAnAM rajasvalAm||69|| apriyAmapriyAcArAM duSTasaGkIrNamehanAm||69|| atisthUlakRCAM sUtAM garbhiNImanyayoSitam||70|| varNinImanyayoniM ca gurudevanRpAlayam||70|| caityaCmaCAnA~~AyatanacatvarAmbucatuSpatham||71||  parvANyanaGgaM divasaM CirohRdayatADanam||71|| atyACito~adhRtiH kSudvAn duHsthitAGgaH pipAsitaH||72||  bAlo vRddho~anyavegArtastyajedrogI ca maithunam||72||

sa0-grAmyadharme-strIpuMsaMyogaviSaye, anuttAnAM striyaM tyajet, uttAnAM- bhajedityarthaH| tathA, rajasvalatvAdiyutAM tyajet| duSTaM vyAdhimalAdibhiH, saGkIrNaM-saGkaTaM ca, mehanaM-yoniryasyAstAm| tathA, varNinIM-brahmacAriNIm| anyayoniM-ajAmahiSyAdiM ca tyajet| gurvityAdi| grAmyadharme nirvartane sati gurudevanRpAlayAMstyajet| tathA, caityAdIMstyajet| teSu striyaM na saGgacchedityarthaH| caityAdInAM paryAyA dinacaryAyAmuktAH| AyatanaM-duSTAnAM nigrahasthAnam| parvANi-ravisaGkrAntyAdIni tyajet, teSu kAmaM na sevetetyarthaH| tathA, anaGgaM,-aGgaM-jaghanam, nAGgaM-anaGgamaGgasadRCaM jaghanakAryanirvartanayogyaM mukhAdikamucyate| dAkSiNAtyA hi mukhena tat kurvanti, tanniSidhyate| divasaM ca tyajet, dine rataM na kurvItetyarthaH| mUrdhavakSo~abhighAtaM ca tyajet| tathA, atyACitAdayaH surataM tyajeyuH| atyACitaH - atisuhitaH|  adhRtiH-durmanAH| anyavegArtaH-purISAdivegAturaH|  nanu,kSudrAn kSudvegArta ucyate| tato~anyavegArta ityanenaivAsyArthasya labdhatvAt kiM kSudvAnityanena? satyametat| atiCayArthaM tvetat| yathA kSudvegArtaH striyaM gacchannatiCayena pIDayA bAdhyate, na tathA~anyavegArta iti|

A0 ra0- athAvidhisambhogAdAhArarakSA| tatra sambhoganiSiddhAnyAha- grAmyetyAdi| grAmyadharme-sambhoge, anuttAnatvAdiviCiSTAM nArIM tyajet| apriyAM-anabhISTAm| apriyAcArAM-aniSTAcaraNAm| duSTamehanAM-doSadUSitayonim| saGkIrNamehanAM-saGkucitayonim| atisthUlAmatikRCAM ca| sUtAM-asampUrNArdhyarddhamAsaprasUtim| anyayoSitaM- parastriyam| varNinIM-brahmacAriNIm| anyayoniM-vijAtIyAmajAmahiSyAdim| gurvAlayAdIMCca  tyajet| caityAdayo dinacaryAyAM vyAkhyAtAH| ambu-jalACayaH| AyatanaM-vadhasthAnam| parvANi-puNyakAlAH| anaGgaM-hastamukhAdi| divasaM - aparvaNyapi| CirastADanaM hRdayatADanaM ca-muStyAdinA| dinacaryAyAM sAmAnyato niSiddhasyApi devAlayAdeH punarniSedhaH sambhoge doSabhUyastvakhyApanArthaH|    atyACitAdeH sambhogaM niSedhati-atyACita iti| atyACitaH-atitRptaH| adhRtiH-ahRSTaH| kSudvAn-kSudhitaH| duHsthitAGgaH-viSamasthitagAtraH| pipAsitaH-tRSitaH| anyavegArtaH-CukretaravegapIDitaH| kSuttRSorvegatve~api pRthaggrahaNamalpayorapi tayorniSedhArtham|

mAtrACitIyAdhyAyaH

athAto mAtrACitIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-athetyAnantarye| yathA,-"athA~ato dharmajijJAsA|"  ityatra mImAMsAyAM vedAdhyayanAdanantaraM dharmo jijJAsitavya ityarthaH| ata iti prastutAbhisambandhe| aCanaM-aCitam| bhAve niSThA| mAtrayA~aCitaM-mAtrACitam, tasmai hito mAtrACitIyaH| CeSaM pUrvavadvyAkhyeyam|

A0 ra0- mAtrACitIymadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte- atheti| yataH pUrve~adhyAye "AhAro varNitastatra tatra tatra ca vakSyate|" ityuktam (hR. sU. a. 7/53)| sa cAsAdhAraNo yathAsvaM vaktavyaH| asAdhAraNArthamayamadhyAyaH| ata eva mAtrACitIyaH| mAtrACabdena samyagyogo lakSyate| sa cAsamyagyogasya tyAgAtsambhavati| sa punaH saptadhA -saGkIrNACanaM, viruddhACanaM, amAtrACanaM,ajIrNACanaM, samaCanaM, adhyaCanaM, viSamACanaM ceti| tatra niSiddhanAM gRhe niSiddhairvA saha niSiddhaM cAnnaM yatra bhujyate tat-saGkIrNACanam| tacca "CatrusatragaNAkIrNagaNikApaNikACanam|" ityAdyuktam (hR. sU. a. 2/43)| viruddhACanam-ahitACanam| tacca "viruddhamapi cAhAraM"  ityAdyuktam (hR. sU. a. 7/29)| amAtrACanAdInyatrocyante| mAtrAvadapi yanna jIryati tat-ajIrNACanam| samaCanAdInyatraiva lakSayiSyati|

mAtrACI sarvakAlaM syAnmAtrA hyagneH pravartikA||1||  mAtrAM dravyANyapekSante gurUNyapi laghUnyapi||1||

sa0-sarvakAlaM-svastha Aturo vA, mAtrACI syAt-parimitACI bhavet| kuto hetoH ? hi-yasmAt, mAtrA~agneH pravartikA svavyApAre| agnipravRttiCca dehasthitihetuH| tathA coktam-"agnimUlaM balaM puMsAM balamUlaM hi jIvitam|" iti| tasmAnmAtrAyAH prAdhAnyam| asmAcca kAraNAnmAtrAyAH prAdhAnyaM yato mAtrAM dravyANyapekSante gurUNyapi laghUni ca| tatra gurUNi-piSTakSIradrAkSAkSoDekSumASAnUpamAMsAdIni| laghUni-divyodakaraktaCAliSaSTikamudgalAvakapiJjalaiNaCaCaCambarAdIni|

A0 ra0- tatra mAtrAM vidhatte-mAtrACIti| mAtrAmaCnAtIti mAtrACI| yadyapi mAtrAviCiSTAnnapAnasyaiva karmatvam, tathApi prAdhAnyArthaM mAtrAyAH karmatvavyapadeCaH| kimarthaM mAtrACI syAt ? hi-yasmAt, mAtrA agneH pravartikA pacantamagniM pravartayati, pAcayatItyarthaH|    nanu, dravyANyagnimindhanatvAtpravartayanti, na mAtretyata Aha-mAtrAmiti|    nanu, gurUNi dravyANi durjaratvAnmAtrAmapekSantAm, na punarlaghUnItyata Aha-gurUNyapIti|

gurUNAmardhasauhityaM laghUnAM nAtitRptatA||2||  mAtrApramANaM nirdiSTaM sukhaM yAvadvijIryati||2||

sa0-gurUNAM dravyANAmardhasauhityaM-ardhatRptiH| laghUnAM nAtitRptatA-nAtitRptiH, kiM tarhi ? sauhityamAtram| etanmAtrApramANaM nirdiSTam| mAtrA-hrasvA madhyA bRhatI ca, tasyAH pramANaM-mAtrApramANam| tatra mAtrA-parimANaM mAnam, tasyAstu pramANaM-unmAnam| evaM cAtra mAtrACabdasyApaunaruktyam| hi yasmAt, yAvat parimANamabhyavahRtaM sukhaM-avikRtiM kRtvA, jIryati-pariNamati|          

A0 ra0-  nanu gurubhirlaghubhirvA tRtpirevotpadyate, na teSAM viCeSa ityata Aha-gurUNAmiti| yAvatA~~AhArarACinA tRptirutpadyate tAvavo~ardhaM bhujyata iti-ardhasauhityam| tAvanmAtrameva-nAtitRptatA|    nanu, evaM cenmAtrAyA avyavasthitatvaM prApnotItyata Aha - mAtretyAdi| mAtrApramANaM-mAtrAlakSaNam, yAvatsukhaM jIryati tAvanmAtrACabda vAcyamityarthaH| uktaM ca khAraNAdinA"yadabhyavahRtaM samyagyathAkAlaM jarAM vrajet| prakRtyavikRtiM kRtvA tanmAtrAlakSaNaM viduH||" iti| tasmAdgurUNAmardhasauhityaM sukhaM jIryati, laghUnAM nAtitRptateti nAvyavasthA|

bhojanaM hInamAtraM tu na balopacayaujase||3|| sarveSAM vAtarogANAM hetutAM ca prapadyate||3||

sa0-hInamAtraM punaraCanaM na balAya, nopacayAya, na caujase| sarveSAM vAtarogANAM hetutAM-kAraNatAM yAti|

A0 ra0- atha amAtrACane doSAH| tacca dvividham, hInamAtramatimAtraM ca| tatra hInamAtrajAn doSAnAha - bhojanamiti| balaM-CaktiH| upacayaH-puSTiH| ojaH-kAntiH|

sa0-atimAtraM tvaCanaM trInapi doSAn CIghrameva prakopayati|

A0 ra0- atimAtrajAn doSAnAha-atimAtramiti|

pIDyamAnA hi vAtAdyA yugapattena kopitAH||4|| AmenAnnena duSTena tadevAviCya kurvate||5|| viSTambhayanto~alasakaM cyAvayanto visUcikAm||5|| adharottaramArgAbhyAM sahasaivAjitAtmanaH||6||

sa0-tenApakvenAnnena-AhAreNa, duSTena vatAdyA hi-yasmAt, pIDyamAnAH-vibadhyamAnAH ruddhamArgatvAt, ata eva yugapat-ekakAlaM sarva eva, kopitAstadeva-duSTamannamAviCya-ACrityAlasakaM kurvate| kiM kurvataH ? viSTambhayataH,-tadeva duSTamannaM srotaHsu rundhAnAH| tathA, adharottaramArgAbhyAM sahasaiva-anucite deCe kAle (ca), cyAvayantaH-UrdhvamadhaCca niSkACayantaH| ajitAtmanaH-asaMyatacetasaH puMso visUcikAM kurvate|

A0 ra0- atha prasaGgAdatimAtraprakupitadoSajAnAM rogANAM nidAnacikitsite kathayati| tatra visUcikAlasakayoH samprAptimAha-pIDyamAnA iti| pIDyamAnAH santo yugapatkopitAH-strotorodhAt parasparasaGghaTTanena trayo~apyekadaiva kopaM nItAH| kena ? tena,-atimAtreNAnnena| atimAtratvAdevAmenapAkakAlAtikrame~apyapakvena, ata eva duSTena-vikRtena, tadevAviCya-tathAvidhamevAnnamadhiSThAya, evaMbhUtAstadevAnnaM viSTambhayanto~alasakaM kurvate| cyAvayantaH punarvisUcikAm| kAbhyAM cyAvayantaH ? adharottaramArgAbhyAm| sahasaiva - vegena| ajitAtmagrahaNamannalolupasyaivAlasakAdyutpa - ttiriti jJApanArtham| uktaM ca suCrutena (u. a. 56/5)- " na tAM parimitAhArA labhante viditAgamAH| mUDhAstAmajitAtmAno labhante kaluSACayAH||" iti||

sa0-cedyadyarthe| atiCayena duSTA doSAH, tathA duSTAmena baddhAni-pUrNAni, khAni-srotAMsi, yaiste duSTAmabaddhakhAH, tathA tiryaggacchantaH, tanuM sarvAM-CarIraM sakalaM, daNDavadyadi stambhayanti-prasAraNAkuJcanarahitaM kurvanti, tadA daNDakAlasako nAma rogo bhavati| taM-daNDakAlasakaM, tyajet-nopakramet| yata ACukAriNam,-ACu-CIghraM svakarma mAraNaM karotItyACukArI, kSipraM hantItyarthaH|

A0 ra0- daNDakAlasakaM lakSayati-atyartheti| yadyalasake doSAH sarvAM tanuM daNDavatstambhayanti, tamalasakaM daNDakAlasakasaMjJamACukAriNaM tyajet| kIdRCA doSAH ? atyarthaduSTAH,-atimAtrAnnasevanena atiduSTA| duSTAmabaddhakhAH,-cirasaJcayAt duSTenAmena-kAraNabhUtena, baddhAni-pUritAni khAni-strotAMsi, yaiste tathA| tiryaggacchantaH-mArgAvarodhAttiryaGmArgeNa prasarantaH|

viruddhAdhyaCanAjIrNaSIlino viSalakSaNam||13|| AmadoSaM mahAghoraM varjayedviSasaMjJakam||14|| viSarUpACukAritvAdviruddhopakramatvataH||14||

sa0-viruddhaM-prAguktam, "viruddhamamlaM" (hR.sU.a. 7|31) ityAdinA| "vidyAdadhyaCanaM" (hR.sU.a. 8|34) ityAdinA-adhyaCanam| ajIrNaM ca-trividhaM vakSyati| etAni CIlituM CIlaM yasya tasya puMso ya, AmadoSo viSalakSaNaH-lAlAdilakSaNayukto, mahAghoro-atikaSTo viSAkhyo yo bhavati, taM na cikitset| kutaH ? viSarUpatvAdACukAritvAdviruddhopakramatvAcca| viSasadRCasvarUpatvAdviSe CItopakramo yuktaH, Ame coSNopakramo yuktaH, iti viruddhopakramatvam|

A0 ra0-  AmaviSaM lakSayati-viruddheti| viruddhACanAdiCIlinaH puruSasyotpannamAmadoSaM-ajIrNajaM vyAdhiM varjayet| viruddhaM payomatsyAdi| adhyaCanaM-vakSyamANam| ajIrNaM-ajIrNACanam| kIdRCamAmadoSam ? viSalakSaNaM,-dehavyApiviSatulyalakSaNam| mahAghoraM-tIvrapIDAkaram| viSasaMjJakaM-viSAkhyam| AmopapadaiveyaM saMjJA| uktaM ca carakeNa (vi. a. 2/15)-"viruddhAdhyaCanAjIrNACanaCIlinaH punarAmadoSamAmaviSamAcakSate" iti| kuto varjayet ? viSarupACukAritvAt-viSarUpatvAcchIghrakAritvAcca| nanu, viSamapi sAdhyaM dRSTam| tatkuto~asya viSarUpatvAdasAdhyatvam ? ityata Aha-virudhopakramatvataH,- hetuviparItavyAdhiviparItayorupacArayorvirodhAt| heturhyatrAmasaJcayaH,  tatrAgneya upacAraH |vyAdhistu viSarUpaH tatra saumya upacAra iti virodhaH|

 athAmamalasIbhUtaM sAdhyaM tvaritamullikhet||15||  pItvA sogrApaTuphalaM vAryuSNaM yojayettataH||15||  svedanaM phalavartiM ca malavAtAnulomanIm||16|| nAmyamAnAni cAGgAni bhRCaM svinnAni veSTayet||16||

sa0-athetyAnantarye| pUrvoktaM sAdhyAsAdhyamavagamyAnantaramAmaM sAdhyamaduSTaM santaM tvaritaM-drAk, Atura ullikhet-udvamedityarthaH| kiMvidhamAmam ? alasIbhUtam,-alasalakSaNatAM gatam| kathamullikhet ? ityAha-pItvetyAdi| jalamuSNaM pItvA vacAlavaNamadanaPhalayuktaM, vamedityarthaH| tato~anantaraM svedanaM yojayet| tathA-"vipAcya mUtrAmlamadhUni dantIpiNDItakRSNAbiDadhUmakuSThaiH| vartiM karAGguSThanibhAM ghRtAktAM gude rujAnAhaharIM vidadhyAt||" ityAdi PhalavartiM ca malavAtAnulomanIM yojayet| tatrAmadoSe doSavaCAdaGgAni ca nAmyamAnAni-saGkocyamAnAni santi, atyarthaM svinnAni vastrAdinA veSTayet|

A0 ra0- uktAnAmAmadoSANAM cikitsAmAha-atheti| athaCabdaCcikitsArambhe maGgalArthaH| AmaM-AmadoSam,ullikhet-vamet, alasIbhUtam| yaH svayaM na pravartate balAtpravartamAno~api mandaM mandaM vA pravartate, so~alasaH|Amado(vi)So~api tathAbhUtaH| sa hyalasakenaiva(neva) pravartate| visUcyAM tu mandaM mandaM pravartate| sa dvividho~apyullekhanIyaH| uktaM hi khAraNAdinA-"visUcyalasakau vAmyau pippalIlavaNAmbhasA|" iti| sAdhyagrahaNamiha niyamArtham, sAdhyameva na tvasAdhyamapi| dRCyate hi nidAne~asAdhyatvenoktAnAM mAMsagranthyAdInAM cikitsite cikitsopadeCaH| AmadoSastvasAdhyaH, asAdhya evetyarthaH| kiM kRtvollikhet ? sogrApaTuphalamuSNaM vAri pItvA| ugrA-vacA| paTu-saindhavam| phalaM-madanaphalam| tato-vamanAnantaraM, svedanaM yojayet phalavarti ca| kasyA varteH phalavartisaMjJA ? ityapekSAyAmAha-malavAtAnulomanIm| viNmUtrAdhovAtAnAM pravartinI vartiH-phalavartirityarthaH| svedaphalavartidravyANyuktAni khAraNAdinA-"CUle tu stimite sAme svedaH Casto muhurmuhuH| rUkSoSNaiH kaTukaiH pAMCukarISasikatAdibhiH||pippalyo~agAradhUmaSca madanaM sarSapAstrivRt| hemakSIrI vacA kiNvaM kuSThaM dantI yavAgrajaH|| samUtralavaNAbhyaktA PhalavartiriyaM hitA| saMsvedyAlasake CUlavibhandhAnAhanACinI||" iti| yadyAmadoSeNAGgAni nAmyante-saGkocyante, tadA tAnyatisvinnAni kRtvA vastrAdibhirveSTayet|

sa0-visUcyAM-pUrvoktalakSaNAyAm, ativRddhAyAM satyAM pArSNyoH-khurikayoH, ayaHCalAkAdinA dAhaH praCasyate| tadahaH-visUcikArambhadivasa eva, enaM-visUcikAvantaM, upavAsya-laGghayitvA, viriktavat-peyAdikrameNopAcaret| suCrute (?) coktam (saGgrahe sU.a.11)-"succharditaviriktasya gAtrAyAme~atidAruNe| bhallAtakamadhUcchiSTajIrNapiNyAkanAgaraiH|| ghRtatailaM pacet sAmlaistacca khallIghnamuttamam|| tvakpatrarAsnAguruCigrukuSThairamlaprapiSThaiH savacACatAhvaiH| udvartanaM khallivisUcikAghnaM tailaM vipakvaM ca tadarthakAri|| CirISanaktAhvaphaNijjabIjatrAyantyapAmArgaphalAni vartiH| bastasya mUtreNa visUcikAghnI pralepanasyAJjanadhUmayogaiH||" iti|

A0 ra0- visUcyAM viCeSamAha-visUcyAmiti| ativRddhAyAM-pUrvoktena prakAreNa aCAntAyAM, visUcyAM pArSNyordAhaH praCasyate| praCabdaH prakarSArthaH| sarveSvAmadoSeSu pArSNyordAhaH Casyate, visUcyAM tu prakarSeNa| yadAha suCrutaH (u. a. 56/12)- "sAdhyAsu pArSNyordahanaM praCastamagnipratApo vamanaM ca tIkSNam||" iti| sAdhyAsviti bahuvacanAt visucikAlasavilambikAnAM grahaNam| uktaM ca vaGgasenena-"vilambikAlasakayorvisUcyuktaH kriyAkramaH|" iti| pArSNidAhaCca pippalyAdibhiH| yadAha bheDaH-"visUcyAmativRddhAyAM pArSNideCe ca dAhayet| pippalyA vA~apyaraNyA vA CastreNAtApitena vA||" iti|    nivRttAmadoSasya cikitsAmAha-tadahaCceti| yasminnahani AmadoSo nivRttaH, tadaharenamupavAsya viriktavat -peyAdikrameNopAcaret| cakArAt pUrvANyapyahAnyupavAsya|  tathA ca khAraNAdiH-"AmACayaviCudhyarthamathainamupavAsayet| jIrNe viriktavRttiH syAdyA proktA maNDapUrvikA||" iti| vamanAdyupakramAnte paThyamAnena prakRtaparAmarCinA tacchabdena AmadoSanivRttidinameva parAmarSTuM yuktam, na punarutpattidinam|

A0 ra0- vilAmbikAlakSaNamAha-garIyasa iti| bilambikAnAmAjIrNaM bhavet| kasmAt ? lInAdAmAdeva,-AmaCabda AmAdyajIrNasAmAnyavacanaH, tasyotpannasya niHCeSamanivartanAllInatvam| evaM punaH punarlInatvAdgarIyastvam| punaH punarutpAdo duSTabubhukSAyAM bhojanAt| sA tUktA saGgrahe (sU. a.11)-"doSopanaddhaM" ityAdi (Clo 19 TI)| evakAreNaivaM dyotayati,-visUcyalasakAvapyajIrNAdbhavataH, kintu tAvanyato~api sadyo~atimAtrabhojanAdeH| vilambikA tvajIrNAdeveti| yadAha suCrutaH (u. a. 56|3)- "ajIrNamAmaM viSTabdhaM vidagdhaM ca yadIritam| visUcyalasakau tasmAdbhaveccApi vilambikA||" iti| sA ca kaphavAtAnubaddhA|tadanubandhena dIrghakAlavilambanAt vilambiketyucyate| garIyasvAt patanayogyamapyAmaM kaphavAtAnubaddhatvAnnordhvaM nApyadhaH patati, lInameva ciramavatiSThate ityarthaH| tathA ca suCrutaH (u.a. 56/9)- "duSTaM hi bhuktaM kaphamArutAbhyAM pravartate nordhvamadhaCca yasya| vilambikAM tAM ca vivarjanIyAmAcakSate CAstravidaH purANAH||" iti| kaphavAtAnubaddhatvAdevamitareSvapi pittArabdhatvaM vidagdhatvaM ca lakSyate| anyena hyArabdhamanyenAnubadhyate| pittaM ca vidagdhAdeva pravartate| tathA ca bheDaH (ci. a. 11)- "yadA bhuktaM vidagdhaM ca nordhvaM nAdhaH pravartate|| tAM vilambIM vigarhanti viSakalpAM visUcikAm||" iti| viSakalpAmiti pittolbaNatvaM dyotyate| visUcikAmiti visUcikAviCeSyatvena sAnnipAtikatvam| AmaliGgA-ajIrNatulyalakSaNA, viCeSAnupAdAnAt trayANAmapyAmAdInAM liGgairyuktA| tathA ca khAraNAdiH-"etAnyuktAni liGgAni tvAmAjIrNe vinirdiCet|" iti| etAni-ajIrNatrayasambandhIni| AmAt-ajIrNAdannAt jAtamajIrNaM-AmAjIrNam,vilambikA, na tu kaphajamAmam| "yathAkrameNa vAtAdi sannipAtAtmakaM vadet|" iti tenaiva sAnnipAtikasyoktatvAt| tatsamasAdhanA,-teSAM - sa0-pathyaM-CAlyAdi| apathyaM-yavakAdi| tanmiCraM-ekIkRtya, bhuktaM samaCanaM matam, asminvaidyakatantre| vidyAdityAdi| bhuktasya-abhyavahRtasyopari yadanyadbhojanaM tadadhyaCanaM jAnIyAt| nanu, evaM prAtarACe kRte yaH sAyamACaH, tasyAdhyaCanatvaM prasajyeta| adhyaCanaM ca vivarjyameva| yato~anantarameva paThiSyati-"trINyapyetAni mRtyuM vA" ityAdi| vaidyakatantreSu ca narANAM dvirAhAra upadiSTaH| bhagavAn vyAso~apyavocat-"sAyaMprAtarmanuSyANAM bhojanaM vidhinirmitam|" iti| tasmAdadhyaCanasyaivaM tadasamIcInaM lakSaNam| atra saJcakSmahe| prAgbhuktasyopari samanantaremeva vahnAvavibhakte yadaCanaM tadevAdhyaCanam, nAnyat| ata eva suCruto brUte (sU.a. 46|491)-"prAgbhukte tvavibhakte~agnau dvirannaM na samAcaret|" iti| tasmAt prAtarACe kRte satyagnau vibhakte yaH sAyamACaH sa na parihAryaH, api tu kArya eva, guNAvahatvAt| etadeva pratipAdayituM saGgrahe~adhyagISTa (sU.a. 11)-"prAtarACe tvajIrNe~api sAyamACo na duSyati| ajIrNe sAyamACe tu prAtarACo hi duSyati|| divA prabodhyate~arkeNa hRdayaM puNDarIkavat| tasminvibuddhe srotAMsi sphuTatvaM yAnti sarvaCaH|| vyAyAmAcca vicArAcca vikSiptatvAcca cetasaH| na kledamupagacchanti divA tenAsya dhAtavaH|| aklinneSvannamAsaktamanyatteSu na duSyati| avidagdheSviva payaHsvanyatsammiCritaM payaH|| rAtrau tu hRdaye mlAne saMvRteSvayaneSu ca| parikledaM yAnti koSThe saMvRte dehadhAtavaH|| klinneSvanyadapakveSu teSvAsiktaM praduSyati| vidagdheSu payaHsvanyat payastapteSvivArpitam|| naiCe tasmAdajIrNe~anne nAnyadbhuJjIta bhojanam|" iti| adhiCabdo~atropariCabdArthaH| yathA-'prAsAdamadhirohati|' iti| akAle bahu cAlpaM vA bhuktaM tvaCanaM viSamACanasaMjJaM vidyAt| kaH punarakAlo bhojanasya ? iti cet, brUmaH| "prasRSTe viNmUtre" (Clo. 55) ityAdinA~~AhArakAlaM vakSyati| tadvaiparItyenAkAlo vedyaH| trINyapyetAni-samaCanAdhyaCanaviSamACanAni, mRtyuM vA sRjanti-janayanti, ghorAn vyAdhIn-gulmAdIn vA|

A0 ra0- samaCanaM lakSayati-miCramiti| pathyaM-CAlyAdi, apathyaM-yavakAdi, taddvayaM miCrIkRtya bhuktaM-samaCanAkhyam| yattu kevalamapathyaM tadviruddhAkhyam|    adhyaCanaM lakSayati-vidyAditi| bhuktasyopari punarbhojanaM-adhyaCanAkhyam| bhuktasya-prAgabhyavahRtasyAnnasya pAkAbhAvAdAmACaya eva sthitasya, upari-UrdhvamanyadannamAdhIyate yattat-bhuktasyopari bhojanam, pUrvAnnaCeSe bhuktamityarthaH| tathA ca carakaH (ci.a. 15/233)- "pUrvAnnaCeSe tu punarbhuktamadhyaCanaM matam|" iti| suCruto~api (sU.a. 46/508)- "ajIrNe bhujyate yattu tadadhyaCanamucyate|" iti| katham? bhUyo-bAhulyena| anena kvacidannaCeSe bhuktamapi nAdhyaCanam| yathA (saGgrahe sU.a. 11)- "prAtarACe tvajIrNe~api sAyamACo na duSyati|" iti| tathA, atyagnau (hRdaye ci. a. 10/84)- "muhurmuhurajIrNe~api bhojyAnyasyopakalpayet|" iti| nanu, etadaprAptakAlACanatvAdviSamACanAdabhinnam| maivam| jIrNe pUrvAnne yadaprAptakAlaM tadviSamACanam, adhyaCanaM tvajIrNe iti bhedaH| nanu,"prasRSTe viNmUtre" (Clo 55) ityAdinA jIrNAnnatvasyaiva kAlatvaM vakSayati| tatkathamaprAptakAlatvam ? maivam| yo hi yadA pratyahaM bhuGkte sa tasya bhojanakAlaH| prasRSTaviNmUtratvAdikaM tu tasyaiva viCeSaNam| tadviCiSTasyaiva tasya kAlatvArtham| tasmAt prasRSTaviNmUtratvAdiviCiSTe svakAle bhojanaM-kAlabhojanam| prApte~api svakAle pUrvAnnasyAjIrNatvAdanutpanneSu prasRSTaviNmUtratvAdiSu bhojanaM-adhyaCanam| pUrvAnnasya jIrNatvAdutpanneSvapi teSvaprApte svakAle bhojanaM-viSamACanam| avaCyaM caitadabhyupagantavyam| anyathA hi (hR. sU. a. 16/18)- "hyastane jIrNa evAnne sneho~acchaH Cuddhaye bahuH| CamanaH kSudvato~ananno madhyamAtraCca Casyate||" iti kAlabhedo na syAt|   viSamACanaM lakSayati-akAla iti| akAle bhuktaM viSamACanam| taddvividham,-aprAptakAlamatItakAlaM ca| amAtrACanamapyakAle bhuktaM viSamACanamevetyAha-bahu cAlpaM veti| tasmAt kAle yadamAtrayA bhujyate tadamAtrACanam| yaccAkAle mAtrayA amAtrayA vA tadviSamACanam|     samaCanAdInAM doSamAha-trINIti| etAni-samaCana-viSamACanAdhyaCanAni, aniyatAyuSAM mRtyuM, niyatAyuSAM ghorAn vyAdhIn sRjanti|

sa0-kAle-vakSyamANe| tanmanAH-bhojanagatacittaH| kSudvAn-bubhukSitaH| viviktasthaH-ekAntasthitaH| tathA, prakSAlitacaraNahastamukhaH| anindan-bhojanamagarhamANaH| abruvan-abhASamANaH| iSTaM-manorucitaM bhojanam| tathA, dravaM-dravaprAyam| iSTaiH-priyaiH, sahACnIyAt| 'kSudvAn' ityatra praCaMsAyAM matup, utpannapraCastabubhukSaH| tena kiJcidapi yadA duSTabubhukSA syAttadA nAdyAdityarthaH| duSTabubhukSAyA lakSaNam (saGgrahe sU.a. 11)- "doSopanaddhaM yadi lInamannaM pittoddhatasyAvRNuyAnna vahnim| jAyeta duSTA tu tadA bubhukSA yA mandabuddhIn viSavannihanti||" iti| kimbhUtaM bhojanam ? sAtmyam| tacca sAtmyaM dvidhA,-ekaM svalpakAlAbhyastaM sukhAvaham, anyacca janmanaH prabhRti sahAtmanAbhyastaM sukhAvahaM ca| etadevaikaM sAtmyamucyate| tathA, Cuci-anucchiSTaM keCAdyanupahataM ca| hitaM-pathyam| snigdhaM ca taduSNaM ca-snigdhoSNam| tathA, laghu-laghuprAyam. na tu laghveva| ata evedamupapannam "SaDrasaM madhuraprAyam" iti| madhuraraso hi guruH| tathA ca vakSyati (hR.sU.a. 10|38)- "paToH kaSAyastasmAcca madhuraH paramaM guruH|" iti| tadyadi laghveva syAt (tarhi) madhuraprAyamiti na ghaTate| tasmAllaghuprAyamiti vyAkhyeyam| kathamadyAt ? tadAha-nAtidrutavilambitam| kiM kRtvA ? pitrAdIMstarpayitvA| tathA, tiraCco~api-aCvavRSAdIn, pratipannaparigrahAn-kRtasvIkArAn, pratyavekSya-tadAhAracintAM kRtvetyarthaH| tathA, AtmAnaM samIkSya-yathA mamedaM sAtmyamidamasAtmyamiti nityamapramattaH san paryAlocya| kharanAdenoktam-"atidrutACI tvAhAraguNadoSAnna vindati| unmuhyatyalpamaCnAti cchardayedvA~anavasthitaH|| vilambitaM tu bhuJjAno na tRptimadhigacchati| khAdan bahvapi CItatvAdyAti bhojyamahRdyatAm|| jalpato hasataCcApi bhuJjAnasyAnyacetasaH| ta eva doSA mantavyA ye vilambitabhojane||" ityAdi|

A0 ra0- prasaGgAnnityasevyamauSadhamAha-triphalAmiti| niCi-svapnakAle| netrebalAya-cakSurindriyadArDhyAya| yacca auSadhaM rasAyanAdikaM, svAsthyamanuvartayati rogotpattibIjaM cocchinatti tadapi yathAkAlaM bhajet| uktaM ca carakeNa (sU. a. 5/10)- "tacca nityaM prayuJjIta svAsthyaM yenAnuvartate| ajAtAnAM vikArANAmanutpattikaraM ca yat||" iti|

bisekSumocacocAmramodakotkArikAdikam||45|| adyAddravyaM guru snigdhaM svAdu mandaM sthiraM puraH||45|| viparItamataCcAnte madhye~amlalavaNotkaTam||46||

sa0-bisAdidravyaM gurvAdiguNayaktaM puraH-pUrvamadyAt| modako-laDDukaH| utkArikA-lapyasikA| ataH-asmAcca, viparItaM-laghurUkSakaTutIkSNasaraprAyam, ante bhojanasya seveta| madhye cAmlalavaNotkaTam| kharanAde coktam-"kaTuM lavaNamamlaM vA pUrvamAhAramAharet| AhAro madhuro~agre hi gururviSTabhya jIryati||" iti| tadetaduktamubhayamapi deCasAtmyAdivaCAt pramANayitavyam|

A0 ra0- bhojyakramamAha-biseti| gurvAdiguNaM bisAdibhojyadravyaM puraH-pUrvamadyAt| mocaM-kadalIphalam| cocaM-nArikelaphalaM panasaM vA| modako-laDDukaH| utkArikA-pUpalikA| AdiCabdAdiNDarikAdayaH| ato viparItaM-laghvAdiguNaM SaSTikaudanAdikam, ante adyAt| amlalavaNotkaTaM-CuktAdikaM, madhye~adyAt| yattUktaM khAraNAdinA-"kaTuM lavaNamamlaM vA purvamAhAramAharet| AhAro madhuro~agre hi gururviSTabhya jIryati||" iti| tanmandAgniviSayam| tadbhojanasya dIpanapUrvakatvAt| tathA coktaM saGgrahe (sU. a. 10)- "yathAgnisAtmyaM tu prAgdravamupaCuSkaM vA~aCnIyAt| prAgeva tu guru svAdu snigdhaM ca| madhye~amlalavaNam| ante rUkSadravamitararasayuktaM ca| tatra mandAgneH dravoSNena samuttejitoSmaNo~anyadapyupayuktaM samyak pAkamupaiti|" iti|

annena kukSerdvAvaMCau pAnenaikaM prapUrayet||46||  ACrayaM pavanAdInAM caturthamavaCeSayet||47||

anupAnaM himaM bAri yavagodhUmayorhitam||47|| dadhni madye viSe kSaudre, koSNaM piSTamayeSu tu||48|| CAkamudgAdivikRtau mastutakrAmlakAJjikam||48|| surA kRCAnAM puSTyarthaM, sthUlAnAM tu madhUdakam||49|| CoSe mAMsaraso, madyaM mAMse svalpe ca pAvake||49|| vyAdhyauSadhAdhvabhASyastrIlaGghanAtapakarmabhiH||50|| kSINe vRddhe ca bAle ca payaH pathyaM yathA~amRtam||50||

sa0-yavagodhUmayorbhuktayoranu-paCcAt, pAnaM CItaM jalaM hitam| tathA, dadhni madye viSe kSaudre ca himaM jalamanupAne hitam| piSTamayeSu koSNaM jalaM hitam| CAkamudgAdivikRtau ca mastvAdikamanupAnaM hitam| kRCAnAM puMsAM surA puSTyarthaM hitA| sthUlAnAM punaH karCanAya madhUdakaM hitam| CoSe-kSaye, mAMsaraso hitaH, puSTikAritvAt| mAMse bhukte madyamanupAnaM hitam| svalpe ca pAvake madyamevAnupAnaM hitam| vyAdhyAdibhiH kSINe-kSapite, payo-dugdhaM, pathyaM-hitam| iha (hitamiti) prakRte~api pathyagrahaNaM pathyataratvajJApanArtham| yathA~amRtamityanenaitat pratipAdayati,-yathA~amRtaM balavarNaujaH kAntyAyurAdijanakaM tathedamapItyarthaH|

A0 ra0- athAnupAnam| tena hyasamyagyogo~api samyagyogatAM yAti| yadAha khAraNAdiH-"kAmaM doSavadapyannamamAtraM vA niSevitam,| alpadoSamadoSaM vA~apyanupAnena jIryati||" iti| anu-paCcAtpIyata ityanupAnam| etacca bAhulyAbhiprAyeNa| taddhi madhye~apyAdAvapi pIyate| yadAha suCrutaH (sU. a. 46/467)- "tadAdau karCayet pItaM sthApayenmadhyasevitam| paCcAtpItaM bRMhayati tasmAdvIkSya prayojayet||" iti| tathA, (su.sU.a. 46/428)- "nirAmayAnAM caitattu bhuktamadhye praCasyate|" iti ca| kastarhi pAnAnupAnayorbhedaH ? ucyate| yadaniyatakAlaM rucivaCAtpIyate tat-pAnam, yanniyatakAlaM vidhivaCAtpIyate tat-anupAnam| tatrAdAvanupAnavibhAgaH| tatra yavAdiSu CItodakamAha-anupAnaM himamiti| piSTamayeSu ISaduSNodakamAha-koSNamiti| yattu suCrutenoktam (sU. a. 46/423)- "CItodakaM mAkSikasya piSTAnnasya ca sarvaCaH| dadhipAyasamadyArtiviSajuSTe tathaiva ca||" iti| tadvidAhipiSTAnnaviSayam| uktaM va saGgrahe (sU. a. 10)- "tacchItaM dadhimadhuyavagodhUmamadyaviSeSu sarveSu ca vidAhiSu CaradgrISmayoCca|" iti|   CAkAdiSu mastvAdyAha-CAketi| CAkaM-pAThAdi, mudgAdi- sUpyam, tasya   (tayoH) vikRtiH-vaTakAdikA| vikRtigrahaNaM rasAdyanyatva eva mastvAdiprAptyartham| avikRte tu sUpAdau suCrutenoktam (sU. a. 46/425)- "payo mAMsaraso vA~api CAkamudgAdibhojane|" iti| mastvAdiSu yasya yatsAtmyamiSTaM vA tasya tadyojyamiti| ekasyaiva tatkAryakaratvAt na miCrIkRtyaprayogaH| ata eva pRthaguktaM saGgrahe (sU. a. 10)- "dhAnyAmlaM mastu takraM vA CAkAvarAnneSu|" iti|    kRCAnAM surAmAha-sureti| kRCAnAM CItodakAdyuciteSvanneSu suraivAnupAnam, anavakACatvAt| puSTyarthM- - na tu roganivRtyartham| yastu kRCo rogArtaH tasya rogAnurUpamanupAnaM prayojyam|    sthUlAnAM madhUdakamAha-sthUlAnAM tviti| madhumiCramudakaM-madhUdakam| CeSaM pUrvavat|    CoSe mAMsarasamAha-CoSa iti| CoSe-CuSyati dehe| yadAha khAraNAdiH-"kRCakSINAmayonmuktapuSTivarNabalArthinAm| madyastrICramanityAnAM CuSyatAM ca raso hitaH||" iti|    mAMsACinAM mandAgnInAM ca madyamAha-madyamiti| tacca madyocitAnAmeva| yadAha suCrutaH (sU. a. 46/426)- "madyaM madyocitAnAM tu sarvamAMseSu pUjitam| amadyapAnAmudakaM phalAmlaM vA praCasyate||" iti|    vyAdhyAdikSINAdInAM kSIramAha-vyAdhyauSadheti| laGghanaM - upavAsaH| karma-ceSTA|

    dravyameva rasAdInAM CreSThaM, te hi tadACrayAH||1||

sa0-rasAdInAmiti nirdhAraNe SaSThI| rasavIryAdInAM madhye dravyameva pradhAnam| kutaH ? te-rasAdayo, hi-yasmAt, tadACrayAH-tadeva dravyamACrayo yeSAM ta evam| ata eva kevalA rasAdayo nopalabhyante| tasmAt dravyaM pradhAnam|

A0 ra0-tatra dravyasya prAdhAnyamAha-dravyameveti|| rasAdibhyo dravyameva pradhAnam|  hi-yasmAt, te-rasAdayaH, tadACrayAH-dravyAdhiSThAnAH|  etenaiva rasAdyACrayo dravyamityuktaM bhavati|  prAdhAnyakathanaM dravyajJAne tAtparyArtham|  uktaM ca saGgrahe (sU. a. 17)-"yasmAd dRSTo yavaH svAdurgururapyanilapradaH|  dIpanaM CItamapyAjyaM vasoSNA~apyagnisAdinI||  kATupako~api pittaghno mudgo, mASastu pittalaH|  svAdupAko~api, cayakRtsnigdhoSNaM guru phANitam||  rase svAdau yathA caitattathA~anyeSvapi dRCyate|  vAtalaM kaphapittaghnamamlamapyAkSakIphalam||  kurute dadhi gurveva vahniM pAlevataM na tu|  kapitthaM dADimaM cAmlaM grAhi, nAmalakIphalam||  kaSAyA grAhiNI CItA dhAtakI, na harItakI|  apradhAnAH pRthak tasmAdrasAdyAH saMCritAstu te||  prabhAvaCca yato dravye, dravyaM CreSThamato matam|" iti|

 paJcabhUtAtmakaM tattu--------------------------||1||

sa0-turavadhAraNe| yattadoCca nityAbhisambandhAt yadityetadanuktamapyarthAllabhyate| tenAyamarthaH,-yat rasAdInAmACrayabhUtaM kAryaM dravyaM-harItakyAdi sthAvaraM, chAgAdi vA jaGgamaM, tat paJcabhUtAtmakam, na tu yatkAraNaM dravyamAkACAdi| tasya hi paJcabhUtAtmakatve satyAkACAdInAM pRthaktvenAtmalAbho na syAt| tataCcedamAkACaM nAma mahAbhUtam, idaM pRthvI nAma mahAbhUtamiti gadituM na pAryeta, sarvasya paJcamahAbhUtAtmakatvAt| na ca yatkAraNaM tatkadAcit kAryaM syAt| tasmAt kAryadravyasyaiva paJcamahAbhUtAtmakatvam, na kAraNadravyasya~~AkACAdeH| munistu (ca. sU. a. 1|47)- "khAdInyAtmA manaH kAlo diCaCca dravyasaGgrahaH|" iti navadhA dravyamuktvA tallakSaNaM vyadhIta| yathA (carake sU. a. 1|50)- "yatrACritAH karmaguNAH kAraNaM samavAyi yat| taddravyam" iti| asyArthaH,-yatra karma-parispandalakSaNaM saMyogaviyogakAraNam, samavetaCca guNaH-yatra CabdAdayo gurvAdayo vA buddhirvA parAdayo vA samavetAH, yacca kAraNaM samavAyi taddravyamucyate| samavAyIti| yatkAraNamapRthagbhavati tatsamavAyikAraNam| yathA,-tantavaH paTasya| etAni karmaguNACrayitvasamavAyikAraNatvAni yadyapi sarvANi sarvasmin dravye na vidyante, tathA~api yadyatra sambhavati tatra tena tasya dravyasya dravyatvaM kalpyam| tadyathA,-manasaH karmaguNACrayitvena, vAyvAdInAM tu karmaguNACrayitvena samavAyikAraNatvena ca| nanu, AkACAdIni kAraNadravyANIti kathamuktam ? yAvatA~~AkACasya dravyatvameva nAstIti kecit| tAnbrUmahe| jaladheriva pratyakSeNaivAsya nIlarUpatopalabdherastitvaM siddham| tathA, kavayo~api nIlatvamevAsya varNayanti| yathA karNATasya-"vipulapulinA hRdyA nadyo vahantyatinirmalAH kamalasubhago vAyurghrANaM vilambati mAMsalaH| navajaladharacchAyAvAsAdivAciranirgato vahati CaCabhRnnIlasnigdhe nabhasyavadAtatAm||" iti| tathA ca bANasya-"dhautACani nabhasi" iti| tadetaddUSayanti| tathA hi,-  dUrAt bhrAntimAtreNaiva nIlarUpatvamasyopalabhyate| yathA-girervividhavarNasyApi dUrAnnIlatvapratItiH| yatkavInAM varNanaM tatsAdRCyaleCena niSpramANameva sambhAvyate| tathA ca tejasaH CuklatvaM varNayanti| na ca Cuklatvametasyopapadyate, nirAkAratvAt| tasmAnnIlarUpatvamAkACasyAnupapannam| api ca, yadyAkACasya nIlarUpatA syAt, tadA nIlarUpaM bhavennabhaH| na ca syAtsnigdhanIlarUpatvaM nabhasaH| nanu, darCanavaicitryAdasya rUpavattvamupapannam| yathA,-puruSaH CarAderRjutAM didRkSurekaM cakSurnimIlyAparaM conmIlya tAmupalabhate, na tu nayanayugalena| tadvatsannikRSTe gaganarUpasyAnAdAnam, viprakRSTe tu grahaNaM syAditi| na caitadyuktam| yato rUpavattve~abhyupagamyamAne sparCavattvamasya prasajyeta, rUpasya sparCena nityasambandhAt| sparCavattve ca satyAkACatvameva na syAt| ato na rUpavadvyoma| anye tvevaM manyante| pavanavadAkACasyAvasthA~astu| yathA kila pavanaH sparCavAn, na ca tasmin rUpaM sambhavati| tathaivAkACo rUpavAn, na ca sparCavAniti| tadidamanavagatapadArthasvarUpANAM vilapanam| tato yatra rUpaM tatrAvaCyaM sparCaH, na tu yatra sparCastatrAvaCyaM rUpam| tasmAnna nabho rUpavanna ca sat (sparCavat)| atrocyate| paramArthadarCibhiryadupAdAyotpattiH kathyate, tadasti| yathA,-pRthivyAdi| uktaM ca-"akSarAt khaM tato vAyustasmAttejastato jalam| udakAt pRthivI jAtA bhUtAnAmeSa sambhavaH||" iti| tasmAdAkACaM dravyamasti| api ca, AkACamupAdAya gativRddhiprasavAdiviCeSopalabdherAkACasyAstitvam| yathA,-rUpopalabdhiviCeSasambhavAnumitaM cakSuH| api ca, AkACAbhAve hyekaghanatvaM jagataH syAt| tathA, CabdAkhyasya guNasyAnyathA~anupapattyA~astyAkACamiti| nanu, vAyordravyatvaM nAsti, tatsvarUpagrAhakapramANAbhAvAt| sparCopalabdhervAyorastitvamucyata iti cet tadapi na, yato~adhunaivoktaM khAdvAyuriti| gaganasya ca sparCAbhAvAt vAyorapyasparCavattvam, kAraNaguNapUrvakatvAtkAryasya| naitadasti| kAryasyobhayAtmakatvadarCanAt| kAraNaguNapUrvakaM kAryaM dRSTamakAraNaguNapUrvakaM ca dRSTam| hi,- tejasaH sparCo rUpaikArthasamavAyI| apAM sparCo rUparasAbhyAM samavetaH| pRthivyAH sparCo rUparasagandhasamavetaH| yastu vAyoH sparCaH, sa patracalanaCAkhAbhaJjanAdikarmasamavAyI| sa tatkarmopadeCAdastitvam| yasya tattvadarCibhiH karmopadiCyate, tadasti| yathA,- kaphAdivadvAtasya ca karmopadiSTam (hR.sU.a. 12|49)- "sraMsavyAsavyadhasvApa" ityAdi| tasmAdasti vAyurdravyamiti| nanu, yuktaCcaturNAM pRthivyApastejovAyUnAM bhUtAnAM sAvayavatvAt dravyeSUtkarSApakarSasanniveCaH, kvaciddravye kasyacidbhUtasya pramANataH prabhAvataCcAvayavAnAmutkarSApakarSasadbhAvAt| AkACasya tu sa0-pRthvImAdhArIkRtvotpadyate| evaM pRthivyAkhyena bhUtena~~AdhAratvenopakRtya tena tadArabdhaM dravyamityucyate| tathA, ambu-salilaM, yoniH-kAraNaM, yasya tadambuyoni dravyam| evaM jalaM nAma mahAbhUtaM rasavattvAdyonitayopakRtya tena tadArabdhamityucyate| [muninA~apyuktam (ca. sU. a. 1|63)- "rasanArtho rasastasya dravyamApaH kSitistathA| nirvRttau ca viCeSe ca pratyayAH khAdayastrayaH||" iti| amISAM dravyAdInAmACrayakarmaNorbhedaCcintyaH|] tathA, agnipavananabhasAM samavAyAt-apRthagbhAvAt, tasya-dravyasya, nirvRttiH-niSpattiH| tathA, tasya dravyasya yo viCeSaH-idamanyadidamanyaddravyamityevaMrUpo nAnAsvabhAvaH, so~apyagnipavananabhasAM samavAyAt| evamagni pavananabhobhiH samavAyikAraNatvenopakRtya tairetaddravyamArabdhamityucyate| evaM ca sarvaM kAryadravyaM paJcamahAbhUtAtmakam, paJcabhirmahAbhUtairArabdhatvAt  yatra dravye yadbhUtaM bhUyiSThamadhikRtam, tena tasya vyapadeCaH-saMjJA bhavati| yathA,-pRthivyA~adhikayotpAditaM dravyaM pArthivam| evamApyaM taijasaM ca vedyam| tadevaM sarvaM dravyaM paJcabhUtAtmakaM sthitam|

A0 ra0-dravyotpattimAha-tattviti|  tat-dravyam, kSmAM-pRthivIm, adhiSThAya jAyate, mRdamiva ghaTaH, upAdAnakAraNaM pRthvItyarthaH|   ambu-udakaM, yoniH-vipariNAmakAraNaM yasya tadambuyoni|  yathA,-ghaTe niSpAdye mRdaH piNDIbhAvAdau|  agnyAdInAM sambandhAt tannivRttiH-sampUrNAvayavatvam, kAThinyakriyAvakACAdidAnena| viCeSaH-parasparam, so~api tata eva|  yathA,- piNDIbhUtAyA mRdo maNikakarakaCarAvAdibhedaH| sarveSAM paJcabhutAtmakatvAdabhede prApte bhedahetumAha-vyapadeCa iti|  vyapadeCaH-idaM pArthivamidamApyamityAdi bhedena vyavahAraH|  sa bhUyasA-adhikena bhUtena, yatra yasyAdhikyaM tasya tena vyapadeCaH|

tasmAnnaikarasaM dravyaM bhUtasaGghAtasambhavAt||3||

sa0-tasmAdbhUtasaGghAtasambhavAt kAraNAddravyaM naikarasaM-api tvanekarasam| evaM dravyavadrasasyApi bhUtasaGghAtasambhavatvam| ata eva pratidravyaM madhurAdirasasya nAnAsvAdopalambhaH| tathA ca, drAkSA~akSoDakSIrekSukSaudragokSurAdau dravye satyapi mAdhurye~aparo~apara AsvAda upalabhyate| evamamlAnAmapi mAtuluGgadhAnyAmlAdInAM dravyANAM nAnAsvAdopalambhaH| evaM lavaNAdInAmapi vedyam| api caiSAM drAkSAdInAmanekarasatvamAsvAdaviCeSAdanumIyamAnaM bhUyasA rasenAnyarasAbhibhavaM kRtvA vyapadiCyate idaM madhuramidamamlAdyanyatamam, mahAbhUtavat| yathA,-sarvaM dravyaM paJcamahAbhUtAtmakaM bhUyasA mahAbhUtenAnyamahAbhUtAbhibhavaM kRtvA yathA tena vyapadiCyate pArthivamidamApyamidamiti| nanu, dravyanirNaye prakRte pAJcabhautikaM yadeva dravyaM pratijJAtaM tadeva "tasmAt" ityAdinA nigamagranthenAtivAhayituM yuktam, na punaraprastutamanekarasatvam| tasmAdatraivaM granthaH kartuM nyAyyaH-"tasmAnnaikabhUtajaM dravyaM bhUtasaGghAtasambhavAt|" iti| atrocyate| SaNNAmapi rasAnAM yonirudakam| tataCcaikasyaiva mahAbhUtasyodakasaMjJasya rasakAraNatvaM prAptaM nAnyeSAm, nIrasatvAt| iti kRtvA na bhUtasaGghAtasambhavatvaM rasasya| ityevaMvidhAmACaGkAmapaninISurbhUtasaGghAtasambhavatvaM rasasya caikenaiva prayatnena "tasmAnnaikarasaM dravyaM  bhUtasaGghAtasambhavAt|" iti jagAda| muniCcAta eva rasasya bhUtasaGghAtasambhavatvaM spaSTaM kRtvovAca| yathA (ca. sU. a. 1|63)- "rasanArtho rasastasya dravyamApaH kSitistathA| nirvRttau ca viCeSe ca pratyayAH khAdayastrayaH||" iti| evaM bhUtasaGghAto rasAnAM dravyACritAnAmapi sambhavakAraNam| etacca rasabhedIye savistaraM kathayiSyAmaH|

A0 ra0-sarveSAM dravyANAM sarvadharmatvamAha-tasmAditi|  tasmAt-sarvabhUtArabdhatvAt sarvamapi dravyaM naikarasaM-anekarasam, sarvadharmamityarthaH|  rasaCabdo~atra dharmamAtropalakSaNaH|  sarvabhUtArabdhatve~apyekarasatve ko doSaH ?  ityACaGkyAha-bhUta saGghAtasambhavAditi|  rasAnAmapi bhUtasamudAyAdutpatteH|  vakSyati hi (hR.sU.a. 10/1)-"dvayolbaNaiH kramAdbhUtairmadhurAdirasodbhavaH|" iti|  sati ca kAraNe kAryeNAvaCyaM bhAvyam|

naikadoSAstato rogAstatra vyakto rasaH smRtaH||3|| avyakto~anurasaH kiJcidante vyakto~api ceSyate||4||

sa0-yataH sarvaM dravyamanekarasam| tataH-tasmAtkAraNAt, ekadoSA rogA jvarAdayo na bhavanti, api tvanekadoSAH, tridoSA ityarthaH| atrApi "vyapadeCastu bhUyasA" ityadhyAhAryam| tena tridoSAtmake~api jvare vAtAdhike vAtajvara evaM pittajvaraH CleSmajvara ityevaMrUpo vyapadeCa upapannaH| nanu, yadi sarvo jvaraH sannipAtajaH, tatkimiti vakSyati ? ayaM sannipAtajvara iti| brUmahe| samaviSamarUpaM CaktyutkarSamACritya yatra doSA vartante sa sannipAtajvara iti tantrakRtA purastAdvistareNa pratipAdayiSyate|      atha ko raso~anuraso vetyAha-tatretyAdi| tatra-tasmin dravye, yo vyaktaH-sphuTa upalabhyate, sa rasaH smRtastantrakRdbhiH| yaCcAvyakto-asphuTapratibhAso rasanendriyeNopalabhyate, so~anurasaH| hInArtho~atrAnuCabdaH, alpo rasa ityarthaH| na caitAvadevAnurasalakSaNamityAha-kiJcidityAdi| mukhakSiptasya harItakyAderdravyasya rasanendriyeNa kiJcidante vyakto~apyupalabhyate yaH so~apyanurasa iSyate, munibhiriti vAkyaCeSaH| ante ityanenaitadbodhayati,-ante-avasAne, na tvAdAvApAtamAtre na ca madhye| tayorhi rasasyaivopalambhaH| anuCabdasyAtra paCcAdarthatvAt paCcAt sphuTo~api kiJcidya upalabhyate so~apyanurasa ityarthaH|          

A0 ra0-tulyanyAyatvaprasaGgAt sarveSAM rogANAM sarvadoSajatvamAha-naikadoSA iti|  rogA naikadoSAH-sarve~api rogAH sarvadoSodbhavAH|  kutaH?  tata eva hetoH,-rogANAmapi bhUtasaGghAtasambhavAt|  bhUtasaGghAtasya tu triSu doSeSu vibhaktatvAt|  yathoktaM saGgrahe (sU.a. 20)-"vAyvAkACadhAtubhyAM vAyuH AgneyaM pittam, ambhaHpRthivIbhyAM CleSmA|" iti|  bhUtasaGghAtaM vinA na doSasaGghAtaH, taM vinA na rogotpattiriti, ataH sarve rogAstridoSajAH|  kecittu sarvadravyANAM sarvarasatvena sarvadoSasAmAnyAt sarvadoSakopanatvam, tato rogA naikadoSA iti vyAcakSate|  tadasat|  sAmAnyavadvaiparItyasyApi sattvAt|  sAmAnyaM prayojakamiti cet na, doSaghnadravyabhedAbhAvaprasaGgAt|  vaiparItyamapi kvacit prayojakamiti cet na, sarvadoSakopanatvaniyamavyAghAtAt|  sarvadoSakopanAnAM niyama iti cet na, dvyekadoSakopanadravyAbhAvaprasaGgAt|  bAhulyenaiva vyapadeCa iti cet na, dvidoSakopanaikaCamanadviCamanaikakopanadravyAbhAvaprasaGgAt|  siddhAnte~api sarveSAM sarvadharmatvasvIkArAnna doSaghnAdivibhAga iti cet na, tasya tasya dharmasya tatra tatra prayojakatvAt|  tathA ca vakSyati (Clo.22)-"kiJcidrasena kurute karma pAkena cAparam|  guNAntareNa vIryeNa prabhAveNaiva kiJcana||" ityAdi|  tasmAtpUrvameva vyAkhyAnaM yuktam|         sarveSAM sarvadharmatvAdaviCeSe prApte tannirAsArthaM dharmatAratamyamAha-tatra vyakta iti|  tatra-dravye, kaCciddharmaH sadyo vyaktaH kaCcidavyaktaH kaCcidISadvyaktaH kaCcidante vyaktaH|  teSvAdyo rasAkhyaH, itare trayo~anurasAkhyAH|

 gurvAdayo guNA dravye pRthivyAdau rasACraye||4||  raseSu vyapadiCyante sAhacaryopacArataH||5||

sa0-pRthivyAdau-pRthivyAdimahAbhUtArabdhe dravye, rasACraye gurvAdayo guNAH paramArthata ACritAH, na tu raseSu madhurAdiSu| yattu raseSu vyapadiCyante tat sAhacaryopacArataH| saha caratIti sahacaraH, tasya bhAvaH sAhacaryam| yasminneva guDAdau dravye madhuro rasa ACritastasminnapi guruguNa ACritaH, iti madhurarasaguruguNayoH sahacarabhAvaH| sAhacaryeNa-tulyACrayatvenopacAraH sAhacaryopacAraH, tasmAtsAhacaryopacArato, gurvAdayo guNA raseSu-madhurAdiSu vyapadiCyante| yathA,-gururmadhuro raso laghuramla ityAdi| na punaH paramArthato raseSu gurvAdayaH santi| asti ca sAhacaryeNa vyapadeCaH| yathA-ghRtasahacareNa ghRtasthenAgninA dagdho ghRtadagdha ityucyate|

A0 ra0-gurvAdInAM rasACrayatvAddravyasyAsarvadharmatve prApte parihAramAha-gurvAdaya iti|  gurvAdayo guNA dravya eva, na raseSu | yastu madhuro guruH, amlo laghurityAdi vyapadeCaH, sa sAhacaryopacArataH|  ekasminnACraye dvayoravasthAnaM-sAhacaryam|  sAhacaryameva kutaH?  ityAha-rasACraya iti|  dravyaM hi gurvAdInAmiva rasAnAmapyACrayaH|  ata ekACrayatvAtsAhacaryam, tena upacAraH-avidyamAnasyApyACrayACrayIbhAvasyAropaH|  nanu, kimetat rasAdvyatiriktaM dravyaM nAma ?  ityata Aha-pRthivyAdAviti|  pRthivyAdiCabdAbhilabhyaM dravyamityarthaH|

 paJcabhUtAtmakaM tattu--------------------------||1||

sa0-turavadhAraNe| yattadoCca nityAbhisambandhAt yadityetadanuktamapyarthAllabhyate| tenAyamarthaH,-yat rasAdInAmACrayabhUtaM kAryaM dravyaM-harItakyAdi sthAvaraM, chAgAdi vA jaGgamaM, tat yatkAraNamapRthagbhavati tatsamavAyikAraNam| yathA,-tantavaH paTasya| etAni karmaguNACrayitvasamavAyikAraNatvAni yadyapi sarvANi sarvasmin dravye na vidyante, tathA~api yadyatra sambhavati tatra tena tasya dravyasya dravyatvaM kalpyam| tadyathA,-manasaH karmaguNACrayitvena, vAyvAdInAM tu karmaguNACrayitvena samavAyikAraNatvena ca| nanu, AkACAdIni kAraNadravyANIti kathamuktam ? yAvatA~~AkACasya vahantyatinirmalAH kamalasubhago vAyurghrANaM vilambati mAMsalaH| navajaladharacchAyAvAsAdivAciranirgato vahati CaCabhRnnIlasnigdhe nabhasyavadAtatAm||" iti| tathA ca bANasya-"dhautACani nabhasi" iti| syAtsnigdhanIlarUpatvaM nabhasaH| nanu, darCanavaicitryAdasya rUpavattvamupapannam| yathA,-puruSaH CarAderRjutAM didRkSurekaM cakSurnimIlyAparaM conmIlya tAmupalabhate, na tu nayanayugalena| tadvatsannikRSTe gaganarUpasyAnAdAnam, viprakRSTe tu grahaNaM syAditi| na caitadyuktam| yato rUpavattve~abhyupagamyamAne sparCavattvamasya prasajyeta, rUpasya sparCena nityasambandhAt| sparCavattve ca ---------------------kSmAmadhiSThAya jAyate||1||   ambuyonyagnipavananabhasAM samavAyataH||2||   tannirvRttirviCeSaCca vyapadeCastu bhUyasA||2||

sa0-pRthvImAdhArIkRtvotpadyate| evaM pRthivyAkhyena bhUtena~~AdhAratvenopakRtya tena tadArabdhaM dravyamityucyate| tathA, ambu-salilaM, yoniH-kAraNaM, yasya tadambuyoni dravyam| evaM jalaM nAma mahAbhUtaM rasavattvAdyonitayopakRtya tena tadArabdhamityucyate| [muninA~apyuktam (ca. sU. a. 1|63)- "rasanArtho rasastasya dravyamApaH kSitistathA| nirvRttau ca viCeSe ca pratyayAH khAdayastrayaH||" iti| amISAM dravyAdInAmACrayakarmaNorbhedaCcintyaH|] tathA, agnipavananabhasAM samavAyAt-apRthagbhAvAt, tasya-dravyasya, nirvRttiH-niSpattiH| tathA, tasya dravyasya yo viCeSaH-idamanyadidamanyaddravyamityevaMrUpo nAnAsvabhAvaH, so~apyagnipavananabhasAM samavAyAt| evamagni pavananabhobhiH samavAyikAraNatvenopakRtya tairetaddravyamArabdhamityucyate| evaM ca sarvaM kAryadravyaM paJcamahAbhUtAtmakam, paJcabhirmahAbhUtairArabdhatvAt  yatra dravye yadbhUtaM bhUyiSThamadhikRtam, tena tasya vyapadeCaH-saMjJA bhavati| yathA,-pRthivyA~adhikayotpAditaM dravyaM pArthivam| evamApyaM taijasaM ca vedyam| tadevaM sarvaM dravyaM paJcabhUtAtmakaM sthitam|

A0 ra0-dravyotpattimAha-tattviti|  tat-dravyam, kSmAM-pRthivIm, adhiSThAya jAyate, mRdamiva ghaTaH, upAdAnakAraNaM pRthvItyarthaH|   ambu-udakaM, yoniH-vipariNAmakAraNaM yasya tadambuyoni|  yathA,-ghaTe niSpAdye mRdaH piNDIbhAvAdau|  agnyAdInAM sambandhAt tannivRttiH-sampUrNAvayavatvam, kAThinyakriyAvakACAdidAnena| viCeSaH-parasparam, so~api tata eva|  yathA,- piNDIbhUtAyA mRdo maNikakarakaCarAvAdibhedaH| sarveSAM paJcabhutAtmakatvAdabhede prApte bhedahetumAha-vyapadeCa iti|  vyapadeCaH-idaM pArthivamidamApyamityAdi bhedena vyavahAraH|  sa bhUyasA-adhikena bhUtena, yatra yasyAdhikyaM tasya tena vyapadeCaH|

tasmAnnaikarasaM dravyaM bhUtasaGghAtasambhavAt||3||

sa0-tasmAdbhUtasaGghAtasambhavAt kAraNAddravyaM naikarasaM-api tvanekarasam| evaM dravyavadrasasyApi bhUtasaGghAtasambhavatvam| ata eva pratidravyaM madhurAdirasasya nAnAsvAdopalambhaH| tathA ca, drAkSA~akSoDakSIrekSukSaudragokSurAdau dravye satyapi mAdhurye~aparo~apara AsvAda upalabhyate| evamamlAnAmapi mAtuluGgadhAnyAmlAdInAM dravyANAM nAnAsvAdopalambhaH| evaM lavaNAdInAmapi vedyam| api caiSAM drAkSAdInAmanekarasatvamAsvAdaviCeSAdanumIyamAnaM bhUyasA rasenAnyarasAbhibhavaM kRtvA vyapadiCyate idaM madhuramidamamlAdyanyatamam, mahAbhUtavat| yathA,-sarvaM dravyaM paJcamahAbhUtAtmakaM bhUyasA mahAbhUtenAnyamahAbhUtAbhibhavaM kRtvA yathA tena vyapadiCyate pArthivamidamApyamidamiti| nanu, dravyanirNaye prakRte pAJcabhautikaM yadeva dravyaM pratijJAtaM tadeva "tasmAt" ityAdinA nigamagranthenAtivAhayituM yuktam, na punaraprastutamanekarasatvam| tasmAdatraivaM granthaH kartuM nyAyyaH-"tasmAnnaikabhUtajaM dravyaM bhUtasaGghAtasambhavAt|" iti| atrocyate| SaNNAmapi rasAnAM yonirudakam| tataCcaikasyaiva mahAbhUtasyodakasaMjJasya rasakAraNatvaM prAptaM nAnyeSAm, nIrasatvAt| iti kRtvA na bhUtasaGghAtasambhavatvaM rasasya| ityevaMvidhAmACaGkAmapaninISurbhUtasaGghAtasambhavatvaM rasasya caikenaiva prayatnena "tasmAnnaikarasaM dravyaM  bhUtasaGghAtasambhavAt|" iti jagAda| muniCcAta eva rasasya bhUtasaGghAtasambhavatvaM spaSTaM kRtvovAca| yathA (ca. sU. a. 1|63)- "rasanArtho rasastasya dravyamApaH kSitistathA| nirvRttau ca viCeSe ca pratyayAH khAdayastrayaH||" iti| evaM bhUtasaGghAto rasAnAM dravyACritAnAmapi sambhavakAraNam| etacca rasabhedIye savistaraM kathayiSyAmaH|

A0 ra0-sarveSAM dravyANAM sarvadharmatvamAha-tasmAditi|  tasmAt-sarvabhUtArabdhatvAt sarvamapi dravyaM naikarasaM-anekarasam, sarvadharmamityarthaH|  rasaCabdo~atra dharmamAtropalakSaNaH|  sarvabhUtArabdhatve~apyekarasatve ko doSaH ?  ityACaGkyAha-bhUta saGghAtasambhavAditi|  rasAnAmapi bhUtasamudAyAdutpatteH|  vakSyati hi (hR.sU.a. 10/1)-"dvayolbaNaiH kramAdbhUtairmadhurAdirasodbhavaH|" iti|  sati ca kAraNe kAryeNAvaCyaM bhAvyam|

naikadoSAstato rogAstatra vyakto rasaH smRtaH||3|| avyakto~anurasaH kiJcidante vyakto~api ceSyate||4||

sa0-yataH sarvaM dravyamanekarasam| tataH-tasmAtkAraNAt, ekadoSA rogA jvarAdayo na bhavanti, api tvanekadoSAH, tridoSA ityarthaH| atrApi "vyapadeCastu bhUyasA" ityadhyAhAryam| tena tridoSAtmake~api jvare vAtAdhike vAtajvara evaM pittajvaraH CleSmajvara ityevaMrUpo vyapadeCa upapannaH| nanu, yadi sarvo jvaraH sannipAtajaH, tatkimiti vakSyati ? ayaM sannipAtajvara iti| brUmahe| samaviSamarUpaM CaktyutkarSamACritya yatra doSA vartante sa sannipAtajvara iti tantrakRtA purastAdvistareNa pratipAdayiSyate|      atha ko raso~anuraso vetyAha-tatretyAdi| tatra-tasmin dravye, yo vyaktaH-sphuTa upalabhyate, sa rasaH smRtastantrakRdbhiH| yaCcAvyakto-asphuTapratibhAso rasanendriyeNopalabhyate, so~anurasaH| hInArtho~atrAnuCabdaH, alpo rasa ityarthaH| na caitAvadevAnurasalakSaNamityAha-kiJcidityAdi| mukhakSiptasya harItakyAderdravyasya rasanendriyeNa kiJcidante vyakto~apyupalabhyate yaH so~apyanurasa iSyate, munibhiriti vAkyaCeSaH| ante ityanenaitadbodhayati,-ante-avasAne, na tvAdAvApAtamAtre na ca madhye| tayorhi rasasyaivopalambhaH| anuCabdasyAtra paCcAdarthatvAt paCcAt sphuTo~api kiJcidya upalabhyate so~apyanurasa ityarthaH|          

A0 ra0-tulyanyAyatvaprasaGgAt sarveSAM rogANAM sarvadoSajatvamAha-naikadoSA iti|  rogA naikadoSAH-sarve~api rogAH sarvadoSodbhavAH|  kutaH?  tata eva hetoH,-rogANAmapi bhUtasaGghAtasambhavAt|  bhUtasaGghAtasya tu triSu doSeSu vibhaktatvAt|  yathoktaM saGgrahe (sU.a. 20)-"vAyvAkACadhAtubhyAM vAyuH AgneyaM pittam, ambhaHpRthivIbhyAM CleSmA|" iti|  bhUtasaGghAtaM vinA na doSasaGghAtaH, taM vinA na rogotpattiriti, ataH sarve rogAstridoSajAH|  kecittu sarvadravyANAM sarvarasatvena sarvadoSasAmAnyAt sarvadoSakopanatvam, tato rogA naikadoSA iti vyAcakSate|  tadasat|  sAmAnyavadvaiparItyasyApi sattvAt|  sAmAnyaM prayojakamiti cet na, doSaghnadravyabhedAbhAvaprasaGgAt|  vaiparItyamapi kvacit prayojakamiti cet na, sarvadoSakopanatvaniyamavyAghAtAt|  sarvadoSakopanAnAM niyama iti cet na, dvyekadoSakopanadravyAbhAvaprasaGgAt|  bAhulyenaiva vyapadeCa iti cet na, dvidoSakopanaikaCamanadviCamanaikakopanadravyAbhAvaprasaGgAt|  siddhAnte~api sarveSAM sarvadharmatvasvIkArAnna doSaghnAdivibhAga iti cet na, tasya tasya dharmasya tatra tatra prayojakatvAt|  tathA ca vakSyati (Clo.22)-"kiJcidrasena kurute karma pAkena cAparam|  guNAntareNa vIryeNa prabhAveNaiva kiJcana||" ityAdi|  tasmAtpUrvameva vyAkhyAnaM yuktam|         sarveSAM sarvadharmatvAdaviCeSe prApte tannirAsArthaM dharmatAratamyamAha-tatra vyakta iti|  tatra-dravye, kaCciddharmaH sadyo vyaktaH kaCcidavyaktaH kaCcidISadvyaktaH kaCcidante vyaktaH|  teSvAdyo rasAkhyaH, itare trayo~anurasAkhyAH|

 gurvAdayo guNA dravye pRthivyAdau rasACraye||4||  raseSu vyapadiCyante sAhacaryopacArataH||5||

sa0-pRthivyAdau-pRthivyAdimahAbhUtArabdhe dravye, rasACraye gurvAdayo guNAH paramArthata ACritAH, na tu raseSu madhurAdiSu| yattu raseSu vyapadiCyante tat sAhacaryopacArataH| saha caratIti sahacaraH, tasya bhAvaH sAhacaryam| yasminneva guDAdau dravye madhuro rasa ACritastasminnapi guruguNa ACritaH, iti madhurarasaguruguNayoH sahacarabhAvaH| sAhacaryeNa-tulyACrayatvenopacAraH sAhacaryopacAraH, tasmAtsAhacaryopacArato, gurvAdayo guNA raseSu-madhurAdiSu vyapadiCyante| yathA,-gururmadhuro raso laghuramla ityAdi| na punaH paramArthato raseSu gurvAdayaH santi| asti ca sAhacaryeNa vyapadeCaH| yathA-ghRtasahacareNa ghRtasthenAgninA dagdho ghRtadagdha ityucyate|

----------------------------jagatyevamanauSadham||10||   na kiJcidvidyate dravyaM vaCAnnAnArthayogayoH||10||

sa0-evaM-anena paJcamahAbhUtArabdhena gurvAdiguNayogena dravyANAM, jagati-bhuvane~asmin, anauSadhabhUtaM na kiJcid dravyamasti,-api tu sarvameva dravyaM yatsikatApAMsvAdikaM tadauSadhaM,-cikitsitam| vaCAnnAnArthayogayoH,-arthaCca yogaCca-arthayogau, arthaH-prayojanam, yogo-yuktiH, yathA,-anayA yuktyauSadhamidaM yojitamasya rogasya vijayAya syAdanayA cAsya rogasyeti, nAnAvidhau yAvarthayogau tayorvaCAt-sAmarthyAt, sarvamapi dravyamauSadham, rogapratIkArahetutvAt|          

A0 ra0-dravyamAtrasyauSadhatvamAha-jagatIti|  evaM-uktena prakAreNa, tasya tasya dravyasya tattadguNayogatvAt jagati na kiJciddravyamanauSadhaM vidyate-sarvameva dravyamauSadham|  kutaH?  nAnArthayogayorvaCAt,-arthaH-prayojanam, yogo-yojanA, nAnAvidhAvarthayogau-nAnArthayogau, tayoH|  etaduktaM bhavati,-yadekasminnarthe nopayujyate tadevAnyasminnupayujyate| yadekena yogena nopayujyate tadevAnyenopayujyate|  yathA,-atyantAnupayukto~api kharameSAdiviDraso binduCaH CvAsakAsAdau, atyantApathyo~api mASa iNDurIkRtaH sanavanIto~arditAdau|

dravyamUrdhvagamaM tatra prAyo~agnipavanotkaTam||11||   adhogAmi ca bhUyiSThaM bhUmitoyaguNAdhikam||11||  iti dravyam rasAn bhedairuttaratropadekSyate||12||

sa0-UrdhvaM gacchatIti-Urdhvagamam| khaprakaraNe "gamerapyupasaGkhyAnam" iti khaH| prAyo-bAhulyena, UrdhvagamaM dravyamagnipavanAdhikaM bhavati| yathA,-madanaphalAdi| bAhulya (prAyo) grahaNAt agnisamIraNotkaTasyApyadhogAmitvaM dRSTam| yathA,-harItakyAdeH, acintyaprabhAvatvAt| yathA,-sarpasya viSamayatve~api tatphaNAmaNerviSaghnatvam| bhUyiSThaM-prAyeNa, bhUmitoyolbaNaM dravyamadhogAmi bhavati| yathA,-trivRtAdi| yattu vyAmiCrAtmakaM tulyakAlamUrdhvAdhodoSaharaNaM tadiha granthagauravabhayAnnoktamapi vyAmiCrabhUtotkaTaM dravyaM vyAmiCrAtmakamiti sAmarthyalabdha evAyamarthaH|   iti-parisamAptau, dravyaM prati yadvaktavyaM tanniSpannamityarthaH|          evaM dravye nirdiSTe rasA nirdeSTuM yuktA ityAha-bahuvaktavyatvAduttaratra-anantare~adhyAye, rasAn bhedaiH-triSaSTisaGkhyAvacchinnaiH, upadekSyate tantrakRt|            

A0 ra0-auSadhadvaividhyaM paJcavidhe dravye vibhajati|  dravyamUrdhvagamamiti|  dvividhamauSadham,-CodhanaM CamanaM ca|  CodhanaM dvividham,-UrdhvagamamadhogamaM ca|  tatrAgnipavanotkaTamUrdhvagamam, bhUmitoyaguNamadhogamam|  pAriCeSyAdAkACotkaTaM Camanam|  tathA ca suCrutaH (sU. a. 41/6)-"AkACaguNabhUyiSThaM saMCamanam" iti|  gamanaM-gamaH|  UrdhvaM gamo~asyAstIti Urdhvagamam|  prAya iti bhUyiSThamiti ca vyabhicArArtham|  yathA,-citrakavadagnipavanotkaTAyA api dantyA virecanatvam, mRdvIkAvadbhUmitoyaguNAdhikasyApi madhukasya vamanatvam|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a. 17)-"vyAmiCrAtmakamubhayatobhAgam|  CamanaM tu doSaviparItaguNamuktaM prAk|  tatsaGkare ca yato bAhulyena|  tatsaGkare-guNasaGkare, yato bAhulyena-yeSAM guNAnAM bAhulyaM tairnirNayaH|  tathA, anilAtmakaM grahi|  analAtmakaM dIpanapAcanam|  ubhayAtmakaM lekhanam|  bhUmyudakAtmakaM bRMhaNam|" iti|       prakaraNArthamupasaMharati-iti dravyamiti|  iti parisamAptau|kramaprAptasya rasasyAnabhidhAne hetumAha-raso bhedairiti|  uttaratra-uttarasminnadhyAye, upadekSyate-vakSyate, yato~asau bahubhirbhedairviCiSTaH, bahubhedatvena bahuvaktavyatvAt pRthagadhyAyakaraNamityarthaH|

 vIryaM punarvadantyeke guru snigdhaM himaM mRdu||12|| laghu rUkSoSNatIkSNaM ca tadevaM matamaSTadhA||13||

sa0-dravyamuktam| vIryaM punargurvAdInaSTau guNAn dravyACritAniti samAcakSate| tat-tasmAt, evaM-anena prakAreNa, vIryamaSTadhA-aSTaprakAraM, gurvAdivAdinAM matam|

 carakastvAha vIryaM tat kriyate yena yA kriyA||13|| nAvIryaM kurute kiJcitsarvA vIryakRtA hi sA||14||

sa0-yena-svabhAvena, yA kriyA kriyate-yatkarma niSpAdyate, tadvIryam| tadevaM yAvat kiJcidguNajAtaM dravye sthitaM tatsarvaM vIryameva| sarvaM vIryaM karotItyata evAha-nAvIryamityAdi| yanna vIryaM tanna kiJcitkaroti-na kAJcidapyarthakriyAM niSpAdayati, pratiniyataCaktipariSvaktatvAt sarvabhAvAnAm| ata evAha-sarvetyAdi| hiCabdo yasmAdarthe| yasmAtsarvA kriyA vIryakRtA-vIryeNa janitA| tato yanna vIryaM tanna kiJcitkurute|

A0 ra0-carakamataM darCayati-carakastvAheti|  yena kriyate tat-vIryam, dravyakartRke karmaNi karaNabhUtamityarthaH|  katividhaM tat ?  ityapekSAyAmAha-yA kriyeti|  yA kriyA yena kriyate tasyAM tadvIryam, yAvatyaH kriyAstAvantyeva vIryANItyarthaH|  kutaH?  ityAha-nAvIryamiti|  avIryaM dravyaM na kiJcitkurute-vIryaM vinA kartRtvaM nAstItyarthaH|  kutaH? ityAha-sarvA vIryakRtA hi sA|  hi-yasmAt, sA-kriyA sarvA~api vIryakRtA|

sa0-yato vIryasyaiva karaNasAmarthyaM tena kAraNena gurvAdiSvevASTAsu vIryAkhyA anvartheti-anugatArtheti, bhaNyate| evakAro~avadhAraNArthaH| gurvAdiSveva vIryasaMjJA na tu rasavipAkaprabhAveSu [mandasAndrAdiSu vA]| kimbhUteSu gurvAdiSu ? samagretyAdi| samagrACca te guNACca, teSu sArAH-cirakAlAvasthitayo gurvAdaya eva| tathA ca, jATharAgnisaMyogenApi na madhurAdirasavat svabhAvamete jahati| sarteH susthira iti ghaJi sAraCabdaH| tathA, anyebhyo mandasAndrAdibhyo guNebhyo rasAdibhyo vA gurvAdayaH CaktyutkarSavivartinaH| CakteH-sAmarthyasya, utkarSaH-Adhikyam, viCeSeNa varto-vivartaH,-viCeSeNa bhavanam, CaktyutkarSasya vivartaH, sa vidyate yeSAM ta evam| kiJca, gurvAdInAM guNAnAM vyavahArAya-vyavahArArtham, mukhyatvAt-anyebhyo guNebhyo gurvAdayaH pradhAnabhUtA ityarthaH| tathA ca, (Clo. 4)-"gurvAdayo guNA dravye pRthivyAdau rasACraye|" ityuktam, na madhurAdayo guNA iti| tasmAt gurvAdInAM guNAnAM vyavahAramukhyatvaM rasAdibhyaH| tathA, bahvagragrahaNAt-bahugrahaNAdagragrahaNAcca, bahavo dravyarasAdayo gurvAdibhirgRhItA bhavanti| tathA cAyurvedaCAstreSu rasAdibhyo gurvAdInAmagre grahaNaM dRSTam| yathA,-vAtAdidoSaguNanirUpaNAyAM gurvAdInAmeva pUrvaM grahaNam, na rasAdInAm| tathA ca, "tatra rUkSo laghuH" ityAcAryo~apaThadvAyvAdilakSaNe (hR. sU. a. 1|11)| evaM gurvAdInAmevAgragrahaNAt gurvAdiSveva vIryAkhyA~anvarthA-anugatArtheti bhaNyate|

A0 ra0-nanu, evaM rasAdInAmapi vIryatvaprasaGga ityAha-gurvAdiSviti|  tena-carakeNa, gurvAdiSveva vIryAkhyA varNyate|  kutaH?  anvartheti kRtvA|  itiCabdo hetau|  yatasteSu kriyamANA vIryasaMjJA~anvarthA syAt|         anvarthatvameva darCayati-samagretyAdi|  karaNaM hi vIryam|  karaNaM ca sAdhakatamam|  sAdhakatamatvaM ca gurvAdInAmeva|  kutaH?  samagraguNasAratvAt|  samagreSu guNeSu madhye sthira (sAra)tvAt-cirasthAyitvAt, CaktyutkarSavivartanAt-utkRSTaCaktitvAt, vyavahArAya mukhyatvAt-loke CAstre ca  mukhyatvena vyavahriyamANatvAt, bahvagragrahaNAt-bahuguNagaNanAyAM prathamagrahaNAt|  vipAke~api sthiratvasya, prabhAve~api CakyutkarSasya, mRdukaThinAdAvapi vyavahAramukhyatvasya, raseSvapi bahvagragrahaNasya darCanAt caturNAmupAdAnam|

 ataCca viparItatvAtsambhavatyapi naiva sA||16||   vivakSyate rasAdyeSu, vIryaM gurvAdayo hyataH||16||

sa0-ataH-asmAcca kAraNakadambakAt, viparItatvAt-vaiparItyena sthitatvAt, na rasAdayo vIryam| tathA hi,-rasasya sAratvaM nAsti, jATharAnalasaMyogavaCena rasAntarotpatteH| gurvAdInAM tu jATharAgnisaMyogavaCenApi nAnyathAbhAvaH| tathA ca na rasasya CaktyutkarSavivartitvam,-yato rasasya gurvAdyAhitaCaktereva svakarmaNi sAmarthyam| vyavahArAya yathA gurvAdermukhyatvaM yathA ca bahvagragrahaNaM tathA prAgdarCitam| prabhAvaH-sarvAtiCAyi dravyasvabhAvaH, tasya ca kriyAnirvartanasAmAnye satyapi vIryasaMjJA pUrvoktAddhetorna pravartate| evaM vipAkakarmaNorapi cintyam| tasmAt rasAdyeSu sambhavatyapi-vidyamAnA~api, asadrUpeva sA vIryasaMjJA na vivakSyate-norarIkriyate| Adau bhavaH-AdyaH| digAditvAdyat| rasa Adyo yeSAM-prabhAvAdInAM, ta evaM teSu| vIryamityAdi| hiCabdo yasmAdarthe| yata evaM sA-vIryasaMjJA, sambhavatyapi rasAdiSu vaiparItyAnna vivakSyate, ato gurvAdaya eva vIryam, na rasAdayaH |

A0 ra0-etacca rasAdiSu nAstIti darCayati-ataCceti|  sA-vIryAkhyA, rasAdiSu sambhavatyapi-vidyamAnApi, na vivakSyate, anudarA kanyetivat|  kriyAnirvartanasAmAnyAtsatyapi vIryatve rasAdayo vIryatvena na vyavahriyanta ityarthaH|  kutaH? ato-hetucatuSTayAt, viparItatvAt|         siddhamarthamapanudati-vIryamiti|  hi-sphuTam, ataH-kAraNAt, gurvAdaya eva vIryam|  gurvAdInAmaSTAnAM yogarUDhA vIryasaMjJeti bhAvaH|

sa0-rasAnAM bhedo rasabhedaH, tasmai hito rasabhedIyaH, tamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH-kathayiSyAmaH| "rasanArtho rasaH" iti muniH (ca. sU. a. 1|63)| tathA, abyoniH, apAmeva rasavattvAt| tathA ca muniH (ca. sU. a. 25|13)- "Apo hi rasavatyaH" iti| apAM cAvyaktarasatvAt prativyaktyanyAdRCo~anyAdRCo rasAnAM mahAbhUtavailakSaNyaja AsvAda AsvAdyate| tathA ca, madhurarasAdhiSThitAnAM kSIradrAkSekSuCarkarAdInAM prativyaktyanyAdRCo~anyAdRCo madhurarasAsvAda upalabhyate, na tvekarUpaH| evamamlAnAmAranAlakolAmlIkAdInAmapi pratidravyamanekarUpa AsvAdaviCeSa upalabhyate, na tveka eva|
