A0 ra0-vAyoH sAmyaM lakSayati-taM cala iti|  taM-deham|  calo-vAyuH|  utsAhaH-adhyavasAyaH|  ucchvAsaH-CvAsanirgamaH|  niCvAsaH-CvAsapraveCaH|  ceSTA-gamanAdikriyA|  vegapravartanaM-viNmUtrAdipravRttiH|  dhAtUnAM samyaggatiH-mArgeNAdrutavilambitasaJcAraH|  akSANAM pATavaM-indriyANAM viSayagrahaNasAmarthyam|  anugRhNAti-upakaroti|  avikRtaH-samaH|      pittasya sAmyaM lakSayati-pittamiti|  paktiH-pAkaH|  USmA-auSNyam|  darCanaM-cAkSuSajJAnam|  kSut-bubhukSA|  tRT-pipAsA|  ruciH-prItiH|  prabhA-kAntiH|  medhA-jJAnadhAraNam|  dhIH-jJAnam|  CauryaM-balam|  tanutvaM-asthUlatvam|  mArdavaM-saukumAryam|      CleSmaNaH sAmyaM lakSayati-CleSmeti|  sthiratvaM-dRDhAGgatvam|  snigdhatvaM-snehAktatvamiva|  sandhibandhaH-suCliSTasandhitvam|  kSamA-sahiSNutvam|  AdiCabdAdalaulyAdayaH|  "tamanugRhNAtyavikRtaH" iti vAkyadvaye~anuvartate|

prINanaM jIvanaM lepaH sneho dhAraNapUraNe||4||  garbhotpAdaCca dhAtUnAM CreSThaM karma kramAtsmRtam||4||

sa0-prINanAdIni karmANi rasAdInAM kramAt-krameNa CreSThAni smRtAni, munibhiriti CeSaH| saGgrahoktAni madhyamAnyaparANi karmANyeSAM santyeva| yathA,-rasasya tuSTiraktapuSTyAdikaM karma, raktasya ca varNaprasAdo mAMsapoSaNam, mAMsasya balaM medaHpuSTI ca medasaH svedadArDhyAsthipuSTayaCca, asthno majjapoSaNam, majjJo balamasthipUraNaM CukrapuSTiCca, Cukrasya harSo balaM ca, etairdhAtavo dehamanugRhNantItyarthaH| prINanaM-ApyAyanam| raso hi samyagabhyavaharataH srotAMsi praviCyendriyaprasAdamabhinirvartayan manasaH prItimAdadhAti| jIvanaM-ojovRddhikaram, raktakarma| lepaH-upadeho, mAMsasya karma| tadupaliptAnyasthIni ceSTAM kSamante| sneho-netrAdiSu snigdhatA, medasaH karma| dhAraNaM-UrdhvadhAraNam, asthikarma| pUraNaM-snehenAsthnAm, majjJaH karma| Cukrasya garbhotpattiH, CreSThaM karmeti yojyam|

A0 ra0-dhAtUnAM sAmyaM lakSayati-prINanamiti|  prINanaM-tRptiH, avikRtasya rasasya CreSThaM karma|  jIvanaM-prANadhAraNam, raktasya|  lepo-bhittermRttikayeva, mAMsasya|  snehaH -snigdhatvam, medasaH|  dhAraNaM-avalambanam, asthnaH|  pUraNaM-asthipUraNam, majjJaH|  garbhotpAdaH Cukrasya|  CreSThagrahaNAdanyAnyapyuttaradhAtupuSTyAdIni santIti jJApayati|

 avaSTambhaH purISasya, mUtrasya kledavAhanam||5|| svedasya kledavidhRtiH-------------------||5||

sa0-avaSTambho-dehadhAraNaCaktiH, CreSThaM karma purISasya smRtam| mUtrasya kledavAhanaM CreSThaM karma, mUtraM kledaM nirvAhayati| svedasya kledavidhAraNaM CreSThaM karma, kledAbhAve hi CoSaH syAt, madhyamatvaksnehakacaromadhAraNamapi|

A0 ra0-purISasya sAmyaM lakSayati-avaSTambha iti|  avaSTambho-dhAraNam|      mUtrasya sAmyaM lakSayati-mUtrasyeti|  kledavAhanaM-kledasya bahirnirgamanam|      svedasya sAmyaM lakSayati-svedasyeti|  keCavidhRtiH-romNAmavalambanam|  "CreSThaM karma" iti vAkyatraye~anuvartate|  tena anilAnaladhAraNabastipUraNakledadhAraNAdInyanyAnyapi karmANi jJeyAni|

 ------------------vRddhastu kurute~anilaH||5|| kArCyakArSNyoSNakAmatvakampAnAhaCakRdgrahAn||6|| balanidrendriyabhraMCapralApabhramadInatAH||6||

sa0-vRddhaH punarvAyuH kArCyAdIn karoti| balAdInAM bhraMCena sambandhaH| balasya prANopaghAto bhraMCaH| nidrAyAstu nACo bhraMCaH|

A0 ra0-atha vaiSamyajJAnam|  tattu paJcadhA|  vakSyati-hi (hR. ni. a. 1/2)- "nidAnaM pUrvarUpANi rUpANyupaCayastathA|  samprAptiCceti vijJAnaM rogANAM paJcadhA smRtam||" iti|  tatrAdau rUpam, tasyAntaraGgatvAt|  pUrvarUpaM tu rUpamevAvyaktam|  vakSyati hi (hR. ni. a. 1/4)- "liGgamavyaktamalpatvAdvyAdhInAM tadyathAyatham|  tadeva vyaktatAM yAtaM rUpamityabhidhIyate||" iti|  vaiSamyaM ca dvidhA,-vRddhikSayabhedAt|  tatrAdau vRddhilakSaNam|  tatra vAyorAH-vRddha iti|  kArCyaM-kRCatvam|  kArSNyaM-kRSNavarNatvam|  uSNakAmatvaM-uSNAbhilASaH|  kampo-vepathuH|  AnAhaH-baddhodaratA|  CakRdgrahaH-purISarodhaH|  balAdInAM bhraMCo-nACaH| pralApaH-asambaddhapralApaH| bhramaH-cakrarUDhasyeva| dInatA- mlAnatvam|

pItaviNmUtranetratvakkSuttRDdAhAlpanidratAH||7||  pittam------------------------------||7||

sa0-pItasya viDAdibhistvagantaiH sambandhaH, tataH kSudAdibhirdvandvaH, tatastalapratyayaH| pittaM vRddhaM pItaviNmUtrAdIn karoti|

A0 ra0-pittasyAha-pItaviNmUtreti|  viNmUtranetratvacAM pItatvam|  kSuttRSAviha tIvre jJeye, samayoH sAmyalakSaNatvAt|  dAhaH-santApaH|  alpanidratA-nidrAlpatvam|

 -------CleSmA~agnisadanaprasekAlasyagauravam||7|| CvaityaCaityaClathAGgatvaM CvAsakAsAtinidratAH||8||

A0 ra0-CleSmaNa Aha-CleSmeti|  agnisadanaM-agnimAndyam|  praseko-lAlAsrAvaH|  AlasyaM-anutsAhaH| gauravaM-durvahAGgatvam|  CvaityaM-Cuklatvam| CaityaM-CItasparCatvam|  ClathAGgatvaM-avayavaCaithilyam|  CvAsakAsau-rogau|  atinidratA-nidrAdhikyam|

raso~api CleSmavat----------------------------||8||

--------------raktaM visarpaplIhavidradhIn||8|| kuSThavAtAsrapittAsragulmopakuCakAmalAH||9|| vyaGgAgninACasammoharaktatvaGnetramUtratAH||9||

doSAdivijJAnIyaH adhyAyaH

athAto doSAdivijJAnIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-doSA Adayo yeSAM te-doSAdayaH, teSAM vijJAnaM-prAkRtena vaikRtena ca svarUpeNAvagamaH, tasmai hito yaH, tamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH| AdiCabdena dhAtavo malACca saGgRhyante| tatsvarUpAvagamena ca ta eva doSAH samyagjJAtA bhavanti| dhAtUnAM malAnAM ca doSAdhArabhUtatvAt|

A0 ra0-hetuskandhAnantaraM lakSaNaskandhamArabhate|  tatra doSAdivijJAnIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-atheti|  doSAdivijJAnAdhInatvAllakSaNasya|  doSadUSyavaiSamyaM ca rogalakSaNam|  vaiSamyajJAnaM ca sAmyajJAnAdhInam|  ata evAdau sAmyajJAnam|

doSadhAtumalA mUlaM sadA dehasya-||1||

sa0-doSAH-vAtAdayaH, dhAtavo-rasAdayaH, malAH-mUtrAdayaH, te dehasya mUlamiva mUlam| yathA,-vRkSasya skandhaCAkhAdiyuktasya mUlaM pradhAnam, tadArabdhatvAt| tathA,-dehasya doSadhAtumalAH|

doSAdInAM yathAsvaM ca vidyAdvRddhikSayau bhiSak||24|| kSayeNa viparItAnAM guNAnAM vardhanena ca||24|| vRddhiM malAnAM saGgAcca kSayaM cAti visargataH||25||

sa0-doSadhAtumalAnAM vRddhikSayau jAnIyAt| katham ? yathAsvaM doSAdInAM guNebhyo viparItA ye guNAsteSAM guNAnAM kSayeNa vardhanena ca dehagatena doSAdInAM yathAkramaM vRddhiM kSayaM ca vidyAt| yathA,-vAyorguNA rUkSalaghuCItAdayaH, teSAM viparItAH-snigdhagurUSNAdayaH, teSAM snigdhAdInAM dehe yadA kSayo dRCyate tadA vAyorvRddhiM vidyAt| yadA tu teSAM snigdhAdInAM dehe  vRddhirdRCyate tadA vAyoH kSayo jJeyaH| evaM svabuddhyA vikalpya malAnAM dhAtUnAM ca vAcyam| vRddhiM malAnAmityAdi| na kevalaM malAnAM pUrvoktena prakAreNa vRddhikSayau jJeyau, yAvadamunA~api vakSyamANena lakSaNena teSAM vRddhikSayau jJeyau, [iti caCabdena dyotayati]| evaM svabuddhyA vikalpya, malAnAM saGgAt-bahiraniHsaraNalakSaNAcca vRddhiM vidyAt| teSAmeva malAnAmativisargAt-atipravartanAt kSayaM vidyAt|

A0 ra0-kSayavRddhyoH- pIDAkaratve tAratmyamAha-malocitatvAditi|  doSAdInAM vRddhirdehapIDanI|  kSayastu tato~api dehapIDanaH|  kutaH?  malocitatvAt|  deho hi malasAtmyaH|  sAtmyaM ca bahvapi nAtibAdhate|  vakSyati(?)-"sAtmayaM hyACu balaM dhatte nAtidoSaM ca bahvapi|" iti|  malaCabdena doSadhAtumalAnAM grahaNam|  vakSyati hi (hR. sU.a. 19/86) - "viTCleSmapittAdimaloccayAnAM vikSepasaMhArakaraH sa yasmAt|" iti|

 tatrAsthani sthito vAyuH, pittaM tu svedaraktayoH||26|| CleSmA CeSeSu, tenaiSAmACrayACrayiNAM mithaH||26|| yadekasya tadanyasya vardhanakSapaNauSadham||27|| asthimArutayornaivaM, prAyo vRddhirhi tarpaNAt||27||  CleSmaNA~anugatA tasmAt saGkSayastadviparyAyAt||28|| vAyunA~anugato~asmAcca vRddhikSayasamudbhavAn||28||   vikArAn sAdhayecchIghraM kramAllaGghanabRMhaNaiH||29||

sa0-tatra-teSu vAtAdiSu madhye, asthni vAyuH sthitaH-ACritaH| pittaM tu svedaraktayoH sthitam| CleSmA CeSeSu-rasamAMsamedomajjaCukramUtrapurISAdiSu sthitaH| yataCcaivamACrayACrayibhAvo doSadhAtUnAM, tena hetunA, ACrayACrayiNAM mithaH-parasparaM, yadekasya-ACrayasya vardhanaM, tadanyasya-ACrayiNo~api vardhanam, yadACrayasya kSapaNaM tadACrayiNo~api kSapaNam| nanu, evamasthno vAtACrayasya yadvardhanaM tadasyACrayiNo vAtasyApi vardhanaM, yadasya kSapaNaM tadapi vAtasya kSapaNaM prApnotItyata Aha-asthItyAdi| asthimArutayornaivaM vardhanakSapaNauSadham, sambhavatItyadhyAhAryam| hi-yasmAt, prAyo-bAhulyena, yA vRddhiH-vardhanaM doSadhAtUnAm, sA tarpaNAt-bRMhaNAdbhavati| prAyograhaNaM vAyuparihArArtham| sA ca CleSmaNA~anugatA-anubaddhA| yata evaM yA vRddhiH sA santarpaNAt, tasmAddhetorya eSAM doSAdInAM kSayaH sa prAyo-bhUyiSTham, apatarpaNAt-laGghanarUpAdbhavati| sa ca saGkSayo vAyunA~anugataH| evaM yadasthno vardhanamauSadham, tat snigdhamadhurAdi bRMhaNarUpaM vAtasya kSapaNam| yacca vAtasya vardhanamauSadham, tat rUkSatiktAdyapatarpaNaM laGghanarUpamasthnaH kSapaNam| tadarthametaduktam-asmAccetyAdi| yata evaM vRddheH santarpaNarUpatvaM kSayasyApatarpaNarUpatvam, ato vRddhikSayasambhavAn vikArAn doSadhAtUnAM sambandhinaH kramAllaGghanabRMhaNaiH sAdhayet-upakramet| katham ? CIghraM cirotthitA hi te duCcikitsyAH syuH| vRddhyutthAn vikArAn laGghanaiH, kSayotthAn bRMhaNairiti kramArthaH|

A0 ra0-dUSyANAM vRddhikSayahetvAdivijJAnArthaM doSadUSyayorACrayACrayibhAvamAha-tatreti|  tatra-teSu doSAdiSu madhye|  CeSeSu-rasamAMsamedomajjaCukramUtrapurISAdiSu|      ACrayACrayibhAvasya phalamAha teneti|  tena-ACrayACrayibhAvena hetunA|  eSAM-doSAdInAm|  ACrayACrayiNAM AdhArAdheyabhAvena sthitAnAm|  yadekasya vardhanakSapaNauSadhaM tadevAnyasya|  katham?  mithaH,-parasparam|  yadACrayasya tadACrayiNaH, yadACrayiNastadACrayasyetyarthaH|  vardhanaM-vRddhi hetuH|  kSapaNaM-kSayahetuH|  auSadhaM-vaiSamyanivartakam, sAmyaheturityarthaH|      apavAdamAha-asthimArutayoriti|  asthimArutayorACrayACrayibhAve~apyevaM na jJeyam|  yaddhi vAyorvardhanaM rUkSAdi, tadasthnaH kSapaNam|  yadasthno vardhanaM snigdhAdi, tadvAyoH kSapaNam|  asthno vRddhau laGghanamauSadham|  vAyorvRddhau bRMhaNam|  asthikSaye bRMhaNamauSadham, vAtakSaye laGghanamiti|      athopaCayaM vivakSuCcikitsAmAha|  cikitsaiva hi prayujyamAnA upaCaya ucyate|  vakSyati hi (hR. ni. a. 1/6) -"hetuvyAdhiviparyastaviparyastArthakAriNAm|  auSadhAnnavihArANAmupayogaM sukhAvaham||  vidyAdupaCayaM vyAdheH sa hi sAtmyamiti smRtaH|" iti|  cikitsA ca dvividhA,-bRMhaNalaGghanabhedAt|  tatra bRMhaNalaGghane vibhajati-prAyo vRddhiriti|  vRddhijAn vikArAn laGghanena sAdhayet, kSayajAn bRMhaNena|  kuto~ayaM vibhAgaH?  hi-yasmAt, vRddhistarpaNAt -bRMhaNAdbhavati|  sA ca CleSmaNA~anugatA,-yatra yatra vRddhistatra tatra CleSmA, pittAdivRddhAvapi CleSmAnugamo~astItyarthaH|  tasmAtsarveSu vRddhivikAreSu laGghanamauSadham, hetuviparItatvAt CleSmAnugamena vyAdhiviparItatvAcca|  tathA, saGkSayastadviparyayAt-tarpaNaviparyayAllaGghanAdbhavati|  sa ca vAyunA~anugataH,-yatra yatra kSayastatra tatra vAyuH, kaphAdikSaye~api vAyoranugamo~astItyarthaH|  tasmAtsarveSu kSayavikAreSu bRMhaNamauSadham, hetuviparItatvAdvAtAnugamena vyAdhiviparItatvAcca|

vAyoranyatra, tajjAMstu tairevotkramayojitaiH||29||

sa0-vAyuM hitvA vRddhyutthAn vikArAn laGghanaiH, kSayotthAn bRMhaNaiH sAdhayet| tajjAn-vAyusambhavAn vikArAn, punastaireva-laGghanabRMhaNairutkramayojitairupakramet| yathAnirdiSTakramAdviparItaH kramaH-utkramaH| yathA,-vAtavRddhyutthAn vikArAn bRMhaNaiH tatkSayotthAMCca laGghanairiti|

A0 ra0-etacca sarvaM vAyoranyatra|  vAyuvRddhau tarpaNaM na hetuH, na vA laGghanamauSadhamityarthaH|  tarhi tatra kim?  ityata Aha-tajjAniti|  tajjAn-vAyuvRddhikSayajAn|  vRddhijAn bRMhaNena sAdhayet, kSayajAn laGghanena, ityutkramayojanA|  vAyuvRddhirlaGghanAt, kSayo bRMhaNAdityata eva jJeyam|  prAyograhaNAdvyabhicAro~api|  yathA (saGgrahe sU. a. 7) -"kaphe laGghanasAdhye~api kartari jvaragulmayoH|  tulye~api deCakAlAdau laGghanaM na samaM matam||" iti|

viCeSAdraktavRddhyutthAn raktasrutivirecanaiH||30||  mAMsavRddhibhavAn rogAn CastrakSArAgnikarmabhiH||30|| sthaulyakArCyopacAreNa medojAnasthisaGkSayAt||31|| jAtAn kSIraghRtaistiktasaMyutairbastibhistathA||31|| viDvRddhijAnatIsArakriyayA, viTkSayodbhavAn||32|| meSAjamadhyakulmASayavamASadvayAdibhiH||32|| mUtravRddhikSayotthAMCca mehakRcchracikitsayA||33|| vyAyAmAbhyaJjanasvedamadyaiH svedakSayodbhavAn||33||

sa0-vRddhikSayopakrame evaM sthite~api viCeSeNa raktavRddhyutthAn raktasrutivirecanairupakrameta| mAMsavRddhijAn CastrakSArAgnikarmabhiH| medovRddhikSayAbhyAM jAtAn-medojAniti madhyamapadalopo~atra draSTavyaH| medovRddhijAn vikArAn sthaulyopacAreNa dvividhopakramaNIyoktyA sthaulyacikitsayA, medaHkSayajAn kArCyopacAreNopAcaret| asthikSayajAn kSIraghRtaistiktasaMyutaiH, bastibhistathA-tathArUpaistiktasaMyutairityarthaH| nanu, yAni vAtakRnti dravyANi tAnyasthikSayodbhavavikArANAM vRddhikaraNAnIti taddravyopayogo~atra na yuktaH, tiktasya vAtakRtatvAt| atrocyate| yaddravyaM snigdhaM CoSaNaM kharatvamutpAdayati tadasthno vardhanaM yuktam, kharasvabhAvatvAdasthnAm| na caivaMvidhamekaM dravyamasti, yat snigdhaM CoSaNaM ca| tasmAt kSIraghRtaistiktasaMyutairbastibhiCca tiktasaMyutaiCcetyupadiSTam| kSIraghRtasya tiktayuktasya kharasvabhAvatvAt| viDvRddhijAn-purISavRddhijAn,  atIsAracikitsayA sAdhayet| viTkSayodbhavAn meSAjamadhyAdibhiH sAdhayet| meSa-urabhraH, ajaH-cchAgaH, tayormadhyaM-antarAdhiH| kulmASaH-ardhasvinno mASAdirhiGgughRtAdisaMskRtaH| mASadvayaM-mASo rAjamASaCca| AdiCabdena kAkANDolAtmaguptAdInAM grahaNam| mUtravRddhyutthAn mehacikitsayA, mUtrakSayotthAn mUtrakRcchracikitsayA, svedakSayajAn vyAdhIn vyAyAmAdibhiH sAdhayet|

A0 ra0-atha keSAMcidviCeSaH|  tatra raktavRddhijAnAha -viCeSAditi|  raktasrutiH-CirAvyadhAdiH|      mAMsavRddhijAnAha-mAMsavRddhibhavAniti|      medojAnAha-sthaulyeti|  medovRddhijAn sthaulyopacAreNa-dvividhopakramaNIyAdhyAyoktena|  medaHkSayajAn kArCyopacAreNa|      asthikSayajAnAha-asthisaGkSayAditi|  tatheti tiktasaMyutaiH|  tathA ca khAraNAdiH-"paJcakarmANi sarpIMSi satiktA bastayastathA|  payaH" iti|  na caivaM tiktasaMyutairiti bastInAmeva viCeSaNaM vaktuM yuktam, "bastayaH kSIrasarpIMSi tiktakopahitACca ye|" iti carakavacanAt (sU. a. 28/24)|      viDvRddhijAnAha-viDvRddhijAniti|  atIsArakriyayA atIsAracikitsitena|      viTkSayajAnAha-viTkSayodbhavAniti|  meSAjayormadhyaM-antarAdhiH|  mASadvayaM-mASo rAjamASaCca|  AdiCabdAnmatsyamAMsAdayaH|      mUtravRddhikSayajAnAha-mUtreti|  mUtravRddhijAn pramehacikitsayA|  mUtrakSayajAn kRcchracikitsayA|      svedakSayajAnAha-vyAyAmeti|

svasthAnasthasya kAyagneraMCA dhAtuSu saMCritAH||34||   teSAM sAdAtidIptibhyAM dhAtuvRddhikSayodbhavaH||34||  pUrvo dhAtuH paraM kuryAdvRddhaH kSINaCca tadvidham||35||

sa0-svasthAnaM kAyAgneH-pakvAmACayayormadhyam| yathA ca vakSyati (hR. sU. a. 12|10) - "pittaM paJcAtmakaM tatra pakvAmACayamadhyagam|" ityAdi yAvat "pAcakaM nAma tat smRtam|" iti| tatra pakvAmACayamadhye tiSThatIti svasthAnasthaH, tasyaivaMvidhasya kAyAgneH-jATharAnalasya, aMCAH-bhAgAH, dhAtuSu-rasAdiSu saMCritAH| teSAM-agnyaMCAnAm, sAdena-mAndyena, dhAtUnAM vRddhyudbhavaH| tathA teSAmaMCAnAmatidIptyA-atitaikSNyAt, dhAtukSayodbhavaH| pUrvo-rasAkhyo, dhAturvRddho bhUtvA paraM-raktAkhyaM, dhAtuM vRddhaM kuryAt| pUrvaCca kSINo dhAtuH paraM dhAtuM tadvidhaM-kSINameva kuryAt|

A0 ra0-dhAtujAnAmupakramAntaramAha-svasthAnasthasyeti|  svasthAnasthatya-grahaNIsthasya|  kAyAgneH-annapaktuH|  aMCAH-kSudrANi rUpAntarANi|  dhAtuSu-dhAtvACayeSu, sarvadhAtvagnaya ityarthaH|  teSAM sAdena-mAndyena dhAtuvRddhyudbhavaH, atidIptyA dhAtukSayaCca|  dhAtuvRddhau mAndyopakramaH, dhAtukSaye taikSNyopakramaH kArya ityarthaH|  tathA, pUrvo dhAturvRddhaH paraM vRddhaM kuryAt, kSINaH kSINam|  paradhAtorvRddhau pUrvasya kSayaH kAryaH, kSaye vRddhirityarthaH|  ityupaCayaprakaraNam|

doSA duSTA rasairdhAtUn dUSayantyubhaye malAn||35||  adho dve, sapta Cirasi, khAni svedavahAni ca||36||  malA malAyanAni syuryathAsvaM teSvato gadAH||36||

sa0-doSA duSTA rasaiH-madhurAdibhirmithyAyogAtiyogasevitaiH kupitAH, dhAtUn dUSayanti| ubhaye-doSA dhAtavaCca, malAn dUSayanti| malA malAyanAni dUSayantIti sambandhaH| tathA ca muniH (ca. sU. a. 7|42) - "malAyanAni bAdhyante duSTairmAtrAdhikairmalaiH|" iti| kAni malAyanAni ? ityAha-adho dve ityAdi| adho dve-gudameDhrAkhye, sapta Cirasi khAni-dve akSiNI dvau karNau dvau nAsApuTAvAsyaM ceti, tathA svedavahAni-romakUpAkhyAni chidrANi sarvaCarIragatAni, malAyanAni syuH| ato-dUSaNAtkAraNAt, teSu-malAyaneSu duSTeSu, yathAsvaM gadAH-rogAH syuH| yo yasya svo- yathAsvam|

A0 ra0-vRddhikSayavikArasamprAptimAha-doSA duSTA iti|  rasaiH-madhurAdibhiH, duSTA doSAH-vAtAdayo,dhAtUn-rasAdIn, dUSayanti|  rasagrahaNaM vIryAdInAmupalakSaNam|  ubhaye-doSA dhAtavaCca, malAn-purISAdIn, dUSayanti|  te malA malAyanAni-srotAMsi, dUSayanti|  kAni punastAni?  adho dve-guhyaM gudaCca|  sapta Cirasi-karNau netre nAsike mukhaM ca|  svedavahAni khAni-romakUpAH, teSAmasaGkhyatvAtsaGkhyAnuktiH|  ato-duSTeranantaram, teSu-duSTeSu doSadhAtumalamalAyaneSu, gadAH syuH|  katham?  yathAsvam,- svasthAnAnatikrameNa|  sthAnavibhAga uktaH saGgrahe (sU.a. 19)-"vakSyante vAtajAstatra nidAne vAtarogike|  pittaM tvaci sthitaM kuryAdvisphoTakamasUrikAH|| rakte visarpaM dAhaM ca mAMse mAMsapAkakothanam|  sadAhAn medasi granthIn svedAtyudvamanaM tRSam||  asthni dAhaM bhRCaM maJjJi hAridranakhanetratAm|  pUti pItAvabhAsaM ca CukraM CukrasamACritam||  CirAgataM krodhanatAM pralApaM snAyugaM tRSam|  koSThagaM madatRTdAhAn vyApino~anyAMCca yakSmaNaH|  CleSmA tvaci sthitaH kuryAtstambhaM CvetAvabhAsatAm|  pANDvAmayaM CoNitago mAMsasaMstho~arbudApacI||  ArdracarmAvanaddhAbhagAtratAM cAtigauravam|  medogaH sthUlatAM mehamasthnAM stabdhatvamasthigaH||  majjagaH CuklanetratvaM CukrasthaH CukrasaJcayam|  vibandhaM gauravaM cAti CirAsthaH stabdhagAtratAm||  snAyugaH sandhiCUnyatvaM koSThago jaTharonnatim|  arocakAvipAkau ca tAMstAMCca kaphajAn gadAn||  viNmUtrayoH sACrayayostatra tatropadekSyate|  upatApopaghAtau ca svACrayendriyagairmalaiH||" iti|

 athAto doSabhedIyAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-doSANAM bhedo-doSabhedaH, sthAnanAmavibhAgAdibhiH| tasmai hito doSabhedIyaH| CeSaM pUrvavat|

A0 ra0- doSabhedIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte -atheti| yataH pUrvAdhyAye doSavaiSamyamuktam| tacca doSabhedAdbahudhA bhidyate| doSabhedajJAnArthamayamadhyAyaH| ata evAyaM doSabhedIyaH | tadbhedaCca sthAnakarmAvasthAhetvAkRtisAdhanasaMyogabhedAdbhavati| tatra sthAnato yathA-pakvACayastho~ayaM vAyuH kaTistho~ayam| karmato yathA,-CvAsocchvAsa pravartako~ayaM viNmUtrapravartako~ayam|avasthAto yathA,-cito~ayaM prakupito~ayam| hetuto yathA,-mithyAyogaprakupito~ayam, atiyogaprakupito~ayam| AkRtito yathA,-sraMsalakSaNo~ayaM vyAsalakSaNo~ayam| sAdhanato yathA,-snigdhopaCayo~ayam,uSNopaCayo~ayam| saMyogato yathA,-pittayukto~ayaM CleSmayukto~ayamiti| evaM pittAdiSvapi|

pakvACayakaTIsakthiCrotrAsthisparCanendriyam||1|| sthAnaM vAtasya, tatrApi pakvAdhAnaM viCeSataH||1||

sa0-pakvACayAdi vAtasya sthAnam| tatrApi SaDvidhe sthAne viCeSeNa pakvAdhAnaM syAt| annaM pakvamAdhIyate-sthApyate~asminniti pakvAdhAnaM,-pakvACayaH| ata eva vAte bastirupakramaH pradhAna uktaH, mUlApakarSaNAt| sakalaCarIravyApitve~apyeSAmidaM viCeSeNoktam| tathA ca prAgadhyagISTa (hR. sU. a. 1|7) - "te vyApino~api hRnnAbhyoH" iti| vicitragatitvAccaiSAM vakSyamANaprANAdibhedena pRthak sthAnakarmanirdeCaH|

A0 ra0- tatrAdau sthAnato bhedaH| sthAnaM dvidhA,-sAmAnyaM viCiSTaM ca| tatrAdau sAmAnyam| tatra vAyoH sthAnamAha-pakvACayeti| pakvACayo-nAbheradhaH pakvAnnasthAnam| kaTI-CroNiH| sakthi-vaGkSaNAdyaGguSThAntam| CrotraM -karNaH| sparCanendriyaM-tvak| tatra-teSu sthAneSu madhye, pakvAdhAnaM-pakvACayo, viCeSataH sthAnam|

nAbhirAmACayaH svedo lasIkA rudhiraM rasaH||2||   dRk sparCanaM ca pittasya, nAbhiratra viCeSataH||2||

sa0-pittasya nAbhyAdIni sthAnAni| lasIkA-jalasadRCI| dRk-cakSuH| sparCanaM-tvak| nanu, sparCanendriyaM vAyoH sthAnamuddiSTam| tadeva kathaM pittasyApi syAt| brUmaH| vAtasakhitvAdagneH| vAtasakho hyagniH, pittaM ca vahniriti vacanAt| tasmAdubhayorapyetadyuktaM sthAnam| viCeSata iti| atra-eSu sthAneSu madhye, pittasya viCeSeNa nAbhiH sthAnam|

A0 ra0- pittasyAha-nAbhiriti| AmACayo-nAbherUrdhvamapakvAnnasthAnam| "lasIkA-syAdrasamalo jalaprAyastvagACrayaH"| dRk-cakSuH| sparCanaM-tvak| atra-eSu sthAneSu madhye, nAbhirviCeSataH sthAnam|

 uraH kaNThaCiraHklomaparvANyAmACayo rasaH||3||  medo ghrANaM ca jihvA ca kaphasya, sutarAmuraH||3||

sa0-vAyureka eva calanasvabhAvaH san prANAdibhiH-prANodAnavyAnasamAnApAnaiH, bhedAt-viCeSAt, paJcAtmA-paJcasvabhAvaH| yathaiko~api devadatto yAM yAM kriyAM karoti tadanurUpAmeva saMjJAM lAvakapAcakAdikAM labhate, tadvadvAtAdayaH|

---------------------------prANo~atra mUrdhagaH||4||   uraH kaNThacaro buddhihRdayendriyacittadhRk||4|| SThIvanakSavathUdgAraniHCvAsAnnapraveCakRt||5||

sa0-atra-eSu madhye, prANo vAyurmUrdhagaH-Cirasi sthitaH, uraH kaNThaM ca carati| tathA, buddhyAdInAM dhArakaH| tathA, SThIvanAdikriyaH| SThIvanaM-  mukhasrAvodgAraH| SThIvanamiti "SThIverlyuTi SThivisivyordIrghaCca" iti pRSodarAdipAThAddIrghaH|

uraH sthAnamudAnasya nAsAnAbhigalAMCcaret||5|| vAkpravRttiprayatnorjAbalavarNasmRtikriyaH||6||

vyAno hRdi sthitaH kRtsnadehacArI mahAjavaH||6|| gatyapakSepaNotkSepanimeSonmeSaNAdikAH||7|| prAyaH sarvAH kriyAstasmin pratibaddhAH CarIriNAm||7||

sa0-vyAno hRdaye sthitaH prAdhAnyena kRtsne-sarvasmin, CarIre carati| tathA, mahAjavaH-CIghragatiH, prANAdyapekSayA| tathA, gatyAdikAH kriyAH prAyaH sarvadehinAM tasmin-vyAne, pratibaddhAH-tadAyattAH| gatiH-caGkramaNam| apakSepaNaM-aGgasyAdhonayanam| utkSepaH- aGgasyordhvanayanam|  nimeSaH-akSNornimIlanam| unmeSaH-tayorvikAsaH| AdigrahaNena jRmbhaNAnnAsvAdanaviCodhanAdiparigrahaH|

A0 ra0- vyAnasyAha-vyAna iti| vyAnasya hRdayamavasthitisthAnam| sarvaCarIraM vicaraNasthAnam| gatyAdayaH sakalAH kriyAH karma| apakSepaNaM-aGgasyAdhonayanam| utkSepaNaM-Urdhvanayanam| tasminpratibaddhAH-tadekaniSpAdyAH| mahAjavaH-prANAdibhyo vegavAn|

A0 ra0- samAnasyAha-samAna iti| samAnasyAgnisamIpamavasthitisthAnam| sarvakoSTho vicaraNasthAnam| annasya grahaNaM, gRhItvA pAcanaM, paktvA sArakiTTavivecanaM, vivicya kiTTAvamocanaM ca karma| agnisamIpaM agnisthAnasya grahaNyAkhyasya agnyanavaruddho~avakACaH|

apAno~apAnagaH CroNibastimeDhrorugocaraH||9|| CukrArtavaCakRnmUtragarbhaniSkramaNakriyaH||9||

 cayo vRddhiH svadhAmnyeva pradveSo vRddhihetuSu||22|| viparItaguNecchA ca------------------------------||23||

----------------------------------kopastUnmArgagAmitA||23|| liGgAnAM darCanaM sveSAmasvAsthyaM rogasambhavaH||23|| svasthAnasthasya samatA vikArAsambhavaH CamaH||24||

A0 ra0- kopaM lakSayati- kopastviti| unmArgagAmitA-svamArgAdanyena mArgeNa gamanam,-kopaH| tatra yadA prathamaM sthAninamabhibhUya anyasthAnavyAptistadA sveSAM liGgAnAM-raukSyAdInAM darCanam, sa samantAdanyasthAnACrayaNAt sthAnasaMCrayAkhyaH| tato vikurvANo jvarAdirUpeNAbhivyajyate tadA asvAsthyaM-prakRtyanyathAtvam, sa rogarUpeNAbhivyaktatvAt vyaktyAkhyaH| tatastameva rogamavasthAntarANyanubhavannanubadhnAti tadA rogasambhavaH| sambhavaM-dIrghakAlAnuvartanamiti yAvat| so~avasthAbhedarUpatvAt bhedAkhyaH| etACca SaDavasthAH suCrutena spaSTamuktAH (sU. a. 21/36) - "saJcayaM ca prakopaM ca prasaraM sthAnasaMCrayam| vyaktiM bhedaM ca yo vetti doSANAM sa bhavedbhiSak||" tatprayojanaM ca " saJcaye~apahRtA doSA labhante nottarA gatIH| te tUttarAsu gatiSu bhavanti balavattarAH|" iti|   praCamaM lakSayati-svasthAnasthasyeti| svasthAnasthatvaM samatvamavikRtatvaM ceti militaM praCamalakSaNam| rasavarNasparCAdyanyatvaM-vikAraH|

 cayaprakopapraCamA vAyorgrISmAdiSu triSu||24|| varSAdiSu tu pittasya, CleSmaNaH CiCirAdiSu||25||

A0 ra0- tAMCca pratirogaM lakSayet| ko~atra svatantraH kaH paratantra iti|

teSAM pradhAnapraCame praCamo~aCAmyatastathA||62|| paCcAccikitsettUrNaM vA balavantamupadravam||63||

sa0-teSAM-paratantrANAM rogANAmapradhAnAnAm, pradhAnapraCame-svatantravyAdhipraCame, praCamo bhavati,-na tu teSAM pRthagupakramo vidheya ityarthaH| aCAmyataH-tathA CamamagacchataH paratantrAn vyAdhIn doSAn vA, tathA-tena prakAreNa pradhAna cikitsAlakSaNena, paCcAt-pradhAnacikitsAta uttarakAlaM, cikitset| acikitsyamAno hyasAdhyatAM yAyAt| tUrNaM veti| upadravaCcedbalavAn syAttadA tamevopadravaM tUrNameva cikitset-, na paCcAt|

A0 ra0- teSAM-paratantrANAM, svatantrapraCame praCamaH| tathA - svatantrauSadhena, ye na CAmyanti tAn paCcAtsvauSadhena cikitset| yastu balavAnupadravastaM tUrNaM-prAgeva, cikitset|

vyAdhikliSTaCarIrasya pIDAkarataro hi saH||63||

sa0-hi-yasmAt, vyAdhikliSTaCarIrasya puMsaH so~atiCayena pIDAkaraH| prAgutpanno~api rogaH pIDAkaraH| upadravastu paCcAjjAyamAno vyAdhikliSTaCarIrotpannatvAtpIDAkarataraH| tadayamatrArthaH,-paratantro vyAdhirhInabalaH pradhAnopakrameNaivopaCAmyati| yastu paratantraH paCcAdutpadyamAno~api svatantravyAdhyupakrameNa CamaM na yAti taM paCcAdupakramet| yastu balavAn paratantrastamAdAveva cikitset, atipIDAkaratvAt|

A0 ra0- sa hi svatantreNa pIDitasya narasya svatantrAdatipIDakaH| saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 22) - "saptavidhAH khalu rogA bhavanti| sahagarbhajAtapIDAkAlaprabhAvasvabhAvajAH|  te tu pRthagdvividhAH| tatra sahajAH CukrArtavadoSAnvayAH kuSThArComehAdayaH, pitRjA mAtRjACca| garbhajA jananyapacArAtkaubjyapAGgulyapaiGgalyakilAsAdayo, annarasajA mAtRdauhRdavimAnajACca| jAtajAH svApacArAt santarpaNajA rogotpattiM pratyutpannaM karma yadanenaiva CarIreNa dRSTamadRSTaM voddiCyAptopadiSTapratiSiddhAnAmananuSThAnamanuSThAnaM vA| janmAntarAtItena tu pUrvam| tatpunardaivAkhyam, uktaM ca niyatAniyatabhedena prAk| tasmAt dRSTahetavaH pratyutpannakarmajAH| viparItA daivajanmAnaH| alpa nidAnA mahArujaCcobhayAtmakAH| tatra yathAsvaM pratipakSaCIlanAt pUrveSAM rogANAmupaCamaH| satyeva vipakSaCIlane nirdiSTakarmakSayAddaivikAnAm| doSakarmakSayAdanyeSAm| anye punaH pratyutpannaM karma parakRtamapi varNayanti| tacca parAbhisaMskAramAcakSate| evaM cAhuH,-yadi svayaM kRtAdeva karmaNaH kAryanirvRttiH syAt, na dRSTapuruSAntarakRtAt|  kimiti vidvAnapi parAcaritayorupakArApakArayoH sukhaduHkhAnurodhAttoSaroSau pratikartavyacintAM vA pratipadyate| evamete vyAdhayo dvividhAH santastrividhA jAyante| tataCca doSavanto bhUyaH saptavidhAH| sakalo~api cAyaM rogasamUhaH pratIkAravAn AyurvedavihitamupadeCamapekSate|  yasmAnniyatahetuko~apyAmayaH samyagbhiSagAdeCAnuSThAnAdupAttAyuH saMskArAparikSaye sahyavedanatAM pratipadyate| anupakramyamANastu sarva eva prAyaCo bhinattyakANDe| svayamapi ca daivAnnidAnAlpatayA vA nivartamAnaH SoDaCaguNasamuditakriyopAlambhAdACutaramaparikliSTasya vA~apagacchati| aniyataphaladAyini tu daive hitAbhyAsaratasyAvakACameva na labhate vyAdhiH| tasmAnna kasyAJcidavasthAyAmAtmavAn hitAhitayostulyadarCI syAt| trividhACca punarvyAdhayo mRdumadhyAtimAtrabhedena| tatrAlpalakSaNA mRdavo, madhyalakSaNA madhyAH, sampUrNalakSaNAstvatimAtrAH| te punaH sukhasAdhyAdiviCeSeNa caturdhA prAgupadiSTAH| subahuCo~api ca bhidyamAnA vyAdhyayo nijAgantutAM na vyabhicaranti| tatra nijAstridoSotthAH| teSu pUrvaM vAtAdayo vaiSamyamApadyante tato vyathA~abhinivartate| bAhyahetujAstvAgantavaH| tasmAdekAkArA eva rogAH, tathA ruksAmAnyAt| asaGkhyabhedA vA pratyekaM samutthAnasthAnasaMsthAnavarNanAmavedanAprabhAvopakramaviCeSAt| te yathAsthUlaM yathAsvamevopadekSyante| asaGkhayeyatvAcca doSaliGgaireva rogAnupakramaM ca vibhajet||" iti|

vikAranAmAkuCalo na jihrIyAt kadAcana||64||   na hi sarvavikArANAM nAmato~asti dhruvA sthitiH||64||

sa0-vikArAH-rogAH, teSAM nAmAni, teSvakuCalo vaidyo na jAtucijjihrIyAt-rogasaMjJAnabhijJo~ahamiti lajjAM na kuryAt, cikitsAmeva vidadhyAdityarthaH| kuto hetoH ? ityAha-na hItyAdi| yasmAtsarvavikArANAM nAmataH-saMjJAto, dhruvA-niCcitA, sthitiH-avasthAnaM, nAsti|

A0 ra0- CAstre~anuktaM svayamUhanIyamityAha-vikAranAmeti| yo vikArasya vAtajAditvaM jAnAti, nAma na jAnAti, CAstre~anuktatvAtsaGkIrNatvAdvA, sa na jihnIyAt-lajjAM na kuryAt| na hi nAmAdhInA sarvatra cikitsA| vAtajAdijJAnaM hi cikitsAyAM pradhAnaM kAraNam|

 sa eva kupito doSaH samutthAnaviCeSataH||65||  sthAnAntarANi ca prApya vikArAn kurute bahUn||65|| tasmAdvikAraprakRtIradhiSThAnAntarANi ca||66||  buddhvA hetuviCeSAMCca CIghraM kuryAdupakramam||66||

sa0-yasmAtsaH-eka eva, doSo-vAtAdyanyatamaH, samutthAnaviCeSato-hetubhedAt, tathA sthAnAntarANi-svasthAnaM hitvA parANi sthAnAni, prApya-gatvA, bahUn-anantAn, vikArAn kurute| tathA coktaM tantrAntare-"yo doSaH CarIrasandhInAviCati, tena jRmbhA jvaraCcopajAyate| yastvAmACayamabhyupaiti, tena rogA bhavantyurasi, arocakaCca| yaH kaNThamabhiprapadyate kaNThastato dhvaMsate svaraCcAvasIdati| yaH prANavahAni srotAMsyAsyAdIni upaiti, CvAsaH pratiCyAyaCca tenopajAyate|" iti| vikArasya-jvarAdeH, prakRtayaH-upAdAnakAraNAni vAtAdidoSAH, tA vikAraprakRtI:-rogahetuviCeSAn, buddhvA,- jJAtvA, tathA~adhiSThAnAntarANi sthAnaviCeSAMCca, buddhvA,tathA hetuviCeSAn-nidAnabhedAMCca, buddhvA-yathA kimayaM kupitaH pavano rUkSeNa hetunA laghunA CItena vetyAdi jJAtvA, CIghramevopakramet-cikitset| na tu vikArAnabhijJa iti na cikitset|

A0 ra0- atha sAdhanam| sAdhanajJAnaM ca lakSaNajJAnAdhInam| tatra lakSaNasya durbodhatvamAha-sa eveti| sa eva yo~anyatra lakSito, bahUn vikArAn kurute,-ye~anyatra na dRSTAH| tatra dvau hetU-samutthAnaviCeSAtkupitatvaM sthAnAntaraprAptiCca samutthAnaviCeSaH-anyatrAdRSTaM samutthAnam|tasmAdvikArAditritayajJAnapUrvaka upakramaH kAryaH| sa ca CIghram, avasthAntarotpattibhayAt| prakRtiH-svabhAvo~asAdhAraNaM cihnam|

sUtrasthAnam

doSopakramaNIyaH adhyAyaH

athAto doSopakramaNIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-doSANAmupakramaNaM-cikitsA, doSopakramaNam| tasmai hito doSopakramaNIyaH| CeSaM pUrvavadyojyam

A0 ra0- lakSaNaskandhAnantaramauSadhaskandhamArabhate|  tatra doSopakramaNIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-atheti|  doSopakramaNasyaiva sarvarogauSadhatvAt|  upakramaNaM-auSadham|

 vAtasyopakramaH snehaH svedaH saMCodhanaM mRdu||1||   svAdvamlalavaNoSNAni bhojyAnyabhyaGgamardanam||1||   veSTanaM trAsanaM seko madyaM paiSTikagauDikam||2||   snigdhoSNA bastayo bastiniyamaH sukhaCIlatA||2||   dIpanaiH pAcanaiH siddhAH snehACcAnekayonayaH||3||   viCeSAnmedyapiCitarasatailAnuvAsanam||3||

sa0-vAtasyopakramaH snehaH, CreSThatvAcca prAgupAdAnaM snehasya| tataH svedaH| kRtasnehasvedasya ca saMCodhanam| tacca mRdu-na tIkSNam, tIkSNasya vAtakopahetutvAt| tathA, svAdvAdIni bhojyAni-bhakSyANi| abhyaGgaCca mardanaM cAbhyaGgamardanam| mardanaM-pANyAdinA| veSTanaM-CATakAdinA| trAsanaM-khaDgavyagrAgrahastarAjapuruSadarCanAdinA| nanu, bhICokAdibhirmArutasya kopa uktaH| vakSyati hi (hR. ni. a. 1|15) - "kriyAtiyogabhICoka" ityAdi| tat kathaM trAsanaM vAyorupakramaH ? ucyate| bhayaM vAtaprakopahetuH, na tu trAsanam| trAsanaM hi sarvavatavijayi| tasmAdvAtopaCAntyarthaM trAsanaM yuktam| yathA,-unmAdAdiSu| tathA ca vakSyati vAtonmAde (hR. u. a. 6|29) - "harSaNACvAsanottrAsabhayatADanatarjanam|" ityAdi| tathA, sekAdirupakramaH| seko-daCamUlakvAthAdinA| tathA, madyaM paiSTikaM gauDikaM ca vAtasyopakramaH| tathA, snigdhoSNA bastayo vAtasyopakramaH| snigdhoSNA ityuktyA rUkSaCItaM bastimatra nirAkaroti| tathA, bastiniyamo-yathAvidhi bastidAnam, vAtasyopakramaH| athavA bastiniyamaH-karmakAlayogAkhyastripaJcACadbastisaGkhyaH "prAk sneha ekaH paJcAnte" (hR. sU. a. 19|63) ityevamAdinA granthena yo darCitaH, sa vAtasyopakramaH| tathA sukhaM CIlayatIti sukhaCIlaH| CIlikAmibhikSyAcaribhyo NaH| tasya bhAvaH sukhaCIlatA,-saukhyavRttitvam| tilapriyAlAkSoDAdayo~anekA yonayo yeSAM te~anekayonayaH snehAH, te ca vAtasyopakrama iti yojyam| kimbhUtAH ? dIpanapAcanairdravyaiH siddhAH| viCeSeNa puSTamAMsarasastailamanuvAsanaM ca vAtasyopakramaH|

A0 ra0-pittasyauSadhamAha-pittasya sarpiSaH pAnamiti|  sugandhiCItahRdyAnAM dravyANAM-candanAdInAM ye gandhAsteSAmupasevanam|  kaNTheguNAnAM-kaNThAvalmbinAM, hArANaM-muktAvalInAM, ye maNayasteSAmurasA dhRtiH|  uCIraM-vIraNam|  pradoSaH-candraM vinA~api|  ayantraNamukhaM-yat mukhena niyantraNaM na karoti buddhyA tu karoti|  mugdhA-mRdulA|  udyAnadIrghikAH-krIDAvanavApyaH|  sutIrthaH-CobhanAvataraNamArgaH, vipulaH svacchaCca yaH salilACayaH, tasya saikate-sikatAmayapradeCe|  sAmbhojajalatIrayorantaH-sandhiH, yasminsaikate tattathA|  kAyamAnaM-tRNAdiracitAgAram|  saumyA bhAvAH-manaHprasAdanAH padArthAH, payaH sarpirvirekaCceti catuSTayaM viCeSAdauSadham|

pittasya sarpiSaH pAnaM svAduCItairvirecanam||4||   svAdutiktakaSAyANi bhojanAnyauSadhAni ca||4||   sugandhiCItahRdyAnAM gandhAnAmupasevanam||5||   kaNTheguNAnAM hArANAM maNInAmurasA dhRtiH||5||   karpUracandanoCIrairanulepaH kSaNe kSaNe||6||   pradoSaCcandramAH saudhaM hAri gItaM himo~anilaH||6||   ayantraNasukhaM mitraM putraH sandigdhamugdhavAk||7||   chandAnuvartino dArAH priyAH CIlavibhUSitAH||7||   CItAmbudhArAgarbhANi gRhANyudyAnadIrghikAH||8||   sutIrthavipulasvacchasalilACayasaikate||8||   sAmbhojajalatIrAnte kAyamAne drumAkule||9||   saumyA bhAvAH payaH sarpirvirekaCca viCeSataH||9||

sa0-upakrama ityanuvartate| sarpiSaH pAnamityAdi pittasyopakramaH| tathA, hArANAM-muktAdAmnAM kaNTheguNasaMjJAnAM vakSasA dhRtiH-dhAraNam| tathA, maNInAM-marakatacandrakAntapadmarAgAdInAm| tathA, karpUrAdibhiH pratikSaNamanulepanam| tathA, pradoSAdiH pittasyopakrama iti vartate| pradoSo-rAtrimukham| sudhAyA idaM saudhaM,-dhavalagRham| hAri-ramyam, gItaM-gAnam| tathA, mitramayantraNasukhaM-na vidyate yantraNA yasmiMstathAvidhaM sukhaM yasmiMstathAvidhaM mitram| tathA, sandigdhA-avyaktA, mugdhA-aprauDhA, vAg-vANI, yasya sa evaMvidhaH putraH| dArAH-kalatrANi, vallabhAH-suCIlACca| tathA, chandAnuvartinaH-cittAnuguNakAriNaH| CItAmbudhArA garbhe-abhyantare, yeSAM tathAvidhAni gRhANi| tathA, udyAnaM-upavanam| tathA, dIrghikAH-gRhapuSkariNyaH| tathA, saumyA bhAvAH pittasyopakramaH| kva sthitasya ? sutIrthavipulasvacchasalilACayasaikate yat kAyamAnaM-tRNagRham, tasmin| CobhanaM tIrthaM yasya sa evam| sutIrthaCcAsau vitatavimalajalACayaCca sutIrthavipulasvacchasalilACayaH tasya samIpe saikatam, tasmin| sikatA asmindeCe santIti saikatam, "sikatACarkarAbhyAM ca" ityaN| samUhArthe ThagdurnivAraH syAt| kIdRCe kAyamAne ? sAmbhojaM-sapadmaM, jalaM yasmiMstIrAnte sa evaM sAmbhojajalastIrAnto yasmin kAyamAne tasmin| tathA, drumaiH-vRkSaiH, Akule-vyApte| viCeSeNa tu payo ghRtaM virekaCcopakramaH|

A0 ra0-pittasyauSadhamAha-pittasya sarpiSaH pAnamiti|  sugandhiCItahRdyAnAM dravyANAM-candanAdInAM ye gandhAsteSAmupasevanam|  kaNTheguNAnAM-kaNThAvalmbinAM, hArANaM-muktAvalInAM, ye maNayasteSAmurasA dhRtiH|  uCIraM-vIraNam|  pradoSaH-candraM vinA~api|  ayantraNamukhaM-yat mukhena niyantraNaM na karoti buddhyA tu karoti|  mugdhA-mRdulA|  udyAnadIrghikAH-krIDAvanavApyaH|  sutIrthaH-CobhanAvataraNamArgaH, vipulaH svacchaCca yaH salilACayaH, tasya saikate-sikatAmayapradeCe|  sAmbhojajalatIrayorantaH-sandhiH, yasminsaikate tattathA|  kAyamAnaM-tRNAdiracitAgAram|  saumyA bhAvAH-manaHprasAdanAH padArthAH, payaH sarpirvirekaCceti catuSTayaM viCeSAdauSadham|

  CleSmaNo vidhinA yuktaM tIkSNaM vamanarecanam||10||   annaM rUkSAlpatIkSNoSNaM kaTutiktakaSAyakam||10||   dIrghakAlasthitaM madyaM ratiprItiH prajAgaraH||11||   anekarUpo vyAyAmaCcintA rUkSaM vimardanam||11||   viCeSAdvamanaM yUSaH kSaudraM medoghnamauSadham||12||   dhUmopavAsagaNDUSA niHsukhatvaM sukhAya ca||12||

sa0-vidhinA-CAstroktena, yuktaM tIkSNaM vamanavirecanaM kaphasyopakramaH| tathA, annaM rUkSAdiguNayuktam| tathA, madyaM purANam| ratiprItiH prajAgaraH,-ramaNaM-ratiH, tasyAH prItiH-sukham| tathA, prajAgaraH-atijAgaraNam| tathA, anekarUpo vyAyAmo-niyuddhadhanurAkarSaNAdikaH| viCeSeNa tu vamanaM yUSo mAkSikaM tathA medoghnaM yadauSadhaM tacca dhUmAdayaCca| tathA, niHsukhatvaM-sukhAbhAvo duHkharUpatvam, vAgdehamanaHkarmaNo duHkhadasyAnuSThAnAdyadasukhamutpadyate, tacca CleSmaNo vRddhasya vikArakaraNahetorupaCamAt sukhAya jAyate|

A0 ra0-CleSmaNa auSadhamAha-CleSmaNo vidhinA yuktamiti|  vidhinA yuktaM tIkSNaM Codhanam, tIkSNena Codhanena vyApado~asambhavAt|  ata eva mRdumadhyaM vAtapittayoH Codhanamuktam|  ratiprItiH-sambhoge prItiH, na tu ratiH|  vamanAdyaSTakaM viCeSAdauSadham|  sukhAya-sukhasAdhanAya|  dharmAya yanniHsukhatvaM-duHkhAnubhavaH nAdharmAya, tasya rogahetutvAt|

upakramaH pRthagdoSAn yo~ayamuddiCya kIrtitaH||13||   saMsargasannipAteSu taM yathAsvaM vikalpayet||13||

sa0-pRthak-pratyekaM, doSAn-vAtAdIn. uddiCya-ACritya, ya upakramaH kIrtitaH-uktaH, saMsarge sannipAte ca taM-upakramaM, yathAsvaM vikalpayet-pravRddhadoSAnusAreNa nirUpya prayuJjIta| yathA,-vAtapittasaMsarge vAtapittopakramau miCrau, vAtakaphasaMsarge vAtakaphopakramau, ityAdi| evaM sannipAte~api nirUpyopakramaH prayojyaH|

A0 ra0-saMsargasannipAtabhedAnAmauSadhamAha-upakrama iti|  yathAsvaM-svamAtmIyaM viCeSamanatikramya, vikalpayet|  yathA,- vAtapittasaMsarge vAtapittauSadhamelanamavirodhena|  tasminneva vAtAdhike vAtauSadhamAdhikyena, pittAdhikye pittauSadham, evamanyatrApi|

 graiSmaH prAyo marutpitte vAsantaH kaphamArute||14||   maruto yogavAhitvAt, kaphapitte tu CAradaH||14||

sa0-upakrama ityanuvartate| vAtapittasaMsarge grISmartucaryAvihita upakramaH prAyeNa yojyaH| yathA (hR. sU. a. 3|27) - "ato~asmin paTukaTvamlavyAyAmArkakarAMstyajet| bhajenmadhuramevAnnam" ityAdi sarvaM tyAjyaM sevyaM ca| kaphamArutasaMsarge vasantartubhavaH "tIkSNairvamananasyAdyaiH" (hR. sU. a. 3|19) ityAdirupakramo yojyaH| prAyeNetyatrApi yojyam| nanu, grISme~atyantaCItasevoktA, vasante ca tIkSNaM vamananasyAdyuktam| etacca dvayamapyekAntena pavanahetuH| tatkathamuktam ? "graiSmaH prAyo marutpitte vAsantaH kaphamArute|" ityACaGkyAha-maruto yogavAhitvAt| atrAyaM bhAvaH,-yadA kila vAyuH pittena yujyate tadA dAhAdikRt, na ca pitte same sati dAhAdikaM kartuM marutsamarthaH| api ca grISme CItameva sevyata iti nAyaM niyamaH| kiM tarhi? snigdhAdyapi| tasmAnmarutpitte grISmavidhiryuktaH| vasante ca kaphayogAt kaphavikArakAryeva bhavati pavanaH, yogavAhitvAt| atastIkSNo vamananasyAdirnyAyya eva| pittena saha sthitasya vAyoH pittacikitsA, kaphena saha sthitasya vAyoH kaphacikitsA, svabhAvavaCAditi bhAvaH| tathA ca granthaH,-"yogavAhI" (pR. 9|23) ityAdi| kaphapittasaMsarge tu CAradaH-CaradRtucaryAvihita upakramaH| nanu, sannipAte ka upakramaH ? brUmaH| varSartucaryAvihitaH| prAvRSi hi doSatrayakopa uktaH| ata eva tatrAha (hR. sU. a. 3|44) - "bhajetsAdhAraNaM sarvam" ityAdi|

A0 ra0-saMsargabhedAnAmauSadhAntaramAha-graiSma iti|  marutpitte saMsRSTe graiSma upacAraH kAryaH|  kaphamArute vAsantaH|  kaphapitte CAradaH|  tatra CAradasya kaphapittaghnatvAdyukto nirdeCaH|  graiSmasya pittaghnatvAdvAsantasya kaphapittaghnatvAdayuktaH, tatrAha-maruto yogavAhitvAditi|  yogaM-sambandhaM, vahati - nirvahati, dvitIyasyAnusaraNeneti-yogavAhI|  tena pittayuktasya vAyoH pittaghnenopaCAntiH, kaphayuktasya kaphaghnena|  prAyograhaNAdanucitAMCasya tyAgo~api|

 caya eva jayeddoSaM kupitaM tvavirodhayan||15||   sarvakope balIyAMsaM CeSadoSAvirodhataH||15||

sa0-cayakAla eva doSaM-vAtAdiM, jayet| yathA chinnamUlatvAnna vikurvIta| na kopakAlaM pratIkSeteti sUcanArtha evaCabdaH| kathaM jayet ? ityAha-kupitaM doSamavirodhayan| sarvadoSakope tu balavattaraM doSaM jayet| katham? CeSadoSAvirodhena| 

A0 ra0-auSadhakAlamAha-caya eveti|  caya eva doSaM jayet, na kopaM pratIkSeta|  atha kathaJciccayAtikrame kupitaM doSaM jayet|  taM punaravirodhayan jayet|  kupito~api dvividhaH,-prakRtisamasamaveto vikRtiviSamasamavetaCca|  tatra prathame doSasvarUpatulyaM rogasvarUpam, dvitIye viparItam|  yathA,- kaphajvare kaphaviparItamuSNatvam|  tatra jvarasvarUpasya kaphaprakopavirodhitvAdatyuSNamauSadhaM na kAryam|  vakSyati hi (hR. ci. a. 1/16) -"USmA pittAdRte nAsti jvaro nAstyUSmaNA vinA|  tasmAtpittaviruddhAni tyajetpittAdhike~adhikam||" iti|  sarveSAM yugapatkope yo balIyAn taM jayet, CeSadoSamavirodhayan|  saGgrahakArastvAha (sU. a. 21) - "kramAnmarutpittakaphAn sarvatra sadRCe bale|  vAtAdInAM yathApUrvaM yataH svAbhAvikaM balam||  Uce parACaro~apyarthamamumeva pramANayan|  yathopanyAsataH prAptamAdau doSe bhiSagjitam||  netRbhaGgena dRSTo hi samaM sainyaparAjayaH|  sthAnataH kecidicchanti prAk tAvat CleSmaNo vadham||  Cirasyurasi kaNThe ca pralipte~annaruciH kutaH|  tadabhAve kathaM bhojyapAnadravyAvacAraNam||  asatyabhyavahAre ca kuto doSasya nigrahaH|  tasmAdAdau kapho jeyaH kAyadvArArgalo hi saH||  madhyasthAyi yataH pittamACukAri ca cintyate|  ato vAtasakhasyAsya kuryAttadanu nigraham||  adhaHsthAyI ca tadanu nigrAhyaH syAtsamIraNaH|  ata eva ca pittAdiH kaphAnto~anyaiH kramaH smRtaH||  suCrutaCca na sarvatra matametaDbravIti tu|  jayejjvare~atisAre ca kramAt pittakaphAnilAn||  prAyeNa tApAtmatayA jvare pittaM viCiSyate|  viCaCca saratA pittAttathA ca mRdukoSThatA||  tasya cAnubalaH CleSmA gauravApaktijADyakRt|  vAyuCca vardhate~avaCyaM yastvahaHsu tayoH kSaye||  jvarAtisArayostasmAdeSa doSajaye kramaH|  kaphapittAnilAnanye kramAdAhustayorapi||  yasmAdAmaCayotkleCAdbhUyiSThaM tatsamudbhavaH|  krameNAdyena tatrApi pravRddhAn svACaye sthitAn||  svACayeSu praduSTAnAM sthitaivaM hyACukAritA|  vijJAya karmabhiH svaiH svairdoSodrekaM yathAbalam||  bheSajaM yojayettatra tantrI kuryAnna tu kramam|" iti|

 prayogaH CamayedvyAdhimekaM yo~anyamudIrayet||16|| |  nA~asau viCuddhaH Cuddhastu Camayedyo na kopayet||16||

sa0-yaH prayogo vyAdhiM CamayedanyamanyaM vyAdhimudIrayet-prakopayet, nAsau viCuddho-na CreSTha ityarthaH| sa tu viCuddhaH prayogo, yaH CamayedvyAdhiM na kopayet| tasmAdanyaM vyAdhimavirodhayan vyAdhiM jayet|

A0 ra0-tatrACuddhaprayogo heyaH Cuddha upAdeyaH|  tasmAttayorlakSaNamAha-prayoga iti|  doSANAM parasparaM na CamaH, ityuktaM saGgrahe (sU. a. 21) -"kruddhaM malamalaM jetuM nAlpabhAvAdubhAvapi|  doSA doSAtmakatvAcca na sAmye~api parasparam||  CItadravAmlalavaNakaTvAdiguNatulyatA|  dRSTA mithaCca doSeSu nAto~anyonyaM jayanti te||  ArambhakaM virodhe~api mitho yadvadguNatrayam|  viCvasya dRSTaM yugapadvyAdherdoSatrayaM tathA||" iti|

vyAyAmAdUSmaNastaikSNyAdahitAcaraNAdapi||17||   koSThAcchAkhAsthimarmANi drutatvAnmArutasya ca||17||      doSA yAnti tathA tebhyaH srotomukhaviCodhanAt||18||   vRddhyA~abhiSyandanAtpAkAtkoSThaM vAyoCca nigrahAt||18||      tatrasthACca vilamberan bhUyo hetupratIkSiNaH||19||

sa0-koSThAt-udarAt, CAkhAsthimarmANi doSA yAnti| kutaH ? iti hetucatuSTayamAha-vyAyAmAdibhiH CAkhAsthimarmANi doSA yAnti| tatra vyAyAmopajAtaCramasyordhvaM prapannaH pavano vyAyAmakRtakSobhaCramoSmAdibhiH praCithilaM calaM ca doSaM svAspadAt cyAvayitvA paryAkulaM CAkhAdiSu kSipati| tathA, agnyAtapAdisambandhina USmaNastaikSNyAt,-tIkSNena hyUSmaNA vilAyitA doSAstenaiva coSmaNA vivRteSu srotomukheSu satsu CAkhAdIni yAnti| ahitetyAdi| ahitena ca sevitena doSAH svapramANAdatiricyamAnAH koSThamApUrya vArSikA iva jalaughA nimnonnatAnIva CAkhAsthimarmANi prapadyante| api samuccaye| drutatvAdityAdi| drutatvAt-CIghravAhitvAt, mArutasya ca, koSThAcchAkhAsthimarmANi doSA yAnti|    srotasAM mukhAni, teSAM viCodhanaM-vivaraNam, tasmAddoSAH koSThaM yAnti| tathA, vRddhyAdibhiH| vRddhiH-svapramANAtirekaH| vRddhA hi doSAH svAni srotAMsyApUrya koSThaM yAnti| abhiSyandanaM ca nAgnitApAditIkSNoSNAdisaMCleSAdeva, api tu kSIradadhyAdyabhiSyandibhojanAdapi| evaM pAkAt,-pAcanAdibhiH pakvA doSAH kvacidanAsajjantaH koSThaM yAnti| kiJcaH ? vAyoCca nigrahAt,-caCabdAnna kevalaM pUrvebhyo hetubhyo yAvadvAyvapreraNAcca, iti cArthaH|    tatrasthAH-koSThasthACca doSA vilamberan-na rogAnutpAdayeyuH| yasmAtte bhUyo hetupratIkSiNaH, nimittakAraNahetuSu sarvAsAM prAyodarCanAddhetau prathamA, bhUyo hetupratIkSitvAdityarthaH| vRddho~api hi doSaH koSThe CAkhAdau vA mArgAntareNa gato hInaCaktitvAnna rogotpAdanasamartho bhavati|

A0 ra0-atha sthAnabhedopakrama ucyate|  tatra doSANAM sthAnAntaraprAptiprakAramAha-vyAyAmAditi|  vyAyAmAdibhiCcaturbhiH koSThasthA doSAH CAkhAkhyaM bahirmArgaM yAnti, madhyaM vA asthimarmAkhyam|    tathA CAkhAsthA asthimarmasthA vA srotomukhaviCuddhyAdibhiH paJcabhirhetubhiH koSThaM yAnti|  abhiSyandanaM-dravIbhAvaH| evaM doSAH koSThasthAH kiM kuryuH ?  ityAha-tatrasthACceti|  yatsthAnaM prAptAstatra vilambante, yAvatsthAnAntaragamane hetuM na labhante|  labdhe tu hetau punaH sthAnAntaraM yAntItyarthaH|

te kAlAdibalaM labdhvA kupyantyanyACrayeSvapi||19||

sa0-te-doSAH, kAladeCApathyAdeH samAnaguNAdbalaM labdhvA kupyanti,-vikAramutpAdayantItyarthaH| kutra sthAne ? ityAha-anyACrayeSvapi,-koSThACrayAH CAkhAsthimarmasvapi, CAkhAmarmACritAH koSTheSvapItyarthaH| na kevalaM svasthAnasthA eva kupyantIti sUcanArtho~api CabdaH|

athAto doSopakramaNIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-doSANAmupakramaNaM-cikitsA, doSopakramaNam| tasmai hito doSopakramaNIyaH| CeSaM pUrvavadyojyam

A0 ra0- lakSaNaskandhAnantaramauSadhaskandhamArabhate|  tatra doSopakramaNIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-atheti|  doSopakramaNasyaiva sarvarogauSadhatvAt|  upakramaNaM-auSadham|

 vAtasyopakramaH snehaH svedaH saMCodhanaM mRdu||1||   svAdvamlalavaNoSNAni bhojyAnyabhyaGgamardanam||1||   veSTanaM trAsanaM seko madyaM paiSTikagauDikam||2||   snigdhoSNA bastayo bastiniyamaH sukhaCIlatA||2||   dIpanaiH pAcanaiH siddhAH snehACcAnekayonayaH||3||   viCeSAnmedyapiCitarasatailAnuvAsanam||3||

sa0-vAtasyopakramaH snehaH, CreSThatvAcca prAgupAdAnaM snehasya| tataH svedaH| kRtasnehasvedasya ca saMCodhanam| tacca mRdu-na tIkSNam, tIkSNasya vAtakopahetutvAt| tathA, svAdvAdIni bhojyAni-bhakSyANi| abhyaGgaCca mardanaM cAbhyaGgamardanam| mardanaM-pANyAdinA| veSTanaM-CATakAdinA| trAsanaM-khaDgavyagrAgrahastarAjapuruSadarCanAdinA| nanu, bhICokAdibhirmArutasya kopa uktaH| vakSyati hi (hR. ni. a. 1|15) - "kriyAtiyogabhICoka" ityAdi| tat kathaM trAsanaM vAyorupakramaH ? ucyate| bhayaM vAtaprakopahetuH, na tu trAsanam| trAsanaM hi sarvavatavijayi| tasmAdvAtopaCAntyarthaM trAsanaM yuktam| yathA,-unmAdAdiSu| tathA ca vakSyati vAtonmAde (hR. u. a. 6|29) - "harSaNACvAsanottrAsabhayatADanatarjanam|" ityAdi| tathA, sekAdirupakramaH| seko-daCamUlakvAthAdinA| tathA, madyaM paiSTikaM gauDikaM ca vAtasyopakramaH| tathA, snigdhoSNA bastayo vAtasyopakramaH| snigdhoSNA ityuktyA rUkSaCItaM bastimatra nirAkaroti| tathA, bastiniyamo-yathAvidhi bastidAnam, vAtasyopakramaH| athavA bastiniyamaH-karmakAlayogAkhyastripaJcACadbastisaGkhyaH "prAk sneha ekaH paJcAnte" (hR. sU. a. 19|63) ityevamAdinA granthena yo darCitaH, sa vAtasyopakramaH| tathA sukhaM CIlayatIti sukhaCIlaH| CIlikAmibhikSyAcaribhyo NaH| tasya bhAvaH sukhaCIlatA,-saukhyavRttitvam| tilapriyAlAkSoDAdayo~anekA yonayo yeSAM te~anekayonayaH snehAH, te ca vAtasyopakrama iti yojyam| kimbhUtAH ? dIpanapAcanairdravyaiH siddhAH| viCeSeNa puSTamAMsarasastailamanuvAsanaM ca vAtasyopakramaH|

A0 ra0-pittasyauSadhamAha-pittasya sarpiSaH pAnamiti|  sugandhiCItahRdyAnAM dravyANAM-candanAdInAM ye gandhAsteSAmupasevanam|  kaNTheguNAnAM-kaNThAvalmbinAM, hArANaM-muktAvalInAM, ye maNayasteSAmurasA dhRtiH|  uCIraM-vIraNam|  pradoSaH-candraM vinA~api|  ayantraNamukhaM-yat mukhena niyantraNaM na karoti buddhyA tu karoti|  mugdhA-mRdulA|  udyAnadIrghikAH-krIDAvanavApyaH|  sutIrthaH-CobhanAvataraNamArgaH, vipulaH svacchaCca yaH salilACayaH, tasya saikate-sikatAmayapradeCe|  sAmbhojajalatIrayorantaH-sandhiH, yasminsaikate tattathA|  kAyamAnaM-tRNAdiracitAgAram|  saumyA bhAvAH-manaHprasAdanAH padArthAH, payaH sarpirvirekaCceti catuSTayaM viCeSAdauSadham|

pittasya sarpiSaH pAnaM svAduCItairvirecanam||4||   svAdutiktakaSAyANi bhojanAnyauSadhAni ca||4||   sugandhiCItahRdyAnAM gandhAnAmupasevanam||5||   kaNTheguNAnAM hArANAM maNInAmurasA dhRtiH||5||   karpUracandanoCIrairanulepaH kSaNe kSaNe||6||   pradoSaCcandramAH saudhaM hAri gItaM himo~anilaH||6||   ayantraNasukhaM mitraM putraH sandigdhamugdhavAk||7||   chandAnuvartino dArAH priyAH CIlavibhUSitAH||7||   CItAmbudhArAgarbhANi gRhANyudyAnadIrghikAH||8||   sutIrthavipulasvacchasalilACayasaikate||8||   sAmbhojajalatIrAnte kAyamAne drumAkule||9||   saumyA bhAvAH payaH sarpirvirekaCca viCeSataH||9||

sa0-upakrama ityanuvartate| sarpiSaH pAnamityAdi pittasyopakramaH| tathA, hArANAM-muktAdAmnAM kaNTheguNasaMjJAnAM vakSasA dhRtiH-dhAraNam| tathA, maNInAM-marakatacandrakAntapadmarAgAdInAm| tathA, karpUrAdibhiH pratikSaNamanulepanam| tathA, pradoSAdiH pittasyopakrama iti vartate| pradoSo-rAtrimukham| sudhAyA idaM saudhaM,-dhavalagRham| hAri-ramyam, gItaM-gAnam| tathA, mitramayantraNasukhaM-na vidyate yantraNA yasmiMstathAvidhaM sukhaM yasmiMstathAvidhaM mitram| tathA, sandigdhA-avyaktA, mugdhA-aprauDhA, vAg-vANI, yasya sa evaMvidhaH putraH| dArAH-kalatrANi, vallabhAH-suCIlACca| tathA, chandAnuvartinaH-cittAnuguNakAriNaH| CItAmbudhArA garbhe-abhyantare, yeSAM tathAvidhAni gRhANi| tathA, udyAnaM-upavanam| tathA, dIrghikAH-gRhapuSkariNyaH| tathA, saumyA bhAvAH pittasyopakramaH| kva sthitasya ? sutIrthavipulasvacchasalilACayasaikate yat kAyamAnaM-tRNagRham, tasmin| CobhanaM tIrthaM yasya sa evam| sutIrthaCcAsau vitatavimalajalACayaCca sutIrthavipulasvacchasalilACayaH tasya samIpe saikatam, tasmin| sikatA asmindeCe santIti saikatam, "sikatACarkarAbhyAM ca" ityaN| samUhArthe ThagdurnivAraH syAt| kIdRCe kAyamAne ? sAmbhojaM-sapadmaM, jalaM yasmiMstIrAnte sa evaM sAmbhojajalastIrAnto yasmin kAyamAne tasmin| tathA, drumaiH-vRkSaiH, Akule-vyApte| viCeSeNa tu payo ghRtaM virekaCcopakramaH|

A0 ra0-pittasyauSadhamAha-pittasya sarpiSaH pAnamiti|  sugandhiCItahRdyAnAM dravyANAM-candanAdInAM ye gandhAsteSAmupasevanam|  kaNTheguNAnAM-kaNThAvalmbinAM, hArANaM-muktAvalInAM, ye maNayasteSAmurasA dhRtiH|  uCIraM-vIraNam|  pradoSaH-candraM vinA~api|  ayantraNamukhaM-yat mukhena niyantraNaM na karoti buddhyA tu karoti|  mugdhA-mRdulA|  udyAnadIrghikAH-krIDAvanavApyaH|  sutIrthaH-CobhanAvataraNamArgaH, vipulaH svacchaCca yaH salilACayaH, tasya saikate-sikatAmayapradeCe|  sAmbhojajalatIrayorantaH-sandhiH, yasminsaikate tattathA|  kAyamAnaM-tRNAdiracitAgAram|  saumyA bhAvAH-manaHprasAdanAH padArthAH, payaH sarpirvirekaCceti catuSTayaM viCeSAdauSadham|

  CleSmaNo vidhinA yuktaM tIkSNaM vamanarecanam||10||   annaM rUkSAlpatIkSNoSNaM kaTutiktakaSAyakam||10||   dIrghakAlasthitaM madyaM ratiprItiH prajAgaraH||11||   anekarUpo vyAyAmaCcintA rUkSaM vimardanam||11||   viCeSAdvamanaM yUSaH kSaudraM medoghnamauSadham||12||   dhUmopavAsagaNDUSA niHsukhatvaM sukhAya ca||12||

sa0-vidhinA-CAstroktena, yuktaM tIkSNaM vamanavirecanaM kaphasyopakramaH| tathA, annaM rUkSAdiguNayuktam| tathA, madyaM purANam| ratiprItiH prajAgaraH,-ramaNaM-ratiH, tasyAH prItiH-sukham| tathA, prajAgaraH-atijAgaraNam| tathA, anekarUpo vyAyAmo-niyuddhadhanurAkarSaNAdikaH| viCeSeNa tu vamanaM yUSo mAkSikaM tathA medoghnaM yadauSadhaM tacca dhUmAdayaCca| tathA, niHsukhatvaM-sukhAbhAvo duHkharUpatvam, vAgdehamanaHkarmaNo duHkhadasyAnuSThAnAdyadasukhamutpadyate, tacca CleSmaNo vRddhasya vikArakaraNahetorupaCamAt sukhAya jAyate|

A0 ra0-CleSmaNa auSadhamAha-CleSmaNo vidhinA yuktamiti|  vidhinA yuktaM tIkSNaM Codhanam, tIkSNena Codhanena vyApado~asambhavAt|  ata eva mRdumadhyaM vAtapittayoH Codhanamuktam|  ratiprItiH-sambhoge prItiH, na tu ratiH|  vamanAdyaSTakaM viCeSAdauSadham|  sukhAya-sukhasAdhanAya|  dharmAya yanniHsukhatvaM-duHkhAnubhavaH nAdharmAya, tasya rogahetutvAt|

upakramaH pRthagdoSAn yo~ayamuddiCya kIrtitaH||13||   saMsargasannipAteSu taM yathAsvaM vikalpayet||13||

sa0-pRthak-pratyekaM, doSAn-vAtAdIn. uddiCya-ACritya, ya upakramaH kIrtitaH-uktaH, saMsarge sannipAte ca taM-upakramaM, yathAsvaM vikalpayet-pravRddhadoSAnusAreNa nirUpya prayuJjIta| yathA,-vAtapittasaMsarge vAtapittopakramau miCrau, vAtakaphasaMsarge vAtakaphopakramau, ityAdi| evaM sannipAte~api nirUpyopakramaH prayojyaH|

A0 ra0-saMsargasannipAtabhedAnAmauSadhamAha-upakrama iti|  yathAsvaM-svamAtmIyaM viCeSamanatikramya, vikalpayet|  yathA,- vAtapittasaMsarge vAtapittauSadhamelanamavirodhena|  tasminneva vAtAdhike vAtauSadhamAdhikyena, pittAdhikye pittauSadham, evamanyatrApi|

 graiSmaH prAyo marutpitte vAsantaH kaphamArute||14||   maruto yogavAhitvAt, kaphapitte tu CAradaH||14||

sa0-upakrama ityanuvartate| vAtapittasaMsarge grISmartucaryAvihita upakramaH prAyeNa yojyaH| yathA (hR. sU. a. 3|27) - "ato~asmin paTukaTvamlavyAyAmArkakarAMstyajet| bhajenmadhuramevAnnam" ityAdi sarvaM tyAjyaM sevyaM ca| kaphamArutasaMsarge vasantartubhavaH "tIkSNairvamananasyAdyaiH" (hR. sU. a. 3|19) ityAdirupakramo yojyaH| prAyeNetyatrApi yojyam| nanu, grISme~atyantaCItasevoktA, vasante ca tIkSNaM vamananasyAdyuktam| etacca dvayamapyekAntena pavanahetuH| tatkathamuktam ? "graiSmaH prAyo marutpitte vAsantaH kaphamArute|" ityACaGkyAha-maruto yogavAhitvAt| atrAyaM bhAvaH,-yadA kila vAyuH pittena yujyate tadA dAhAdikRt, na ca pitte same sati dAhAdikaM kartuM marutsamarthaH| api ca grISme CItameva sevyata iti nAyaM niyamaH| kiM tarhi? snigdhAdyapi| tasmAnmarutpitte grISmavidhiryuktaH| vasante ca kaphayogAt kaphavikArakAryeva bhavati pavanaH, yogavAhitvAt| atastIkSNo vamananasyAdirnyAyya eva| pittena saha sthitasya vAyoH pittacikitsA, kaphena saha sthitasya vAyoH kaphacikitsA, svabhAvavaCAditi bhAvaH| tathA ca granthaH,-"yogavAhI" (pR. 9|23) ityAdi| kaphapittasaMsarge tu CAradaH-CaradRtucaryAvihita upakramaH| nanu, sannipAte ka upakramaH ? brUmaH| varSartucaryAvihitaH| prAvRSi hi doSatrayakopa uktaH| ata eva tatrAha (hR. sU. a. 3|44) - "bhajetsAdhAraNaM sarvam" ityAdi|

A0 ra0-saMsargabhedAnAmauSadhAntaramAha-graiSma iti|  marutpitte saMsRSTe graiSma upacAraH kAryaH|  kaphamArute vAsantaH|  kaphapitte CAradaH|  tatra CAradasya kaphapittaghnatvAdyukto nirdeCaH|  graiSmasya pittaghnatvAdvAsantasya kaphapittaghnatvAdayuktaH, tatrAha-maruto yogavAhitvAditi|  yogaM-sambandhaM, vahati - nirvahati, dvitIyasyAnusaraNeneti-yogavAhI|  tena pittayuktasya vAyoH pittaghnenopaCAntiH, kaphayuktasya kaphaghnena|  prAyograhaNAdanucitAMCasya tyAgo~api|

 caya eva jayeddoSaM kupitaM tvavirodhayan||15||   sarvakope balIyAMsaM CeSadoSAvirodhataH||15||

sa0-cayakAla eva doSaM-vAtAdiM, jayet| yathA chinnamUlatvAnna vikurvIta| na kopakAlaM pratIkSeteti sUcanArtha evaCabdaH| kathaM jayet ? ityAha-kupitaM doSamavirodhayan| sarvadoSakope tu balavattaraM doSaM jayet| katham? CeSadoSAvirodhena| 

A0 ra0-auSadhakAlamAha-caya eveti|  caya eva doSaM jayet, na kopaM pratIkSeta|  atha kathaJciccayAtikrame kupitaM doSaM jayet|  taM punaravirodhayan jayet|  kupito~api dvividhaH,-prakRtisamasamaveto vikRtiviSamasamavetaCca|  tatra prathame doSasvarUpatulyaM rogasvarUpam, dvitIye viparItam|  yathA,- kaphajvare kaphaviparItamuSNatvam|  tatra jvarasvarUpasya kaphaprakopavirodhitvAdatyuSNamauSadhaM na kAryam|  vakSyati hi (hR. ci. a. 1/16) -"USmA pittAdRte nAsti jvaro nAstyUSmaNA vinA|  tasmAtpittaviruddhAni tyajetpittAdhike~adhikam||" iti|  sarveSAM yugapatkope yo balIyAn taM jayet, CeSadoSamavirodhayan|  saGgrahakArastvAha (sU. a. 21) - "kramAnmarutpittakaphAn sarvatra sadRCe bale|  vAtAdInAM yathApUrvaM yataH svAbhAvikaM balam||  Uce parACaro~apyarthamamumeva pramANayan|  yathopanyAsataH prAptamAdau doSe bhiSagjitam||  netRbhaGgena dRSTo hi samaM sainyaparAjayaH|  sthAnataH kecidicchanti prAk tAvat CleSmaNo vadham||  Cirasyurasi kaNThe ca pralipte~annaruciH kutaH|  tadabhAve kathaM bhojyapAnadravyAvacAraNam||  asatyabhyavahAre ca kuto doSasya nigrahaH|  tasmAdAdau kapho jeyaH kAyadvArArgalo hi saH||  madhyasthAyi yataH pittamACukAri ca cintyate|  ato vAtasakhasyAsya kuryAttadanu nigraham||  adhaHsthAyI ca tadanu nigrAhyaH syAtsamIraNaH|  ata eva ca pittAdiH kaphAnto~anyaiH kramaH smRtaH||  suCrutaCca na sarvatra matametaDbravIti tu|  jayejjvare~atisAre ca kramAt pittakaphAnilAn||  prAyeNa tApAtmatayA jvare pittaM viCiSyate|  viCaCca saratA pittAttathA ca mRdukoSThatA||  tasya cAnubalaH CleSmA gauravApaktijADyakRt|  vAyuCca vardhate~avaCyaM yastvahaHsu tayoH kSaye||  jvarAtisArayostasmAdeSa doSajaye kramaH|  kaphapittAnilAnanye kramAdAhustayorapi||  yasmAdAmaCayotkleCAdbhUyiSThaM tatsamudbhavaH|  krameNAdyena tatrApi pravRddhAn svACaye sthitAn||  svACayeSu praduSTAnAM sthitaivaM hyACukAritA|  vijJAya karmabhiH svaiH svairdoSodrekaM yathAbalam||  bheSajaM yojayettatra tantrI kuryAnna tu kramam|" iti|

 prayogaH CamayedvyAdhimekaM yo~anyamudIrayet||16|| |  nA~asau viCuddhaH Cuddhastu Camayedyo na kopayet||16||

sa0-yaH prayogo vyAdhiM CamayedanyamanyaM vyAdhimudIrayet-prakopayet, nAsau viCuddho-na CreSTha ityarthaH| sa tu viCuddhaH prayogo, yaH CamayedvyAdhiM na kopayet| tasmAdanyaM vyAdhimavirodhayan vyAdhiM jayet|

A0 ra0-tatrACuddhaprayogo heyaH Cuddha upAdeyaH|  tasmAttayorlakSaNamAha-prayoga iti|  doSANAM parasparaM na CamaH, ityuktaM saGgrahe (sU. a. 21) -"kruddhaM malamalaM jetuM nAlpabhAvAdubhAvapi|  doSA doSAtmakatvAcca na sAmye~api parasparam||  CItadravAmlalavaNakaTvAdiguNatulyatA|  dRSTA mithaCca doSeSu nAto~anyonyaM jayanti te||  ArambhakaM virodhe~api mitho yadvadguNatrayam|  viCvasya dRSTaM yugapadvyAdherdoSatrayaM tathA||" iti|

vyAyAmAdUSmaNastaikSNyAdahitAcaraNAdapi||17||   koSThAcchAkhAsthimarmANi drutatvAnmArutasya ca||17||      doSA yAnti tathA tebhyaH srotomukhaviCodhanAt||18||   vRddhyA~abhiSyandanAtpAkAtkoSThaM vAyoCca nigrahAt||18||      tatrasthACca vilamberan bhUyo hetupratIkSiNaH||19||

sa0-koSThAt-udarAt, CAkhAsthimarmANi doSA yAnti| kutaH ? iti hetucatuSTayamAha-vyAyAmAdibhiH CAkhAsthimarmANi doSA yAnti| tatra vyAyAmopajAtaCramasyordhvaM prapannaH pavano vyAyAmakRtakSobhaCramoSmAdibhiH praCithilaM calaM ca doSaM svAspadAt cyAvayitvA paryAkulaM CAkhAdiSu kSipati| tathA, agnyAtapAdisambandhina USmaNastaikSNyAt,-tIkSNena hyUSmaNA vilAyitA doSAstenaiva coSmaNA vivRteSu srotomukheSu satsu CAkhAdIni yAnti| ahitetyAdi| ahitena ca sevitena doSAH svapramANAdatiricyamAnAH koSThamApUrya vArSikA iva jalaughA nimnonnatAnIva CAkhAsthimarmANi prapadyante| api samuccaye| drutatvAdityAdi| drutatvAt-CIghravAhitvAt, mArutasya ca, koSThAcchAkhAsthimarmANi doSA yAnti|    srotasAM mukhAni, teSAM viCodhanaM-vivaraNam, tasmAddoSAH koSThaM yAnti| tathA, vRddhyAdibhiH| vRddhiH-svapramANAtirekaH| vRddhA hi doSAH svAni srotAMsyApUrya koSThaM yAnti| abhiSyandanaM ca nAgnitApAditIkSNoSNAdisaMCleSAdeva, api tu kSIradadhyAdyabhiSyandibhojanAdapi| evaM pAkAt,-pAcanAdibhiH pakvA doSAH kvacidanAsajjantaH koSThaM yAnti| kiJcaH ? vAyoCca nigrahAt,-caCabdAnna kevalaM pUrvebhyo hetubhyo yAvadvAyvapreraNAcca, iti cArthaH|    tatrasthAH-koSThasthACca doSA vilamberan-na rogAnutpAdayeyuH| yasmAtte bhUyo hetupratIkSiNaH, nimittakAraNahetuSu sarvAsAM prAyodarCanAddhetau prathamA, bhUyo hetupratIkSitvAdityarthaH| vRddho~api hi doSaH koSThe CAkhAdau vA mArgAntareNa gato hInaCaktitvAnna rogotpAdanasamartho bhavati|

A0 ra0-atha sthAnabhedopakrama ucyate|  tatra doSANAM sthAnAntaraprAptiprakAramAha-vyAyAmAditi|  vyAyAmAdibhiCcaturbhiH koSThasthA doSAH CAkhAkhyaM bahirmArgaM yAnti, madhyaM vA asthimarmAkhyam|    tathA CAkhAsthA asthimarmasthA vA srotomukhaviCuddhyAdibhiH paJcabhirhetubhiH koSThaM yAnti|  abhiSyandanaM-dravIbhAvaH| evaM doSAH koSThasthAH kiM kuryuH ?  ityAha-tatrasthACceti|  yatsthAnaM prAptAstatra vilambante, yAvatsthAnAntaragamane hetuM na labhante|  labdhe tu hetau punaH sthAnAntaraM yAntItyarthaH|

te kAlAdibalaM labdhvA kupyantyanyACrayeSvapi||19||

 bRMhaNaM CamanaM tveva vAyoH pittAnilasya ca||7||

sa0-gurvAdiguNayuktaM yaddravyaM tat snehanaM bhavati| viparItamato yallaghUSNasthirarUkSatIkSNasthUlakaThinasAndraguNopetaM tadvirUkSaNam| prAyograhaNaM virUkSaNe snehane ca yojyam| tathA ca,- laghvapi sArSapaM tailaM chAgaM ca dugdhaM tathA viSkirapratudamRgAkhyaM vargatrayaM snehanaM bhavati| tathA, uSNamapi matsyamahiSamAMsaM snehanaM bhavati| evaM rUkSaNe~api vedyam| tathA ca,- yavo guruCItasarAdiguNayukto~api virUkSaNaH, tathA rAjamASo~api| snehane prakRte~api virUkSaNopanyAso~anvayavyatirekeNa sutarAM snehasya samyakpratipAdanArthaH|

 sarpirmajjA vasA tailaM sneheSu pravaraM matam||2||  tatrApi cottamaM sarpiH saMskArasyAnuvartanAt||2|| mAdhuryAdavidAhittvAjjanmAdyeva ca CIlanAt||3||

sa0-sneheSu-kSIrAnUpAmiSAdiSu madhye, sarpirAdayaCcatvAraH snehAH prakarSeNa varAH| tatrApi ca-teSvapi caturSu madhye, sarpiruttamam, saMskArasyAnuvartanAt| nanu, yadi saMskAramanuvartate sarpistadAnIM maricacitrakAdidravyAbhisaMskRtasya ghRtasya CaityAdiguNaviparyAsaH prAptaH| na cedaM dRSTam| yadasya CaityAdayo guNA vinaCyantyauSNyAdayaCcotpadyante iti| atrocyate| anuCabdo~atra sahArthe, anekArthatvAnnipAtAnAm| tenAyamarthaH,-sarpiSo guNAH saMskAraguNaiH saha vartante, na tu tailAdInAm| tailavasAmajjAno hi saMskAravaCAt svaguNAMstyajanti| atra codAharaNaM yathA,-candanAdyaM tailamiti| ato dravyaguNAntarairanabhibhUtaguNatvAtsarpiSa itareSAM ca tailAdInAM dravyairabhibhUtaguNatvAduttamatvam| ata eva ca vAtapittajvarAdiSu vikAreSu ghRtasAdhyeSu bheSajaM tailaM neSTam, aniSTasampAdanAt| tailasAdhyeSu tu vikAreSu tadupaCAntyarthaM tathAvidhadravyasaMskRtaM ghRtamapISTam| taddhi na tathA~aniSTahetuH| tasmAt sarvasnehebhyaH sarpirevottamam, saMskArasyAnuvartanAditi nyAyAt nyAyyameva| mAdhuryAdihetoCca|

A0 ra0-snehanavaramAha-sarpiriti|      snehanottamamAha-tatrApIti|  saMskArasyAnuvartanAt-yathA CItaiH saMskRtaM CItatAm, uSNaiH saMskRtamuSNatAM bhajate ityAdi|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 25) - "mAdhuryAdavidAhitvAjjanmAdyeva ca CIlanAt|" iti|

pittaghnAste yathApUrvamitaraghnA yathottaram||3||

sa0-yo yaH pUrvo-yathApUrvam, yo ya uttaro-yathottaram| "yathAsAdRCye" ityavyayIbhAvaH| uttaramapekSya pUrvaH pUrvaM cApekSyottaraH| tena caturNAM snehAnAM yathAnirdiSTAnAM sarpirAdInAM traya eva snehA vasAmajjasarpiHsaMjJakA yathApUrvatvena sambadhyante, na tu tailAkhyaH snehaH, tasya pUrvatvAbhAvAt| na hyanyo~asmAt kaCciduttaro~asti, yadapekSyaiSaH pUrvatvamAtmana AsAdayet| tasmAnnAsti pUrvatvasambandhastailasya| [tathA, caturNAM snehAnAM traya eva snehA majjavasAtailAkhyA yathottaratvenAbhisambadhyante, na sarpiHsaMjJakaH snehaH, uttaratvAbhAvAt| na hyanyaH kaCcidasya pUrvo vidyate, yadapekSayaivottaratvamAtmana AsAdayatItyuktam| ] tadevaM yathApUrvaM pittaghnatvaM vasAmajjasarpiSAM sAmAnyenoktam| viCeSeNa ca-, vasA pittaghnI, majjA pittaghnataraH, sarpiH pittaghnatamamityarthaH| itaraghnA ityAdi| itarau-vAtakaphau pittApekSayA, tau ghnanti-parAkurvantItItaraghnAH| yathottaraM trayaH snehA majjavasAtailAkhyA vAtaCleSmaghnAH| tena majjA vAtaCleSmaghno vasA vAtaCleSmaghnatarA tailaM vAtaCleSmaghnatamamityavagantavyam| anye tvevaM vyAcakSate-CleSmaNi snehaniSedhAditaraghnA iti sAmAnyoktAvapi vAtaghnA iti gamyate| athavA dravyAntarasaMskRtasarpirAdyapekSayA kaphasyApItaraCabdena grahaNamiti|

A0 ra0-sarpirAdInAM snehaprayoge doSaviCeSeNa tAratamyamAha-pittaghhnA iti|  tailAdvasA, tato majjA, tataH sarpiH pittaghnam|  sarpiSo majjA, tato vasA, tatastailaM vAtaghnaM kaphaghnaM ca|  snehanasAdhye pittaroge~api tailasyAbhyanujJArthaM pittaghnatvamuktam|  evamanyatra|

sa0-yuktiH-yoga upAyalakSaNaH| yuktyA-mAtrAkAlakriyAbhUmidehadoSasvabhAvayA, snehaM-sarpirAdikam, avacArayet-upayuJjIta| kena saha ? ityAha-bhakSyAdyannena| AdiCabdena bhojyalehyapeyasya trividhasyApyannasya grahaNam| tathA, bastibhirnasyenAbhyaJjanena gaNDUSeNa ca snehamavacArayet| mUrddhAdInAM tarpaNaCabdena pratyekaM sambandhaH| tena, mUrddhatarpaNena-CirobastyAkhyena| tathA, karNatarpaNena-karNapUraNAkhyena| tathA, akSitarpaNena-tarpaNapuTapAkavidhyuktena| bhakSyaM-CaCAGkakiraNAdi, tena bhakSyeNa saha| AdigrahaNAdodanAdayo munyuktA gRhyante| tathA ca muniH (ca. sU. a. 13|23) - "odanaCca vilepI ca raso mAMsaM payo dadhi| yavAgUH sUpaCAke ca yUSaH kAmbalikaH khalaH|| saktavastilapiSTaM ca madyaM lehAstathaiva ca| bhakSyamabhyaJjanaM bastistathaivottarabastayaH||" iti| bastibhiriti bahuvacananirdeCo bastitrayagrahaNArthaH| tena nirUho~anvAsanaM bastiruttara iti|

sa0-rasabhedaCcaikakatvaM ca, tAbhyAM rasabhedaikakatvAbhyAM snehasyAvacAryamANasya catuHSaSTirvicAraNA bhavanti| rasabhedena-"SaT paJcakAH SaT ca pRthak" (hR. sU. a. 10|43) ityAdigranthanirdiSTena triSaSTisaGkhyAvacchinnena sahopayuktasya snehasya, tathaikakatvena-asahAyena kevalena snehena satA~asya snehasya catuHSaSTirvicAraNAH-snehaprayogakalpanAH| yA etA bhakSyAdyannena, tathA rasabhedena mUrdhakarNAkSitarpaNena ca| yA etAH kramAt-yathAkramaM nirdiSTAH, tAH kalpanAH snehasyAnyAbhibhUtatvAt anyena bhakSyAdinA bahunA, tathA rasabhedena sahopayuktasyAbhibhUtatvAt, tathA~alpatvAt-alpopayogitvAt, mUrddhAkSitarpaNAdau hi pAna iva prabhUtasyAvacArayitumaCakyatvAcca vicAraNAH smRtAH| AyurvedakartRbhiriti CeSaH|

dvAbhyAM caturbhiraSTAbhiryAmairjIryanti yAH kramAt||17||  hrasvamadhyottamA mAtrAstAstAbhyaCca hrasIyasIm||18|| kalpayedvIkSya doSAdIn prAgeva tu hrasIyasIm||18||

sa0-dvAbhyAM yAmAbhyAM-praharAbhyAM, yA snehasya mAtrA prayuktA jATharAnalavaCAjjarAM yAti sA tasya hrasvA mAtrA, caturbhiryAmairyA jIryati sA tasya madhyamA mAtrA, aSTAbhiryAmairyA jIryati sottamA mAtrA, kramAt-yathAkramaM, tA hrasvamadhyamottamA mAtrAH| tAbhyaCca-tisRbhyo mAtrAbhyo, hrasIyasIM-atiCayena hrasvAM mAtrAM kalpayet| vaidya iti CeSaH| hrasvamadhyottamA iti nirdeCe "GyApoH" ityAdinA hrasvaH| hrasvA mAtrA yAmadvayajaraNalakSaNA uktA, tato~apyarvAkkAlena yA jarAM yAti sA hrasIyasIti| doSAdIn-doSabheSajadeCakAlabalaCarIrAhArasattvasAtmyaprakRtIH vIkSya-Akalayya, prAk-pUrvameva, ajJAtakoSThe puruSa uttamamAtrAviSaye pUrvaM hrasIyasIM kalpayet| tato hrasvAM tato madhyamAM tata uttamAM ca prakalapyet| evaM madhyamamAtrAviSaye hrasIyasIM, hrasvamAtrAviSaye~api hrasIyasIM prAkkalpayet| anyathA pratyavAyabhayaM syAt| evakAro~avadhAraNe| tuCabdo yathottaramiti kramanirdeCArthaH| saGgrahe~apyuktam (sU. a. 25) - "ajJAtakoSThe hi bahuH kuryAjjIvitasaMCayam|" iti| iyaM hrasvA iyaM hrasvA iyamanayoratiCayena hrasvA iti hrasIyasI| hrasIyasItyatra Iyasuni "sthUladUra" ityAdinA valopaH| anyaistu paladvayapalacatuSTayapalaSaTkasaGkhyAvacchinnA mAtrA uktAH| na caitadyujyate| yato jaTharAnalaCaktimanapekSya snehamAtrAH prayujyamAnA anarthAyaiva| ato~asmAbhiH paladvayAdisaGkhyAvacchinnA noktAH| munerapi naitanmatam| tadgrantho hi (ca. sU. a. 13|29) - "ahorAtramahaH kRtsnamardhAhaM ca pratIkSate| pradhAnA madhyamA hrasvA snehamAtrA jarAM prati||" iti|

A0 ra0-acchapeyasya mAtrAtrayamAha-dvAbhyAmityAdi|      acchapeyasya caturthI mAtrAmAha-tAbhya iti|  doSAdIn vIkSya tAbhyo~api hrasIyasIM-yAmapariNAminIM mAtrAM, parikalpayet|      hrasIyasImeva prathamaM yojayedityAha-prAgeva tu hrasIyasImiti|  tatra heturuktaH saGgrahe (sU. a. 25) -"ajJAtakoSThe hi bahuH kuryAjjIvitasaMCayam|" iti|  mAtrANAM viSayaCcoktastatraiva (saM.sU.a. 25)-"tatra durbalamandAgnibAlavRddhasukhAtmakaiH|  apathyariktakoSThaiCca jvarAtIsArakAsibhiH||  hRasvA peyA sukhA sA hi parihAre~anuvartate|  ciraM ca balyA na ruje vyApannA~api prakalpate||  mehAruHpiTikAkuSThavAtaCoNitapIDitaiH|  madhyamA mRdukoSThaiCca snehanI syAtsukhena sA|  na balakSapaNI mandavibhraMCA Cuddhaye~apyalam|  mahAdehAnalabalakSuttRTkleCasahiSNubhiH||  gulmodAvartavIsarpasarpadaMCAbhipIDitaiH|  unmattaiH kRcchramUtraiCca mahatI CIghrameva sA||  sarvamArgAnusAreNa jayedvyAdhIn suyojitA|" iti|

hyastane jIrNa evAnne sneho~acchaH Cuddhaye bahuH||19||

sa0-hyastane~anne-AhAre, jIrNa eva-jIrNamAtra eva na tvannAbhilASe sati, Cuddhaye-CodhanArthaM, bahuH-uttamayA mAtrayA, sneho~acchaH-kevalaH, peyatvena Casyate| saJjAtabubhukSeNa tu pIto jATharAnalasya dIptatvAcchodhanakAryamakurvANastadyogyatAM cAnutpAdayannACveva jarAmupaiti| vamanamapi bubhukSitasya na sampadyate, kaphApaciteH pUrvoktAcca hetoH| tasmAdyuktamuktaM 'hyastane jIrNa evAnne' iti|

A0 ra0-CodhanasyAcchapeyasya kAlaM mAtrAM cAha-hyastana iti|  jIrNa evAnne-jaraNasamanantarameva, kSudhitatvasya CamalakAlatvAt|  Cuddhaye-Cuddhyartham|  CuddhyarthatvaM ca snehanadvAreNa, na sAkSAt|  ata evAtra tAdarthye caturthI|  CamanabRMhaNau tu svayaM sAdhanatvAcchamanabRMhaNaCabdAbhyAmuktau|  svayaM Codhanasya tu snehasya virecanoktaiva mAtrA|  bahuH-uttamamAtraH|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 25) -"vAte salavaNaM sarpiH pitte kevalamiSyate|  vaidyo dadyAdbahukaphe kSAratrikaTukAnvitam||" iti|

CamanaH kSudvato~ananno madhyamAtraCca Casyate||19||

sa0-Camano-yo rogasya CamanAyopayujyate snehaH, sa kSudvato-jAtabubhukSasya Casyate, jAtAyAM bubhukSAyAM na jIrNamAtra evAnne Codhana iva| Camano hi sneho yatratatrasthaM doSaM kupitaM sarvaCarIravyApitvAcchamanarUpatvAt [ ca ] Camayati| yadi punarjIrNamAtra evAnne sneho~ayamabubhukSitasyaivopayujyate, tadAnIM srotasAM kaphAdyupalepAnivartanAt tatsampRktaH sa sneho na sarvaM CarIraM vyApnute, avyApnuvaMCca doSaM na Camayet| tasmAt kSudvata evAyaM Casyate| sa ca madhyamamAtrayA, anannaH-kevala eva bhakSyAdinA~~AhAreNa rahitaH, accha eva peya ityarthaH| atra cottamayA mAtrayA snehapAnadinAnantaraM pathyaM kAryam| punaH snehaprayogaH| punaranyasminnahani pathyaM kAryam| madhyamamAtrayA snehapAne tu laghubhojino yAmamAtre~annAkAGkSA bhavati| tadA ca snehopayoge rAtryArambhe rAtriyAmArddhe gate vA rasakaudanaprAyaM bhojanaM bhojyaM mAtrayaiva| granthakAro hi Camane svalpabhojanamevAnujajJe| vakSyati hi (Clo. 29) - "upacArastu Camane kAryaH snehe viriktavat|" iti| suCrute coktam (ci. a. 31|34) - "pariSicyAdbhiruSNAbhirjIrNasnehaM tato naram| yavAgUM pAyayeduSNAM suklinnAmalpataNDulAm|| peyo yUSo raso vA syAdakRtaH saurabhAyutaH| kRtau vA~alpAlpasarpiSkau vilepI vA vidhIyate||" iti|

A0 ra0-CamanasyAcchapeyasya kAlaM mAtrAM cAha-Camana iti|  anannaH-annasambandharahitaH, yAvadeSa[na]jIryati tAvanna bhoktavyamityarthaH|

sa0-acche-acchapeye, snehe-uttamamadhyamahrasvamAtropayojite, anu-paCcAt, uSNaM vAri pibet| kimartham ? tatsukhapaktaye-tasya-snehasya, sukhapaktiH-sukhena pAkaH, tadartham| tathA, AsyopalepaCuddhyai ca snehaliptasya mukhasya CuddhinimittaM ca| tauvarAruSkare na tu-tuvarataile bhallAtakataile cAcchapeye~apyuSNodakaM na pibet, tayoratyuSNavIryatvAditi bhAvaH| tuvarasyAyaM vikAraH snehastauvaraH| tasya vikAra ityaN| evamAruSkare ca| cirapIte ca snehe jIrNAjIrNaM prati saMCaye sati bhUyo~apyuSNaM jalaM pibet| anupAnApekSaM punargrahaNam, na vIpsArtham| tena-uSNodakapAnena, udgArasya viCuddhirbhavet| tataCca-jIrNAjIrNaviCaGkAtaH, adhikamaGgalAghavaM ruciCca snehapAyinaH syAt| saGgrahe~anyadapyuktam (sU. a. 25)| yathA-"tato guruprAvaraNo nivAte Cayane sthitaH| jaraNAntaM pratIkSeta tRSyannuSNAlpavAripaH|| CirorugbhramaniSThIvamUrcchAsAdAruciklamaiH| jAnIyAdbheSajaM jIryajjIrNaM tacchAntilAghavAt|| anulomAnilasvAsthyakSuttRSNodgAraCuddhibhiH|" iti|   

A0 ra0-acchapeyasyAnupAnamAha-vAryuSNamiti|      tuvarabhallAtakasnehayoruSNodakaM niSedhati-tauvarAruSkare na tviti|  uktaM hi saGgrahe (sU. a. 25) -"tauvarAruSkare na tu|  uSNopacAraH snehe syAduSNo hyuSNairvirudhyate||" iti|      yathAkAlamajIryati snehe punaruSNodakapAnamAha-jIrNAjIrNeti|       tasya phalamAha-tenodgAraviCuddhiriti|  jIrNAjIrNalakSaNamuktaM saGgrahe (sU. a. 25) - "tato guruprAvaraNo nivAte Cayane sthitaH|  jaraNAntaM pratIkSeta tRSyannuSNAlpavAripaH||  CirorugbhramaniSThIvamUrcchAsAdAruciklamaiH|  jAnIyAdbheSajaM jIryajjIrNaM tacchAntilAghavAt||  anulomAnilasvAsthyakSuttRSNodgAraCuddhibhiH|" iti|

sa0-bhojyo-bhojayitavyo naraH| kiM tat ? annam| kimbhUtam ? dravoSNam| atra cobhayathA samAsaH,-draveNa mudgayUSAdinA sahoSNamannaM dravoSNam, tathA kevalaM dravaM ca taduSNaM ca dravoSNaM vilepyAdikaM kevalameva, iti| tathA, anabhiSyandi-na kaphakRt| tathA, nAtisnigdhaM-ISatsnigdhamityarthaH| tathA, asaGkaraM-asaGkIrNam, apathyenAmiCritamityarthaH|  kaH puruSaH kiM kurvannIdRCamannaM mAtrayA bhojyaH ? ityAha-CvaH snehaM pAsyan-pAtumicchan| tathA, tasminneva dine snehaM piban| tathA, pItavAnapi yaH sneham| apiH samuccaye| nanu, "mAtrACI sarvakAlaM syAt" (hR. sU. a. 8|1) iti prAguktameva| tatkimiha punarmAtrAgrahaNena ? brUmaH| mAtrACabdastatra pramANArthaH, iha tvalpArthaH| tenAyamarthaH,-yAvadannamasya samyagyathAkAlaM pariNamati tAvato~apyannAdanena svalpaM bhojyamiti|

uSNodakopacArI syAdbrahmacArI kSapACayaH||26|| na vegarodhI vyAyAmakrodhaCokahimAtapAn||26|| pravAtayAnayAnAdhvabhASyAtyAsana saMsthitIH||27|| nIcAtyuccopadhAnAhaH svapnadhUmarajAMsi ca||27||  yAnyahAni pibettAni tAvantyanyAnyapi tyajet||28|| sarvakarmasvayaM prAyo vyAdhikSINeSu ca kramaH||28||

tryahamacchaM mRdau koSThe krUre saptadinaM pibet||29||   samyaksnigdho~athavA yAvadataH sAtmyI bhavetparam||30||

sa0-mRdau koSThe sati puruSastridinamacchaM snehaM pibet| krUrakoSThe saptAhaM pibet| madhyakoSThastvata eva lakSaNAdadhigamyate| yathA,-catvAryahAni paJca vA snehaM pibediti| yadi ca [ mRdukoSThe ] tryaheNa samyaksnigdhalakSaNaM na syAt tadA catuSpaJcarAtramapi snehaM pibet| madhyakoSThastu SaDrAtramapi pibedityAha-samyaksnigdho~athavA yAvadityAdi| athavA naiSa niyamaH, samyaksnigdhalakSaNotpattireva niyamaH| ataH saptAhAdapyUrdhvamacchaH snehaH peyo yAvatsnigdhalakSaNaM syAt| ataHparaM snehaH sAtmyI bhavet| sAtmyIbhUte ca snehe yo doSaH sa saGgrahe kathitaH| yathA (sU. a. 25) - "sAtmyIbhUto hi kurute na malAnAmudIraNam| atiyogena vA vyAdhIn yathA~ambvogho~atiyojanAt||" iti| yadi tu saptAhenApi snigdhalakSaNaM notpadyate tadA dinamekaM viCramya punaH sneho yojya iti sadvaidyAH|

A0 ra0-acchapeyasya pAnAvadhimAha-tryahamityAdi|  mRdau koSThe tridinam, krUre saptadinam, yAvadvA snigdhalakSaNotpattirmRdau krUre ca|      avadhyatikrame doSamAha-ata iti|  sAtmyIbhUtasya doSatvamuktaM saGgrahe (sU. a. 25) -"sAtmyIbhUto hi kurute na malAnAmudIraNam|  atiyogena vA vyAdhIn yathA~ambvogho~atiyojanAt|| nihatya setuM mRtkoSThAt sravati kSapayanmRdam| sneho~apyagniM tathA hatvA sravati kSapayaMstanum||" iti|

virUkSaNe laGghanavatkRtAtikRtalakSaNam||35||

sa0-virUkSaNe samyagutpanne tathA~atyarthotpanne ca laGghanavat kRtAtikRtalakSaNaM jJeyam| kRtaM cAtikRtaM ca kRtAtikRte, tayorlakSaNaM kRtAtikRtalakSaNam| kRtaCabdena samyakkRtamucyate| virUkSaNAyogalakSaNaM tu snehAtiyogalakSaNenaivoktam| tatra samyakkRtasya laGghanasya yallakSaNaM vimalendriyatAdi tadeva samyagvirUkSaNe kRte lakSaNaM bodhyam| tathA, atikRte virUkSaNe~atilaGghitasya lakSaNaM kArCyAdikaM vedyam|

A0 ra0-snehavyApadyuktavirUkSaNasya samyagyogAtiyogalakSaNamAha-virUkSaNa iti|  laGghanavat-laGghanasya samyagyoge "vimalendriyatA" ityAdi, atiyoge "atikArCyaM" ityAdi|  kRtaM-samyagyogaH|  atikRtaM-atiyogaH|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 25) -"snehena paittikasyAgniryadA tIkSNatarIkRtaH|  snehamACu jarAM nItvA punarojo~abhitaCcaran||  udIrayetsopasargAM pipAsAmasya cAdhikAm|  so~asUMstyajedyadyudakaM na pibedACu CItalam||  CItasekAvagAhAMCca tattRSNApIDito bhajet|  snehAgninA dahyamAnaH svaviSeNeva pannagaH|  ajIrNe balavatyAM tu CItairdihyAcchiromukham|  chardayettadaCAntau ca pItvA CItodakaM punaH|| rUkSAnnamullikhedbhuktvA tAdRCyAM tu kaphAnile|  samadoSaCca niHCeSaM snehamuSNAmbunoddharet||  tato doSAdibalataH pUrvoktaM ca vidhiM Crayet|  na sarpiH kevalaM pitte deyaM sAme viCeSataH||  sarvaM hyanurujeddehaM hatvA saMjJAM ca mArayet|" iti|

 snigdhadravoSNadhanvottharasabhuk svedamAcaret||36|| snigdhastryahaM sthitaH kuryAdvirekaM, vamanaM punaH||36||  ekAhaM dinamanyacca kaphamutkleCya tatkaraiH||37||

sa0-snigdhaCcAsau dravoSNadhanvottharasaCca, taM bhuGkte yaH sa snigdhadravoSNadhanvottharasabhuk| dhanvottharaso-jAGgaladeCamAMsasamudbhUto rasaH, taM bhuJjAnaH svedamAcaret| mAMsarasasya svabhAvata eva snigdhadravatvAt snigdhadravagrahaNamadhikayogAyeti vedyam| uSNaM-ubhayathA vIryato~agnisaMyogAcca| evambhUtaH puruSaH pUrvaM snigdho~anantaraM snigdhadravoSNadhanvottharasabhuk svedamAcaran dinatrayaM sthitaH san virekaM kuryAt| vamanaM punariti| yadA tu snehAdanantaraM vamanamevopayuGkte tadaikAhamanenaiva prakAreNa snigdhadravoSNadhanvottharasabhuk svedamAcaran sthito~anyacca dinaM-dvitIyamahaH, kaphamutkleCya-sthAnAt pracyAvya, sthito vamanaM kuryAt| kairutkleCya ? tatkaraiH,-kaphakaraNahetubhirmASakSIramatsyaguDAdibhiH| tatkarairiti kRJo hetvAdinA hetau TaH|

sa0-upanAho-bandhanam| kiNvaM-surAprakRtiH| CatAhvA-CatapuSpA| dhAnyairiti sAmAnyoktAvapi tilAtasImASAdIni yogyatvAdyAnyuSNavIryANi snigdhAni vA tAni prAyeNa prayojyAnIti| samastagrahaNaM gandhaireva yujyate| ata eva saGgrahe~avadat (sU. a. 26) - "sarvagandha" iti| gandhaiH-gandhadravyaiH kuSThAgurutagarasurasAdibhiH| tathA, rAsnAdibhiH| kimbhUtaiH pUrvoktaiH ? udriktalavaNaiH-lavaNADhyaiH| tathA, snehaCca cukraM ca takraM ca payaCca, taiH plutaiH-AloDitaiH| cukraM-amlam| takrasya cukratvAdeva grahaNe siddhe takragrahaNamatiCayArtham, atiCayena sAlvaNAkhye svede takraM prayojyamiti| kevale pavane vacAdibhirupAnAhasvedaH kAryaH| CleSmasaMsRSTe pavane surasAdibhiH-surasayugAdinA gaNena (hR. sU. a. 15|30)| pittena saMsRSTe pavane padmakAdyaiH-"padmakapuNDrau" (hR. sU. a. 15|12) ityAdibhiH| pittena saMsRSTe pavana ityatra kiJcideva pittena saMsRSTe pavane padmakAdibhirupanAhaH kArya ityavabodhyam, nAdhikena pittena yukte pavane, nApi tulyena pittena yukte pavana iti| evaM hyuktam (hR. sU. a. 13|14)- "graiSmaH prAyo marutpitte" vidhiH kAryaH| graiSmaCca vidhiH prAyeNa sarvaH CItaH| tatra svedo dUrotsArita eva| tasmAt kiJcitpittena saMsRSTe pavane padmakAdyairupanAhaH kArya iti vedyam| ete ca traya upanAhAH kevale vAyau tathA kaphayukte pittayukte ca krameNa yojyAH| ete ca sAlvaNAbhidhAnAH svedA ityAha-sAlvaNAkhyairiti| punaHpunariti asakRttaiH svedayojanA kAryetyarthaH| nirapAyo hi yathA~ayaM sAlvaNAparasaMjJa upanAhAkhyaH svedo na tathA~apare svedA iti| upanahyate-badhyate carmapaTAdinA, ityanvarthaM nAmAsyopanAha iti| sAlvaNa ityasya tantrAntaraprasiddhaM nAma| tathA ca dhanvantariH (su. ci. a. 4|14) - "kAkolyAdiH savAtaghnaH sarvAmladravyasaMyutaH| sAnUpaudakamAMsastu sarvasnehasamanvitaH|| sukhoSNaH spaSTalavaNaH sAlvaNaH parikIrtitaH|" iti| 'udriktalavaNaiH snehacukratakrapayaHplutaiH|' iti triSvapi svedeSu yojyam|

CigruvAraNakairaNDakaraJjasurasArjakAt||7|| CirISavAsAvaMCArkamAlatIdIrghavRntataH||8|| patrabhaGgairvacAdyaiCca mAMsaiCcAnUpavArijaiH||8|| daCamUlena ca pRthak sahitairvA yathAmalam||9|| snehavadbhiH surACuktavArikSIrAdisAdhitaiH||9|| kumbhIrgalantIrnADIrvA pUrayitvA rujArditam||10|| vAsasA~~AcchAditaM gAtraM snigdhaM siJcedyathAsukham||10||

sa0-CigrvAdijaiH patrasamUhaiH, tathA vacAdyaiH-vacAdigaNoktaiH, tathA mAMsairAnUpajairjalajaiCca, daCamUlena ca pRthak-vyastairdvitrAdibhiH, sahitairvA-samastairvA, yathAmalaM snehavadbhiH-doSaharaghRtAdyanyatamasnehayuktairyathAdoSaM surACuktavArikSIrAdisAdhitaiH, kumbhIH-sthAlIH, pUrayitvA, athavA galantIrnADIrvA-anavarataM dhArayA jalAdisravantIrvAridhAnikAsaMjJAH vaMCAdimayIH pUrayitvA, rujArditaM-pIDArtaM, gAtraM-aGgaM, vAsasA~~AcchAditaM tathA snigdhaM sat yathAsukhaM-sukhasparCaM kadAcidatyuSNaM kadAcidISaduSNaM siJcet|

sa0-taireva-pUrvoktaiH, svedadravaiH pUrNaM kuNDaM bhRCamavagAhya-praviCya, Aturo-rogI tiSThet| kIdRCe doSe ? ityAha-sarvAGgage~anile,-sarvaCarIravyApini vAyau| tathA, arCaHprabhRtirogakaSTapIDAsu| AdigrahaNena hastapAdapIDAsu ca| kuNDagrahaNamupalakSaNArtham| tena kUpakuTIsvedau ca vedyau| saGgrahe coktam (sU. a. 26)- "CayanasyAdhovistAradviguNakhAte kUpe vAtaharadArukarISAnyatarapUrNadagdhe vigatadhUme svAstIrNaCayanasthaM svedayediti kUpasvedaH| kuTIM nAtyuccavistArAM vRttAmacchidrAmupanAhadravyakalkaghanapradigdhakuDyAM sarvato vidhUmapradIptakhadirAGgArapUrNahasantikAsamUhaparivRtAM vidhAya tanmadhyasthitaCayyAsthaM svedayediti kuTIsvedaH| padmotpalAdibhiH saktupiNDyA vA~~AcchAdya cakSuSI| CItairmuktAvalIpadmamukulotpalabhAjanaiH|| muhuH karaiCca sajalaiH svidyato hRdayaM spRCet|" iti|
