sa0-upanAho-bandhanam| kiNvaM-surAprakRtiH| CatAhvA-CatapuSpA| dhAnyairiti sAmAnyoktAvapi tilAtasImASAdIni yogyatvAdyAnyuSNavIryANi snigdhAni vA tAni prAyeNa prayojyAnIti| samastagrahaNaM gandhaireva yujyate| ata eva saGgrahe~avadat (sU. a. 26) - "sarvagandha" iti| gandhaiH-gandhadravyaiH kuSThAgurutagarasurasAdibhiH| tathA, rAsnAdibhiH| kimbhUtaiH pUrvoktaiH ? udriktalavaNaiH-lavaNADhyaiH| tathA, snehaCca cukraM ca takraM ca payaCca, taiH plutaiH-AloDitaiH| cukraM-amlam| takrasya cukratvAdeva grahaNe siddhe takragrahaNamatiCayArtham, atiCayena sAlvaNAkhye svede takraM prayojyamiti| kevale pavane vacAdibhirupAnAhasvedaH kAryaH| CleSmasaMsRSTe pavane surasAdibhiH-surasayugAdinA gaNena (hR. sU. a. 15|30)| pittena saMsRSTe pavane padmakAdyaiH-"padmakapuNDrau" (hR. sU. a. 15|12) ityAdibhiH| pittena saMsRSTe pavana ityatra kiJcideva pittena saMsRSTe pavane padmakAdibhirupanAhaH kArya ityavabodhyam, nAdhikena pittena yukte pavane, nApi tulyena pittena yukte pavana iti| evaM hyuktam (hR. sU. a. 13|14)- "graiSmaH prAyo marutpitte" vidhiH kAryaH| graiSmaCca vidhiH prAyeNa sarvaH CItaH| tatra svedo dUrotsArita eva| tasmAt kiJcitpittena saMsRSTe pavane padmakAdyairupanAhaH kArya iti vedyam| ete ca traya upanAhAH kevale vAyau tathA kaphayukte pittayukte ca krameNa yojyAH| ete ca sAlvaNAbhidhAnAH svedA ityAha-sAlvaNAkhyairiti| punaHpunariti asakRttaiH svedayojanA kAryetyarthaH| nirapAyo hi yathA~ayaM sAlvaNAparasaMjJa upanAhAkhyaH svedo na tathA~apare svedA iti| upanahyate-badhyate carmapaTAdinA, ityanvarthaM nAmAsyopanAha iti| sAlvaNa ityasya tantrAntaraprasiddhaM nAma| tathA ca dhanvantariH (su. ci. a. 4|14) - "kAkolyAdiH savAtaghnaH sarvAmladravyasaMyutaH| sAnUpaudakamAMsastu sarvasnehasamanvitaH|| sukhoSNaH spaSTalavaNaH sAlvaNaH parikIrtitaH|" iti| 'udriktalavaNaiH snehacukratakrapayaHplutaiH|' iti triSvapi svedeSu yojyam|

A0 ra0-upanAhasya lakSaNamAha-upanAha ityAdi|  vacAdibhiryaH svedaH kriyate sa upanAhaH|  kiNvaM-surAkAJjikAdyadhaHsthitadravyam|  gandhaiH-kuSThAdigandhadravyaiH|  eraNDajaTA-eraNDamUlam|  AmiSaM-mAMsam|  udriktalavaNaiH-saindhavAdyutkaTaiH|  snehAdibhiH plutaiH-AloDitaiH|  cukraM-suktam|  payaH-kSIram|  eSaH svedaH kevale pavane|  eSa eva CleSmasaMsRSTapavane surasAdivargeNa saha kAryaH|  pittena saMsRSTe pavane padmakAdivargeNa saha kAryaH|  sAlvaNAkhyaiH-sAlvaNa ityAkhyA upanAhasya yebhyaH padmakAdibhyastaiH|  padmakAdibhiryukta upanAhaH-sAlvaNAkhyaH|  uktaM ca suCrutena (ci.a. 4/14)-"kAkolyAdiH savAtaghnaH sarvAmladravyasaMyutaH|  sAnUpamAMsaH susvinnaH sarvasnehasamanvitaH||  sukhoSNaH spRSTalavaNaH sAlvaNaH parikIrtitaH|  tenopanAhaM kurvIta sarvadA vAtarogiNAm||" iti|  tadvyAkhyAnaM ca,- "kAkolyAdirgaNo grAhyo nASTavargakasaMjJitaH|  vAtaghno bhadradArvAdivargo~amlo dADimAdikaH||  sarvasnehaCcatuHsneho lavaNaM saindhavAdikam|  amlAdibhiCca saMskAryaH kAkolyAditrayaM tribhiH||" iti|  padmakAdireva tanmate kAkolyAdiH|  sa copanAhaH punaH punaH kAryaH|  upanAho-bandhanam|

sa0-USmA-bASpaH, tadAkhyaH sveda utkArikAdibhiH prayojyaH| tatra yavamASairaNDabIjAtasIkusumbhabIjAdibhiH piSTasvinnairlapyasikAkRtiryaH svedanopAyaH sA utkArikA| loSTaM-mRtpiNDaH| kapAlaM-karparam| upalaH-pASANaH| pAMsuH-dhUliH| tathA, patrabhaGgena-chadasamUhena| tathA, dhAnyena| karISo-gavAdiCakRccUrNaH| sikatA-vAlukA| tuSo-dhAnyatvak| etairutkArikAdibhistuSAntaiH svedo vidhAtavyaH| kimbhUtaiH ? anekopAyasantaptaiH,-aneke ca ta upAyACca, taiH santaptAH-uSNIkRtA ya utkArikAdayaH, taiH| kathaM prayojyaH ? ityAha-deCakAlataH| lyablope paJcamI ceyam| tena deCakAlAvapekSya| upalakSaNaM cedam| tena doSadUSyAdInapyapekSya svedo~ayaM prayojyaH| loSTakapAlapASANAnagnitaptAn sandaMCena gRhItvA svedyadoSAdyapekSayA~ambhasyamle dhAnyAmle CuktAdau vA nimajjayet| tadudbhUtabASpaiH svedaH Cayanasthasya kAryaH| athavA gavAdiCakRtA~~ArdreNa piNDIkRtenoSNena svedaH sa ca piNDasvedasaMjJaH| sa eva saGkarasveda ucyate| athavairaNDAdidravyayuktAni yavAdIni dhAnyAni sAmlakAdIni gRhItvA pihitamukhAyAmukhAyAM samyagupasvedya nivAte gRhe Cayanasthe kiliJje prastIryAvikakauCeyavAtaharapatrAnyatamottarapracchade rauravAjinaprAvArAdisvavacchannaM svedayet| athavA pUrvavatsvedyadravyANi kumbhyAmutkvAthya tannikaTopaviSTo ghanavastraprAvRta USmANaM gRhNIyAt| eSa saMstarasvedaH| evamanekopAyasantaptatvaM doSadUSyAdyapekSayA nirUpya svedo yojyaH|

A0 ra0-USmasvedasya lakSaNamAha-USmeti|  utkArikAdibhiH soSmAbhiH kambalAdiveSTitairyaH svedaH kriyate, sa USmasvedaH|  utkArikA-roTikA|  patrabhaGgena-khaNDaCaH kRtaiH patraiH|  dhAnyena-godhUmAdinA| CigruvAraNakairaNDakaraJjasurasArjakAt||7|| CirISavAsAvaMCArkamAlatIdIrghavRntataH||8|| patrabhaGgairvacAdyaiCca mAMsaiCcAnUpavArijaiH||8|| daCamUlena ca pRthak sahitairvA yathAmalam||9|| snehavadbhiH surACuktavArikSIrAdisAdhitaiH||9|| kumbhIrgalantIrnADIrvA pUrayitvA rujArditam||10|| vAsasA~~AcchAditaM gAtraM snigdhaM siJcedyathAsukham||10||

sa0-CigrvAdijaiH patrasamUhaiH, tathA vacAdyaiH-vacAdigaNoktaiH, tathA mAMsairAnUpajairjalajaiCca, daCamUlena ca pRthak-vyastairdvitrAdibhiH, sahitairvA-samastairvA, yathAmalaM snehavadbhiH-doSaharaghRtAdyanyatamasnehayuktairyathAdoSaM surACuktavArikSIrAdisAdhitaiH, kumbhIH-sthAlIH, pUrayitvA, athavA galantIrnADIrvA-anavarataM dhArayA jalAdisravantIrvAridhAnikAsaMjJAH vaMCAdimayIH pUrayitvA, rujArditaM-pIDArtaM, gAtraM-aGgaM, vAsasA~~AcchAditaM tathA snigdhaM sat yathAsukhaM-sukhasparCaM kadAcidatyuSNaM kadAcidISaduSNaM siJcet|

sa0-etat pUrvoktaM recyArecyatvamavagamyAnantaraM sAdhAraNe-CrAvaNAdau kAle, yathAvidhi-snehasvedAdhyAyoditena krameNa, snigdhasvinnaM puruSaM bhaiSajyamAtrAM prAGmukhaM pAyayediti vakSyamANena sambandhaH| kIdRCam ? CvovamyaM-prAtarvamanArham| vamyamiti "arhekRtyatRcaCca" ityarhArthe poradupadhAditi yat| utkliSTaH-sthAnAccalitaH, kapho yasya tamutkliSTakapham| kaiH? matsyAdibhiH| antarbhAvitaNyartho~atra| utkleCitakaphamityarthaH| tathA, niCAM suptam| "kAlAdhvanoH" iti dvitIyA| ata eva yathocitaH sakalaniCAsvApo~atropalakSyate| tathA, suSThu jIrNamannaM-AhAro yasya tam| kadA pAyayet ? pUrvAhNe-prAtaHkAle| kimbhUtam ? kRtaM maGgalaM-svastyayanAdi, yasya tam| maGgalamityupalakSaNArtham,- kRtadevadvijAgniguruvRddhArcanamapIti draSTavyam| tathA, nirannaM-akRtAhAram| AturavaCAdvA kiJcitsnigdham| katham ? ityAha-peyayA pItasarpiSam| vRddhetyAdi| tathA, asau vAmyo vRddho vA bAlo vA durbalo vA klIbaH-khedAsahiSNurvA bhavati, bhIrurvA-kAtaro bhavati| tadA rogAnurodhAdAkaNThaM-atimAtraM madyakSIrAdikaM pAyayet| tadanantaraM bhaiSajyamAtrAM pAyayet| saGgrahe~apyuktam (sU. a. 27) - "bhIrukRCabAlavRddhasukumArAnvA doSAnurodhenAkaNThaM pItayUSekSurasakSIratakramAMsarasamadyatuSodakayavAgUmaNDAnyatamam" iti| kimbhUtAM mAtrAm ? yathAvikAravihitAM,-  rogAnusAreNa sAdhitAm| tathA, madhusaindhavAbhyAM yutAm| kiM kRtvA ? koSThaM-mRdumadhyakrUralakSaNaM, vibhajya-vicArya| CleSmAdhikyena mRdutvaM, CleSmamadhyatvena madhyatvaM, CleSmahInatvena krUratvaM vamane koSThasya bodhyam| tathA coktam carake (si. a. 1|8) - "CleSmottaraCcchardayate hyaduHkham" iti| kimbhUtAM bhaiSajyamAtrAm ? mantrAbhimantritAm| tAneva mantrAnAha-brahmetyAdigranthena|

A0 ra0-vamanavidhimAha-atheti|  kRtasnehanAdikamAturaM prAGmukhaM bhaiSajyamAtrAM pAyayedityanvayaH|  Cvovamyamiti vamanadinAtpUrvadine, utkliSTakapham|  samyaksnigdhaM cennirannam|  ISatsnigdhaM cet peyayA pItasarpiSam|  vRddhAdiSvanyatamaCce(maM ce) drogAnusAreNa madyAdiSvanyatamamAkaNThaM pAyitam|  brahmetyAdisvAhAntena mantreNAbhimantritAm|  ayaM cauSadhapAnavidhirviCeSaparihAreNa sarveSvauSadheCu jJeyaH|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 27) -"snAtAnuliptaM sragviNamahatavAsasaM devatAgnidvijaguruvRddhavaidyAnarcitavantaM kRtahomabalimaGgalaprAyaCcittasvastivAcanaM jAnusamasaMstRtasopadhAnopACrayAsanopaviSTaM pItatakrayUSatuSodakayavAgUmaNDAnyatamaM nakSatratithikaraNamuhUrttodaye praCaste|" iti (ityadhikam)|

A0 ra0-upAyenApyapravRtttau kiM kRtyam?  ityata Aha-utthAna iti|  utthAne-pravartane alpe sati tasmin dine bhuktvA dvitIyadine punarvirecanaM pibet|  yastu nivRttasnehavAnna viricyate sa punaH snigdhasvinno daCAhAdUrdhvaM virecanaM pibet|  pUrvamatikramaM-prathamavirecane sAmagrIvaikalyaM, smaran samyagAlocya yadyogyaM syAttatpunardeyam, na prathamameva|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 27) - "hrIbhayalobhaiCca vegAghAtaCIlA prAyaCastriyo rAjasamIpasthA vaNijaCca bhavanti|  tasmAdete vegadhAraNAt pravRddhavAtatvAt sadA~~AturA durvirecyACca|  tAn susnigdhAn Codhayet, anyAnapi cAkAlanirhAravihArAhArAn|  ataCcaiSAM sadAturatvAdalpo~apyAmayo duHsAdhyo  bhavati|" iti|

A0 ra0- anAsthApyAdInAM pANDvAdInAM cAnuvAsanaM niSedhati- nAnuvAsyA iti| anAsthApyAH-atisnigdhAdayaH| nirannaH-akRtAhAraH| viDbhedI-CithilamalaH| gurukoSThaH-AhAraM vinA~apyAhArapUrNa iva koSTho yasya| abhiSyandI-netrakopI| saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 28) -  tatrAtisnigdhAdInAM yathAsvamuktAH pRthagdoSAH| api ca| abhukte riktakoSThasya prayuktamanuvAsanam| saradUragasUkSmatvaiH| kSipramUrdhvaM prapadyate|| tena vAyorjayo na syAdvAtadhAmanyatiSThatA| kayAgnerACu nACastu viCeSAdativartinA|| snehaH sadyo~asitAhAraruddhe tvAmACaye~anilam| pakvasthaM hanti pakvasthaCcyavate cAnnapAkataH|| nirUhaCca samIraCca tIkSNavegAvubhAvapi| tAvannamUrcchitau tIkSNAvadho~annena sahAgatau|| UrdhvaM vA CakRtA sArddhaM saMsthitau koSTha eva vA| samalAhAraviSTabdhau haretAmACu jIvitam|| bhuktavAnanuvAsyo~asmAnna nirUhyo~atra bhuktavAn| pANDurogArtAdInAM doSAnutkleCya snehabastirudaraM janayet| pratiCyAyAdimatAM bhUya eva doSaM vivardhayet|" iti|

sa0-varSe pUrNe satyaGgulamAdAya svAGgulAtprabhRti krameNa tryaGgulaM chidraM mUle netrasya bhavati| kimbhUtaM chidram ? arddhasyArddhamarddhArddham| tasya-aGgulasyArddhArddhaM tadarddhArddham, tena pravarddhitam| tatra prathame varSe~aGgulamAtraM chidram, yAvadvarSANi SaT| saptame varSe sapAdamaGgulam, yAvadekAdaCa varSANi| dvAdaCe varSe sArddhamaGgulam, yAvatSoDaCa varSANi| SoDaCavarSasya tu pAdonamaGguladvayam| saptadaCe varSe~aGguladvayam| aSTAdaCe varSe sapAdamaGguladvayam| ekonaviMCativarSasya sArddhamaGguladvayam| viMCativarSasya pAdonamaGgulatrayam| ekaviMCativarSasya tryaGgulaM chidramiti kramo vedyaH| paramamityanenaitadgamayati,-paramaM-utkarSamACrityedaM mUlacchidram| madhyamaM tu mUlacchidraM "svAGguSThena" ityanenoktam| UnavarSasya tvarddhAGgulaM chidrametadapekSayA kalpyam| agre tu chidraM tadbhavati yanmudgAdi vahati| tatra vArSikasya mudgavAhi, yAvatSaDvarSam| saptavarSasya mASavAhi, yAvadekAdaCo~abdaH| dvAdaCavarSasya kalAyavAhi, SoDaCavarSasya klinnakalAyavAhi, ekaviMCativarSasya karkandhuvAhi, iti kramAdvayaHpramANam| UnavarSasya ca na mudgavAhi kalpyam| agracchidrapramANaM caitat "agre kaniSThayA" ityatrApi saGgacchata eva| dairghyapramANaM cAtra pakSe pUrvameva yojyam| "svAGguSThena samaM mUle sthaulyena" ityanena (ityatra) chidrapramANaM svamatyA bhiSajA prakalpyam| tathA, "tryaGgulaM paramaM chidraM" ityatra ca sthaulyapramANaM svadhiyaiva nirUpyam| tantrakRtA tu granthagauravabhayAduktaprAyatvAcceha noktam|

sa0-AsthApyaM-nirUhaNArhaM, snigdhaM, tathA svinnaM, tathA CuddhaM-UrdhvAdhaH, tathA bhUyo~api labdhabalaM, tathA~anuvAsanayogyaM, viditvA pUrvameva nirUhAdanuvAsayet| CIte-hemantaCiCirayoH RtvoH, tathA vasante, divA~anuvAsayet| anyadA-CItAdvasantAccAnyasmin grISmaprAvRTCaradAkhye Rtau, rAtrAvanuvAsayet| keciditi bhinnakramaH, tato~anyadetyato~anantaraM draSTavyam| iti kecit "AhuH" iti vAkyaCeSaH| dhAnvantarAstu sarvathaiva rAtrAvanuvAsanaM necchanti| dhanvantarimatamevorarIkRtya saGgrahe~adhijage (sU. a. 28)- "na rAtrau praNayedbastiM doSotkleCo hi rAtrijaH| snehavIryayutaH kuryAdAdhmAnaM gauravaM jvaram||" iti| tadetaddeCAntarAdivaCAt pramANayitavyam| kimbhUtaM naram ? abhyaktasnAtaM,-pUrvamabhyaktaH paCcAtsnAtaH, tam| pUrvakAleti samAsaH| ucitAtpAdahInaM-yena yadbhojanamabhyastaM tasmAccaturthabhAgahInamaCitam| tathA, hitaM-laghuguNayuktam| tathA, kiJcit snigdharUkSam| tathA, sAnupAnaM dravAdi ca| AdiCabdena dravoSNamanabhiSyandItyAdiviCiSTaM bhuktavantamiti gamayati| uktaM ca saGgrahe (sU. a. 28)- "atisnigdhACino hyubhayamArgasaMsargAt sneho madamUrcchAgnisAdahRllAsAdIn janayati| rUkSACino viSTambhaM balavarNahAniM ca| alpamAtradravACino visRSTaviNmUtrasya cAnAvRto na tadAvaraNAdvyApadam|" iti| kimbhUtam ? kRtacaGkramaNaM-vihitagamanamAtram| tathA, tyaktamUtrapurISam| tathA, Cayane-CayanIye, sukhAvahe saMviSTaM-sthitam| kimbhUte ? nAtyucchrite,-nAtyunnate, na cocchIrSe-na connataCirodhare| kathaM saMviSTam ? vAmapArCvataH,-vAmapArCvena| saGkocya dakSiNaM sakthi vAmasakthna uparIti vRddhavaidyAH| tato-dakSiNasakthnaH, aparaM-vAmaM sakthi, prasArya| saGgrahe coktam (sU. a. 28) - "Cayane nAtyucchrite svAstRta ISadunnatapAdadeCe vAmapArCvena prAkCirasaM saMveCayet|" iti|

sa0-asya-evaMbhUtAvasthasyAturasya, gude snigdhe ghRtena kRte netraM [ snigdhaprAntaM praNayet| ] bastervadana ucchvAsya-vAtaM niHsArya, baddhe sati, nAtiCIghraM, nAtivilambitaM, nAtivegena, na ca mandaM kRtvA, tathA pRSThavaMCAbhimukhamekavArameva netraM prapIDayet| kathaM prapIDayet ? hastamakampayan| atidrutAdipIDanadoSA bastivyApatsiddhau (hR. ka. a. 5) vakSyamANAH| sAvaCeSaM ca snehaM kurvIta| kuto hetoH ? ityAha-yasmAt CeSe snehe vAyustiSThati|

A raM- pratIkArasyApavAdamAha-atiraukSyAditi| nivRttasnehasyAnivRttasnehasya ca snehaCeSapAkArthamauSadhamAha -adhyuSita iti| kevalameva vA-koSNamambhaH| saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 28) - "sukhoCitaM cainaM tathA kRtavamanavirecanAsthApanAnyatamaM prAtaH  CuNThIdhAnyakvAthamitaradvoSNamudakaM snehaCeSajaraNAya vAtakaphopaCAntaye ca pAyayet| tato~annakAle yathoktamannamaCnIyAt| na cAnuvAsitaM peyAM pAyayet| sA hi sasnehakoSThamenamabhiSyandayati|" iti|

anvAsayettRtIye~ahni paJcame vA punaCca tam||33||  yathA vA snehapaktiH syAdato~atyulbaNamArutAn||34|| vyAyAmanityAn dIptAgnIn rUkSAMCca prativAsaram||34||

sa0-tamAturaM bhUyastRtIye divase paJcame vA~anuvAsayet| athavA yathA snehapAko bhavedityagnyapekSayA saptarAtre~adhike nyUne vA trirAtre vA yathAyogamanuvAsayet| ataH-asmAdeva hetoH, adhikapavanAn vyAyAmaCIlAn paTutaradahanAn rUkSAMCca puruSAn pratyahamanuvAsayet|

A0 ra0- punaranuvAsanasya kAlamAha-anvAsayediti snehapAkAnusAreNa satpamAdidineSu vA| ulbaNavAtAdIn pratidinamanuvAsayedityAha-ata iti| ataH-snehapAkaprAdhAnyAt|

iti snehaistricaturaiH snigdhe srotoviCuddhaye||35|| nirUhaM CodhanaM yuJjyAdasnigdhe snehanaM tanoH||35||

sa0-iti-pUrvoktena prakAreNa, snehaistribhiCcaturbhirvA snigdhe sati srotoviCodhanArthaM nirUhaM CodhanaM prayojayet| asnigdhe sati tanoH-CarIrasya, snehanaM prayojayet| trayo vA catvAro vA tricaturAH| saGkhyayAvyayeti samAsaH| caturo~acprakaraNe tryupAbhyAmupasaGkhyAnamityac samAsAntaH|

A0 ra0- anuvAsanAnantaraM nirUhamAha-iti snehairiti| snehaiH-anuvAsanaiH|     niSiddhAnuvAsanasyAnuvAsanaM vinaiva nirUhamAha-asnigdha iti| snehanaH san yaH Codhano nirUhastaM yuJjyAt|

paJcame~atha tRtIye vA divase sAdhake Cubhe||36|| madhyAhne kiJcidAvRtte prayukte balimaGgale||36|| abhyaktasveditotsRSTamalaM nAtibubhukSitam||37|| avekSya puruSaM doSabheSajAdIni cAdarAt||37|| bastiM prakalpayedvaidyastadvidyairbahubhiH saha||38||

sa0-atha-anuvAsanAdanantaraM, paJcame tRtIye vA vAsare madhyAhne kiJcit-manAk, AvRtte-atikrAnte, tathA balimaGgale vihite sati, puruSaM kRtAbhyaktasveditaM tyaktamalaM kiJcidbubhukSitaM tathA prakRtyAdibhirjJAtvA doSAdIni viditvA| AdiCabdena sAtmyabalAdiparigrahaH| ityevaM sarvamavagamya vaidyo bastiM prakalpayet| nanu, "dUSyaM deCaM" (hR. sU. a. 12|67) ityAdinA sarvamuktamevaitat| tatkimanena ? iti| brUmaH| nirUhamapi sApAyaM paCyatetadAcAryeNa punaruktam| dUSyadeCAdimahatA yatnenAlocanIyamiti pratipAdanArtham| "nirUhamAtrA prathame" ityAdi ca sarvamatrAlocyam| kathaM prakalpayet ? ityAha-tadvidyaiH-vaidyakaCACtrajJairbahubhiH saha-sArddham|

A0 ra0- nirUhavidhimAha-paJcama iti| antyAnuvAsanadinAt tRtIye paJcame vA| sAdhake-jyotiHCAstrokte| Cubhe-aCaucAdirahite| avetya-jJAtvA| tadvidaiH-bastikuCalaiH| saGgrhe tu (sU. a. 28) - "AryAvalokitaM nAthamAryAM tAramAtmabhuvaM dhAtAramaCvinAvindramAtreyaM saptarSIn kACyapa videha patiprabhRtInagniveCAdIMCca tantrakArAn dIpagandhapuSpaphalabalidhUpairyajJa iva prakalpitabhAgAn kRtvA, oSadhIrvRddhavaidyAn dviijAtIMCca saMpUjya tadvidyasahito doSauSadhAdibalena yathArhamupakalpayedvastim| " iti|

 kvAthayedviMCatipalaM dravyasyASTau phalAni ca||38|| tataH kvAthAccaturthAMCaM snehaM vAte prakalpayet||39|| pitte svasthe ca SaSThAMCamaSTamAMCaM kaphe~adhike||39|| sarvatra cASTamaM bhAgaM kalkAdbhavati vA yathA||40||  nAtyacchasAndratA basteH palamAtraM guDasya ca||40|| madhupaTvAdiCeSaM ca yuktyA----------------------||41||

sa0-dravyasya-bastikalpoktasya, nirUhakalpanArthaM viMCatipalAni, tathA~aSTau phalAni-madanaphalAni, sAmAnyaparibhASayA SoDaCaguNaM jalaM dattvA kvAthayet| caturbhAgAvaCeSaCca grAhyaH| tataH-tasmAdevaMkRtAt, kvAthAccaturthAMCaM snehaM vAte prakalpayet| dvAdaCaprasRto hi nirUhaH| tatra snehaM SaTpalikaM kalpayedityarthaH| pitte~adhike svasthe ca puruSe SaSThAMCaM snehaM-catuSpalikaM, prakalpayediti prakRtam| kaphe~adhike aSTamAMCaM snehaM-tripalikaM, prakalpayet| nanu, svasthasya doSacAlanaM pratiSiddhaM tantrAntarIyaiH| tadgrantho hi-"yo hi saJcAlayetsuptaM vane siMhaM karAdibhiH| sa doSAMCcAlayet svasthAn pracchardanavirecanaiH||" iti| tasmAt svasthavRtte nirUhakalpanA na yukteti| tadetadasat| yasmAt prAgabhihitam (hR. sU. a. 4|35)- "CItodbhavaM doSacayaM vasante viCodhayan grISmajamabhrakAle| ghanAtyaye vArSikamACu samyak prApnoti rogAnRtujAnna jAtu||" iti| tasmAdAcAryavacanAjjJAyate svasthavRtte~api CuddhividhAnaM sammatamiti tantrakRtaH| tantrAntarIyaM mataM tvasadeva, CiSTavyavahAraviruddhatvAt| sarvatra-vAte pitte kaphe svasthe ca, kalkAt-peSyadravyAt, aSTamaM bhAgaM-trINi palAni, kalpayet| bhavati vetyAdi| yathA vA bastiratyaccho~atisAndro-atighano [ vA ] na bhavati tathA kalkaH kalpayitavyaH| palamAtraM guDasya ceti palAnnAdhikona iti jJApanArthaM mAtragrahaNam| madhupaTvAdiCeSaM ca yuktyA prakalpayet| tatreyaM yuktiH,-mAkSikasya palacatuSTayaM saindhavasya ca karSaH, AdigrahaNAt kvacidyavakSArasya karSaH, tathA mAMsarasasurAsavasuktakSIrakAJjikAnAM grahaNam|

A0 ra0- nirUhadravyANAM mAtrAmAha-kvAthayediti| yatra kvAthyasya viMCatipalAni tatrASTau madanaphalAni ityevaMparametat, na kvAthamAnaparam, prakuJcAdinirUheSvasambhavAt| kvAthAtmakAnnirUhAt dvAdaCaprasRtAccaturthAMCaM-prasRtatrayasammitaM, snehaM kalpayet| tataH kvAthAttAvantaM kvAthamapanIya, lyablope paJcamI| evaM kalkAdaSTamaM-sArdhaprasRtam| guDasya palamAtram| yuktyA madhu prasRtadvayasammitam, paTu-saindhavaM, akSasammitam| adiCabdAnmAMsarasakSIragomUtrakAJjikamadanaphalAni| uktaM hi suCrutena (ci. a. 38/30) - "kSaudraM mUtraM phalaM kSIramamlaM mAMsarasaM tathA| yuktyA pradApayeddhImAn nirUhe kalpanA tviyam||" iti|  tatra caturNAM dravANAM prasRtadvayam, madanaM tvekam, pAriCeSyAtkvAthasya prasRtacatuSTayam, evaM dvAdaCaprasRtatvam| uktaM hi suCrutena (ci. a. 38/37)- " datvA~~Adau saindhavasyAkSaM madhunaH prasRtadvayam| vinirmathya tato dadyAt snehasya prasRtatrayam|| ekIbhUte tataH snehe kalkasya prasRtaM kSipet| sammUrcchite kaSAyaM tu catuSprasRtasammitam|| vitarecca tadAvApamante dviprasRtonmitam| evaM prakalpito bastirdvAdaCaprasRto bhavet||" iti| yatvatra kalkasya prasRtamAnaM tat 'bhavati vA yathA nAtyacchasAndratA basteH' ityabhiprAyeNa| yaccAvApasya prasRtadvayamAnaM tadguDapalakalkatripalayogAt| iti vAte~adhike| pitte tu snehanyUnatA madhudugdhAbhyAM pUraNIyA| kaphe tu madhunaiva| uktaM hi vRndena (a. 76/5)- " madhusnehanakalkAkhyakaSAyAvApataH kramAt| trINi SaT dve daCa trINi palAnyanilarogiNAm|| pitte catvAri catvAri dve dvipaJca catuSTayam|  SaT trINi dve daCa trINi kaphe cApi nirUhaNam||" iti|

 -----------------------------sarvaM tadekataH||41|| uSNAmbukumbhIbASpeNa taptaM khajasamAhatam||41||  prakSipya bastau praNayetpAyau nAtyuSNaCItalam||42|| nAtisnigdhaM na vA rUkSaM nAtitIkSNaM na vA mRdu||42|| nAtyacchasAndraM nonAtimAtraM nApaTu nAti ca||43|| lavaNaM tadvadamlaM ca---------------------------||43||

sa0-tat-etat, sarvamauSadhamekataH-ekasmin kRtvA, bheSajapAkAtikrAntiparihArArthamuSNAmbukumbhIvASpeNa taptaM, khajena-dadhyAhananakASThena, samAhataM-AloDitaM, tathA "brahmadakSa" ityAdinA cAbhimantritaM, bastau prakSipya pAyau-gude, praNayet| nAtyuSNaM, nAtiCItalaM, nAtisnigdhaM, na vA rUkSaM, nAtitIkSNaM, na vA mRdu, nAtyacchaM nAtisAndraM-nAtighanaM, nonamAtraM, na cAtimAtraM, nApaTu-nAlavaNaM, nAtilavaNaM, tadvadamlaM ceti nAnamlaM, nAtyamlam| atiCabdaprayogAdatra madhyamAvasthAnugamaH|

UrdhvajatruvikAreSu viCeSAnnasyamiSyate||1||  nAsA hi Ciraso dvAraM tena tadvyApya hanti tAn||1|| virecanaM bRMhaNaM ca CamanaM ca tridhA~api tat||2||

sa0-jatru-vakSoMsayoH sandhiH| jatruNa UrdhvamUrdhvajatru| mayUravyaMsakAditvAt samAsaH| tatra vikArA UrdhvajatruvikArAH, teSUrdhvajatruvikAreSu-CirorogAdiSu viSaye, vamanaCirAvyadhAdayo~apISyanta eva| viCeSeNa tu nasyamiSyate| nAsAyAM kriyata iti nasyam| nAsikAyAH "paddanna" iti nasAdeCaH| nanu, kimiti nasyameteSu rogeSu viCeSeNeSTam ? ityAha-nAsA hItyAdi| yasmAt ghrANaM CirodvAram| tena dvAreNa CrotraCRGgATakaprAptamUrdhvaM netrakaNThAdiCirAmukhAnupraveCena, tat-Ciro, vyApya tAn-vikArAn hanti|tat-nasyaM, virecanabRMhaNaCamanAkhyabhedena tridhA syAt|

A0 ra0-nasyavidhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte atheti|      tatra nasyaviSayamAha-UrdhvajatruvikAreSviti|  viCeSAditivacanAditareSvapi|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 29) -"nAsayA praNIyamAnamauSadhaM nasyaM nAvanaM nastaH karmeti ca saMjJAM labhate|  nAsA hi Ciraso dvAram|  tatra niSecitamauSadhaM srotaHCRGgATakaM prApya, vyApya ca mUrddhAnaM netraCrotrakaNThAdiCirAmukhAni ca, muJjAdiSIkAmivAsaktAmUrddhvajatrugatAM vaikArikImaCeSAmACu doSasaMhatimuttamAGgAdapakarSati|" iti|[nasyabhedAnAha-virecanamiti|]  virecanaM bRMhaNaM CamanaM ceti trividhaM nasyam|

virecanaM CiraHCUlajADyasyandagalAmaye||2|| CophagaNDakRmigranthikuSThApasmArapInase||3||

yojayenna tu nAvanam||11|| toyamadyagarasnehapItAnAM pAtumicchatAm||11|| bhuktabhaktaCiraHsnAtasnAtukAmasrutAsRjAm||12|| navapInasavegArtasUtikACvAsakAsinAm||12|| CuddhAnAM dattabastInAM tathA~anArtavadurdine||13|| anyatrAtyayikAdvyAdheH-------------------||13||

sa0-toyAdi pItaM yaisteSAm| atra "AhitAgnyAditvAt" paranipAtaH| tathA pAtumicchatAM nAvanaM-nasyaM, naiva yojayet| toyAdipItAnAM pAtumicchatAM ca yojitaM nasyaM nAsAsyasyandopadehatimiraCirorogAn kuryAt| bhuktabhaktasya ca doSA UrdhvasrotAMsyAvRtya chardiCvAsakAsapratiCyAyAn janayeyuH| Cirobhyaktasya ca CirokSikarNaCUlakaNTharogapInasahanumanyAstambhArditaCiraHkampAn| CiraHsnAtasya snAtukAmasya ca mUrdhni stimito doSo jADyArucipInasAn| srutaraktasya ca kSAmatAmarucimagnisAdaM ca| navapratiCyAyasya srotorodhAt duSTapratiCyAyakeCaCAtakRmikaNDUvicarcikArogAn| mUtritoccAritAdivegArtAnAM bhRCataraM vegavidhAraNajAn vikArAn| sUtikAyAH srutaraktadoSAn| CvAsakAsinorvyAdhivivRddhim| CuddhAnAM kRtavamanavirecanAdInAM CvAsakAsasvarendriyahAniCirogauravakaNDUkRmidoSAn| dattabastInAM vivRtasrotastayA~ativyAptyA CvAsakAsAdIneva| tathA, anArtavadurdine sahasaiva CaityAcchirorugvepathustaimityatAlunetrakaNDUpAkamanyAstambhakaNTharoga pratiCyAyArUMSikAH| eSu ca nasyadoSeSu jAteSu yathAsvamAyatanaM doSodrekaM cApekSya snehasvedaCirovirekavaktralepasekatIkSNAvapIDadhUmagaNDUSAdIni yathAsvaM kuryAt| saGgrahe viCeSaH (sU. a. 29)- "garbhiNyACca bhaktadveSajvaramUrcchArddhAvabhedakAH syuH| apatyaM ca vyaGgaM vikalendriyamunmAdApasmArayuktaM vA syAt| viCeSeNa tu garbhiNI rUkSe nasyakarmaNi varSAbhUkAkolIkapikacchUbhiH CRtaM payaH pibet| balAvidAryaMCumatImedAbhirvA| ebhireva ca CRtaM haviH| vAtaharasiddhaCca snehaH Cirobastau karNapUraNe ca yojyaH| sarvaM ca bRMhaNamannapAnam|" iti| toyapItAdiSu sadaiva kiM nasyaM na yojyam ? ityAha-anyatretyAdi| Atyayike vyAdhau nasyaM yojyameva|

A0 ra0-pItatoyAdInAM nasyaM niSedhati-yojayediti|  pAtumicchatAM-toyAdInyeva|  bhuktabhakto-bhuktavAn|  navapInasaH-apakvapInasaH|  vegArtaH-utpannaviNmUtrAdivegaH|  anArtavadurdine-avArSikAbhre|  AtyayikAdvyAdheranyatra niSedhaH|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 29) -"tatra bhuktabhaktasya nasyenerito doSa UrdhvasrotAMsyAvRtya chardiCvAsakAsapratiCyAyAn janayet|  snehAdipItapAtukAmAnAmakSinAsAsyasyandopadehatimiraCirorogAn|  CiraHsnAtasya CirokSikarNaCUlakaNTharogapInasahanumanyAstambhArditaCiraHkampAn|  snAtukAmasya mUrddhastaimityajADyArucipInasAn|  srutaraktasya kSAmatAmarucimagnisAdaM ca|  mUtritoccAritAdivegArtAnAM bhRCataraM vegavidhAraNajAn vikArAN|  abhihatasya tIvratarAM rujam|  kRtavamanAdInAM CvAsakAsasvarendriyahAniCirorogagauravakaNDUkRmidoSAn|  [ dattabastInAM vivRtasrotastayA~ativyAptyA CvAsa kAsAdIneva| ] garbhiNyA bhaktadveSajvaramUrcchArdhAvabhedakAH syuH, apatyaM ca vyaGgaM vikalendriyamunmAdApasmArayuktaM vA|  sUtiyAyAH srutaraktoktAN doSAn|  navapratiCyAyasya srotorodhAt duSTapratiCyAyakeCaCAtakRmikaNDUvicarcikAH|  CvAsakAsinorvAtavyAdhivRddhiH|  akAladurdine sahasaiva CaityAcchirorugvepathustaimityatAlunetrakaNDUpAkamanyAstambhakaNTharogapratiCyAyArUMSikAH|  teSu yathAsvamAyatanaM doSodrekaM cApekSya snehasvedaCirovaktralepasekatIkSNAvapIDadhUmagaNDUSAdInAcaret|  viCeSeNa tu garbhiNI rUkSe nasyakarmaNi varSAbhUkAkolIkapikacchUbhiH CRtaM payaH pibet|  balAvidAryaMCumatImedAbhirvA|  Abhireva ca CRtaM haviH|  vAtaharasiddhaCca snehaH Cirobastau karNapUraNe ca yojyaH|  sarvaM ca bRMhaNamannapAnam|  bhuktabhaktAdiSvapi cAtyayikavyAdhyAturamapekSeta|" iti|

sa0-pUrvaM snigdhaM paCcAt svinnamuttamAGgaM-Ciro, yasya tasya| tathA, prAk-pUrvaM, kRtamAvaCyakaM-avaCyakaraNIyamuccAramUtrotsargadantadhAvanAdikaM, yena sa prAkkRtAvaCyakaH, tasya| tathA, nivAtasthAne CayanaM yattatra sthitasya sataH, bhUyo jatrUrdhvaM svedayet| athetyAdi| atha-anantaram, uttAnaspaSTasthitaCarIrasya sato hastacaraNe prasArite, tathA kiJcidunnatacaraNasya kiJcicchirasi nAmite sati, nAsApuTamekaM pidhAya-sthagayitvA, paryAyeNa-na tu yugapat, bhaiSajyaM niSecayet| kIdRCam ? uSNAmbutaptaM,- uSNodakoSNIkRtam| kena pariSecayet ? praNADyA, athavA picunA-kArpAsAdimayena| datte nasye sati pAdatalaskandhahastakarNAdi mardayet| AdiCabdena grIvAlalATAdiparigrahaH| suCrute cAbhyadhAyi (ci. a. 40|25)- "vastrAvacchAditanetrAya vAmahastapradeCinyagronnAmitanAsikAgrAya viCuddhasrotasi dakSiNahastena snehamuSNAmbuprataptaM rajatasuvarNatAmramaNimRtpAtraCuktInAmanyatamasthamanavacchinnadhAramAsiJcet|" iti| CanairityAdi| tato-mardanAnantaraM, Canairucchidya pArCvayorubhayorniSThIvet| (saGgrahe tu sU. a. 29)- "anabhyavaharan| kaphasahitamabhyavahRtamagnimavasAdayeddoSaM ca saMvarddhayet| ekapArCvaniSThIvane na sarvAH CirA bheSajena samyagvyApyante| punaHpunaCcainaM svedayet|" evaM-anena krameNa, AbheSajakSayAt kuryAt| (prAyaH saGgrahokto~ayamagrimo granthaH-) na tu nasyamAtrA sakRdeva prakSeptavyA| hInamAtraM cauSadhaM na deyam| taddhi doSAnutkleCyAnirharan gauravArucikAsaprasekapInasacchardikaNTharogAn kuryAt| adhikamatiyogadoSAn kuryAt| sakRdeva sarvaM dattamucchindyamAnaM CirorogapratiCyAyaghrANakledAnucchvAsoparodhaM ca kuryAt| atyuSNaM dAhapAkajvararaktAgama [ CirorugdRSTidaurbalya ] mUrchAbhramAn| atiCItaM hInadoSAneva| atyunnataCirasaH samyagapratipadyamAnaM tAneva hInadoSAn| atyavanataCiraso dUragamanAnmUrcchAjADya [ kaNDUdAha ] jvarAn| saGkucitagAtrasya samyagdhamanIraprApnuvaddoSotkleCaM [ vedanAM stambhaM vA ] kuryAt|

A0 ra0-nasyavidhimAha-snigdhasvinneti|  AvaCyakaM-dantadhAvanAdi|  paryAyeNa-na yugapannAsApuTadvaye|  praNADyA-praNAlikayA|  ucchidya-nAsayA CvAsamUrdhvaM nItvA, ubhayoH pArCvayorniSThIvet yAvadbheSajakSayaH|    nasye puTasaGkhyAmAha-evamiti|

sa0-raktapittArtyAdiSu dhUmo nAvachAraNIyaH| nanu, vAte vAtakaphe kaphe ca dhUmasyAnujJAtatvAt pittArtau prAptireva nAsti| tatkiM pratiSedhena? brUmaH| vAtaprakRtervAtapittArtau satyAM kaCcidbhiSakpACo bhrAntyA prakRtyanurUpopakramacikIrSayA dhUmaM yojayet, tanniSedhArthamidamuktam| athavA vAtaCleSmaprakRteH pittArtau pittaprakRtervA vAtaCleSmArtau dhUmo na yojya iti pratipAdanArthamidaM gaditam| aCiCabdo matsyAdiSu viSAnteSu pratyekaM yojyaH| atra ca yathAsambhavaM pAnaM madyAdeH, bhojanaM ca matsyAdeH aCanaCabdenocyate| caturvidhe~apyAhAre aCanaCabdenAstyeva vyavahAraH| yathA (hR.sU.a. 8|1)-"mAtrACI sarvakAlaM syAt" iti kecicca yavAgUpAyinyapi dhUmapAnaM necchanti|

kSutajRmbhitaviNmUtrastrIsevACastrakarmaNAm||5|| hAsasya dantakASThasya dhUmamante pibenmRdum||6|| kAleSveSu niCAhAranAvanAnte ca madhyamam||6|| nidrAnasyAJjanasnAnaccharditAnte virecanam||7||

sa0-kSutAdInAmaSTAnAmante mRduM-snehanAkhyaM, dhUmaM pibet| eSu-kSutAdiSu kAleSu, niCAhAranAvanAnteSu ca madhyamaM dhUmaM pibet| madhya eva madhyamaH, "madhyAnmaH" iti mapratyayaH| virechanAkhyaM dhUmaM nidrAdInAmante pibet| nAvananasyaCabdayorekArthayorihopAdAnAnnasyakrameNa dhUmaM pibediti granthakRtA pratipAditam| tena snigdhanasyAnte snigdhaM-mRdvaparaparyAyaM, dhUmaM pibet| AcAryopadeCAcca kSutAdyanteSu ca snigdhaM dhUmaM pibet| madhyanasyAnte madhyamaM dhUmaM pibet| kAleSviti vacanAcca kSutAntAdiSu ca madhyamaM dhUmaM pibet| evaM tIkSNanasyAnte virecanaM dhUmaM pibet| iti triSu sambandhaH| tIkSNaCabdo~atra virecanaparyAyaH|

kSutajRmbhitaviNmUtrastrIsevACastrakarmaNAm||5|| hAsasya dantakASThasya dhUmamante pibenmRdum||6|| kAleSveSu niCAhAranAvanAnte ca madhyamam||6|| nidrAnasyAJjanasnAnaccharditAnte virecanam||7||

sa0-kSutAdInAmaSTAnAmante mRduM-snehanAkhyaM, dhUmaM pibet| eSu-kSutAdiSu kAleSu, niCAhAranAvanAnteSu ca madhyamaM dhUmaM pibet| madhya eva madhyamaH, "madhyAnmaH" iti mapratyayaH| virechanAkhyaM dhUmaM nidrAdInAmante pibet| nAvananasyaCabdayorekArthayorihopAdAnAnnasyakrameNa dhUmaM pibediti granthakRtA pratipAditam| tena snigdhanasyAnte snigdhaM-mRdvaparaparyAyaM, dhUmaM pibet| AcAryopadeCAcca kSutAdyanteSu ca snigdhaM dhUmaM pibet| madhyanasyAnte madhyamaM dhUmaM pibet| kAleSviti vacanAcca kSutAntAdiSu ca madhyamaM dhUmaM pibet| evaM tIkSNanasyAnte virecanaM dhUmaM pibet| iti triSu sambandhaH| tIkSNaCabdo~atra virecanaparyAyaH|

SaDviMCatiH sukarmArairghaTitAni yathAvidhi||1|| CastrANi romavAhIni bAhulyenAGgulAni SaT||1|| surUpANi sudhArANi sugrahANi ca kArayet||2||  akarAlAni sudhmAtasutIkSNAvartite~ayasi||2||  samAhitamukhAgrANi nIlambhojacchavIni ca||3|| nAmAnugatarUpANi sadA sannihitAni ca||3|| svonmAnArdhacaturthAMCaphalAnyekaikaCo~api ca||4||  prAyo dvitrANi, yuJjIta tAni sthAnaviCeSataH||4|| (maNDalAgraM vRddhipatramutpalAdhyarddhadhArake |1| arpaiSaNyau vetasAkhyaM CarAryAsyatrikUrcake||1| kuCAsyaM sATavadanamantarvaktrArdhacandrake (kam)||2||  vrIhimukhaM kuThArI ca CalAkAGguliCastrake||2|  baDiCaM karapatrAkhyaM kartarI nakhaCastrakam||3||  dantalekhanakaM sUcyaH kUrco nAma khajAhvayam||3||  ArA caturvidhAkArA tathA syAtkarNavedhanI(nam)||3.5|| ||4||

sa0-bAhulyena CastrANi SaDaGgulAni bhavanti|  tathA SaDviMCatisaGkhyAni, tathA sukarmAraiH-karmakuCalairnaraiH, yathAvidhi { ghaTitAni }-samyaGniSpAditAni, tathA romavAhIni-lomaCAtanasamarthAni, tathA surUpANi-CobhanAkArANi, tathA sudhArANi-CobhanadhArANi, tathA sukhena gRhyante-sugrahANi ca, kArayet| kva ? ayasi| kIdRCe ? suSThu dhmAtaM sudhmAtaM, tathA sutIkSNaM svAvartitaM ca yadayaH-CastraM, tasmin| kIdRCAni CastrANi ? akarAlAni-sudarCanAni| tathA, samAhitaM-suSThukRtaM, mukhAgraM-phalaM, yeSAM tAni samAhitamukhAgrANi| tathA, nIlotpaladyutIni| tathA, nAmnA~anugataM rUpaM yeSAM tAni-anvarthanAmAnItyarthaH| tathA, sarvakAlaM sannihitAni-samIpasthAni| tathA, svaM ca tadunmAnaM ca svonmAnaM-AtmIyaM pramANaM, tasmAtsakACAdardham, tasya caturthAMCaH-aSTabhAgaH, phalaM yeSAM tAnyevam| api ceti samuccaye| evaMvidhAni CastrANyekaikaCaH sthAnaviCeSAt dvitrANi prayuJjIta| ekaikaCa iti "ekaM bahuvrIhivat " iti dvitvasublopau, tataH CaspratyayaH|

A0 ra0-CastrANAM sAmAnyalakSaNamAha-SaDviMCatiriti|  sukarmAraiH-uttamalohakAraiH|  romavAhIni-romacchedIni|  akarAlAni-Arjavavanti|  ayasi-lohe ghaTitAni, tRtIyArthe saptamI|  samAhitaM-samyagghaTitaM, mukhAgraM-phalaM, yeSAM tAni|  svonmAnasya-aGgulaSaTkasya, ardhacaturthAMCaH-adhyuSTo bhAgaH,- saptamAMCadvayasahitaM yavadaCakam, tatparimANaM phalaM yeSAM tAni|  ekaikaCo dvitrANi-pratyekaM dve trINi vA, kArayet|         SaDviMCaterupayogamAha-yuJjIteti|

maNDalAgraM phale teSAM tarjanyantarnakhAkRti||5||   lekhane chedane yojyaM pothakICuNDikAdiSu||5||

sa0-teSAM CastrANAM madhye maNDalAgraM nAma Castram| kIdRk ? phaloddeCe tarjanyA antarnakhastarjanyantarnakhaH tasyevAkRtiryasya tadevam| kvaitadyojyam ? ityAha-lekhane chedane ca pothakyAdiSu yojyam| AdiCabdena vartmarogAdayo gRhyante|

A0 ra0-maNDalAgraM CastramAha-maNDalAgramiti|  CuNDikA-galaCuNDikA|

vRddhipatraM kSurAkAraM chedabhedanapATane||6|| Rjvagramunnate Cophe gambhIre ca tadanyathA||6|| natAgraM pRSThato dIrghahrasvavaktraM yathACrayam||7||

sa0-vRddhipatraM nAma CastraM kSurAkAraM syAt| tacca chedanAdiSu yojyamiti prakRtam| phalaparimANaM tUktameva| kIdRk ? Rju-spaSTamagraM yasya tadRjvagram, tadunnate Cophe syAt| gambhIre tu Cophe tat-vRddhipatramanyathA| kathamanyathA ? ityAha-natetyAdi| pRSThataH-pRSThadeCe, natamagraM yasya tannatAgraM bhavatIti|

A0 ra0-vRddhipatramAha-vRddhipatramiti|  unnate gambhIre ca Cophe Rjvagram|  anyathAbhUte Cophe pRSThato natAgram|  sthAnavaCena dIrghamukhaM hrasvamukhaM ca|

utpalAdhyardhadhArAkhye bhedane chedane tathA||7||

sa0-{ yathAyathaM-yathAsvaM, dIrghavaktraM hrasvavaktraM ca yuJjyAt| }  utpalaM cAdhyardhadhAraM ca, te Akhye yayosta utpalAdhyardhadhArAkhye Castre yathAkramaM dIrghahrasvavaktre bhavathaH|  utpalapatraM dIrghamukhamadhyardhadhAraM tu hrasvavaktramityarthaH| te bhedane chedane ca yojye| tatheti samuccaye, pATane ca yojya ityarthaH|

A0 ra0-utpalapatramadhyarddhadhAraM ceti CastradvayamAha-utpaleti|  ete svanAmAnugatarUpe|

sarpAsyaM ghrANakarNArCaCcchedane~ardhAGgulaM phale||8||

sa0-sarpavaktraM nAma CastraM nAmAnugatAkAraM ghrANArCaCcchedane karNArCaCchedane ca yojyam| tacca phale~ardhAGgulaM bhavati|

A0 ra0-sarpavaktramAha-sarpAsyamiti|

gateranveSaNe ClakSNA gaNDUpadamukhaiSaNI||8|| bhedanArthe~aparA sUcImukhA mUlaniviSTakhA||9||

sa0-eSaNI nAma Castram gatervraNAnAmanveSaNe yojyam| kIdRCI ? ClakSNA-komalasparCA| tathA, gaNDUpadamukhamiva mukhaM yasyAH sA gaNDUpadamukhA|      dvitIyAmeSaNImAha- aparaiSaNI bhedanArthe sUcImukhA syAt|  tathA, mUle niviSTaM-kRtaM, khaM-chidraM, yasyAH sA mUlaniviSTakhA|

A0 ra0-anveSaNArthameSaNImAha-gateriti|  gateH-nADIvraNasya|    bhedanArthameSaNImAha-bhedanArtha iti|  bhedanatvaM kSArAktasUtrapraveCanena|

vetasaM vyadhane-----------------------------------||9||

sa0- vetasaM- vetasapatrAkAraM Castram, SaDaGgulaM pUrvoktaphalam| tacca vyadhane yojyam|

A0 ra0-vetasaCastramAha-vetasamiti|

---------------------------srAvye CarAryAsyatrikUrcake||9||

sa0-CarAriH-AThyAkhyaH pakSiviCeSaH| CarAryAsyaM nAma CastraM trikUrcake ca srAvye yojyam|

A0 ra0-CarArimukhaM trikUrcakaM ceti CastradvayamAha- srAvya iti|  srAvye-pracchAnena raktasrutau|  bhAve kRtyapratyayaH|  CarAriH-pakSiviCeSaH|

 kuCATAvadane srAvye dvyaGgulaM syAttayoH phalam||10||

sa0-kuCATA nAma CastraM vadane srAvye yojyam| tayoH-CarArikuCATayoH, phalaM dvyaGgulapramANaM syAt|

A0 ra0-kuCapatramATAmukhaM ceti CastradvayamAha-kuCATeti|  ATA-pakSiviCeSaH|

tadvadantarmukhaM tasya phalamadhyardhamaGgulam||10|| ardhacandrAnanaM caitat---------------------------||11||

sa0-antarmukhaM nAma CastraM tadvat-kuCATAtulyam| tasya-antarmukhasya, phalaM sArdhamaGgulaM syAt| tathA-kuCATAtulyametadapi, ardhacandrAsyasaMjJaM Castram| caH samuccaye bhinnakrame|

A0 ra0-antarmukhamAha-tadvaditi|  tadvat-srAvye|

 ----------------------tathA~adhyardhAGgulaM phale||11||  vrIhivaktraM prayojyaM ca tacchirodarayorvyadhe||11||

sa0-vrIhivaktramapyadhyardhAGgulaM phale syAt| tacca CirAvyadha udaravyadhe ca yojyam|

A0 ra0-vrIhimukhamAha-tatheti|

pRthuH kuThArI godantasadRCArdhAGgulAnanA||12|| tayordhvadaNDayA vidhyeduparyasthnAM sthitAM CirAm||12||

sa0-kuThArI nAma CastraM pRthuH-vistIrNasaMsthAnadaNDA| tathA, godantasadRCamardhAGgulamAnanaM yasyAH saivam| tayA-kuThArikayA, UrdhvadaNDayA satyA CirAmasthnAmupari sthitAM vidhyet|

A0 ra0-kuThArImAha-pRthuriti|       kuThAryAH kAryamAha-tayeti|

tAmrI CalAkA dvimukhI mukhe kurubakAkRtiH||13||  liGganACaM tayA vidhyet------------------||13||

sa0-tAmramayI CalAkA dvimukhI syAt|  sA ca mukhe kurubakAkRtiH-raktasahacarapuSpamukulAkArA syAt| tayA CalAkayA, liGganACaM-kaphotthapaTalasaMjJaM, vidhyet|

A0 ra0-CalAkAmAha-tAmrIti|  kurubakaM-kuraNTakamukulam|

--------------------kuryAdaGguliCastrakam||13|| mudrikAnirgatamukhaM phale tvardhAGgulAyatam||14|| yogato vRddhipatreNa maNDalAgreNa vA samam||14|| tatpradeCinyagraparvapramANArpaNamudrikam||15||  sUtrabaddhaM galasrotorogacchedanabhedane||15||

sa0-aGguliCastrakaM kuryAt| kIdRCam ? mudrikayA-UrmikayA, nirgataM-niSkrAntaM, mukhaM yasya tanmudrikAnirgatamukham| phale tu-tasminmukhe, ardhAGguladIrgham| yogataH-saMsthAnena, vRddhipatreNa maNDalAgreNa vA tulyam| kiyatpramANA~asya mudrikA kAryA ? ityAha-tatpradeCinyagretyAdi| tasya-vaidyasya, yA pradeCinI tasyA yadagraparva tasya yatpramANaM tenArpyata iti tatpradeCinyagraparvapramANArpaNI-bhiSaktarjanyagraparvapraveCAgracchidrA, mudrikA yasmin tat tatpradeCinyagraparvapramANArpaNamudrikam| tathA, sUtreNa baddhaM-sUtrabaddham, sUtreNa baddhvA maNibandhe yojyamityarthaH| galasrotorogANAM chedane bhedane ca tadyojyam|

A0 ra0-aGguliCastrakamAha-kuryAditi|  mudrikAnirgatamukhaM-kaNThasthamudrikam|  yogataH-sthAnarogayogyatAnusAreNa vikalpya|

grahaNe CuNDikArmAderbaDiCaM sunatAnanam||16||

sa0-baDiCaM nAma CastraM CuNDikArmAdergrahaNe yojyam|  AdiCabdena pratijihvikAdergrahaNam| kIdRCaM tat ? sunataM-aGkuCavadAnataM, AnanaM-mukhaM, yasya tadevam|

A0 ra0-baDiCamAha-grahaNa iti|

chede~asthnAM karapatraM tu kharadhAraM daCAGgulam||16|| vistAre dvyaGgulaM sUkSmadantaM sutsarubandhanam||17||

sa0-karapatraM nAma CastraM kharadhAraM, tathA daCAGgulaM dairghyeNa, dvyaGgulaM vistAreNa, sUkSmA dantA yasya tatsUkSmadantam| tathA, tsaruH-muSTiH, bandhanaM-grahaNam, Cobhane tsarubandhane yasya tat sutsarubandhanam| abhidhAnakoCe yadyapi 'tsaruH-asimuSTiH' ityabhyadhAyi, tathA~api muSTimAtrasyehopalakSaNArthatvAt muSTAvapyupapannameva|

A0 ra0-karapatramAha-chede~asthnAmiti|  suSThu tsarubandhanaM grahaNArthaM yasya|

snAyusUtrakacacchede kartarI kartarInibhA||17||

sa0-kartarI nAma CastraM kartarIsadRCaM snAyvAdicchede yojyam|

A0 ra0- kartarImAha-snAyusUtrakacaccheda iti|

vakrarjudhAraM dvimukhaM nakhaCastraM navAGgulam||18|| sUkSmaCalyoddhRticchedabhedapracchAnalekhane||18||

sa0-nakhaCastraM-nakhacchedakaM, prasiddham| tacca vaktrA RjuCca dhArA yasya tadevam| tasyaikaM mukhaM vaktramanyadRju-spaSTam| tathA, navAGgulaM-navAGgulapramANam, na tu SaDaGgulam| etacca sUkSmaCalyasya-kaNTakAderuddharaNAdau nakhacchedane bhedane { pracchAne lekhane } ca yojyam|        

A0 ra0-nakhaCastramAha-vakrarjudhAramiti|  navAGgulaM na tu SaDaGgulam|  nakhacchedanakaM-prasiddham|  vakrarjudhAraM ekasminmukhe vakrA dhArA, anyasmin RjuH|

ekadhAraM catuSkoNaM prabaddhAkRti caikataH||19|| dantalekhanakaM tena CodhayeddantaCarkarAm||19||

sa0-ekadhAraM-ekasmin pradeCe { dhArA yasya tadevam| }  tathA, catuSkoNam| tathA, ekataH-ekasmindeCe prabaddhA AkRtiryasya tat| taddantalekhanakaM nAma Castram| tena dantaCarkarAM Codhayet|

A0 ra0-dantalekhanamAha-ekadhAramiti|  prabaddhavat-veSTitavat, AkRtiryasya tat prabaddhAkRti|

sUtrasthAnam

CastravidhiH adhyAyaH

vRttA gUDhadRDhAH pACe tisraH sUcyo~atra sIvane||20|| mAMsalAnAM pradeCAnAM tryasrA tryaGgulamAyatA||20|| alpamAMsAsthisandhisthavraNAnAM dvyaGgulAyatA||21|| vrIhivaktrA dhanurvaktrA pakvAmACayamarmasu||21|| sA sArdhadvyaGgulA-------------------------||22||

sa0-atra-eSu CastreSu madhye, sIvane-sIvanaviSaye, tisraH sUcyaH syuH| kimbhUtAH ? vRttAH-vartulAH, pACe gUDhAstathA dRDhAH sAratvAt|        AsAM ca pratyekaM saMsthAnaviCeSeNa viCeSopayogamAha-  mAMsalAnAM-bahumAMsAnAM, CarIradeCAnAM tryasrA mukhe sUcI syAt| saGgrahe~apyavocat (sU.a.34)-"tryasrAgrA" iti| tryasreti cintyam| tathA, tryaGgulamAyatA-tryaGguladIrghA|   vRttatvaM dRDhapACatvaM coktameva sAmAnyalakSaNena|     alpamAMsAnAM vraNAnAM sandhyasthisaMCritAnAM ca dvyaGgulamAyatA-dIrghA| vRttamukhatvaM cAsyAH sAmAnyenoktam|     vrIhimukhA, cApavat kuTilA, dairghyeNa dve~aGgule sArdhe syAt| sA ca pakvACaya AmACaye marmasu ca vraNAnAM sIvane yojyA|        

A0 ra0-sUcItrayamAha-vRttA iti|  pACe-chidrasthAne, gUDhA dRDhACca|  tatra tryaGgulAM sUcImAha-mAMsalAnAmiti|   dvyaGgulAM sUcImAha-alpamAMseti|   sArddhadvyaGgulAM sUcImAha-vrIhivaktreti|

sarvavRttAstACcaturaGgulAH||22|| kUrco vRttaikapIThasthAH saptASTau vA subandhanAH||22|| sa yojyo nIlikAvyaGgakeCaCAteSu kuTTane||23||

sa0-lohitaM madhuraguNaM(rasaM) , tathA, ISallavaNaM, kiJcicchabda ISadarthe, tathA~aCItoSNaM-naJISadarthe, ISacchItamISaduSNaM, tathA~asaMhataM-dravaM, CuddhaM syAt| samprati varNataH CuddhalohitalakSaNamAha-padmetyAdi| indragopaH-mRganakSatrotpannaH kITakaviCeSaH| hema-kanakam| aviH-meSaH| aviCaCayorlohitaCabdena raktavAcinA sambandhaH| padmAdInAM dvandvaH|  padmendragopahemAviCaCalohitamiva lohitaM-raktavarNaM, yadraktaM tacchuddhaM syAt| tacca tanoH-CarIrasya, prabhavaH-utpattihetuH| tenaivaraktena, tanoH sthitiH-prabandhAvicchedalakSaNA| anekadRSTAntopAdAnaM ca CuddharaktasyAnekavarNadarCanAt|

 vakrarjutiryagUrdhvAdhaH CalyAnAM paJcadhA gatiH||1||  dhyAmaM CopharujAvantaM sravantaM CoNitaM muhuH||1||  abhyudgataM budbudavatpiTikopacitaM vraNam||2||  mRdumAMsaM ca jAnIyAdantaHCalyaM samAsataH||2||

sa0-vakrAdibhedabhinnA CalyAnAM paJcaprakArA gatiH-gamanam| kadAcicchalyAni vakraM kRtvA, tiryagvA UrdhvaM vA, adho vA, gacchantiH kadAcidRju kRtvA| evamubhayathA tiryagUrdhvAdhobhedagamanAcchalyAnAM paJcadhA gatiH|evaMvidhaM vraNamantaHCalyaM jAnIyAt| samAsataH - saGkSepeNa| dhyAmaM-CyAmavarNam| tathA, CopharujAvantam| tathA, muhuH CoNitaM sravantam| tathA, abhyudgataM-Abhimukhyenocchritamunnatam| tathA, budbudena tulyaM vartate budbudavat| tathA, piTakairupacitaM-vyAptam|  tathA, mRdumAMsaM-komalamAMsam|

A0 ra0-CalyAharaNavidhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-atheti|         CalyagatibhedAnAha-vakrarjviti|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a.37)-"trividhA gatiH CalyAnAmUrdhvamadhastiryak ca|  sA punaH pratyekamRjuvakrabhedena dvividhA|" iti| antaHCalyasya lakSaNamAha-dhyAmamiti|

 viCeSAttvaggate Calye vivarNaH kaThinAyataH||3||  Copho bhavati-----------------------------------||3||

sa0-viCeSeNa punastvaggate Calye Copho vivarNastathA kaThino dIrghaCca syAt|

A0 ra0-tvaggataCalyasya lakSaNamAha-viCeSAditi|  viCeSAditi vacanAt sAmAnyalakSaNamapyatra jJeyam|

 -------------mAMsasthe coSaH Copho vivarddhate||3||  pIDanAkSamatA pAkaH CalyamArgo na rohati||4||

sa0-mAMsagate Calye coSaH syAt| 'sarvAGgINastIvro~aratimAn dAhaCcoSa ucyate' ityAhuH| tathA Copho vivarddhate| tathA, pIDanasyAkSamatvaM pAkaCca, CalyamArgaCca rohaM na yAti|

A0 ra0-mAMsagatasya lakSaNamAha-mAMsastha iti|  coSaH-AcUSaNeneva vyathA|

peCyantaragate mAMsaprAptavacchvayathuM vinA||4||

sa0-peCImadhyagate mAMsagatena tulyaM lakSaNam, CothaM varjayitvA| mAMsAvayavaviCeSo dIrghatantvAkRtiH peCItyucyate|

A0 ra0-peCIgatasya lakSaNamAha-peCyantaragata iti|

 AkSepaH snAyujAlasya saMrambhastambhavedanAH||5||  snAyuge durharaM caitat----------------------||5||

sa0-snAyuge Calye snAyujAlasyAkSepAdyAH syuH| AkSepaH-AkarSaNam| saMrambhaH-kSobhaH| stambhaH-stabdhatA|  vedanA - CUlam|  etacca-snAyugaM CalyaM, duHkhena hartuM Cakyate|

A0 ra0-snAyugatasya lakSaNamAha-AkSepa iti|  etat-snAyugatamanyebhyo durharaM ca|

 -----------------------------sirAdhmAnaM sirACrite||5||

sa0-sirACrite Calye sirANAmAnAhaH syAt|

A0 ra0-CirAgatasya lakSaNamAha-CirAdhmAnamiti|  CirAdhmAnaM-CirANAM vAyurpUrNatvam|

 svakarmaguNahAniH syAtsrotasAM srotasi sthite||6||

sa0-srotogate Calye srotasAM svakarmaguNayorhAniH syAt| yathA,-kaNThasrotaHsthite Calye pAnAbhyavaharaNasya nirodho jAyate guNo~api yastasyApraduSTatvAdilakSaNaH so~apyasya hIyata iti| evamanyeSAM svakarmaguNahAnirvyAkhyeyA|

A0 ra0-srotogatasya lakSaNamAha-svakarmaguNahAniriti|  svakarma-prANAdInAM yathAvadvahanam|  svaguNo-mArdavAdiH|

 dhamanIsthe~anilo raktaM phenayuktamudIrayet||6||  niryAti CabdavAn syAcca hRllAsaH sAGgavedanaH||7||

sa0-dhamanIsthe Calye vAyurlohitaM saphenaM prerayet|  tathA saCabdo marunniryAti, hRllAsaCcAGgapIDAyuktaH syAt|

A0 ra0-dhamanIgatasya lakSaNamAha-dhamanIstha iti|

 saGgharSo balavAnasthisandhiprApte~asthipUrNatA||7||

sa0-asthisandhiprApte Calye balavAn saGgharSaH-kSobhaH, syAt| tathA, asthipUrNatA ca jAyate|

A0 ra0-asthisandhigatasya lakSaNamAha-saGgharSa iti|  balavAn saGgharSaH-duHsahasaGghaTTanam|

sUtrasthAnam

CalyAharaNavidhiH adhyAyaH

naikarUpA rujo~asthisthe CophaH-----------------------||8||

sa0-asthisthe Calye, anekAkArAH (naikarUpAH)-nAnAvidhAH, rujo- bhagnarugNamRditapIDitAvanunnaprAyAH syuH, CophaCca|

A0 ra0-asthigatasya lakSaNamAha-naikarUpA iti|

 -------------------------------tadvacca sandhige||8|| caiSTAnivRttiCca bhavet-----------------------||8||

sa0-sandhigate Calye tadvadeva-asthisthaCalyena tulyaM lakSaNam| tathA, sandhisthaCalyAkrAntAvayavasya ceSTAnivRttiH-vyApAroparamaCca bhavati| pUrvamasthisandhigatasya Calyasya lakSaNamuktam| adhunA CarIrasandhigataCalyasya lakSaNam| anyo hi CarIrasandhiH| tathA ca rAjayakSmanidAne vakSyati (hR. ni. a. 5|5)-"CarIrasandhInAviCya" iti|

A0 ra0-sandhigatasya lakSaNamAha-tadvaditi|

 -------------------------ATopaH koSThasaMCrite||8||  AnAho~annaCakRnmUtradarCanaM ca vraNAnane||9||

sa0--koSThasaMCrite-udarACrite Calye, ATopaH-kSobhaH tathA~~AnAho-jaTharAdhmAnam, tathA vraNamukhe~annaCakRnmUtradarCanaM ca syAt|

A0 ra0-koSThagatasya lakSaNamAha-ATopa iti|

 vidyAnmarmagataM CalyaM marmaviddhopalakSaNaiH||9||

sa0-marmasthaM CalyaM marmaviddhopalakSaNairvidyAt-jAnIyAt|  marmaviddhasya ca lakSaNaM  saGgrahe kathitam| yathA (CA. a. 7) "dehaprasuptirgurutA sammohaH CItakAmitA| svedo mUrcchA vamiH CvAso marmaviddhasya lakSaNam||" iti|

A0 ra0-marmagatasya lakSaNamAha-vidyAditi|  upalakSaNaM lakSaNam|  tacca "viddhe~ajasramasRksrAvo" ityAdinA CArIrake (hR.CA. a. 4/47) vakSyate|

yathAsvaM ca parisrAvaistvagAdiSu vibhAvayet||10||

sa0-na kevalaM sAmAnyalakSaNena-dhyAmAdinA, tathA tvagAdisthaCalyaviCeSalakSaNena, tvagAdisthaM CalyaM lakSayet| yAvat yathAsvaM parisrAvaistathA~anurUpairvibhAvayet|

A0 ra0-tvaggatAdInAM srAvato lakSaNamAha-yathAsvamiti|  yathAsvamiti yatra yadACritaM dravaM tatra tatsravati|  yathA,- tvaggate lasIkA, CirAdigate raktam, asthigate majjA ityAdi|

 ruhyate CuddhadehAnAmanulomasthitaM tu tat||10||

sa0-tat-prAGnirdiSTaM CalyaM, ruhyate-rohaM yAti| kimbhUtAnAM puMsAm ? vamanavirecanAdibhiH CuddhadehAnAm| ruhyata iti karmakartarIti kecit, tacca na yuktam| yataH karmasthabhAvakAnAM karmasthakriyANAM ca kartA karmavadbhavati| na kartRsthabhAvakAnAM na ca kartRsthakriyANAmityuktam| ruhiCca kartRsthakriyaH| tasmAt rohatIti ruT| ruDivAcaratIti kyaGanto~ayam| rUDhAbhAso hyayam, na tu samyagrUDhaH|  tathA ca vakSyati-"doSakopa" ityAdi| tasmAdasya rUDhAbhAsatvAdeSaiva vyutpattiryuktA|

A0 ra0-antaHCalyo~api svaguNenaiva rUDho vraNo bhavatItyAha-ruhyata iti|  ruhyate svayameva|  karmakartaryAtmanepadam|  tat-Calyam|  Calyena CalyakSataM lakSyate, tasyaiva ropaNArhatvAt|

doSakopAbhighAtAdikSobhAdbhUyo~api bAdhate||11||

sa0-yatastacchalyamasamyagrUDhatvAt bhUyo~api bAdhate|  prAkkRtabAdhamapi punarapi pIDAM janayati| kuto hetoH ? ityAha-doSakopaCcAbhighAtaCca, tAvAdI yeSAM dhAvanalaGghanAdInAM te evaM,  taiH kSobhaH-saMrambhaH, tasmAt| doSakopakSobhAt abhighAtAdikSobhAt bAdhate|

A0 ra0-antaHCalyaM rUDhamapi punarbAdhata ityAha doSakopeti|

tvaGnaSTe yatra tatra syurabhyaGgasvedamardanaiH||11|| rAgarugdAhasaMrambhA yatra cAjyaM vilIyate||12||  ACu CuSyati lepo vA tatsthAnaM Calyavadvadet||12||

sa0-tatra-teSu tvaGnaSTAdiSu CalyeSu madhye, tvaGnaSTaM yatra pradeCe syAt tatra-tasthAne, abhyaGgAdibhirlauhityaCUladAhakSobhAH syuH|  yatra vA sthAne ghRtaM styAnaM yojitaM vilIyate tatsthAnaM Calyavat-saCalyaM vadet| yadvA lepaH-candanAdinA datto, yatrACveva CuSyati, tatsthAnaM-tvagdeCaM, CalyavajjAnIyAt|

A0 ra0-atha naSTaCalyajJAnopAyaH|  tatra tvaGnaSTasyopAyamAha-tvaGnaSTa iti|

mAMsapraNaSTaM saMCuddhyA karCanAcchlathatAM gatam||13|| kSobhAdrAgAdibhiH CalyaM lakSayet-------------------||13||

sa0-mAMsapraNaSTaM-mAMsenAdRCyatAM prAptaM, saMCuddhyA-vamanavirecanAdikayA, yatkarCanaM-kRCatvaM kRtaM, tasmAt ClathatAM CithilatvaM  prAptaM, kSobhAt- anekaprakArAdvedanArUpAt, tathA rAgAdibhirlakSayet|

A0 ra0-mAMsanaSTasyopAyamAha Calyasya kSobhAdyatra rAgAdayastatra Calyam|

 ------------------------------------tadvadeva ca||13||  peCyasthisandhikoSTheSu naSTam----------------||14||

sa0-tadvaditi tena-mAMsapraNaSTena, tulyaM vartate| yathA,-CuddhyA karCanAt ClathatAM gataM kSobhAdrAgAdibhirlakSayediti|

A0 ra0-peCyAdiSu triSu naSTasyopAyamAha-tadvadeveti|

sUtrasthAnam

CalyAharaNavidhiH adhyAyaH

 -------------------------------asthiSu lakSayet||14|| asthnAmabhyaJjanasvedabandhapIDanamardanaiH||14||

sa0-asthiSu naSTaM CalyamasthnAmabhyaJjanAdibhirlakSayet|

A0 ra0-asthinaSTasyopAyamAha-asthiSviti|  'kSobhAdrAgAdibhiH' ityanuvartate|

 prasAraNAkuJcanataH sandhinaSTaM tathA~asthivat||15|| naSTe snAyuCirAsrotodhamanISvasame pathi||15|| aCvayuktaM rathaM khaNDacakramAropya rogiNam||16|| CIghraM nayettatastasya saMrambhAcchalyamAdiCet||16||

sa0-sandhinaSTaM CalyamasthinaSTaCalyavallakSayet   snAyuCirAsrotodhamanISu naSTe Calye, asame pathi-viSame mArge, rathamAropya rogiNaM-CalyavantaM, CIghraM nayet-ACveva deCAntaraM prApayet| kimbhUtaM ratham ? khaNDaM cakram yasya sa khaNDacakraH, tam| tatastasya-rathasya, saMrambhAt-kSobhAt, CalyamAdiCet-lakSayet|

A0 ra0-sandhinaSTasyopAyamAha-prasAraNAkuJcanata iti|   asthivat-abhyaJjanAdibhiCca|   snAyvAdiSu caturSunaSTasyopAyamAha-naSTa iti|  asame pathi-uccanIce mArge|

 marmanaSTaM pRthaGnoktaM teSAM mAMsAdisaMCrayAt||17||

sa0-marmanaSTaM CalyaM pRthak nAbhihitam| kutaH ? teSAM-marmaNAM, mAMsAdireva prAGnirdiSTo yataH saMCrayo, na tu pRthaGmarmANi vidyante| { tathA ca saGgrahe(sU. a. 37)-"marmapraNaSTe~apyananyabhAvAnmAMsAdibhyo marmaNAmuktaM parIkSaNaM bhavati|" iti|

A0 ra0-marmanaSTasyopAyAnuktau hetumAha-marmanaSTamiti|  teSAM-marmaNAM, mAMsAdigatatvAt-mAMsAdinaSTakathanenaivoktatvAt|

sAmAnyena saCalyaM tu kSobhiNyA kriyayA saruk||17||

sa0-sAmAnyena-sAmAnyalakSNena, kSobhiNyA kriyayA-saMrambhotpAdakena karmaNA CvasanaprANAyAmAdikena, yat saruk sthAnaM tat saCalyaM jAnIyAt|

A0 ra0-naSTasya sAmAnyalakSaNamAha-sAmanyeneti|

 vRttaM pRthu catuSkoNaM tripuTaM ca samAsataH||18|| adRCyaCalyasaMsthAnaM vraNAkRtyA vibhAvayet||18||

sa0-vRttaM-vartulam| pRthu-pArCvAparapArCvAbhyAM yatparicchidyate| catuSkoNaM-caturasram| tripuTaM-tryasram| samAsataH-saGkSepeNa|| adRCyasya-anupalabdhasya, Calyasya saMsthAnaM-AkRtiM, vraNAkRtyA-vraNasaMsthAnena, vibhAvayet-vidyAt|

A0 ra0-adRCyasya CalyasyAkRtirvraNAkRtyA jJeyetyAha-vRttamiti|  vRttaM-koNarahitam|  pRthu-dvikoNam|  tripuTaM-trikoNam|  saMsthAnaM-AkRtiH|

 teSAmAharaNopAyau pratilomAnulomakau||19||

sa0-teSAM-adRCyAnAM CalyAnAm| AkarSaNopAyau dau pratilomAnulomakau| pratilomaH-CarIrAntaHpraveCaviparyayaH|  anulomaH-CarIrAntaHpraveCAnugataH| 

pratilomAnulomayornirharaNaviSayamAha-

A0 ra0-CalyAharaNopAyabhedAnA(vA)ha-teSAmiti|  yatra pratikUlamAharaNaM sa pratilomaH, yatrAnukUlaM so~anulomaH|

 arvAcInaparAcIne nirharettadviparyayAt||19||

sa0-tayoH-pratilomAnulomayorviparyayaH, tasmAdviparyayAt, anulomaM parAcInamAnayedityarthaH|

A0 ra0-tayorviSayamAha-arvAcInaparAcIna iti|  arvAcInaM-adhogatam, tadviparyayAdUrdhvaM nirharet|  parAcInaM-Urdhvagatam, tadviparyayAdadho nirharet|  UrdhvaM nirharaNaM-pratilomam, adhaH-anulomam|  uktaM ca saGgrahe (sU.a.37)-"pratilomamarvAcInamAnayet, anulomaM parAcInam|" iti|

sukhAhAryaM yataCcchittvA tatastiryaggataM haret||20||

sa0-tiryaggataM CalyaM yato-yasmAddehadeCAt, chitvA-vilupya, sukhAhAryaM sampadyate-sukhenAhartuM Cakyate, tataH-tasmAddehadeCAt, chittvoddharet|  chittvetyatra yadyapi karma kiJcinna nirdiSTaM, tathA~api tvaGmAMsAdInAM yogyatvAtteSAmeva karmatvaM bodhyam|  mAMsAdIni chhittvoddharedityarthaH|

A0 ra0-tiryaggataM tvavasthAbhedenobhayorviSaya ityAha-sukhAhAryamiti|  tiryaggataM yenopAyena sukhAhAryaM tena haret|  praveCapArCvAdanyena pArCvena yadA sukhAhAryaM tadA chittvA-CastreNa dvAraM kRttvA, haret|

 CalyaM na nirghAtyamuraHkakSAvaGkSaNapArCvagam||20||  pratilomamanuttuNDaM chedyaM pRthumukhaM ca yat||21||

sa0-CalyamurogatamuraHsthaM kakSAsthaM vaGkSaNasthaM pArCvasthaM ca na nirghAtyaM-na nirghAtanIyam| tathA pratilomaM-nAnulomagataM, tathA~anuttuNDaM vAribudbudavannonnataM, tathA chedyaM CalyaM, tathA pRthumukhaM-vistIrNAnanaM, ca na nirghAtyam|

A0 ra0-urogatAdiSu CalyeSu nirghAtanaM niSedhati-Calyamiti|  pratilomaM-Urdhvagatam|  anuttuNDaM-adRCyamukham|  chedyaM-chedanArham|

 naivAharedviCalyaghnaM naSTaM vA nirupadravam||21||

sa0-viCalyaM hantIti viCalyaghnam| tAvajjIvati yAvatsaCalyaH| CalyApAye tu mriyate tannAharedeva|  viCalyasya tasya prANaharaNatvAt| etatsvarUpaM marmavibhAge spaSTaM kRtvA vakSyate| naSTaM veti vACabdaCcArthe|  naSTaM-adRCyatAM prAptaM ca, yannirupadravaM-tannimittarogarahitaM, nAharet, pratyavAyabhayAt|

A0 ra0-anAharaNIyaM CalyamAha-naivAharediti|  viCalyaghnaM-"utkSepau sthapanI trINi viCalyaghnAni tatra hi|" (hR.CA.a. 4/55) ityukteSu marmasu sthitam|

sUtrasthAnam

CalyAharaNavidhiH adhyAyaH

 athAharetkaraprApyaM kareNaiva------------------||22||

sa0-karaprApyaM-hastagrAhyaM CalyaM, karaNaivAharet-nApareNa kaGkamukhAdinA|

A0 ra0-hastAhAryaM CalyamAha-atheti|

 -----------------------------------itaratpunaH||22||  dRCyaM siMhAhimakaravarmikarkaTakAnanaiH||22||

A0 ra0-siMhamukhAdisvastikayantrAhAryaM CalyamAha-itaraditi|  itarat-kareNAprApyam|

 adRCyaM vraNasaMsthAnAdgrahItuM Cakyate yataH||23|| kaGkabhRGgAhvakuraraCarArIvAyasAnanaiH||23||

sa0-adRCyaM punaH CalyaM vraNasaMsthAnAdAkalayya kaGkamukhAdibhirgrahItuM Cakyate yatastatastairharet|  yattadornityAbhisambandhAttadopalambhaH|

A0 ra0-kaGkamukhAdisvastikayantrAhAryaM CalyamAha-adRCyamiti|  'itarat' ityanuvartate|

 sandaMCAbhyAM tvagAdistham----------------------||24||

sa0-tvagAdisthaM CalyaM sandaMCAbhyAM nirharet| AdigrahaNAnmAMsAdInAM grahaNam|

A0 ra0-sandaMCAhAryaM CalyamAha-sandaMCAbhyAmiti|  tvagAdIni-tvakCirAsnAyupiCitAni|

 ---------------------tAlAbhyAM suSiraM haret||24||

 suSirasthaM tu nalakaiH--------------------------||24||

sa0-suSirasthaM punaH CalyaM nalakaiH-nADIyantraiH, AkarSet|

 ------------------------CeSaM CeSairyathAyatham||24||

sa0-CeSaM CalyaM CeSairyantrairyathAyogamAharet|

A0 ra0-CeSayantrAhAryaM CalyamAha-CeSaM CeSairiti|

 CastreNa vA viCasyAdau tato nirlohitaM vraNam||25|| kRtvA ghRtena saMsvedya baddhA~~AcArikamAdiCet||25||

sa0-CastreNa vA pUrvaM viCasya-mAMsAdIn chittvA, tataH- anantaraM, apanItaraktaM vraNaM vidhAya, sarpiSA svedayitvA, vastrapaTTAdinA sarpimadhu baddhvA, AcArikaM-snehavidhyuktaM "uSNodakopacArI syAt" ityAdikaM, AdiCet-kathayet|

A0 ra0-yantreNAhartumaCakyasya CalyasyopAyamAha-CastreNa veti|  viCasya-vidArya|  nirlohitaM-srutaraktam|  AcArikaM-AhArAdiniyamam|  ["bhojanaM tu yathAsAtmyaM" (hR.sU.a. 29/34) ityAdivakSyamANoktam|]

 sirAsnAyuvilagnaM tu cAlayitvA CalAkayA||26||

sa0-sirAsnAyuvilagnaM punaH CalyaM CalAkayA cAlayitvA CithilIkRtya, Aharet|

A0 ra0-CirAsnAyuvilagnasyopAyamAha-CirAsnAyuvilagnamiti|

 hRdaye saMsthitaM CalyaM trAsitasya himAmbunA||26||  tataH sthAnAntaraM prAptamAharettadyathAyatham||27||  yathAmArgaM durAkarSam------------------------||27||

A0 ra0-hRdayalagnasya CalyasyopAyamAha-hRdaya iti|  yathAyathaM-sthAnAnurUpeNa yantreNa|  yathAmArgaM-mArgAnurUpeNa Codhanena|  durAkarSaM-hRdayAdAkraSTumaCakyam|

 -----------------------------anyato~apyevamAharet||27||

sa0-anyato~api-anyadeCasthamapi CalyaM, durAkarSaM-duHkhenAkraSTuM Cakyate, tat svamArgaM nayet tadevamevAharet, yathA hRtsthaM Calyam sthAnAntaraM prAptaM nirhAryam| tathA, yathAmArgaM-mArgAnatikrameNa, anyadeCasthamapi CalyamAkarSaNIyam|

A0 ra0- CastrakarmaviSayasya vraNasyotpattimAha-vraNa iti|vraNasyotpattipratibandhamAha-tameveti| tameva-Cvayathumeva| CastrakarmaNi bheSajavidhAnaM bheSajAsAdhye Castrakarma vidhAtavyamiti jJApanArtham| uktaM hi saGgrahe (sU. a. 38)- "dvividhe~api hi vyAdhAvupAyApekSe nija Agantau vA bheSajaviSayAtIte Castrakarma prayujyate|" iti|

Copho~alpo~alpoSmaruksAmaHsavarNaH kaThinaH sthiraH||2||

sa0-Amo yaH CophaH saH pramANato~alpaH| tathA, alpoSmA| tathA, alparuk-alpaCUlaH| tathA, savarNaH-tvaksamAnavarNaH| tathA, kaThino-na mRduH, pakvavat| tathA, sthiro-na pakvavaccalaH| sa AmaH sAma iti "so~aci lope cetpAdapUraNam" iti sulopaH|

 pacyamAno vivarNastu rAgI bastirivAtataH||3|| sphuTatIva sanistodaH sAGgamardavijRmbhikaH||3|| saMrambhArucidAhoSAtRDjvarAnidratAnvitaH||4||  styAnaM viSyandayatyAjyaM vraNavatsparCanAsahaH||4||

A0 ra0- CastrakarmaviSayasya vraNasyotpattimAha-vraNa iti|vraNasyotpattipratibandhamAha-tameveti| tameva-Cvayathumeva| CastrakarmaNi bheSajavidhAnaM bheSajAsAdhye Castrakarma vidhAtavyamiti jJApanArtham| uktaM hi saGgrahe (sU. a. 38)- "dvividhe~api hi vyAdhAvupAyApekSe nija Agantau vA bheSajaviSayAtIte Castrakarma prayujyate|" iti|

sa0-Amo yaH CophaH saH pramANato~alpaH| tathA, alpoSmA| tathA, alparuk-alpaCUlaH| tathA, savarNaH-tvaksamAnavarNaH| tathA, kaThino-na mRduH, pakvavat| tathA, sthiro-na pakvavaccalaH| sa AmaH sAma iti "so~aci lope cetpAdapUraNam" iti sulopaH|

 pacyamAno vivarNastu rAgI bastirivAtataH||3|| sphuTatIva sanistodaH sAGgamardavijRmbhikaH||3|| saMrambhArucidAhoSAtRDjvarAnidratAnvitaH||4||  styAnaM viSyandayatyAjyaM vraNavatsparCanAsahaH||4||

sa0-sa  CophaH pacyamAno vivarNo-na tvaksamAnavarNaH| tathA rAgI-lohitavarNaH|  tathA, bastirivAtataH-stabdho vAtapUrNadRtivat|  chAgAdInAM tu mUtrAdhAro bastirityucyate| tathA, sphuTatIva| { tathA, } sanistodaH-saha nistodena vartata iti sanistodaH| niyataprabandhapravRttA ruk-nistodo, vicchinnA tu CUlamityucyate| sAGgetyAdi| aGgAnAM mardaH- kSobhaH, sahAGgamardavijRmbhikAyAM vartata iti sAGgamardavijRmbhikaH| tathA, saMrambhAdibhiryutaH|  anvitaCabdena pratyekaM saMrambhAdInAM sambandhaH| saMrambho-vAgviSayAtItAnAM svasaMvedyAnAmanekarUpANAM pIDanavighaTTanacchedanabhedanadaMCanAdInAM rujAM prAdurbhAvaH|  sarvAGgINastIvro-dAhaH|  aratimAn dAha uSA ucyate|  tathA, sa pacyamAno ghRtaM styAnamupayuktaM vilInayati|  tathA, sparCanaM na sahate vraNavat|

A0 ra0- pacyAmAnasya Cophasya lakSaNamAha-pacyamAna iti| vivarNaH-tvagviparItavarNaH| rAgI-raJjanaCaktimAn, lepauSadhaM varNAntaraM nayatItyarthaH| sphuTati-viSliSTAvayatvaM vrajati| saMrambho-jhaTiti rujAdivRddhiH|

 pakve~alpavegatA mlAniH pANDutA valisambhavaH||5|| nAmo~anteSUnnatirmadhye kaNDUCophAdimArdavam||5|| spRSTe pUyasya saJcAro bhavedbastAvivAmbhasaH||6||

sa0-pakve sati, alpavegatA bhavati, na tu saMrambhaH|  tathA, glAniH-mlAnatvam| tathA, pANDutvaM valInAM codbhavaH| tathA, anteSu-paryanteSu, nAmo-nimnatvam, madhya unnatiH|  nAmo~anteSvityuktyaiva madhya unnatitvaM labdhameva, unnatigrahaNaM tvatiCayArtham, tenottuNDitvaM gamyate|  tathA, kaNDvAdimRdutvaM syAt| tathA, spRSTe tasmin sati pUyasya saJcAro bhavati,  basterantaHsthitasya yathA~ambhasaH saJcAraH|

A0 ra0- pakvasya Cophasya lakSaNamAha-pakva iti| alpavegatA-upadravAlpatvam| kaNDUCophAdayo lakSaNAni| upadravAstu-aGgamardAdayaH|

A0 ra0- CastrakarmavidhimAha-atheti| saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 38)- " athopahRtayantraCastrakSArAgnijAmbavauSThapicuplotapatrasUtracarmapaTTamadhusnehakaSAyalepakalkasekodakumbhaCItoSNodakakaTAhavyajanAdivraNopayogisarvopakaraNamAstRtaCayanIyamupasthitasthirasnehabalavadavalambhakapuruSamiSTe~ahani muhUrte ca dadhyakSatAnnapAnarukmaratnArcitavipraM praNateSTadevataM bhuktavantamAturaM prAGmukhamupaveCya saMveCya vA yantrayitvA pratyuGmukho vaidyo marmaCirAsnAyusandhyasthidhamanIH pariharan anulomaM CastraM nidadhyAt|" iti| nikhAtaCastrasyAharaNavidhimAha-sakRdeveti| sakRt-ekavAramAharet, nAntarA~antarA muJcedityarthaH|

---------------------------------pAke tu sumahatyapi||18||  pATayet dvyaGgulaM samyagdvyaGgulatryaGgulAntaram||18|| eSitvA samyageSiNyA paritaH sunirUpitam||19||  aGgulInAlavAlairvA yathAdeCaM yathACayam||19||  yato gatAM gatiM vidyAdutsaGgo yatra yatra ca||20||  tatra tatra vraNaM kuryAtsuvibhaktaM nirACayam||20||  AyataM ca viCAlaM ca yathA doSo na tiSThati||21||

sa0-pAke tu sumahatyapi pATayet| dvyaGgulaM-dvyaGgulaparimANaM vraNaM, samyak kuryAt,-nAdhikam| dvyaGguletyAdi| aGguladvayamathavA~aGgulatrayamantarIkRtya punaranyaM vraNaM kuryAt,-na tvAsannam|  tathA, eSiNyA samyageSitvA-gaveSayitvA, paritaH-samantAt, sunirUpitaM-suparyAlocitam| na kevalameSiNyA, yAvadaGgulyA, nAlena-padmotpalAdijena, vAlairvA-varAhAdisambandhibhiH, anveSya yathAdeCaM yathACayaM vraNaM kuryAt| taM ca pradeCaM darCayitumAha-yata ityAdi| yato yasmin pradeCe gatAM-dUrayAtAM, gatiM-nADIM, jAnIyAt tasmin pradeCe vraNaM kuryAt| yatra yatra CvayathupradeCe, utsaGgaM-unnatiM, vidyAt tatra tatra pradeCe vraNaM kuryAt| kiMbhUtaM vraNam ? suSThu vibhaktau pArCvAparapArCvAdivibhAgau yasya taM tathAvidham| tathA, nirACayam,-na vidyata ACayaH-pUyAderdoSasya sthAnaM, yasya tathAbhUtaM nirACayaM kuryAt|  tathA, AyataM-dIrgham, tathA viCAlaM-vistirNaM, kuryAt| evaM kRte sati doSaH-pUyAkhyo, na tiSThati-na sthitiM labhate|

sa0-Castre~avacArite-nyaste sati, vAgbhiH-tatkAlocitAbhirmadhurAbhiH 'svastho jAto~asi' ityevaMprAyAbhiH, tathA CItAmbhobhiH-pariSekAdibhiH, AturamACvAsya, anantaraM vraNaM paritaH-samantAt, aGgulyA paripIDya-pUyAdidoSaM nirhArya, anantaraM kaSAyeNa-madhuyaSTyAdisAdhitena, kSAlayitvA, tataH plotena -kArpAsAdijavastrakhaNDena, jalamapanIya-pAnIyArdratAM nirhRtya, anantaraM vraNaM guggulvAdibhirnimbapatrAntairdhUpayet| kimbhUtaiH ? ghRtaplutaiH|- plutagrahaNAdbahughRtairiti dyotayati| saGgrahe coktam (sU. a. 38)- "guggulvAdibhirevaM CayanAsanAdi dvirahno dhUpayet|" iti| tataH-anantaraM, vartiM-kArpAsAdimayIM, vraNAntardadyAt-praveCayet, vaidyaH| kimbhUtAm ? digdhAm| kaiH ? tilakalkAjyamadhubhiH,-vAtavraNe tilapiSTadigdhAM, pittavraNe ghRtadigdhAM, kaphavraNe madhudigdhAm| kecittu sarvaireva tairyugapaddigdhAmityAhuH| na ca kevalaM tilAdibhiH, yAvat yathAsvaM-yat yasya doSasya svaM bheSajaM, tena ca digdhAm| taireva-tilakalkAdibhiH, vraNAntaHpraviSTAM tAM-vartiM, AcchAdayet-sthagayet| UrdhvaM-tadupariSTAt, ghRtayuktaiH saktubhirAcchAdayet| saGgrahe coktam (sU. a. 38)-"nAtibhRSTayavasaktubhirghRtAktairbhAjanAnte~ambhasA dakSiNAGgulIbhiH sumRditairavacchAdya" iti| tato- vraNAntaHpraviSTavarticchAdanAdanantaraM, kavalikAM-bahuvastrakhaNDapuTanirvartitAM, nidhAya-saMsthApya, paTTena-nibiDavastrakhaNDena, prakRtatvAt vraNaM badhnIyAt| katham ? yuktyA-doSakAlAnuguNayA| ata eva saGgrahe jagAda (sU.a.38)-"vAtaCleSmodbhavAMstatra dvistrirvA veSTayedvraNAn| sakRdeva parikSapya pittaraktAbhighAtajAn|| CastrakSatarujAyAM tu pratatAyAM yaSTImadhukasarpiSoSNena vraNaM siJcet| udakumbhAccApo gRhItvA prokSayan parita upacaret|" iti| kathaM badhnIyAt ? susamAhitaM kRtvA-nAvahelayA, vAmapArCve dakSiNapArCve vA| adhastAt na badhnIyAt,  naiva copari-UrdhvaM, badhnIyAt, naiva copari-UrdhvaM, badhnIyAt|

A ra0-agnidAhaM niSedhati-na dahediti|  antaHCalyAn antarasRjaCca|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a. 40)-"uSNe ca kAle Atyayike tu vyAdhau kRtoSNapratIkArasya picchilamannamaCitavato~agnikarma kuryAt|" iti|  tathA (saM. sU. a. 40)-"atha dAhArhamAturaM kRtasvastyayanamupahRtasarvopakaraNaM prAkCiraHsaMviSTamAptAvalambitaM kRtvA vaidyo nirdhUmavRhatsthiradIptakhAdirabAdarAdyaGgArairayoghaTanaprakAreNa bhastrAnilAdhmAtairvyajanena cordhvAnirgacchajjvAlatayA~~ApAditApAdyamAna bhAsurAgnivraNairjAmbavauSThAdibhirvyAdhipradeCavaCAt valayArdhacandrasvastikASThApadabindurekhApratisAraNavikalpairmuhurmuhurhitopahitAbhirvAgbhiradbhiCcAturamACvAsayan dahedAsamyagdAhaliGgopatteH|  ucchUnasuSirapralUnadantanADIsajantuduSTavraNeSu tu snehamadhUcchiSTaguDaiH pUrayitvA dahet|" iti|

sUtrasthAnam

kSArAgnikarmavidhiH adhyAyaH

 sudagdhaM ghRtamadhvaktaM snigdhaCItaiH pradehayet||45||

sa0-sudagdhaM-agninA rogAdhiSThAnaM jJAtvA, ghRtamadhubhyAmabhyaktaM kRtvA, snigdhaCItaiH- madhuyaSTiCAlimUlAdibhiH, pralepayet|

A ra0-dAhAnantaraM kRtyamAha-sudagdhamiti|

 tasya liGgaM sthite rakte CabdavallasikAnvitam||45|| pakvatAlakapotAbhaM surohaM nAtivedanam||46||

sa0-tasyetyanena sudagdhaM sthAnaM parAmRCyate| tasya-sudagdhasya sthAnasya, liGgaM-lakSaNaM, sthite rakte-dahyamAnAvasthApravRttAsRji nivRtte sati, Cabdavat-budbudaCabdavat, tatsthAnaM bhavet| tathA, lasikAnvitam| lasikA-kuCaCastrAdivikSate prathamaM yA dRCyate jalalavAkRtiH| tathA, pakvatAlaphalasadRCam, kadAcitkapotasadRCam| sukhena rohati-suroham| tathA, nAtivedanaM-na tIvraruk|

A ra0-sudagdhalakSaNamAha-tasyeti|  tAlaM-tAlaphalakam|  kapotaH-pakSI|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a. 40)-"saCabdaM dahanaM durgandhitvaM tvakasaGkocaCca tvagdagdhe|  kapotavarNatvamalpaCopharujatA CuSkasaGkucitavraNatA ca mAMsadagdhe|  kRSNonnatavraNatvaM sthite ca rakte lasIkAsrutiH CirAdagdhe|  kRSNAruNakarkaCasthiravraNatA snAyvAdidagdhe ca|" iti|

 pramAdadagdhavatsarvaM durdagdhAtyarthadagdhayoH||46||

sa0-durdagdhAtyarthadagdhayoH pramAdadagdhena tulyaM sarvaM lakSaNaM bodhyam|    

A ra0-durdagdhAtidagdhayorlakSaNamAha-pramAdadagdhavaditi|

 caturdhA tattu tucchena saha-----------------||47||

sa0-tat-pramAdadagdhaM, catuSprakAram| katham ? tucchena-tucchadagdhalakSaNena, saha| avimRCyadagdhaM hi kadAcit samyagdagdhalakSaNaM, kadAciddurdagdhalakSaNam, kadAcidatidagdhalakSaNam, kadAcicca tucchadagdhalakSaNaM syAt|

A ra0-pramAdadagdhabhedAnAha-caturdheti|  tucchaM durdagdhamatidagdhaM sudagdhaM ceti caturdhA|

-------------------------------tucchasya lakSaNam||47|| tvagvivarNoSyate~atyarthaM na ca sphoTasamudbhavaH||47||

sa0-tucchasya-tucchadagdhasya lakSaNamiti kArye kAraNopacArAdevamuktam| tvagityAdi| tvagvivarNA| satyatyarthamuSyate-rujyate, na ca sphoTAnAM samudbhUtiriti tucchadagdhasthAnasya lakSaNam| yatkiJcinmAtramevAgninA spRSTaM tattucchadagdhamityucyate|

A ra0-tucchalakSaNamAha-tucchasyeti|

 sasphoTadAhatIvroSaM durdagdham-----------------||48||

 -------------------------------------atidAhataH||48||  mAMsalambanasaGkocadAhadhUpanavedanAH||48|| sirAdinACastRNmUrcchAvraNagAmbhIryamRtyavaH||49||

sa0-atidAhAdrogAdhiSThAnasya mAMsalambanAdayaH syuH| [ saGkocaH-sirAdInAm| dhUpanaM-dhUmAyanam| vedanA-rujA| sirAdInAM nACo-vyApat| vraNagAmbhIryaM-gambhIravraNatA| mRtyuH-maraNaM ca| ]samyagdagdhaliGgaM tUktameva "tasya liGgaM sthite rakte" (Clo.45) ityAdinA| tasmAttatpunarna nirdiSTam|      

A ra0-atidagdhalakSaNamAha-atidAhata iti|  dhUpanaM-dhUmAyanam|  sudagdhasya lakSaNamuktaM prAk (Clo.45)|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a. 40)-"snehadAhastu kaSTataro bhavati|  sa hi snehasya sUkSmamArgAnusAritvAddUramanupraviCatIti|" iti|

 tucchasyAgnipratapanaM kAryamuSNaM ca bheSajam||49||  styAne~astre vedanA~atyarthaM vilIne mandatA rujaH||50||

sa0-tucchadagdhasyAgninA pratapanaM kAryam| tathA, uSNam bheSajaM-auSadham| raktasya vilayanArthametat| yatastucchadagdhe~avaCyaM styAnamasRgbhavatIti yuktyA pratipAdayannAha-styAne~astra ityAdi| lohite styAne satyatiCayena rugbhavati| vilIne rakte pIDAyA mandatA-mandatvaM bhavati| atastucchadagdhe~agni pratapanaM yojyam|

A ra0-tucchasyauSadhamAha-tucchasyeti|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a. 40)-"styAne rakte himairnoSmA niSkrAmatiyato bahiH|  vedanA varddhate tena rudhiraM ca vidahyate|| uSNaM niSkrAmayat kuryAdUSmANaM mandatAM rujaH|" iti|

 durdagdhe CItamuSNaM ca yuJjyAdAdau tato himam||50||

 samyagdagdhe tavakSIriplakSacandanagairikaiH||51||  limpetsAjyAmRtairUrdhvaM pittavidradhivatkriyA||51||
