garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

navanItaM hitaM tatra kolAmbumadhurauSadhaiH||59|| siddhamalpapaTusnehaM laghu svAdu ca bhojanam||59|| candanoCIrakalkena limpedUrustanodaram||60|| CreSThayA vaiNahariNaCaCaCoNitayuktayA||60|| aCvaghnapatrasiddhena tailenAbhyajya mardayet||61|| paTolanimbamaJjiSThAsurasaiH secayetpunaH||61|| dArvImadhukatoyena mRjAM ca pariCIlayet||62||

tatra-teSu kaNDvAdiSu, upaCamArthaM navanItaM hitam, antarbahiCcopayogitayA| kIdRCam ? kolAmbunA madhurauSadhaiH drAkSAdibhiCca kalkIkRtaiH, siddhaM-pakvam| tathA, tatra bhojanaM hitam| kimbhUtam ? alpaM paTu-lavaNaM, snehaCca yatra tadevam| tathA, laghu-mAtrAsvabhAvAbhyAm| tathA, svAdu-madhuram| tathA, candanoCIrayoryaH kalkaH-piSTo jalenAloDitaH, tenorustanodaraM limpet| CreSThayA vA-triphalayA vA, UrustanodaraM limpet| kimbhUtayA ? eNAdirudhirapiSTayA| tathA, aCvaghnapatrasiddhena tailenAbhyajya-abhyaktamaGgaM kRtvA, anantaraM paTolanimbamaJjiSThAsurasairmardayet| aCvaghnaH-karavIraH| secayetpunaH-pariSekaM ca kuryAt| dArvImadhukatoyena-dAruharidrAmadhuyaSTikAbhyAM kvathitena jalena, mRjAM-CuddhiM snAnAdikAM, CIlayet| saGgrahe tUktam (CA.a.3)-"pariSekaH punarmAlatImadhukasiddhenAmbhasA| kaNDUyanaM varjayet tvagbhedavairUpyaparihArArtham| snAnodvartanaM ca CIlayet| madhuraM cAhAramalpamalpasnehalavaNamalpodakAnupAnaM bhuJjIta|" iti| 

ojo~aSTame saJcarati mAtAputrau muhuH kramAt||62|| tena tau mlAnamuditau tatra jAto na jIvati||63|| CiCurojonavasthAnAnnArI saMCayitA bhavet||63||

ojaH-sarvadhAtUnAM tejaH kartR, mAtAputrau karmabhUtau, saJcarati| mAtA ca putraCceti dvandvaH| "AnaGRto dvandve" ityAnaGAdeCaH| kathaM saJcarati ? muhurmuhuH| kramAt-krameNa, kadAcidgarbhiNImojaH saJcarati kadAcitputramiti| evaM [ tena-] kadAcitkenaujaHsaJcaraNena, tau-mAtAputrau, mlAnamuditau syAtAm| tayA pUrvanirUpitayA garbhagarbhiNyubhayasambaddhayA nADyobhayatra saJcarattadoja ubhayasambaddhaM yadA garbhaM saJcarati tadA garbho mudito-hRSito, bhavedojaHsampattyA, garbhiNI ca mlAnA bhavet| yadA ca tadojo garbhiNIM saJcarati tadA tayaivojaH sampattyA garbhiNI muditA bhavet, CiCurmlAno bhavedojaH sampattyabhAvAt| [ tatra-] tasmin kAle, CiCuH-bAlo, jAtaH-utpanno, na jIvati| kutaH ? ojonavasthAnAt| ojasastadAnIM CiCAvanavasthitatvAt,-acirakAlaprarUDhatvAdojasaH| garbhiNyAM tu na sarvamacirakAlamanavasthitamojaH, yathA garbhe| tasmAnna tasyA nirojastvam| ata evAha-nArIsaMCayitA bhavet,-kadAcijjIvati kadAcinna jIvatIti saMCayitArthaH|

kSIrapeyA ca peyA~atra saghRtA~anvAsanaM ghRtam||64|| madhuraiH sAdhitaM Cuddhyai purANaCakRtastathA||64|| CuSkamUlakakolAmlakaSAyeNa praCasyate||65|| CatAhvAkalkito bastiH satailaghRtasaindhavaH||65||

atra-aSTame mAsi, kSIrasaMskRtA peyA pAtavyA| kimbhUtA? saghRtA| tathA, anvAsanaM ghRtaM Casyate| kIdRk? madhuraiH-drAkSAdibhiH, sAdhitaM-pakvam| tathA-tenaiva prakAreNa, purANaCakRtaH CuddhyarthaM, bastiH-nirUhaH , praCasyate-yujyate| tatra ca bastau kaH kaSAyaH ? kaH kalkaH? ityAha-CuSkamUlaketi| CuSkamUlakAdInAM kaSAyeNa, tathA CatAhvAkalkitaH, tathA saha tailena ghRtena saindhavena ca|

 tasmiMstvekAhayAte~api kAlaH sUterataH param||66||

ekaM ca tadahaCcaikAham| "rAjAhaHsakhibhyaSTac" iti Tac| "ahnaSTakhoreva" iti TilopaH| ekAhena yAto~atikrAnto~antarito~aSTamo mAsaH-ekAhayAtaH, [ tasmin| ] tasmin-aSTame mAsi, punarekadivasAtikrAnte~apyataH paraM sUteH-prasavasya, kAlo yAvadvarSam| apiCabdAdyAte tvaSTame mAsyataH paraM sUteH kAla iti gamyate| aSTamAnmAsAdanantaraM navamadaCamaikAdaCadvAdaCamAsAn yAvat| eSu mAseSu garbho jAto dIrghAyuSTvAdiyukto jIvati|

 varSAdvikArakArI syAtkukSau vAtena dhAritaH||66||

varSAdityAnantarye paJcamI| varSAt-dvAdaCamAsAdanantaraM, garbhaH kukSau vAtena dhArito-ruddhaniSkramaNo, vikArakArI bhavet vikAramavaCyaM karoti| garbhasya sanniveCo~api saGgrahe proktaH, yathA (CA. a. 2)-"garbhastu mAtRpRSThAbhimukho lalATe kRtAJjaliH saGkucitAGgo garbhakoSThe dakSiNam pArCvamACrityAvatiSThate pumAn, vAmaM strI, madhyaM napuMsakam| tatra sthitaCca garbho mAtari svapatyAM svapiti pratibuddhAyAM pratibudhyate|" iti|

CastaCca navame mAsi snigdho mAMsarasaudanaH||67|| bahusnehA yavAgUrvA pUrvoktaM cAnuvAsanam||67||

navame mAsi snigdho mAMsarasayukta odanaH Casto-hitaH| athavA, peyA bahusnehA Casteti liGgavipariNAmena sambandhaH| pUrvoktamanuvAsanaM-"ghRtaM madhuraiH sAdhitaM" ityAdi, tacca Castam|

tata eva picuM cAsyA yonau nityaM nidhApayet||68|| vAtaghnapatrabhaGgAmbhaH CItaM snAne~anvahaM hitam||68||

tata eva-anvAsanaghRtAt, picuM-naktakaM, asyAH-garbhiNyAH, yonau nityaM-sadA, nidhApayet-tatra sthApayet, vAtavijayArtham| pavanenAnAkrAntayonirhi sukhaM garbhaM sUte| tathA, vAtaghnAnAM dravyANAM patrANi, teSAM bhaGgaH-samUhaH, tena kvathitamambhaH CItaM kRtvA snAne~anvahaM-aharahaH, garbhiNyai hitam| anvahamityanaCceti Tac|

niHsnehAGgIM na navamAnmAsAtprabhRti vAsayet||69||

niHsnehagAtrAM garbhiNIM na vAsayet, api tu sasnehAGgIM sthApayet| niHCeSeNa nirastaH sneho yasmAdaGgAttadevaM niHsnehamaGgaM yasyAH sA niHsnehAGgI, tAm| aGgagAtrakaNThebhyo vaktavyamiti GIp| kutaH kAlAdArabhya ? navamAnmAsAtprabhRti| yadyapi kAlo~atra na nirdiSTaH, tathA~api navamAnmAsAdArabhya sAmarthyAdyAvanmuktagarbhaCalyA syAt, tAvanniHsnehAGgIM garbhiNIM na sthApayediti labhyate| sasnehAGgadhAraNaM ca tasyAH kupitavAyornityaM sannihitatvAt| 

prAgdakSiNastanastanyA pUrvaM tatpArCvaceSTinI||69|| punnAmadaurhRdapraCnaratA puMsvapnadarCinI||70|| unnate dakSiNe kukSau garbhe ca parimaNDale||70|| putraM sUte~anyathA kanyAM yA cecchati nRsaGgatim||71|| nRtyavAditragAndharvagandhamAlyapriyA ca yA||71||

prAk-pUrvaM, dakSiNe stane stanyaM-kSIraM, yasyAH prAdurbhavati sA putraM sUta iti sambandhaH| tathA, pUrvaM tatpArCvaceSTinI|  taccabdena dakSiNapArCvaM parAmRCyate| tena-dakSiNena pArCvena, ceSTitaM-gamanasvapanAdikaM, yasyAH sA-tatpArCvaceSTinI, putraM sUta iti sarvatra yojyam| tathA gacchantyAH pUrvaM dakSiNapAdotkSepaH, hastakaraNIye ca pUrvaM dakSiNena pANinA ceSTate, iti tatpArCvaceSTA bodhyA`| punnAmetyAdi|  puMliGgopalakSitaM nAma-punnAma, daurhRdaM ca praCnaCca daurhRdapraCnau|  punnAmnordaurhRdapraCnayo ratA -abhiyuktA, punnAmni daurhRde ratA|  daurhRdakAle yo~abhilASaviCeSo garbhiNyAH sa daurhRdaCabdavAcyaH| tathA, punnAmni praCne~abhiratA-punaH punaH punnAmapraCnaM karoti|  tathA, punnAmadheyAn svapnAn-puruSagajavAjivarAhAdIn AmradADimACokavRkSAdIn vA, draSTuM CIlaM yasyAH saivam|  tathA, unnate dakSiNe garbhakoSThAkhye kukSau| tathA, garbhe-garbhasaMsthAne, parimaNDale-vartule sati, putraM sUte|  anyathA-putraprasavasUcakAddhetorvaiparItye ca, kanyAM sUte|  yathA-prAgdakSiNastanastanyetyAdi putraprasavasUcakaM lakSaNam, ato~anyathA prAgvAmastanastanyetyAdi lakSaNaM garbhiNyAH kanyAprasavasUcakam|  na kevalaM putraprasavalakSaNAdviparyayeNa kanyAM sUte, yAvat yA cecchati nRsaGgatim|  yA ca-garbhiNI puruSeNa saha saGgatimicchati-kAmayate, sA kanyAM sUte| tathA yA ca nRtyAdipriyA sA kanyAM sUte| 

klIbaM tatsaGkare, tatra madhyaM kukSeH samunnatam||72||

tadityanenAtra putraprasUtilakSaNaM duhitRprasUtilakSaNaM ca dvayamapi parAmRCyate|   dvayasyaitasya lakSaNasya saGkare-saGkIrNalakSaNatAyAM, klIbaM-napuMsakaM garbhaM, sUte|  tatra-tasmin klIbe garbhe kukSisthite, kukSermadhyaM samunnataM bhavati|

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

yamau pArCvadvayonnAmAtkukSau droNyAmiva sthite||72||

yamau dvau garbhau, garbhiNI sUte|  kathamiti tallakSaNArthamAha -  pArCvadvayonnAmAt,- pArCvadvayotsedhAt| ata eva kukSau-udare, droNyAmiva sthite|  droNI-madhyanimnA, kukSirapi pArCvadvayonnatyA madhyanimnA bhavati|

prAk caiva navamAnmAsAt sA sUtigRhamACrayet||73|| deCe praCaste sambhAraiH sampannaM sAdhake~ahani||73||

sA-garbhiNI, sUtigRhaM-sUtikAgAraM, navamAnmAsAtpUrvamevACrayet|  kutra deCe kRtam ? ityAha-deCe praCaste,-prAkpravaNa udakpravaNe vA, vAstuvidyAvidbhiH parIkSya kalpitam|  kIdRCam ? sambhAraiH sampannaM,-sakalairupakaraNairyuktam|  tathA, sAdhake~ahani - CubhapuMnakSatre divase sati|

 tatrodIkSeta sA sUtiM sUtikAparivAritA||74||

tatra-sUtikAgRhe, sthitA sUtimudIkSeta,-ahamatra prasaviSya iti cetasi nidhAya sA-garbhiNI, tatrAsItetyarthaH| kimbhUtA ? sUtikAparivAritA,-anekavAraprasavAnubhUtatatkAlocitavyavahArakuCalAbhiH strIbhiH parivAritA|  saGgrahe tUktam (CA. a. 3) "bahuCaH prasUtAbhiranuraktAbhiraviSAdinIbhiravisaMvAdinIbhiH kleCasahAbhiH parivRtA svastyayanaparA~anulomanairAhAravihArairanulomitavAtamUtrapurISA prasavakAlamudIkSeta|  svalpe~api ca viNmUtravibandhe phalavartIH prayojayet|" iti| 

adyaCvaHprasave glAniH kukSyakSiClathatA klamaH||74|| adhogurutvamaruciH praseko bahumUtratA||75|| vedanorUdarakaTIpRSThahRdvastivaGkSaNe||75|| yonibhedarujAtodasphuraNasravaNAni ca||76||  AvInAmanu janmAtastato garbhodakasrutiH||76||

adya vA Cvo vA AsannaH prasavaH, tasmin Asanna (adyaCvaH)-prasave glAnyAdayo bhaveyuH, garbhiNyA iti sambandhaH|  glAniH-harSakSayaH| tathA, kukSI cAkSiNI ca kukSyakSi, tasya ClathatA CithilatvaM, svasthAnAccalitatvamiva| tathA, klamaH-upatApaH|  tathA, adhogurutvAdIni bhavanti| tathA,UrvAdiSu vedanA -pIDA bhavati|  tathA, yonibhedAdayaH syuH| ataH-asmAdyonibhedAdeH, anu-paCcAt, AvInAM-garbhaniSkramaNakAlaCUlaviCeSANAM, janma-utpAdaH| tataH-anantaraM, garbhodakastrutiH-tatkAlaM yonito jalasrAvaH, srAvamAtraH sa garbhodakasaMjJaH|

 athopasthitagarbhAM tAM kRtakautukamaGgalAm||77|| hastasthapunnAmaphalAM svabhyaktoSNAmbusecitAm||77|| pAyayetsaghRtAM peyAM-----------------------------||78||

atha-garbhodakasruteranantaraM, tAM-garbhiNIM, upasthitagarbhAM - abhimukhIbhUtagarbhAmAvijanmodakasrAvAdinA jJAtvA, saghRtAM peyAM pAyayet| kimbhUtAm ? kRtakautukamaGgalAm|  viCiSTakAla eva yo rakSAbandho bAhvAdau badhyate sa kautukavAcyaH|  kautukAkhyaM maGgalaM kautukamaGgalam|  kRtaM kautukamaGgalaM yasyAH, tAm|  tathA, hastasthaM punnAma-dADimAdi, phalaM yasyAH, tAm|  tathA, suSThu aktAM-abhyaktAm|  tathA, uSNAmbusecitAm|  ityasyAnantaraM "pAyayetpeyAM" iti pAThenoSNAmbusecanAdanantaraM peyApAnaM kAryamiti bodhayati

-------------------------tanau bhUCayane sthitAm||78|| AbhugnasakthimuttAnAmabhyaktAGgIM punaH punaH|||78||  adho nAbhervimRdnIyAtkArayejjRmbhacaGkramam||79||

tanau-mRduni, bhUCayane sthitAM mRdnIyAt,-na khaTvAdiCayane sthitAm| tathA coktaM saGgrahe (CA. a. 3)- "suraktArSabhacarmapracchade mRduni bhUCayane CayAnAM" ityAdi| kuto~aGgAtprabhRti viCeSeNa mRdnIyAt ? nAbheradhaH,-nordhvaM nAbheH| kimbhUtAM tAm ? Abhugnasakthim, AsamantAdbhugne-kuTile, sakthnI yasyAH sA~~AbhugnasakthiH, tAM tathAvidhAM mRdnIyAt| tathA, punaHpunarabhyaktAGgIM vAtakopabhayAt| tathA, jRmbho caGkramaM ca tAM kArayet|  jRmbho- jRmbhaNam| caGkramaH-caGkramaNaM drutagamanam|

garbhaH prayAtyavAgevaM, talliGgaM hRdvimokSataH||79|| AviCya jaTharaM garbho basterupari tiSThati||80||

evaM-anayetikartavyatayA~anuSThitayA, garbho~avAk prayAti -UrdhvAdadho gacchati, hRtsthAnaM parityajyAdho~avasthitiM karotItyarthaH| saGgrahe tUktam (CA. a. 3)- "dadyAt kuSThalAGgalikIvacAcavyacitrakaciribilvacUrNamupAghrAtuM muhurmuhuH| tathA bhUrjapatraCiMCipAsarjarasAnAmanyatamadhUmamantarAntarA ca| pArCvapRSThakaTIsakthideCAn koSNena tailenAbhyajyAnusukhamasyA vimRdgIyAt| evamavAk parivartate garbhaH|" iti| musalenolUkhalaM dhAnyapUrNamAhananIyaM garbhasyAvAksthitaya iti kecidAhuH| tadayuktam| yato garbhiNyAstAvadvyAyAmavarjanaM satatamupadiSTam|  viCeSataCca prasavakAle pracalitasarvadhAtudoSAyAH sukumArAyA nAryAH, musalavyAyAmaprerito hi vAyuH prANAn hiMsyAditi| vimardanAdikriyAM ca garbhiNyAstAvatkArayet yAvadgarbhaniSkramaNaM na bhavati| atha mAtRhRdayAnmukto garbhaH kena lakSaNena jJAyate ? ityAha-talliGgamityAdi|  tadityanena garbhaH parAmRCyate| tasya garbhasya, liGgaM-lakSaNaM, talliGgam| garbhasyaitalliGgaM yaddhRdvimokSato hRdayamocanAdanantaraM sa garbho jaTharamAviCya basterupari tiSThati|

Avyo~abhitvarayantyenAM khaTvAmAropayettataH||80||

AvyaH-prasavakAlaCUlaviCeSAH, yasmAdenAM-garbhiNIM, abhitvarayanti, anavaratamutpadyamAnatvAt|   tataH -tasmAt, enAM garbhiNIM, khaTvAmAropayet-Arohayet|

atha sampIDite garbhe yonimasyAH prasArayet||81|| mRdu pUrvaM pravAheta bADhamAprasavAcca sA||81||

atha-khaTvArohaNAdanantaraM khaTvAsthitAyA garbhe sampIDite samantAtpIDite, vAyunA yonimukhAkrAntatayA, asyA garbhiNyA yoniM prasArayet-AbhyaGgAdidAnena vikAsayet|  tataH sA-garbhiNI, garbhaM mRdu kRtvA pUrvaM pravAheta, yAvadyonimukhe nAgato garbhaH|  garbhaM yonidvAramAgataM tu jJAtvA bADhaM -bhRCaM pravAheta, AprasavAt-prasavaM yAvat| tathA coktaM saGgrahe (CA. a. 3)- "CanaiH CanaiCca pUrvaM pravAhiSThAH, nirgame bADhaM garbhasya yonimukhapratipattau bADhataramAprasavAditi|" iti| AGmaryAdA vacana ityADaH karmapravacanIyatve paJcamyapAGparibhiriti paJcamI|

harSayettAM muhuH putrajanmaCabdajalAnilaiH||82||

tAM-garbhiNIM, anantaraM [muhuH] harSayet-sumanasaM muhuH kArayet| kena?  putrajanmaCabdena,-prasUtA prasUtA~asi subhage dhanyaM putramityevaMrUpeNAsakRt strIbhiruccAritena, tathA jalena CItalena, tathA~anilena| saGgrahe~apyuktam (CA. a. 3)- "enAM brUyAcca subhage CanaiH CanaiH pravAhayasva Cobhanaste mukhavarNaH putraM janayiSyasIti|  tathA~anyA tu vAmakarNe~asyA mantramimaM japet|  'kSitirjalaM viyattejo vAyurviSNuH prajApatiH| sagarbhAM tvAM sadA pAtu vaiCalyaM cAdadhAtviti|| prasUSva tvamavikliSTamavikliSTA CubhAnane| kArtikeyadyutiM putraM kArtikeyAbhirakSitam||' iti|  tathA, 'ihAmRtaM ca somaCca citrabhAnuCca bhAmini| uccaiHCravACca turago mandire nivasantu te|| idamamRtamapAM samuddhRtaM vai tava laghu garbhamimaM pramuJcatu stri|  tadanalapavanArkavAsavAste saha lavaNAmbudharairdiCantu CAntim||' iti| athAparA strI garbhiNImanuCiSyAt| anAgatAyAM vedanAyAM mA pravAhiSThAH| akAlapravAhaNaM hi viNmUtrAdivegAnAmivodIraNamanarthakaramahitaM ca|  garbhasya CvAsakAsaCophakubjatAdikaratvAt|' iti|

pratyAyAnti tathA prANAH sUtikleCAvasAditAH||82||

tathA-tena prakAreNa harSAdijananena, prANAH sUteH kleCAH-AdhayaH, tatkRtAni duHkhAni, tairavasAditAH-glAniM nItAH, garbhiNyAH pratyAyAnti-punarnavIbhavanti|

dhUpayedgarbhasaGge tu yoniM kRSNAhikaJcukaiH||83|| hiraNyapuSpImUlaM ca pANipAdena dhArayet||83|| suvarcalAM viCalyAM vA jarAyvapatane~api ca||84|| kAryametattathotkSipya bAhvorenAM vikampayet||84|| kaTImAkoTayetpArSNyA sphijau gADhaM nipIDayet||85||  tAlukaNThaM spRCedveNyA mUrdhni dadyAtsnuhIpayaH||85|| bhUrjalAGgalikItumbIsarpatvakkuSThasarSapaiH||86|| pRthagdvAbhyAM samastairvA yonilepanadhUpanam||86|| kuSThatAlIsakalkaM vA surAmaNDena pAyayet||87|| yUSeNa vA kulatthAnAM bAlvajenAsavena vA||87||

garbhasya saGge-saktau, yoniM kRSNasarpanirmokena dhUpayet-dhUpanaM yonau kuryAt| dhUpayediti "gupUdhUpa" ityAdinA AyapratyayaH, tato vidhau liG|  tathA, hiraNyapuSpImUlaM pANinA pAdena ca sA garbhiNI dhArayet| athavA, suvarcalAM viCalyAM vA dhArayet|  etat-garbhasaGgoktaM, jarAyoH-aparAkhyasya, apatane-aniSkrAntau, kAryaM-vidhAtavyam|  na kevalaM garbhasaGgoktaM kAryaM yAvadenAM-apatitajarAyuM, bAhvordvayorutkSipya vikampayet-vidhunIta| saGgrahe tUktam (CA. a. 3)- "na cedaparA patati tato dakSiNena pANinA nAbherupariSTAdbalavadutpIDyAnyena pRSThata upasaGgRhya vidhunuyAt|" iti|  tathA, pArSNyA kaTImAkoTayediti punaH punaH kaTyAM pArSNighAtaM kuryAdityarthaH|  tathA, sphijau yutau suSThu nipIDayet|  tathA, veNyA-keCaracanAviCeSAkhyayA, tAlukaNThaM spRCet|  saGgrahe~apyuktam (CA. a. 3)- "veNyA~aGgulyA vA keCaveSTitayA vA tAlukaNThaM parAmRCet|" iti|  tathA, mUrdhni-mastake, snuhIpayaH-sudhAdugdhaM dadyAt|  tathA bhUrjAdibhirdravyaiH pRthak-pratyekaM, athavA dvAbhyAM kRtvA, samastairvA, yonyA lepanaM dhUpanaM ca kAryamiti CeSaH| kuSThatAlIsapatrayoH kalkaM vA surAmaNDena-surAbhAgenoparisthitena, tAM pAyayet|  athavA, kulatthAnAM yUSeNa-kvAthena, pAyayet|  bAlvajenAsavena vA| balvajaM vAriNA Asutya rAtrau dhAritaM tacchItakaSAyo bAlvaja Asava ucyate|  saGgrahe~apyuktam (CA. a. 3)- "bhUrjapatrakAcamaNisarpanirmokaiCca yoniM dhUpayet| bhUrjaguggulubhyAM vA| CAlimUlasiddhena vA sarpiSA yonimabhyajya kaTukAlAbujAlinInimbasarpanirmokairdhUpayet|  anabhyaktAM vA kaTutailamiCraiH kalkIkRtairvA tailAktairAlimpet|  guDanAgarakalkena vA| tadeva vA bhakSayet| lAGgalImUlakalkena vA pANipAdamudaraM ca limpet|" iti| tathoktam (saM. CA. a. 3)-"kuSThailAkalkaM vA surayA pAyayet| arkAlarkakaSAyaM vA suronmiCram| kuSThalAGgalikImUlakalkaM vA madyamUtrAnyatareNa| [ vatsakAdicUrNaM vA madyena| ] CatapuSpAkuSThamadanahiGgusiddhasya ca tailasya picuM grAhayet|" iti|

garbhiNyAH parihAryANAM sevayA rogato~atha vA||1|| puSpe dRSTe~athavA CUle bAhyAntaH snigdhaCItalam||1|| sevyAmbhojahimakSIrivalkakalkAjyalepitAn||2|| dhArayedyonibastibhyAmArdrArdrAn picunaktakAn||2||

garbhiNyAH parihAryANAM-AhAravihArANAM pUrvoktAnAmativyavAyAdInAM, sevanena puSpe dRSTe, athavA rogataH puSpe dRSTe, rogasya ca svabhAvApathyasarSapaCAkamandakadadhyAderAhArAnmAtrAdeCakAlAdivaCAdvA sambhavaH, garbhAkhyaphalahetutvAdraktaM puSpamucyate, tasmin dRSTe-cakSurgocaraM prApte, athavA CUle-dRSTe-praCnAdinopalabdhe sati, dRCiratropalabdhivacanaH, bAhyAntaH snigdhaCItalaM sAdhanaM-annapAnapradehapariSekAdi, kAryam| bahiH-snAnAvagAhAdau, antaCca - bhojanAnupAnAdAvityarthaH| rogata iti tRtIyArthe tasiH| tathA, strI yonibastibhyAM picunaktakAn dhArayet|  kimbhUtAn ? sevyAdibhirlepitAn| sevyaM-uCIram| ambhojaM-padmam| himaM candanam| kSIraM vidyate yeSAM te kSIriNo vRkSAH-pippalAdayaH, yeSAM CastrAdicchinnAnAM kSIraM dRCyate| valkaM-valkalam| sevyaM cAmbhojaM ca himaM ca kSIrivalkaM ca, teSAM kalkaCcAjyaM ca , tairlepitAn| tathA ca kimbhUtAn ? ArdrArdrAn-atiCayenArdrIkRtAn|  picuCabdena vikeCikAsadRCaH kArpAsamayaH|  naktakaH-cailakhaNDaH|

CatadhautaghRtAktAM strIM tadambhasyavagAhayet||3|| sasitAkSaudrakumudakamalotpalakesaram||3|| lihyAt kSIraghRtaM khAdecchRGgATakakaserukam||4|| pibetkAntAbjaCAlUkabAlodumbaravatpayaH||4|| CRtena CAlikAkolIdvibalAmadhukekSubhiH||5|| payasA raktaCAlyannamadyAtsamadhuCarkaram||5|| rasairvA jAGgalaiH-------------------------||6||

CataCabdo bahuvAraparyAyaH, na saGkhyAvAcItyarthaH|  tathA ca saGgrahe~adhItam (CA. a. 4)- sahasradhautasarpiSA~adhonAbheH sarvataH pradihyAt|" iti| Catadhautena-bahudhA prakSAlitena ghRtena, aktAM-abhyaktAM, strIM tadambhasyavagAhayet-tatra tAM nimajjanaM kArayet|  tadityanena hi sevyAdidravyaparAmarCaH| strImiti vAmCasoritIyaDvikalpAtpUrvarUpam|  tathA kSIraM ghRtaM ca lihyAt| kimbhUtam ? sasitetyAdi| saha sitayA tathA kSaudreNa tathA kumudakamalotpalAnAM kesareNa-kiJjalkena sahitam|  anye tu kSIrAhRtaM kSIrodbhavaM ghRtaM kSIraghRtamiti vyAcakSate|  tathA, khAdecchRGgATakaM kaserukaM ca|  tathA, payaH-kSIraM, pibet|  kimbhUtam ?  kAntetyAdi|  kAntA-gandhapriyaGguH|  apsu jAtaM-abjam, kamalAdi|  CAlUkaM-utpalamUlam|  bAlamudumbaraM-apakvamudumbaraphalam|  kAntA cAbjaM ca CAlUkaM ca bAlodumbaraM ca tAni vidyante yasya payasastadevam, taiH CRtaM kSIraM pibedityarthaH|  yairhi tatpayaH CRtaM tAni tatrAvaCyaM vidyante|  kSIraCrapaNavidhiCcAtIsAracikitsoktaH (hR. ci. a. 9/39)- "payasyutkvAthya mustAnAM viMCatiM" ityAdyanusAreNAtra kalpyaH|  tantrAntare tvevamuktam-"dravyAdaSTaguNaM kSIraM kSIrAttoyaM caturguNam|  kSIrAvaCeSaH kartavyaH kSIrapAke tvayaM vidhiH||" iti|  anye tu kAntAdidravyANAM cUrNena yuktaM kalkena vA yuktaM payaH pibedityAhuH|  payasA raktaCAlyannaM samadhuCarkaraM suCItaM bhuJjIta|  kimbhUtena kSIreNa ?  CAlyAdibhiH CRtena-siddhena|  deCasAtmyAdyanurodhAjjAGgalairvA rasaiH CAlyannamadyAt|

----------------CuddhivarjaM cAsroktamAcaret||6||

CuddhiM varjayitvA, asroktaM-raktapittAbhihitaM, yatsAdhanaM tadbAhyAntarAcaret-seveta|  asraCabdasyopalakSaNArthatvAdraktapittaM gamyate|

asampUrNatrimAsAyAH pratyAkhyAya prasAdhayet||6|| AmAnvaye ca---------------------------------||7||

asampUrNAstrayo mAsA yasyAH garbhiNyAH saivam|  tasyAH puSpadarCane sati garbhaH prAyo na tiSThati, asaJjAtasAratvAt|  tasmAt pratyAkhyAya-pratyAkhyAnaM kRtvA, prasAdhayet-prakarSeNa yatnena sAdhayet|  AmAnvaye ca|  atrApi pratyAkhyAya prasAdhayedityanuvartate|  AmAnugate raktadarCane sampUrNatricaturAdimAsAyA  api saJjAtasAre~api garbhe sati viruddhopakramatvAt pratyAkhyAya sAdhanaM kArayet|  tathA hi,-rUkSatIkSNoSNakaTuprAyamAmaghnaM garbhiNyA viruddham, CItasnigdhaprAyaM cAmasya| 

tatreSTaM CItaM rUkSopasaMhitam||7|| upavAso ghanoCIraguDUcyaraludhAnyakAH||7|| durAlabhAparpaTakacandanAtiviSAbalAH||8|| kvathitAH salile pAnaM tRNadhAnyAni bhojanam||8|| mudgAdiyUSairAme tu jite snigdhAdi pUrvavat||9||

tatra-AmAnvaye sAmatAyAM satyAM, CItaM yadannapAnAdi, tatsarvaM bhAhyato~antaCca hitam|  CItaM raktasya pathyaM, Amasya viruddhatvAdapathyaM, ityACaGkyAha-rUkSopasaMhitam,-rUkSeNa-tiktakaSAyAdinA, yuktam|  tathA, deCasatvAdyanurodhAdupavAso hitaH, na kevalaM CItaM rUkSopasaMhitam|  tathA ghanAdayo dravyaviCeSAH salile kvathitAH pAnaM hitam|  ghano-mustaH|  araluH-syonAkaH|  tathA, tRNadhAnyAni-nIvArakodravaCyAmAkAdIni, bhojanaM-AhAraH, tatra-AmAnvaye, hitam|  kaiH saha ? mudgAdiyUSaiH| AdigrahaNena makuSTamasUrAdayaH CimbhIdhAnyaviCeSAH pittaCleSmaharA gRhyante|  sAmatAyAmevotpannAyAmayamupakramaH|  Ame tu jite snigdhAdi pUrvavat|  pUrvasminniva pUrvavat|  saptamyantAdvatiH|  yathA prathamaM raktadarCane snidhaCItalAdi hitaM, tathA~atrApi pUrvanirdiSTaM snigdhAdi hitamityarthaH|  snigdhaCItAni bhAhyAntarupayojyAni|

garbhe nipatite tIkSNaM madyaM sAmarthyataH pibet||9|| garbhakoSThaviCuddyarthamartivismaraNAya ca||10|| laghunA paJcamUlena rUkSAM peyAM tataH pibet||10|| peyAmamadyapA kalke sAdhitAM pAJcakaulike||11|| bilvAdipaJcakakvAthe tiloddAlakataNDulaiH||11|| mAsatulyadinAnyevaM peyAdiH patite kramaH||12|| laghurasnehalavaNo dIpanIyayuto hitaH||12||

garbhiNyA evamAsevamAnAyA apyadRSTavaCAdgarbhe nipatite-niHCeSeNa patite sati, tIkSNaM-karkaCaM, madyaM sAmarthyena pibet,-bahu pibedityarthaH|  kimartham ? ityAha-garbhakoSThetyAdi|  garbhakoSThaviCuddhyarthamarteH-pIDAyAH, vismRtyarthaM ca|  tato-madyapariNAmAdanantaraM, rUkSAM peyAM pibet|  kimbhUtAm ?  laghunA paJcamUlena-bRhatyAdinA (hR.sU.a.6/168), kRtAm|  amadyapA tu yA strI sA garbhe nipatite peyAM pibet, na tu madyam|  kva sAdhitAM ?  kalke| kiM sambandhini ?  pAJcakaulike,-paJcakolasyAyaM pAJcakaulikaH, tasmin|  paJcakolakaM kalkIkRtya tatra peyAM sAdhitAmityarthaH|  tathA, bilvAdipaJcakakvAthe-mahatpaJcamUlakaSAye (hR. sU. a. 6/167) , sAdhitAM peyAM pibediti yojyam|  kaiH sAdhitAm ? tiloddAlakataNDulaiH|  uddAlako - vrIhiviCeSaH|  mAsaistulyAni dinAni-mAsasaGkhyA vAsarAH| yAvanto mAsA garbhasya tAvantyahAni garbhe nipatite sati, evaM-pUrvoktena prakAreNa, peyAdiH kramaH kAryaH|  kimbhUtaH ?  laghurasnehalavaNaH|  na vidyete snehalavaNe yasya|  tatha, dIpanIyaiH-agnikRdbhirmaricacitrakAdibhirdravyairyutaH|  saH-tathAvidhaH, tatra kramo hitaH|  

doSadhAtuparikledaCoSArthaM vidhirityayam||13||

doSau-pittakaphAvatra gRhyete|  vAtasya kledAsambhavAt| doSau ca dhAtavaCca, teSAM parikledaH, tasya CoSArthaM-CoSaNAya, ayaM vidhiriti|

snehAnnabastayaCcordhvaM balyadIpanajIvanAH||13||

UrdhvaM-ato doSadhAtuparikledaCoSAdanantaraM, snehAnnabastayo hitAH|  snehaCcaturvidhaH pAnAdau hitaH|  tathA, annaM snigdhaM na rUkSaM, hitam|  bastayo~api snigdhA eva-na rUkSA hitAH, vAtakopabhayAt|  kimbhUtAH snehAnnabastayaH ?  balyadIpanajIvanAH|  balyAH-balAya hitAH| dIpanAH-vahneH sandhukSaNakRtaH|  tathA, jIvanAH-ojovRddhikarAH| 

saJjAtasAre mahati garbhe yoniparisravAt||14|| vRddhimaprApnuvan garbhaH koSThe tiSThati sasphuraH||14|| upaviSTakamAhustaM, varddhate tena nodaram||15||

saJjAtaH sAro-balaM, yasyAsau saJjAtasAro-balavAn garbhaH, tasmin|  tathA, mahati-pravRddhe sati|  garbhiNyAH parihAryAparihAradyo~asau yoneH parisravaH-parisravaNaM, tasmAt|  parisrava iti ca sAmAnyena nirdeCAt kadAcidraktarUpaH kadAcidanyAdRCo~api garbhAtsravati|  parisravAcca kAraNAt vRddhimaprApnuvan-agacchan, koSTha eva-garbhAdhAra eva, tiSThati garbhaH| yato yoniparisravAtkAraNAt vAyuH kupitaH pittaCleSmANau parigRhya garbhasya rasavahAM nADIm pratipIDyAvatiSThate|  tato nADyAM doSaiH kulyAyAmiva tRNapatrAdibhiH praticchannAyAM rasasyAsamyagvahanAnnADIrodhAdvRddhyabhAvo garbhasya|  kimbhUtaH koSThe tiSThati ?  sasphuraH|  sphuraNaM - sphuraH|  ajvidhau bhayAdInAmupasaGkhyAnamityac|  gAGkuTAdibhyo JNiGiditi GittvAdguNAbhAvaH|  saha sphureNa-calanena, vartata iti sasphuraH|  etAvanmAtraviCeSAvasthaH koSThe tiSThati|  taM-tathAvidhaM garbhaM, upaviSTakasaMjJamAhuH|  'munayaH' iti CeSaH| tena-tathAbhUtena garbheNa koSThasthitena, tasyA udaraM na varddhate-na vRddhiM yAti, garbhasyaivAvRddheH| na hi yadyasya vRddhau varddhate tadavRddhau tasya vRddhiH syAt|  tathA hi,-candravRddhAveva samudravelAyA vRddhiH|  upaviSTakAvasthaCca garbho na varddhate|  atastatkAraNAbhavAdudarasyApyavRddhiH|

CokopavAsarUkSAdyairathavA yonyatisravAt||15|| vAte kruddhe kRCaH CuSyedgarbho nAgodaraM tu tam||16|| udaraM vRddhamapyatra hIyate sphuraNaM cirAt||16||

CokopavAsarUkSAdyaiH-garbhagarbhiNyapacayakAribhiH pavanaprakopakAribhirhetubhiH, vAte kruddhe-kupite, athavA garbhagarbhiNyorupacayapradairAhAravihArairupacitayorgarbhagarbhiNyorapi kadAcidatyarthaM raktasrutikAraNAnyAseveta strI, tadAnIM tasyA yonyatisravo jAyate|  tasmAdyonyatisravAtkAraNAdapi pavane kupite, kRCo garbhaH sampadyate|  CuSyedityatra caCabdo luptanirdiSTo draSTavyaH|  na kevalaM kRCo bhavati CuSyeccetyarthaH|  taM-tathAbhUtaM garbhaM, nAgodarasaMjJakaM keSAMcinmate copaCuSkakasaMjJakaM vidyAt|  atra-nAgodarasaMjJake garbhe~antaHsthite, udaraM vRddhamapi-mahadapi sat, hIyate-hAniM yAti|  sphuraNaM ca cirAt-cireNa bhavati|  upaviSTake tu kevalamavRddhirna tu hAniH|

tayorbRMhaNavAtaghnamadhuradravyasaMskRtaiH||17|| ghRtakSIrarasaistRptirAmagarbhAMCca khAdayet||17|| taireva ca subhikSAyAH kSobhaNaM yAnavAhanaiH||18||

tayoH-upaviSTakanAgodarAkhyayorgarbhayoH, ghRtakSIrarasaistRptirgarbhiNyAH kAryeti CeSaH|  kimbhUtaistaiH ? bRMhaNavAtaghnamadhuradravyasaMskRtaiH-siddhaiH|  bRMhaNAni ca tAni vAtaghnAni ca madhurANi ca, evaMbhUtAni yAni dravyANi drAkSACarkarAdIni, na tu vyastAni bRMhaNAni vAtaghnAni madhurANi ca|  tatra kevalaM bRMhaNAni-priyaGguprabhRtIni, na tu vAtaghnAni|  vAtaghnAni ca bRMhaNAni, na tu madhurarasAni, yathA-nAgarAdIni|  madhurANi na vAtaghnAni nApi bRMhaNAni, yathA-taNDulIyamasUrAdIni|  tadetairvyastaguNairdravyaiH saMskRtena ghRtAdinA tRptirna kAryA, kiM tarhi ?  samastabRMhaNAdiguNayuktairdravyaiH saMskRtairiti bodhyam|  tathA ca saGgrahe~adhijage (CA.a.4)-'tayorjIvanIyabRMhaNIyamadhurauSadhasiddhAnAM sarpiSAmupayogaH|" ityAdi|  tathA, tadgarbhapuSTaye tAM garbhiNImAmagarbhAMCca khAdayet, vaidya iti CeSaH|  AmagarbhAn khAdantyAH kadAcidgarbhiNyA jugupsA syAt, ato garbhagarbhiNyordvayorapi vyApado bhaveyuriti Nyanto~atra khAdirnirdiSTaH|  vaidyo hi tAM tathA yuktyA khAdayet, yathA~asau na jugupseta|  AmagarbhA aparipUrNagarbhA ucyante|  tathA, taireva -bRMhaNAdidravyasaMskRtairghRtakSIrarasairAmagarbhaiCca, subhikSAyAH-tRptiM prAptAyAH, kSobhaNaM kAryam|  kaiH ? yAnaiH-rathAdibhiH, vAhanaiH gajaturagAdibhiH|  tatrAropya tAM garbhiNIM vegena nayedityarthaH|

lInAkhye nisphure CyenagomatsyotkroCabarhijAH||18||  rasA bahughRtA deyA mASamUlakajA api||19|| bAlabilvaM tilAnmASAnsaktUMCca payasA pibet||19|| samedyamAMsaM madhu vA kaTyabhyaGgaM ca CIlayet||20||

asyopiviSTakanAgodarAbhyAmeva hetulakSaNayoruktatvAt yadeva nisphuraNatvAdi viCeSAntaraM tadeveha tantrakRtoktam| saGgrahe tu papATha (CA. a. 4)- "yasyAH punarvAtopasRSThasrotaso lIno garbhaH prasupto na spandate taM lInamityAhuH|" iti|  tatra lInAkhye garbhe sati garbhiNyAH CyenAdijA rasA bahughRtA deyAH|  AdiCabdena (upalakSaNatvena) [ saGgrahoktAnAM ] tittirikukkuTAdInAM grahaNam|  tathA, mASamUlakajA rasA bahughRtA deyAH|  tathA, sAtmyAdivaCAt bAlavilbAdIn samastAnaikadhyaM kRtvA kSIreNa pibet|  tathA saha meduramAMsena mArdvIkaM vA pibet| kaTyAM cAbhyaGgaM CIlayet-abhyaset|

harSayetsatataM cainAmevaM garbhaH pravarddhate||20||

satataM-muhurmuhuCca, enAM-garbhiNImupaviSTakanAgodaralInAkhyagarbhodarasthAM, harSayet-muditAM kuryAt| evaM-anayetikartavyatayA kRtayA, garbhaH pravarddhate-vRddhiM yAti|

puSTo~anyathA varSagaNaiH kRcchrAjjAyeta, naiva vA||21||

anyathA-anyena prakAreNa pUrvoktaviparyayeNa rUkSAtmanA sevitena mAturAhArarasenAlpena, puSTaH-cetanAmAtrAvaCeSa eva, vatsarasandohaiH kRcchrAjjAyeta-kaSTena yonito niSkrAmet|  naiva veti|  athavA yAvajjIvaM garbhINyAH kukSAvevAvasIdet na tato niSkrAmet kukSAvevAvatiSTheta|

 udAvartaM tu garbhINyAH snehairACutarAM jayet||21|| yogyaiCca bastibhirhanyAtsagarbhAM sa hi garbhINIm||22||

garbhiNyA yadyudAvartAkhyo vyAdhiH syAt, taM snehaiH-caturbhiryathAyogyauSadhasAdhitaiH pAnAdinA sevitaiH, ACutarAM-atitvaritaM, jayet|  tathA, yogyaiH-tatkAlocitaiH, bastibhiH-anuvAsanaiH, jayet|  nanu, garbhiNyA varjyeSu "bastimAmAsato~aSTamAt" iti prAguktam (hR. CA. a. 1/47)|  tatkathamiha sAmAnyenAnuvAsanaM tantrakRdupAdikSat ?  ityAha-hanyAdityAdi|  sa yasmAdudAvarto garbheNa saha garbhiNIM hanyAt, atastamACutarAM jayet|

garbhe~atidoSopacayAdapathyairdaivato~api vA||22|| mRte~antarudaraM CItaM stabdhaM dhmAtaM bhRCavyatham||23|| garbhAspando bhramatRSNA kRcchrAducchvasanaM klamaH||23|| aratiH srastanetratvamAvInAmasamudbhavaH||24||

doSANAM-vAtAdInAM, upacayaH-pravRddhatvam, atiCayena doSopacayo~atidoSopacayaH, tasmAddhetoH, antaH-udaramadhye, garbhe mRte sati, apathyaiH-svabhAvamAtrAkAlAdiviruddhasvabhAvairvA, antarmRte, athavA daivAt (daivataH)-anyajanmArjitaCubhACubhakarmavaCAt, antarmRte garbhe sati, garbhINyA udaraM CItaM-USmarahitaM, bhavati|  tathA, stabdhaM-niCcalaM, bhavati|  tathA, dhmAtaM - dRtivadvAtapUritam|  tathA, bhRCavyathaM-ativedanaM, bhavati|  tathA, garbhAspando-garbhasyAsphuraNaM, bhramastRSNA ca bhavati|  tathA, kRcchrAt-kRcchreNa, garbhINyA ucchvasanaM-UrdhvaCvasanam|  tathA klamo-glAniH|  tathA, aratiH-sthAnAsanaCayanAdiSvanavasthitatvaM cetasaH|  tathA, sraste ca te netre ca, tayorbhAvaH srastanetratvam, sraste-sthAnAccyute iva|  tathA, AvInAM-AsannaprasavakAlajaCUlaviCeSANAM, asamudbhavaH-anutpAdaH|

tasyAH koSNAmbusiktAyAH piSTvA yoniM pralepayet||25|| guDaM kiNvaM salavaNaM tathAntaH pUrayenmuhuH||25|| ghRtena kalkIkRtayA CAlmalyatasipicchayA||25|| mantrairyogairjarAyUktairmUDhagarbho na cetpatet||26|| athApRcchyeCvaraM vaidyo yatnenACu tamAharet||26|| hastamabhyajya yoniM ca sAjyaCAlmalipicchayA||27|| hastena CakyaM tenaiva--------------------------||27||

tasyAH-antarmRtagarbhAyAH ISaduSNajalasiktAyA yoniM pralepayet-pradehayet|  guDAdikaM piSTvA sAmarthyAdguDAdikenaiva lepayediti yojyam|  tathA~antaH pUrayet, CAlmalyatasipicchayeti sambandhanIyam|   yoneH prakRtatvAttasyA antaH-abhyantaraM, antarbahiCca|  kIdRCyA picchayA ?  ghRtena kalkIkRtayA,-piSTayA|  evaM yonermuhurmuhurabhyantaraM pUrayitvA~anantaraM mUDhagarbhapAtanArthaM mantrAn siddhAn prayojayet|  tathA, jarAyUktAH-jarAyvapatane kathitAH tAMCca yogAn prayojayet|  mantraiH-saGgrahoktaiH (CA. a.3)-"kSitirjalaM" ityAdibhiH, atharvavedoktaiCca mantrairjarAyoH pAtanArthamuktaiH|  evamanuSThIyamAne~api mUDhagarbho yadi na patati, atha-anantaraM, ICvaraM-nRpaM, ApRcchya-tadAjJAM gRhItvA, taM-mUDhagarbhaM, ACu garbhiNyA Aharet-AkarSet|  katham ?  hastamabhyajya-lepayitvA, tathA yonimabhyajya|  kena ?  sAjyetyAdi|  CAlmalyAH picchA CAlmalipicchA-niryAsaH, sahAjyena vartata iti sAjyA, sAjyA CAsau CAlmalipicchA ca tayA, hastaM yoniM cAbhyajya yatnena garbhamAharet|  hastena CakyamAkraSTuM tenaiva-hastena sAjyaCAlmalipicchAktena, taM-garbhaM, samAkarSet|

 ------------gAtraM ca viSamaM sthitam||27|| AJchanotpIDasampIDavikSepotkSepaNAdibhiH||28|| Anulomya samAkarSedyoniM pratyArjavAgatam||28||

gAtraM ca garbhasya viSamaM kRtvA sthitaM-ayathAmArgeNa sthitaM, AJchanAdibhirAnulomya-spaSTatvaM prApte gAtre sati, yonyabhimukhamArjavena-RjumArgeNAgataM santaM, Aharet|  AJchanena-AyAmena dIrghatayA sthApanena, tathotpIDanena-UrdhvaM pIDanena, tathA samantAtpIDanena, tathA vikSepeNa-viCeSapreraNena, tathA utkarSeNa kSepaNaM-utkSepaNaM tena, AdigrahaNAdevaMprAyairanyairapi svabuddhiparikalpitaiH, spaSTatvaM prApte sati| 

hastapAdaCirobhiryo yoniM bhugnaH prapadyate||29|| pAdena yonimekena bhugno~anyena gudaM ca yaH||29|| viSkambhau nAma tau mUDhau CastradAraNamarhataH||30||

hastena pAdena CirasA, atulyakAlaM-kadAciddhastena kadAcitpAdena kadAcicchirasA, yoniM prati bhugnaH-kuTilaH, prapadyate - AyAti, yaH sa eko viSkambho nAma mUDhagarbhaH|  tathA, pAdenaikena yoniM tathA dvitIyapAdena gudaM-pAyuM, bhugnaH san yo mUDhagarbhaH prapadyate, so~aparo viSkambhaH|  tau-etau dvau, viSkambhau nAma mUDhau-mUDhagarbhau, CastradAraNamarhataH|  hastenAkraSTumaCakyatvAttayoH CastradAraNaM kAryamityarthaH|

pUrvaM CiraHsambandhIni kapAlAni viCodhayet|  kiM kRtvA ? yadyadvAyuvaCAdaGgaM sajjedgarbhasya khaNDaCaH||35|| tattacchittvA~~AharetsamyagrakSennArIM ca yatnataH||35||

yadyadaGgaM mUDhagarbhasya vAyuvaCAt sajjet-saMCliSyet, tattadaGgaM khaNDaCo-lavaCaH, cchitvA-dArayitvA, samyagAharet|  kilaika -velayA sakalagarbhaCarIracchedanAdantasthitamUDhagarbhAyA nAryA api balavacchastranipAtanAdvighAtaH sambhAvyata iti khaNDaCa ityuktam|   ata evAha-rakSedityAdi|  nArIM ca yatnena-tAtparyaM kRtvA, rakSet|   yathA nAryA aGgaM kiJcidapi na chidyate tathA vidheyamityarthaH|

SaDaGgaM-SaDavayavaM, aGgaM-CarIram|  tAnyeva SaDaGgAnyAha -CiraH, tathA~antarAdhiH,  tathA dvau bAhU-vAmadakSiNau, tathA sakthinI dve-vAmadakSiNe, iti-evaM, samAsataH-saGkSepeNa, SaDaGgam|  vistareNa punaranekAvayavam|  antarAdhiCabdena CirobAhusakthivarjaH sarvo madhyabhAga ucyate|  AdhIyante-nibadhyante yathAyathaM CarIrasyAntaH sthApyante prAkkRtena karmaNA CiraHprabhRtayaH paJcAvayavA yasmin so~antarAdhiH|  tasya-SaDavayavasyAGgasya, akSihRdayAdikaM pratyaGgam|  AdiCabdena karNanAsApANipAdAdiparigrahaH|  avayavamavayavaM prati yo~avayavaH, tatpratyaGgamucyate| CarIraM vyomavAyvAdipaJcamahAbhUtAtmakaM cetanAdInAmadhiSThAnam|

CabdAdayaH paJca guNAH kramAt-krameNa, khAdInAM paJcAnAM bhavanti|  khaM cAnilaCcAgniCcApaCca bhUCca khAnilagnyabbhuvaH, tAsAm|  tatra CabdaH khasya-AkACasya guNaH, suSire~atiriktasparCAdiguNacatuSTayAyogitvena CabdamAtrasyaivopalambhAt|  sparCo vAyoH|  rUpamagneH|  raso~apAM-pAnIyasya|  gandho bhUmeH|  eteSAM guNAnAM khAdyACritatvAtteSAM guNA ityucyante|  

--------------------ekaguNavRddhyanvayaH pare||2||

ekena guNena vRddhiH, tayA~anvayaH-sambandhaH|  pare-vAyvAdau mahAbhUte|  athavA, ekasya guNasya vRddhiH, tayA~anvayaH-anugamastadbhAvitvaM para iti|  caturNAM mahAbhUtAnAM paratvoktibhAktvamAkACApekSayA|  tena vAyvAdau mahAbhUte ekaguNavRddhyanvayaH|  AkACastvekaguNa eva|  tasya paratvAsambhavAnna tasyaikaguNavRdhdyanvayaH|  AkACAtpare-anantare mahAbhUte vAyvAkhye, ekaguNa vRddhyanvayena dviguNatvAt CabdasparCaguNatvam|  tataH pare mahAbhUte~agnyAkhye, ekaguNavRddhyanvayena triguNatvAt CabdasparCarUpaguNatvam|  tataH pare-jalAkhye mahAbhUte, ekaguNavRddhyanvayena caturguNatvAt CabdasparCarUparasaguNatvam|  tataH pare-pRthivyAkhye mahAbhUte, ekaguNavRddhyanvayena paJcaguNatvAt CabdasparCarUparasagandhaguNatvam|  evaM paJcAnAM khAdInAmekaguNavRddhyaikadvitricatuH paJcaguNatvaM bodhyam|  idAnIM yathAkramanirdiSTebhyo bhUtebhyo ye bhAvA bhavanti, tAn darCayati-

tatra khAt khAni dehe~asmin CrotraM Cabdo viviktatA||3|| vAtAtsparCatvagucchvAsA vahnerdRgrUpapaktayaH||3||  ApyA jihvArasakledA ghrANagandhAsthi pArthivam||4||

[tatra-] teSu paJcasu mahAbhUteSu madhye, asmin dehe-manuSyAdau sthUlatayA pariNate, nAnyasminnatIndriye bhUtAdau|  khAt-AkACAt satvabahulAt, khAni-chidrANi, 'bhavanti' iti CeSaH|  evaM CrotrendriyAdhiSThAnaM-Crotram|  tathA, Cabdo-ghoSaH|  tathA, viviktatA-CUnyatA riktatA, khAdeva cidraviCeSaH|  yadyapi chidrAdiSu sarvabhUtAnAmeva vyApAraH, tathA~apyAkACasyaivAtra viCiSTaM kAraNatvam|  yathA-ghaTAdau mRddaNDacakrasalilasUtrAdikAraNasamudAyaniSpanne~api mRda eva viCiSTakAraNatvam|  ata evAsau mRnmaya evocyate|  evaM sarveSu vakSyamANeSu vAtAdijeSu sparCAdiSu bodhyam|  vAtAt-anilAdrajobahulAt, sparCAdayo bhavanti|  sparCaH-sparCanam|  tvagiha sparCanendriyAdhiSThAnam| tathA, ucchvAsaH-prANAkhyaH|  vahneH satvarajobahulAddRgAdayo bhavanti|  dRk-dRSTiH, cakSurindriyAdhiSThAnam|  tathA, rUpAkhyo guNaH|  paktiH-pAkaH|  upalakSaNaM cedam|  tejaHpittoSmamedhAvarNaCauryAdayo~api vahnereva vedyAH|  abhdyaH satvatamobahulAbhyo jAtA ApyA jihvAdayo bhavanti|  jihvACabdenAtra jihvAyA viCiSTa ekadeCo rasanendriyAdhiSThAnaM vivakSitaH, na sarvaiva jihvA|  tathA, rasAkhyo guNaH|  tathA, kledAkhyo bhAvaH|  upalakSaNaM cedam|  svedasnehamUtrAdayo~apyApyA eva|  ghrANAdi pArthivaM bhavati|  ghrANaM-nAsAyA viCiSTa ekadeCo ghrANendriyAdhiSThAnam| gandho guNaH|  tathA, asthi bhAvaH|  etAni sarvANi pRthivyAkhyAttamobahulAnmahAbhUtAjjAtAni|  

mRdvatra mAtRjaM raktamAMsamajjagudAdikam||4|| paitRkaM tu sthiraM CukradhamanyasthikacAdikam||5|| caitanaM cittamakSANi nAnAyoniSu janma ca||5||

atra-asmin dehe, anekasAmagrIke~api yanmRdu vastu tanmAtRjam|  mAturAdhikyena kAraNabhAva ityarthaH|  mAtRjamiti "paJcamyAmajAtau" iti janerDaH|  kiM punastanmRdu ?  ityAha-raktetyAdi|  AdiCabdena nAbhIhRdayayakRtplIhAmACayAdInAM grahaNam|  nanu, gudasya mAMsaprAyatvAnmAMsagrahaNenaiva siddhaM grahaNam|  tat kiM gudagrahaNena ?  brUmaH|  mAMsatvasyApyasyAniCcayAt pRthagupAdAnaM kRtam|  tathA ca vakSyati (hR.CA.a.4/45)-"mAMsamarma gudo~anyeSAM" iti|  yadvastu sthiraM tat paitRkaM-pitRjam|  kiM tat ?  ityAha-CukrAdikam|  AdiCabdena CirAsnAyuromAdInAM grahaNam|  paitRkamiti "pituryacca" iti Thak|  "isusuktAntAtkaH" iti kAdeCaH|  cetanA-Atmaiva, prAkkRtaCubhACubhakarmabIjakSetramityarthaH|  tato jAtaM caitanam|  kiM tat ?  ityAha -cittamityAdi|  cittaM-indriyasArathiH|  tathA, akSANi-CrotrAdIni|  nanu, caitanAnyakSANItyetatpUrvAparavyAhatamiva manyAmahe|  yataH pUrvamuktam (Clo.3)-"khAtkhAni dehe~asmin" iti|  tatkathamiha caitanAnyakSANItyucyante ?  brUmaH|  nAtra tatra vA~avadhAraNaM kRtam|  yathA caitanAnyevAkSANi khAdeva khAnIti|  tasmAdAkACaM cetanA ca dvayamapyakSANAM kAraNamityavehi|  tathA, nAnAyoniSu-gajAjavAjibastaCaCaCambaraprabhRtiSu, yajjanma-sambhavaH, tadapi caitanam|  upalakSaNaM cedam|  kAmakrodhalobhabhayaharSadharmAdharmaCIlatAsmRtibuddhIcchAdveSaprayatnAhaGkArasukhaduHkhAyuHsvaraviCeCAdayo~api hi caitanA eva|

sAtmyajaM tvAyurArogyamanAlasyaM prabhA balam||6||

sAtmyaM trividham, vyAdhisAtmyaM deCasAtmyaM dehasAtmyaM ca|  tatreha vyAdhisAtmyaM na gRhyate|  yato dehasya sambhavataH sambhUtamAtrasya ceyaM vicAraNA prastutA, kutaH kiM sambhavati? iti|  ato vyAdhicarcehAprastAvAnnopayujyate|  [tasmAddeCasAtmyaM dehasAtmyaM ca gRhyate|  dehasya hi sambhavataH sambhUtamAtrasya ca mAtrAhAravihArAdi yadapathyamapyatiCayena CIlitaM tadapyasya dehasyocitatAM gacchatsukhAnubandhatvena sAtmyamucyate|] tasmAddeCasAtmyaM dehasAtmyam ca grahItuM yuktam|  sAtmyAjjAtaM-sAtmyajam|  kiM tat ?  rasajaM vapuSo janma vRttirvRddhiralolatA||6||

rasAt-AhArarasAt pariNatAjjAtaM rasajam|  kiM tat ?  janma,-sambhavaH|  kasya ?  vapuSaH,-sakalasya CarIrasya|  tathA, vRttiH-vartanaM, jIvitAnubandhaH|  rasaM hi vinA jIvitasyApyabhAvaH|  tathA, vRddhiH-AyAmavistarAbhyAM yathAsaMsthAnasya CarIrasyAdhikyam|  tathA, alolatA-alaulyam|  alolatA rasajeti liGgavipariNAme sati sambandhaH|  udAharaNamAtraM cedam|  utsAhapuSTitRptayo~api hi rasajA eva|

sAtivikaM CaucamAstikyaM CukladharmarucirmatiH||7|| rAjasaM bahubhASitvaM mAnakRddambhamatsaram||7|| tAmasaM bhayamajJAnaM nidrA~~AlasyaM viSAditA||8||

atrinandano dve sahasre sandhInAM nijagAda-provAca|  sa hi snAyupeCIsirACritaiH sandhibhiH saha gaNayati|  etacca bAhulyenoktam|  tathA hi-navasu snAyuCateSu navaCatAni sandhInAm, paJcasu peCICateSu paJcaCatAni,, saptasu sirACateSu saptaCatAni, ityekaviMCatiCatAni prAyeNa prApnuvantIti manyAmahe|

snAvnAM navaCatI-----------------------------||17||

snAyUnAmasmin dehe navaCatI|  navAnAM CatAnAM samAhAro navaCatI, "dvigoH" iti GIp, navaCatAnItyarthaH|  tatra "pade paJca syuraGgulyaH pratyaGguli tu tAni SaT|  triMCadevaM, daCa daCa kUrce pAdatale tathA|| 1||  gulphe ceti, triMCadeva jaGghAyAM, daCa jAnuni|  catvAriMCatsyurUrau ca, vaGkSaNe daCa, sakthini|| 2|| sArdhaM CataM, dvitIye~api tadvadbAhvoCca sakthivat|  CAkhAsvevaM SaTCatAni, kaTyAM dve viMCatI smRte|| 3|| viMCatirmuSkayormeDhrabastyantreSu ca kIrtitAH|  aCItiH pRSThabhAge syuH, pArCvayoH SaSTirakSayoH|| 4|| catvAryurasyaSTadaCa, aSTAvaMsayuge smRtAH|  madhye CatadvayaM triMCadve dve manyAvaTau smRte|| 5||  netrauSThatAluni tathA, grIvAyAM triMCadIritAH|  jatruNi trINi, catvAri hanvoH paJca tu kIrtitAH|| 6||  jihvAyAM, dantamAMseSu dvAdaCaivAtha mUrdhni SaT|  evaM CatAni snAyUnAM navaiteSu vinirdeCet|| 7||  AmapakvACayAntreSu bastau ca suSirANi tu| pratAnavanti CAkhAsu mahAsnAvAni kaNDArAH|| 8||  vRttAni, pArCva pRSThoraHCirasi syuH pRthUni ca|  sirAdibhyo~apyasthito~api rakSetsnAvAni yatnataH|| 9||" iti|  tathA coktam (suCrute CA. a. 5/35)-  "na hyasthIni tathA hiMsyurna peCyo na ca sandhayaH|  vyApAditA api sirA yathA snAyUni dehinAm||  snAyUni yo vetti samyagbAhyAnyAbhyantarANi ca|  sa gUDhaM CalyamAhartuM dehAcchaknoti dehinaH||" iti|

-------------------paJca puMsAM peCICatAni tu||17|| adhikA viMCatiH strINAM yonistanasamACritAH||18||

peCyaH samprati bhaNyante paJcAGgulyo~atha tAsu tAH|  pratyekaM tisra ityevaM tAH paJcadaCa kIrtitAH|| 1||  daCa pAdatale gulphe tathA pAdasya copari|  kUrce tu (ca) viMCatiH syAttu jaGghAyAM, paJca jAnuni|| 2|| Urau viMCatirityevaM CataM sakthnyekato bhavet|  CataM dvitIye~api tathA, sakthivadbhujayormatAH|| 3|| catvAryevaM CatAni syuH CAkhAsvekaiva mehane|  sIvanyAM ca, vRSaNayordve, sphijostu daCa smRtAH|| 4|| tisro gude, bastimUrdhni dve, catasrastu koSTagAH|  nAbhyAmekA~atha, hRdyekA, syAdekA~~AmACaye~api, SaT|| 5||  yakRtplIhondukeSu, syuCcatasraH, pRSThato daCa|  pArCvayorvakSasi daCa, catasraCcAkSakAMsayoH|| 6||  ityantarAdhau SaSTiH, syurgrIvAyAM daCa, gaNDayoH|  aSTau, hanupradeCe~aSTAvekaikA kAkale tathA|| 7||  jihvAyAM mUrdhni galake, dve lalATe~atha tAluni (dve dve tAlulalATayoH)|  dve oSThayoH, karNayordve, nAsAyAM dve ca kIrtite|| 8||  puruSANAM bhavedetatpeCInAM CatapaJcakam|  daCAdhikAH syuH stanayordaCa yonau ca yoSitAm|| 9|| pratyekaM stanayoH paJca, tAsAM vRddhistu yauvane|  yonyantarACrite dve tu dve ca vRtte mukhACrite|| 10||  garbhamArgACrayAstisro yatra garbho~avatiSThate|  CaGkhanAbhyAkRtiryonistryAvartA jAyate striyAH|| 11||  tasyAstRtIya Avarte rohitasyAkRtirbhavet|  garbhaCayyA~atha tisraCca bhaveyuH sampraveCikAH|| 12||  Cukrasya cArtavasyaivaM peCIstantravido viduH| iti| (saGgrahe coktam CA.a.5)- "etAbhirhi CarIre tanubahalasthUlANuvakravRttahrasvadIrghasthiramRduClakSNakarkaCAbhiH sandhyasthisirAsnAvAni pracchAditAni|  sirAdhamanInAM cANuCo vibhajyamAnAnAmekonatriMCacchatasahasrANi nava ca CatANi SaTpaJcACAni bhavanti|  tAbhiridaM CarIraM gavAkSitaM pinaddhamAtataM ca|  tAvanti ca keCaCmaCrulomAni|  tAsAM hi mukhAni tatpratibaddhAni|  atastAni tAbhirApyAyyante|  taiCca tAH svedamabhivahanti|  tathA~abhyaGgAlepAdivIryaM tvaci vipakvamantarnayanti|  sparCaM ca gRhNanti|  srotAMsi punarasaGkhyeyAnyeva|" iti|  anye tvAhuH-"CarIre romNAM dvAsaptatiH koTyo bhavanti|" iti| 

CArIrasthAnam

aGgavibhAgaH adhyAyaH

daCa mUlasirA hRtsthAstAH sarvaM sarvato vapuH||18|| rasAtmakaM vahantyojastannibaddhaM hi ceSTitam||19||

hRdi tiSThantIti hRtsthAH, daCa mUlasirAH| yato~anyAsAM sirANaM sarvAsAM mUlabhUtatvenaivaitAH sthitAH, tataH pradhAnabhUtA ityarthaH|  hRtsthAH-hRdayasambaddhAH|  tAH sarvaM vapuH-sakalaM dehaM, ojo vahanti-prApayanti|  katham ?  sarvataH,-sarvadikkam|  vapurojo vahantIti vaherdvikarmakatvAt vapurojaCca karma|  kimbhUtamojaH ? rasAtmakaM,-rasasvabhAvam, AhArAtsArakiTTatayA pariNatAt sAram|  tannivaddhaM hi ceSTitam|  tAsu-daCasu sirAsu, nibaddhaM-niCcayena sthitaM, ceSTitaM-vAkkAyamanovyApAraH|  hiCabdo yasmAdarthe|  yasmAttannibaddhaM ceSTitamatastA mUlasirAH|  

 sthUlamUlAH susUkSmAgrAH patrarekhApratAnavat||19||  bhidyante tAstataH saptaCatanyAsAM bhavanti tu||20||

sthUlaM mUlaM yAsAM tA evam|  suSTu sUkSmamagraM-prAnto yAsAM tA evam|  sthUlamUlatvena tAsAM vyAnavAyuvikSipto rasaH CIghrameva cAntaH praviCati|  sUkSmaprAntatvena romarAjyAmapyantaH praviCya teSAM romNAM vRddhihetuH sampadyate|  tataCcAsmin dehe sthUlamUlAH susUkSmAgrAH patrarekApratAnavat bhidyante-anekadhA sampadyante|  yathA, vRkSasya palACarekAnAM pratAnAH-samUhAH, sthUlamUlAH susUkSmAgrA anekadhA jAyante tathaivaitAH sirAH sthUlamUlAH sUkSmAgrA anekadhA sampadyante nAnArUpA yataH, tataH-tasmAddhetoH, palACarekhApratAnavadanekadhA gamanAdAsAM sirANAM saptaCatAni bhavanti|  tuCabdo~avadhAraNe bhinnakramaH, saptaiva CatAni|

tatraikaikaM ca CAkhAyAM CataM, tasminna vedhayet||20|| sirAM jAlandharAM nAma tisraCcAbhyantarACritAH||21||

tAsAmekaikasmin sakthni Catam|  tasmin-sirACate, sirAM jAlandharAM nAma-yA jAlAni dhArayati tAM, na vidhyet|  tisraCceti|  yACcAnyAstisraH sirA abhyantarACritAH-antarmukhAH, tA api na vedhyA iti caCabdArthaH|  evaM sakthnyACrite sirACate catasraH sirA na vedhyAH|  dvitIye~api sakthni catasra eva|  sakthivadbAhvorapi|  evaM caturSu sirACateSu CAkhAsvACriteSu SoDaCa sirA na vedhyAH|

SoDaCadviguNAH CroNyAM, tAsAM dve dve tu vaGkSaNe||21|| dve dve kaTikataruNe CastreNASTau spRCenna tAH||22||

SaTtriMCacchatamantarAdhau|  tatra SoDaCadviguNAH CroNyAM-dvAtriMCaccroNyavayavACritA sirAH|  tAsAM madhye dve dve tu vaGkSaNe - dvayorvaGkSaNayoH pratyekaM dve sire| dve dve kaTIkataruNe-dvayoH kaTIkataruNayoH pratyekaM dve sire|  evaM CroNyACritA aSTau sirAH CastreNa n spRCet|

pArCvayoH SoDaCaikaikAmUrdhvagAM varjayettayoH||22||

pArCvayoH SoDaCa sirAH|  tAsAmekaikAmUrdhvagAM pArCvasandhisaMjJAM pratyekaM varjayet|

dvAdaCadviguNAH pRSThe pRSThavaMCasya pArCvayoH||23|| dve dve tatrordhvagAminyau na CastreNa parAmRCet||23||

dvAdaCadviguNAH pRSThe-caturviMCatiH sirAH pRSThamACritAH|  tAsAM pRSThavaMCasya pArCvayoH-pRSThavaMCamubhayataH, dve dve tatrordhvagAminyau|  evaM catasraH CastreNa na parAmRCet|

pRSThavajjaThare tAsAM mehanasyopari sthite||24|| romarAjImubhayato dve dve CastreNa na spRCet||24||

pRSThavajjaThare-pRSThena tulyAH sirA udare, tatsaGkhyA caturviMCatirityarthaH|  tAsAM-udarACritAnAM CirANAM madhyAt, mehanasya meDhrasyopari sthite, romarAjImubhayataH-ubhayapArCvayoH, dve dve sire|  evaM catasraH sirAH|  tAH CastreNa na parAmRCet|

catvAriMCadurasyAsAM caturdaCa na vedhayet||25|| stanarohitatanmUlahRdaye tu pRthagdvayam||25|| apastambhAkhyayorekAM tathA~apAlApayorapi||26||

catvAriMCadurasi sirAH|  tAsAM madhyAt caturdaCa sirA na vedhayet|  tA eva darCayati-stanarohitetyAdi|  tayoH-stanayormUle tanmUle|  tatra stanarohitayoH, tathA stanamUlayoH tathA hRdaye, pRthak-pratyekaM, dvayaM-dve dve sire, na vidhyet|  apastambhAkhyayoH pratyekamekAM sirAM, tathA~apAlApayoH pratyekamekAM sirAM na vidhyet|

grIvAyAM pRSThavattAsAM nIle manye kRkATike||26|| vidhure mAtRkACcASTau SoDaCeti parityajet||27||

grIvAyAM pRSThavat sirANAM saGkhyA-caturviMCatiH sirAH|  tAsAM sirANAM madhyAnnIle dve, manye dve, kRkATike dve, vidhure dve, aSTau ca mAtRkAH-mAtRkAkhyAni marmANi, iti-evaM, SoDaCa parityajet-na CastraM tAsu pAtayet|

hanvoH SoDaCa, tAsAM dve sandhibandhanakarmaNI||27||

hanvordvayoH SoDaCa sirAH saMCritAH|  tAsAM sirANAM madhyAddvesire parityajet|  kiMkarmaNI te Aha ?  sandhibandhanakarmaNI|  badhyate~aneneti bandhanam|  sandherbandhanaM sandhibandhanam|  arthAddhanusambandhinaH sandherbandhanaM karma-kriyA, yayoH sirayoste sandhibandhanakarmaNI sire|

 ---------------------------------kaphaM punaH||37|| gauryaH snigdhAH sthirAH CItAH-------------||38||

kaphaM punargauryo vahante|  tathA snigdhAdiviCeSaNAH|  kaphamiti kaphaCoNitam, CoNitaCabdalopAt|  snigdhAH-snigdhacchAyAH|  tathA, sthirAH-na tu capalAH|  tathA, CItAH sparCena|

-------------------saMsRSTaM liGgasaGkare||38||

liGgasaGkare-yathA nirdiSTasya lakSaNasya saGkIrNatve, saMsRSTaM-kaphavAtajuSTaM vAtapittajuSTaM kaphapittajuSTaM tribhirapi doCairjuSTaM, raktaM sirA vahanti-sakalaM CarIraM prApayanti|

gUDhAH samasthitAH snigdhA rohiNyaH CuddhaCoNitam||38||

gUDhAH-antargatAH, tathA samaM kRtvA sthitAH-samasthitAH, tathA snigdhAH-snigdhacchAyAH, rohiNyaH-sirAparasaMjJA lohitAbhAsA vA prasaraNaCIlA vA, CuddhaCoNitaM dehe~asmin vahanti|

dhamanyo nAbhisambaddhA viMCatiCcaturuttarA||39|| tAbhiH parivRtA nAbhiCcakranAbhirivArakaiH||39|| tAbhiCcordhvamadhastiryagdeho~ayamanugRhyate||40||

dhamanyo nAbhisambaddhA viMCatiCcaturuttarA-caturviMCatirityarthaH|  tAbhiH-dhamanIbhiH, nAbhiH parivRtA-pariveSTitA|  katham ?  cakranAbhirivArakaiH,-yathA rathAGgasya madhyamabhAgo nAbhiCabdavAcyo~arakaiH parivriyate tadvannAbhiH-CarIramadhyabhAgo, dhamanIbhiH|  dhmAnAddhamanyaH srotoviCeSA ucyante|  tAbhiH dhamanIbhiH, ayaM deha Urdhvamadhastiryak cAnugRhyate-rasAdiprApaNakarmaNA tAH kAyasyAnugrahaM kurvanti|  tAbhirayaM deha ApyAyate, ArAma iva jalahAriNIbhiH kedAra iva kulyAbhiH|  saGgrahe coktam (CA. a.6)-"tAsAM khalu dhamanInAM madhyAddaCa dhamanya UrdhvaM prasRtA daCAdhaH prasRtAstiryak catasraH|  tAbhiryathAsvamaGgAvayavA UrdhvAdhastiryak samACritA dhAryante ApyAyyante ca|  tAsAmUrdhvagA hRdayamabhiprapannAH pratyekaM tridhA jAyante|  evaM tAstriMCat|  triMCato madhyAddve dve vAtapittakapharaktarasAn vahataH|  evaM daCa|  dve dve CabdarUparasagandhAn gRhNItaH|  evamaSTAbhiH CabdarUparasagandhA gRhyante|  dvAbhyAM dvAbhyAM bhASate ghoSaM karoti svapiti pratibudhyate ca|  evamaSTau dve cACru vahataH|  tathaiva dve stanACrite nAryAH stanyaM narasya Cukram|  adhogamAH pakvACayasthA daCa tridhA jAyante|  evaM tA api triMCat|  tatrAdyAH pUrvavaddaCa dve dve vAtapittakapharaktarasAn vahataH|  dve vahato~annamantrACrayeNa, dve toyaM dve mUtram|  dve CukraM vahato dve ca muJcataH|  ta eva nArINAmArtavaM vahataH|  dve varconirasanyau sthUlAntrapratibaddhe|  evaM dvAdaCa|  CeSAstvaSTau dhamanyastiraCcInAH svedamabhivarddhayanti|  tiryaggAminyastu catasro bhidyamAnAH subahudhA bhavanti|" iti| 

 srotAMsi nAsike karNau netre pAyvAsyamehanam||40|| stanau raktapathaCceti nArINAmadhikaM trayam||41||

srotAMsi puMsAM nava,-dvau nAsApuTau, dvau karNau, dve netre, pAyuH- gudam, AsyaM-mukham, mehanaM-mUtraniSkramaNadvAram|  strINAmetAni tathA~anyAni trINi,-dvau stanau, tathaiko raktapatho-raktamArgaH, pratimAsaM yato yonau raktaM pravartate|  tadevaM strINAM trINi srotAMsi puMbhyo~adhikAni|  evaM srotAMsi dRCyAnyabhidhAya CarIre yAnyadRCyAni srotAMsi tAnyAha-

 jIvitAyatanAnyantaH srotAMsyAhustrayodaCa||41|| prANadhAtumalAmbhonnavAhIni--------------------------||42||

antaH-CarIrAbhyantare, trayodaCa srotAMsi vadanti| ' AcAryAH' iti CeSaH| tAni ca srotAMsi jIvitAyatanAni-viCeSeNa jIvitasyAdhiSThAnAni|  kimbhUtAni ?  prANadhAtumalAmbhonnavAhIni|  prANAkhyaM vAtaM vahanti yAni tAni-prANavAhIni|  dhAtuvAhIni-rasAdidhAtun yAni vahanti|  malavAhIni-mUtraCakRtsvedAn yAni vahanti|  tathA, ambhovAhIni-udakavAhIni|  tathA, annavAhIni-annamabhyavahRtaM yAni vahanti|  evaM trayodaCa|  saGgrahe coktam (CA.a.6)-"tatra prANavAhinAM hRdayaM mUlaM mahAsrotaCca|  tAni kSayaraukSyapipAsAkSudvyAyAmavegavidhAraNAdibhirduSyanti|  tato~atisRSTaM pratibaddhaM kupitamalpAlpamabhIkSNaM vA saCabdaCUlamucchvasanaM kurvanti|  tatra CvAsavatsAdhanam|  udakavAhinAM tAlu mUlaM kloma ca|  tAnyAmabhayAtipAnoSNaCuSkAnnatRDvigrahAdibhirduSyanti|  tato~atitRSNA mukhaCoSaH karNakSveDanaM tamodarCanaM ca|  tatra tRSNoktamauSadham|  annavAhinAmAmACayo mUlaM vAmapArCvaM ca|  teSAM duSTau sarvaM mAtrACitIyoktamavagacchet|  rasavAhinAM hRdayaM mUlaM daCa dhamanyaCca|  raktavAhinAM yakRt plIhA ca|  mAMsavAhinAM snAvAni tvak ca|  medovAhinAM vRkkau mAMsaM ca|  asthivAhinAM jaghanaM medaCca|  majjavAhinAM parvANyasthIni ca|  CukravAhinAM stanau muSkau majjA ca|  mUtravAhinAM bastirvaGkSaNau ca|  CakRdvAhinAM pakvACayaH sthUlAntraM ca|  svedavAhinAM medo romakUpACca|  srotasAmeva viCeSAH sirA dhamanyaH|  apare tvanyatvamicchanti sirAdhamanIsrotasAm|  saraNAt sirAH|  dhmAnAddhamanyaH|  sravaNAtsrotAMsi|  kevalaM parasparasannikarSAt sadRCakarmatvAt saukSmyAcca vibhaktakarmaNAmapyavibhAga iva lakSyate|  anye punarevamAcakSate|  srotAMsi sirA dhamanyo rasAyanyo vAhinyo nADyaH panthAno~ayanAni mArgAH CarIracchidrANi saMvRtAsaMvRtAni sthAnAnyACayA kSayA niketACceti CarIre dhAtvavakACAnAM lakSyAlakSyANAM paryayeNa nAmAnIti|" iti|

-----------------------------------ahitasevanAt||42|| tAni duSTAni rogAya, viCuddhAni sukhAya ca||42||

ahitAnAmAhAravihArAdInAM sevanAt-CIlanAt, tAni,-srotAMsi, duSTAni rogAya sampadyante|  teSAM vijJAnArthaM doSAdivijJAnIyoktamavagacchet|  viCuddhAni-aduSTAni srotAMsi, sukhAya ArogyAya, sampadyante|

 svadhAtusamavarNAni vRttasthUlAnyaNUni ca||43|| srotAMsi dIrghANyAkRtyA pratAnasadRCAni ca||43||

svo dhAtuH svadhAtuH,-yo yo yasya yasya srotasa AdhArasyAdheyatvena sthito dhAtuH, tena tena svadhAtunA samaH-samAno, varNo yeSAM srotasAM tAni svadhAtusamavarNAni|  yathA,-rasadhAtutulyavarNAni rasavAhisrotAMsi, yAvacchukradhAtusaddRCavarNAni CukravAhisrotAMsi|  tathA, sarvasrotasAM madhye kAnicidvRttAni-vartulAni, kAnicitsthUlAni, kAnicidaNUni-sukSmANi srotAMsi|  tathA, AkRtyA-saMsthAnena, dIrghANi sarvANyeva|  tathA, pratAna sadRCAni-patrarekhAtulyAni|  patrarekhAtulyarupatvena CAkhA praCAkhatayA~anekadhA dUraM pravisRtAnIti gamayati|  

AhAraCca vihAraCca yaH syAddoSaguNaiH samaH||44|| dhAtubhirviguNo yaCca srotasAM sa pradUSakaH||44||

AhAraH-pAnACanAdilakSaNaH, doSaguNaiH-vAtapittaCleSmaguNairaukSyAdibhiH yaH samaH-tulyaH samAnaguNaH, sa srotasAM pradUSakaH|  vihAro~api-yo vAgdehamanaCceSTAlakSaNaH, so~api doSaguNaiH samAnaguNo yathAyathaM srotasAM pradUSakaH|  yaCcAhArastathAvihAro dhAtubhiH-rasAdibhiH, viguNo-viruddhaguNo rasasamAnaguNairviparItaguNaH, sa yathAyathameva srotasAM pradUSakaH|  

CArIrasthAnam

aGgavibhAgaH adhyAyaH

atipravRttiH saGgo vA sirANAM granthayo~api vA||45|| vimArgato vA gamanaM srotasAM duSTilakSaNam||45||

atiCayena pravRttiH, yathA-mUtravAhisrotasAM pramehavadbahumUtratA|  saGgaH-apravRttiH, kiJcidvA pravRttirmUtrakRcchravat|  CakRdvAhinAM srotasAmatIsAravatpurISAtisaraNaM-atipravRttiH|  saGgaH stokaM stokaM kRtvA purISasya pravRttiH, athavA sarvasarvikayodAvartavatpurISasyApravRttiH|  evaM mUtravAhisrotasAM mUtrAtipravRttyapravRttI tatsrotoduSTerlakSaNam|  tathaiva purISavAhinAM purISAti pravRttyapravRttI purISavAhisrotoduSTerlakSaNam|  evamanyeSAmapi srotasAM yathAyathaM vastuvAhinAM yathAsvaM vastvatipravRttyapravRttI teSAM duSTerlakSaNam|  athavA sirANAM-srotasAM, granthayaH-kuTilabhAvatvaM, duSTerlakSaNam|  vimArgato veti|  athavA svaM mArgamujjhitvA mArgAntarAsAdanaM srotasAM duSTerlakSaNam|

bisAnAmiva sUkSmANi dUraM pravisRtAni ca||46||  dvArANi srotasAM dehe raso yairupacIyate||46||

bisAnAM-mRNAlAnAM, yathA sUkSmANi dvArANi-chidrANi, dUraM pravisRtAni-sakalaM bisaM gatAni, tathaiva srotasAM dvArANi mukhAni, sUkSmANi dehe dUraM pravisRtAni-kRtsnaM dehaM prakarSeNa gatAni|  yaiH-dvAraicchidraiH, dehe-CarIre, abhyavahRtasyAhArasya kAyAgninA pacyamAnasya prasAdabhAvo yaH samudbhavati sa rasaH prasAdAkhya upacIyate-vRddhiM nIyate|

vyadhe tu srotasAM mohakampAdhmAnavamijvarAH||47|| pralApaCUlaviNmUtrarodhA maraNameva vA||47|| srotoviddhamato vaidyaH pratyAkhyAya prasAdhayet||48|| uddhRtya CalyaM yatnena sadyaHkSatavidhAnataH||48||

srotasAM tu vyadhe-tADane sati, mohAdayo bhavanti|  mohAdInAmitaretaradvandvaH pralApAdInAM ca|  viNmUtrayo rodhena sambandhaH|  athavA maraNameva bhavati|  ataH-asmAjjIvita saMCayAddhetoH, vaidyaH pratyAkhyAya-"akriyAyAM dhruvo mRtyuH" (hR.ci. a.11/44) ityAdyuktvA, CalyamuddhRtya-bahirniSkAsya, prasAdhayet|  katham ?  yatnena-nAvahelayA|  kena prasAdhayet ?  sadyaH kSatavidhAnataH-sadyovraNapratiSedhoktavidhinA|

annasya paktA pittaM tu pAcakAkhyaM pureritam||49|| doSadhAtumalAdInAmUSmetyAtreyaCAsanam||49||

turavadhAraNe|  anekavidhasyAhArasyAbhyavahRtasya pittameva paktA|  kimbhUtaM pittam ?  pAcakAkhyaM pureritaM,-pUrvaM doSabhedIye~adhyAya uktam|  yathA (hR.sU. a.12/10)-"pakvAmACayamadhyagam" ityArabhya yAvat "pAcakaM nAma tatsmRtam|" iti| tadIdRCaM pittamAhAraM pAcayatIti dhanvantarimatam|  doSadhAtviti|  Atreyasya-atriputrasya, CAsanaM-AjJA, iti-evaM, doSAdInAmUSmA~agniriti|  doSAH-vAtAdayaH, dhAtavo-rasAdayaH, malAH-mUtrapurISasvedAH, AdiCabdena dUSikAdayaH|  teSAM doSAdInAM sambandhI USmA-agniH, yaH sa evAnnasya paktA, na tu pittaM pAcakAkhyamiti|

tadadhiSThAnamannasya grahaNAdgrahaNI matA||50|| saiva dhanvantarimate kalA pittadharAhvayA||50|| AyurarogyavIryaujobhUtadhAtvagnipuSTaye||51|| sthitA pakvACayadvAri bhuktamArgArgaleva sA||51||

tasya- agnerjaTharasya, adhiSThAnaM Adharo, yatrasau Cariro~agnistiSThati,sA~annasya grahaNAt tatsaMjJA grahaNIti matA | AmACayastho viCiSTo dhamanIviCeSa ityarthaH| saiva grahaNI dhanvantarImate kalA pittadharA nAma kathyate |yata evam grahaNyagnerAdhArabhUta,tathA~annagrahaNAttatsaMjJA, ata AyurAdipuSTaye 'sampadyate'iti vakyaCeSaH | AyuH -CarIrendriyasatvAtmasaMyogaviCeSaH| ArogyaM - dhAtusAmyam| vIryaM - CaktiH, karmaNi sAmarthyam | ojaH AhArasya paraM prasAdajaM sarvadhAtvApyAyakaM yadvastujAtaM taducyate | puSTiCabda eSAM pratyekaM yojyaH,AyuHpuSTaye ArogyapuSTaye vIryapuSTaye ojaHpuStaye paJcamahAbhUtAgnipuSTaye dhAtvagnipuSTaye ceti piNDArthaH | pakvACayasya dvAH pakvACayadvAH, tasyAM sthitA | sA hi - grahaNI,bhuktasya sahasA pakvACayAntaHpraveCarodhinI | sA cArgaleva - yathA dvAri kapATamArgarodhe~argalA sthitA , tathA bhuktaM hyabhyavahRtaM kaNThanADIluThitaM kAyasya mahAnimnadeSaM koSTAkhyamavatIrNaM grahaNI gRhItvA~avatiSThate| anantaraM jAThareNa~agninA vipakvaM CanaiH pakvACaye muJcati | ata evocyate - sthitA pakvACayadvAri bhuktamArgArgaleva sA |iti|

bhuktamAmACaye rudhvA sA vipAcya nayatyadhaH||52|| balavatyabalA tvannamAmameva vimuJcati||52||

bhuktaM-abhyavahRtamannaM, AmACaye-AmAnnasthAne yatrAmamannaM tatra, sA-grahaNI, ruddhvA-avaSTabhya, adho nayati|  kiM kRtvA ? vipAcya,-vividhaiH prakAraiH pAcayitvA|  balavatIti|  balavatI bhuktaM vipAcyAdho nayati|  abalA punaH satI sA Amameva-apakvameva vimuJcati|  nanu, jAThArAgnirannaM grahaNIsthaM pacati, na grahaNI|  tataCca kathamuktam ? "sA vipAcya nayatyadhaH" iti|  atrocyate|   agnigrahaNyorAdhArAdheyabhAvena sthitatvAdyujyata evaitadvaktum|   grahaNI hyagnerAdhAraH|  tathA ca prAguktam (Clo.50)-"kalA pittadharAhvayA" iti|  pittaM ca vahniH|  tathA cAdhunaiva vakSyati (Clo.90)-"pittaM vahniH" ityAdi|  tadevaM vahnyAdhArA yA kalA sA~annagrahaNAdgrahaNItyucyate|  tataCcAdhAratayA grahaNImACrityAgniH pAkakaraNasamartho bhavati, nAdhAramantareNa kevala eva|  tadevamagnyAdhArasya grahaNyAkhyasya pAkanirvartanaM prati kartRtvaM yuktameveti|  ataH "sA vipAcya nayatyadhaH" ityetadupapannameva|  

grahaNyA balamagnirhi sa cApi grahaNIbalaH||53|| dUSite~agnAvato duSTA grahaNI rogakAriNI||53||

hi yasmAdarthe|  yasmAdgrahaNyA yadbalaM-sAmarthyaM, tasya heturagniH|  agnito grahaNyA balamutpadyate|  sa cApyagnirgrahaNIbalaH, grahaNI balaM yasyAgneH sa evam|  apiCabdAnna kevalamagnirgrahaNyA balam, grahaNyapyagnerbalam|  ato hetordUSite~agnau duSTA grahaNI rogakAriNI sampadyate|  evaM cArthAd grahaNyAmapi duSTAyAmagnirduSyati|  duSTaCca so~api rogakArI sampadyate|  evaM yA pittadharA kalA sA~aduSTA satyAyurAdInAM puSTaye bhavatItyuktam|  annagrahaNAdgrahaNyA evaMrUpatA|  

yadannaM dehadhAtvojobalavarNAdipoSaNam||54|| tatrAgnirheturAhArAnna hyapakvAdrasAdayaH||54||

yadannaM-AhAro, dehadhAtvAdipoSaNaM bhavati, tatrAgnirhetuH|  kutaH ?  ityAha-na hItyAdi|  hi-yasmAt, apakvAdAhArAdrasarudhirAdayo na sambhavanti|  ato dehadhAtvAdipoSaNe sarvatrAgniH kAraNam, pAkakriyAnirvartanAt|  tadevamanvayavyatirekAbhyAmavagamyate, annaM dehadhAtvAdiheturagniprabhAvAdeva, tasmAdagniH pAkakAraNam, pakvamannaM dehAdipoSaNam|  iti parasparakAraNatvamanayoH|  

annaM kAle~abhyavahRtaM koSThaM prANAnilAhRtam||55|| dravairvibhinnasaGghAtaM nItaM snehena mArdvam||55|| sandhukSitaH samAnena pacatyAmACayasthitam||56|| audaryo~agniryathA bAhyaH sthAlIsthaM toyataNDulam||56||

kAle-"prasRSTe viNmUtre" (hR.sU. a.8/55) ityAdinA granthena prAGnirUpite|  annamabhyavahRtaM koSThaM-hRdayAdyaGganibandhanaM sthAnaM, praNAkhyena vAyunA~~AhRtaM-AnItam|  "SThIvanakSavathUdgAra" (hR.sU.a.12/5) ityAdinaiva prANAnilAhRtatve labdhe punaruktaM spaSTArtham|  tacca dravaiH-dravaguNopalakSitaistoyavyaJjanamadyakSIrAdibhiH, vibhinnasaGghAtaM-apanItapiNDitabhAvam|  tathA, snehena-ghRtAdinA, mRdutvaM prApitam|  tathA, AmACayasthitamagniH pacati|  "nAbhistanAntaraM jantorAmACaya iti smRtaH|" iti vyAkhyAta AmACayastantrAntare (carake vi. a. 2/23)|  kimbhUto~agniH ?  audaryo-jaTharabhavaH|  tathA samAnAkhyena vAyunA sandhukSitaH-uddIpitaH|  kAlagrahaNasyopalakSaNArthatvAnmAtrAdisahAyena jATharAgninA samAnoddIpitena pakvamannaM dehadhAtvAdipoSaNam|  nanu, audaryo~agniradRCyatvAnna jJAyate kathaM pacati ?  atastadarthaM bAhyaM dRSTAntaM nirupayituM granthakRdAha yathetyAdi|  yathA bAhyo~agniH sthAlIsthaM toyataNDulaM pacati|  toyaM ca taNDulACca toyataNDulam, dvandvaikavadbhAvaH|  tathaivAsAvaudaryo~agniH sandhukSitaH samAnenAmACayasthitaM caturvidhamannaM-aCitapItalIDhakhAditabhedabhinnaM, prANAnilAhRtaM pacati|  nanu, doSabhedIye~adhyAye pUrvamuktam (hR.sU.a. 12/4)-"prANo~atra mUrdhagaH|  ityArabhya yAvat "niCvAsAnnapraveCakRt|" iti|  annasya praveCaM-AharaNaM, karotItyannapraveCakRt|  prANAnilAhRtamityanenApyayamarthaH pratyapAdi|  tatkimetena ?  atrocyate|  annapraveCakRdityanenAnnapraveCakaraNamAtramuktam, na tu koSThaprApaNamiti|  prANasya hi vAryormUrdhACritasyoro yAvatsaMcAra uktaH, na tato~adhaH|  evamannapraveCakaraNaM tAvatprAptaM yAvaduraH, na koSThamiti|  koSThaM prANAnilAhRtamityanena tu koSThaprApaNAkhyo~arthaviCeSa uktaH|  iti dvayamapyetadvaktuM yuktam|  [ nanu, ] 'sandhukSitaH samAnena' iti ca na vAcyam|  yataH prAguktam (hR.sU.a.12/8)-"samAno~agnisamIpasthaH koSThe carati sarvataH|" iti| evaM jAThareNAgninA sahacaraH samAno vAyuH sandhukSayatItyartho~avatiSThate|  tasmAt "sandhukSitaH samAnena " ityanena nArthaH|  ucyate|  arthaviCeSasampratyayArthametaduktam|  tathA hi-"samAno~agnisamIpasthaH koSThe carati sarvataH|  annaM gRhNAti pacati " iti samAnasyaiva pAkakriyAM prati vahnisandhukSaNadvAreNa kartRtvamuktam, nAgneH|  iha punaH sandhukSitaH samAnenAgniH pacati, na samAno vAyuH, ityapaunaruktyameva|  yadyapi caikapratyayajanitaM na kiJcidasti, tathA~apyannapAkakriyAM pratyagnereva kartRtvam, na samAnAdeH|  samAnAdayo hyupakArakA eva|  ato yuktamidaM 'agniH pacati' iti|  

Adau SaDrasamapyannaM madhurIbhUtamIrayet||57|| phenIbhUtaM kaphaM, yAtaM vidAhAdamlatAM tataH||57|| pittamAmACayAtkuryAccyavamAnaM, cyutaM punaH||58|| agninA CoSitaM pakvaM piNDitaM kaTu mArutam||58||

Adau-prathamaM, SaDrasamapi, apiCabdAdvitrAdirasamapi, annaM-abhyavahRtamaCitapItAdikaM, tatpacyamAnaM madhurIbhutaM-amadhuraM madhuraM sampannaM sat, kaphamIrayet|  kimbhUtaM kapham ?  phenIbhUtam|   pAnIyAderapi pacyamAnasya prathamaM phenotpattidarCanAdevamuktam|  vidAhAditi|  tataH-prathamAvasthAto mAdhuryaprAyAyA anantaraM, madhyamAvasthAM prApya jAThareNa vahninA pakvaM SaDrasamapyannamabhyavahRtamamlatAM yAtaM-anamlamamlaM sampannaM, pittaM vidadhyAt|  kasmAtpunaramlatAM yAti ?  ityAha-vidAhAt|  viruddho viSamo vA dAho-vidAhaH|  tato vidAhAddhetoramlatAM yAtam|  kimbhUtamannam ?  AmACayAccyavamAnaM,-nAmACayasthitameva|  cyutaM punaH-tata AmaCayAtpakvACayaM prAptaM, jATharAgninA pakvaM CoSitamannaM, tathA piNDitaM-tadAnIm piNDaM saJjAtaM saMhataM sampannaM, tathA kaTukaM jAtaM, anyAM(ntyAM) tRtIyAmavasthAM prApya mArutaM kuryAditi yojyam|  etacca sarvaM svabhAvasiddhaM svasaMvedyaprAyaM kAryAnumeyaM ca|  ata eva rasaSaTke~api yaddravyANAM vipAkatraividhyaM madhurAmlakaTukalakSaNamuktaM, tadanayA rItyopapannataraM bhavati|  tathA hi-SaDrasasyApyannasya jATharAgninA pacyamAnasya rasatrayopalakSitena madhurAmlakaTukasvabhAvenAvasthAtrayeNa pariNAmo bhavati|  atha (nanu,) annamityatra kasmAt "ado jagdhirlyaptikiti" iti jagdhyAdeCo na bhavati ?|  brUmaH|  anna iti nipAtanAt "bahulaM chandasi" iti bahulavacanAdvA jagdhyAdeCAbhAvaH|  nanu, vidAhAdamlatAM gatamiti sAmAnyenoktamayuktamivAbhAti|  yato drAkSekSuCarkarAdInAmavidAhitvaM CrUyate|  api ca vidAhAdIni ca varjayediti tantrakAraH (hR.sU.a. 8/32) paThati|  anayA ca rItyA avadAhidravyAbhAva eva syAt|  tasmAtsAmAnyena vidAhitvamabhyupagamyamAnamanyAyyamiva manyAmahe|  ucyate|  vidAhasya dvaividhyAdadoSaH|  iha hi dvividho vidAhaH prathito doSasthAnakRto dravyakRtaCca|   tatra hi doSasthAnakRtasya grahaNam|  [nanu,] AmACayAccyutamagninA pakvamiti kathamuktam ?  yataH pakvACayasthasyAgninA pAko~anupapannaH|  dUravyavadhAno hyagnirAmACayasthaH|  tasmAtpakvACayasthasyAnnasya pakvatvamanupapannam|  atrocyate|  pakvACaye~apyasti pAkaH, tantrakAravacanAt|  tathA hi prAgbastividhAvabhyadhAt (hR.sU.a.19/34)-"yathA vA snehapaktiH syAdato~atyulbaNamArutAn|  vyAyAmanityAn dIptAgnIn" ityAdi|  tadevaM pakvACayasthasyApyanuvAsanasya snehapAko~abhihitaH|  tathA pakvACaye~apyagninA pakvasya punaH pAko yukta eva|  tantrAntareSu mAMsAdInAmapi vikledadarCanAdanyatrApi pAko~anujJAta eva|

bhaumApyAgneyavAyavyAH paJcoSmANaH sanAbhasAH||59|| paJcAhAraguNAnsvAn svAn pArthivAdIn pacantyanu||59||

bhUmerayaM bhaumaH|  Apya iti cintyam|  Agneya iti "agrerDhak" iti Dhak|  vAyavya iti "sA~asya devatA" ityarthe "vAyvRtupitruSaso yat" iti yat|  tadatraupamyartho bodhyaH,  vAyavya iva vAyavya iti|  ke punaste ?  ityAha-paJcoSmANa iti|  kimbhUtAH ?  sanabhasAH|  saha nAbhasenoSmaNA paJcoSmANaH - paJcAgnayaH|  bhauma USmA yAvannAbhasa USmeti|  tadete~agnayaH paJcAhAraguNAn anu-paCcAt, pacanti|  kuto~anu ?  prakRtatvAdaudAryAgninirvartitAdannapAkAt|  kimbhUtAnAhAraguNAn ?  svAnsvAn pArthivAdIn|  yo yasya mAhAbhutoSmaNaH pArthivAderAtmIyo guNaH, taM guNaM sa eva pArthivAdyUSmA pacati|

"yasmAcchleSmA somaH, tena hetunA CleSmalo naraH saumyo bhavati|  kAraNAnuvidhAyitvAtkAryANAm|  soma iva saumyaH, CAkhAditvAdyaJ|  tathA, gUDhasnigdhaCliSTAni sandhyasthimAMsAni yasya sa evam|  tathA, kSudrAdibhirataptaH-akSobhito bhavati|  tathA, budhdyA~anvitaH praCastasatvaCca|  tathA, satyaM sandadhAti pratijAnIte, iti satyasandhaH|  ""AtaCcopasarge"" ityaG|  CAlinIvRttam|  priyaGgvAditulyena varNena ekaikena yuktaH|  kaCcitpriyaGgusamAnavarNaH kaCciddUrvAsadRCavarNaH kaCciccharastambasadRCavarNaH kaCcicchastratulyavarNaH kaCcidgorocanAtulyavarNaH kaCcitpadmatulyavarNaH, kaCcitsuvarNasadRCavarNaH|  tathA, pralambabAhuH dIrghabhujaH|  tathA, vistIrNapIvaravakSAH|  tathA, mahallalATam alikaM, yasya sa tathA|  tathA, ghananIlakeCaH|  upajAtivRttam|  mRdvaGgaH-komalAvayavaH|  samaH suSThu vibhakto-vibhaktAvayavaH, cArurdeho yasya sa evam|  bahavastejoratirasAdayo yasya sa evam|  tathA, dharmasvabhAvaH| niSThuraM na kadAcidvadati|  pracchannaM-gUDhaM kRtvA, vairaM dRDhaM ciraM vahati-na tu Cithilayati|  praharSiNIvRttam|  samadasya dviradendrasya tulyaM yAtaM-gamanaM, yasya sa evam|  tathA, jaladAdisadRCaCabdaH|  tathA, praCastasmRtiH CobhanAbhiyogI vinayI ca bhavati|  bAlye~api-bAlatve~api nAtirodano na ca lolupaH|  aupacchandasikaM vRttam|  sa cAnnaM tiktAdirasayuktaM balakSepakaM bhuGkte, tathA~alpamapi bhuGkte,  tathA~api svabhAvAdbalI bhavati|  raktAvantau yayoste raktAnte, tathA susnigdhe viCAle dIrghe ca, tathA suvyaktau CuklAsitau yayoste suvyaktaCuklAsite, tathA pakSmale, evaMbhUte akSiNi yasya sa evam|  indravajrAvRtam|  alpA vyAhArAdayo yasya sa evam|  [ *vyAhAro-bhASaNam|  pAnaM-pAnIyAdi|  aCanaM-bhojanam|  IhA-kAyikA ceSTA| ]  prAjye-prabhUte, Ayurvitte yasya sa evam|  dIrghadarCI-bhAvi kAryaM paCyati, idaM kurvata idamavaCyaM sampadyata iti|  vadAnyo-valgubhASI dAtA ca|  CrAddho-dAnAdau CraddhAvAn|  gambhIro-mahAcittaH|  sthUlalakSo-bhUridAtA|  kSamAvAn-kSAntiyuktaH|  AryaH-sajjanaH|  evaM pRthagvAtAdiprakRtIstisro~abhidhAya dvandvasarvadoSaprakRtilakSaNAbhidhitsayedamAha-"

prakRtIrdvayasarvotthA dvandvasarvaguNodaye||104||

dvayAt-saMsargAt, udbhUtAstisraH prakRtayaH, sarvotthA-sarvadoSodbhUtA, ekA prakRtiH, evaM prakRtayo dvayasarvotthACcatasraH|  guNaCabdo~atra dharmavacano liGgavacano vA|  dvandvaCabdena doSadvayaM sarvaCabdena ca doSatrayaM lakSyate|  dvandvaM ca sarve ca dvandvasarve, teSAM guNAH-doSadvayadoSatrayANAM dharmA liGgAni vA, teSAmudayaH-prAdurbhAvo, dvandvasarvaguNodayaH, tasmin dvandvasarvagoNodaye sati, dvayasarvotthAH prakRtIrvadet-AdiCet|  dvayaM ca sarve ca dvayasarve, tebhya utthaH-utthAnaM, yAsAM tAH|  evaM dvandvadoSaguNodaye dvandvotthAH prakRtIrvadet, sarvadoSaguNodaye sarvotthAM prakRtiM vadet|  uttha ityutpUrvAttiSThateH "supi sthaH" iti yogavibhAgAtkaH|  "udaH sthAstambhoH pUrvasya" iti pUrvasavarNAdeCaH|  "atrAdyAstrayo nityAturA doSAnuCayitaCarIratvAt|  viCeSataCca dvandvaprakRtayaH|  teSu hi guNamiCravikArakAriSu kSutpipAsAdiSvivArogyavyapadeCaH" (saM. CA. a. 8)|  evaM vAtAdiprakRtIrnirdiCya, sattvAdiprakRtIrnirdidikSurAha-

CArIrasthAnam

marmavibhAgaH adhyAyaH

athAto marmavibhAgaM CArIraM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2|| iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

mriyate~asminnaGga upahata iti marma|  vibhajanaM-vibhAgaH, marmaNAM vibhAgo marmavibhAgaH|  so~asminnadhyAye~astIti marmavibhAgaH|  arCa AditvAdac|  CArIrasthAna pratibaddhatvAcca CArIraH|  CeSaM pUrvavat|  

saptottaraM marmaCatam-----------------||1||

saptottarANi-adhikAni, yasmin-Cate, tadevam|

-----------------------------teSAmekAdaCAdiCet||1||  pRthaksakthnostathA bAhvostrINi koSThe navorasi||1|| pRSThe caturdaCordhvaM tu jatrostriMCacca sapta ca||2||

teSAM-marmaNAM madhye, pRthak-pratyekaM kRtvA, sakthnordvayorbAhvoCca dvayorekAdaCAdiCet, evaM catuCcatvAriMCanmarmANi CAkhAsu vidyAt|  koSThe-jaThare, trINi marmANi|  urasi-vakSasi, navasaGkhyAni|  pRSThe caturdaCa|  jatrorUrdhvaM-jatruNa upariSTAt, triMCattathA sapta, evaM saptatriMCadityarthaH|  jatroriti puMstvamatra cintyam|  athavA 'anityamAgamaCAsanam' ityatra num na kRtaH| 

madhye pAdatalasyAhurabhito madhyamAGgulim||2||  talahRnnAma rujayA tatra viddhasya paJcatA||3||

pAdatalasya madhye-madhyapradeCe, madhyamAGgulimabhito-madhyamAGguleH pAdasambandhinyA Abhimukhyena, yatpAdatalaM-pAdapRSThaM, tatra talahRnnAma marmAhuH, pUrvAcAryA iti CeSaH|  madhyamAGgulimiti "abhitaH [ paritaH samayAnikaSAhApratiyoge~api" iti ] Cabdaprayoge dvitIyA|  tatra-tasmin, viddhasya-Ahatasya, paJcatA-maraNaM, bhavati|  kayA? rujayA,-vedanayA|

aGguSThAGgulimadhyasthaM kSipramAkSepamAraNam||3||

aGguSThaCcAGguliCca, tayormadhyasthaM-aGguSThAGgulimadhyasthitaM, kSipraM nAma marma|  tadviddhamAkSepamAraNaM-AkSepakAkhyena vAtavyAdhinA mArayati|

 tasyordhvaM dvyaGgule kUrcaH pAdabhramaNakampakRt||4||

tasyordhvaM-tasya kSiprAkhyasya marmaNa upariSTAt, dvyaGgule-dvyaGgulaM vimucya, kUrco nAma marma|  tadviddhaM pAdasya bhramaNaM kampaM ca karoti|

gulphasandheradhaH kUrcaCiraHCopharujAkaram||4||

gulphasandheradhaH kUrcaCiro nAma marma|  tadviddhaM CopharujAkaram|

 jaGghAcaraNayoH sandhau gulpho rukstambhamAndyakRt||5||

jaGghAcaraNayoH sandhau-sandhipradeCe, gulpho nAma marma|  tadviddhaM ruk ca stambhaCca mAndyaM ca, tAni karoti|  stambhaH stabdhatvamivAGgasya|

jaGghAntare tvindrabastirmArayatyasRjaH kSayAt||5||

jaGghAntare-jaGghAmadhye pArSNiprabhRtidvAdaCabhiraGgulaiH, indrabastirnAma marma|  tadviddhaM raktakSayAnmArayati, nAnyathA|  tasmAdraktastambhane yatitavyamiti pratipAdanArthamasRkkSayAditi heturupanyastaH|  eSa eva nyAyo~anyatrApyanusartavyaH|  tena yatra yaddhetukaM mAraNAdikaM karma vyadhe kathitaM, tatra taccikitsAyAM yatitavyamiti|

jaGghorvoH saGgame jAnu khaJjatA tatra jIvataH||6||

jaGghorvoH saGgame-sandhau, jAnunAma marma|  tatra-jAnuni viddhe, puruSo mriyata eva|  atha jIvati tato~asya jIvataH puMsaH khaJjatA syAditi|  arthAt prAyeNa maraNaM puruSasyeti bodhayati|

CArIrasthAnam

marmavibhAgaH adhyAyaH

jAnunastryaGgulAdUrdhvamANyUrustambhaCophakRt||6||

jAnunaH-jAnusandheH, tryaGgulAdUrdhvamANInAma marma|  tadviddhamUrustambhaCophakaram|

 urvyUrumadhye tadvedhAtsakthiCoSo~asrasaGkSayAt||7||

urvI nAma marma Urumadhye|  tadvedhAt-tadabhighAtAt, sakthiCoSaH-UrukArCyam|  sakthiCoSo~asrasaGkSayAt,syAt  nAnyathA  vyadhe satyapi|

UrumUle lohitAkSaM hanti pakSamasRkkSayAt||7||

UrumUle- urvyAstUrdhvaM vaGkSaNasandheradhastAllohitAkSaM nAma marma| tadviddhaM pakSaM hatyasRkkSayAt vyadhe satyapi|

muSkavaGkSaNayormadhye viTapaM SaNDhatAkaram||8||

muSkavaGkSaNayormadhye viTapaM nAma marma|  tadviddhaM puMsaH SaNDhatAkaraM-nirapatyatAkaram|

 iti sakthnostathA bAhvormaNibandho~atra gulphavat||8||  kUrparaM jAnuvatkauNyaM tayorviTapavatpunaH||9||  kakSAkSamadhye kakSAdhRk kuNitvaM tatra jAyate||9||

iti-evamanena prakAreNa, sakthnordvayoH pratyekamekAdaCa marmANi bhavanti|  tathA bAhvoH-tenaiva prakAreNa bAhvoH, talahRdAdInyekAdaCa marmANi bhavanti|  atha kiJcinmAtramatra viCeSamAha - maNItyAdi|  atra-bAhumarmasu, gulphena tulyo maNibandhaH, saMjJAmAtrabhedaH, jAnutulyaM kUrparam|  tayoH-maNibandhakUrparAkhyayorbAhumarmaNoH, viddhayoH kauNyaM-pANipANyaGgulIkubjatvam|  viTapetyAdi|  kakSA cAkSaCca kakSAkSau, tayormadhye viTapena tulyaM kakSAdhRksaMjJaM marma|  tatra viddhe sati kuNitvaM-bAhupANyaGgulikubjatA, jAyate|  

sthUlAntrabaddhaH sadyoghno viDvAtavamano gudaH||10||

sthUlAntrasUkSmAntrabhedAt dvidhA~antram|  tatra sthUlAntrabaddho gudo nAma marmaviCeSaH|  sa ca viDvAtau-vAtavarcasI, vamati- udgirati, iti viDvAtavamanaH|  bAhulakAtkartari lyuT|  sa gudaH sadyaH-tatkSaNAdeva, hanti|   sadyoghna iti "amanuSyakartRke ca" iti Thak| gudaCabdasyAtra puMstvaM cintyam, na cArdharcAdiSvayamasti|  

 mUtrACayo dhanurvakro bastiralpAsramAMsagaH||10|| ekAdhovadano madhye kaTyAH sadyo nihantyasUn||11|| Rte~aCmarIvraNAdviddhastatrApyubhayataCca saH||11|| mUtrasrAvyekato bhinne vraNo rohecca yatnataH||12||

mUtrasyACaya AdhAro mUtrACayo-yatra mUtraM tiSThati, sa dhanurvakraH-cApavat kuTilaH|  anenAsya saMsthAnamuktam|  sa ca bastinAma marmaviCeSaH|  asraM ca mAMsaM cAsramAMse, alpe asramAMse gacchati| "anyebhyo~api dRCyate" iti DaH|  tatrastho na bahuraktamAMsapradeCa ityarthaH|  tathA, ekamadhovadanaM yasyAsAvekAdhovadanaH|  kaTyA madhya iti sthAnanirdeCaH|  kaTyA madhyapradeCe~asAvavatiSThate|  sa viddhaH sadyaH-tatkSaNAdeva, asUn-prANAn, nihanti| Rte~aCmarIvraNAt-aCmaryAharaNArthaM yo vraNaH kriyate taM vraNaM varjayitvA|  tatrApi-aCmarIvraNe, ubhayataH-ubhayapArCvataCca, sa viddhastadA~asau sadyo~asUnnihanti|  tasmin bastAveka [taH-eka]pArCvato, bhinne-viddhe sati, mUtrasrAvI vraNaH syAt|  sa ca yatnataH-AdareNopakrAnto, rohati nAnyathA|

dehAmapakvasthAnAnAM madhye sarvasirACrayaH||12|| nAbhiH so~api hi sadyoghno--------------------------------||13||

AmaM ca pakvaM cAmapakve, sthAnaM ca sthAnaM ca sthAne, AmapakvayoH sthAne AmapakvasthAne, dehaCcAmapakvasthAne ca dehAmapakvasthAnAni, teSAM madhye|  tatraikatvAddehasya dehamadhyapradeCe, tathobhayorAmapakvACayayormadhye-antarAle, nAbhirnAma marma|  sa sarvAsAM sirANAM-sakalaCarIragAnAM ACrayaH-AdhAraH|  so~api hi sadyoghnaH|  apiH samuccaye|  hiryasmAdarthe|  na kevalaM gudabastI sadyoghnau yAvannAbhirapi viddhaH sadyoghnaH|  nAbhiCabdasya puMstavaM  cintyam|

 ------------------------------dvAramAmACayasya ca||13|| satvAdidhAma hRdayam stanoraH koSThamadhyagam||13||

hRdayaM nAma yanmarma tadapi sadyoghnam|  taccAmACayasya dvAraM -mukham|  tena hi dvAreNAnnapAnamAmACaye praviCati|  tacca satvAdInAM-satvarajastamasAM, tathA vijJAnasya-indriyANAM cArthapaJcakasya, tathA~~AtmanaH-cetasaH, dhAma-sthAnam|  tacca stanoraH koSThamadhyagam|  stanau coraCca koSThaCca stanoraHkoSThaM, tasya madhyaM tatra gacchati-sthitiM badhnAti, koSThavakSasoH stanayoCca madhye sthitamityarthaH|

stanarohitamUlAkhye dvyaGgule stanayorvadet||14|| UrdhvAdho~asrakaphApUrNakoSTho naCyettayoH kramAt||14||

stanarohitaM ca mUlaM ca prakRtatvAtstanasyaiva, te|  stanarohitastanamUle Akhye-saMjJe, yayoste stanarohitamUlAkhye dve marmaNI vadet|  kva pradeCe ?  stanayoH|  kramAditi vakSyamANamihApi sambadhyate|  tena stanayorUrdhvaM dvyaGgule stanarohite|  stanayoradho dvyaGgule stanamUle|  tayoH-stanarohitastanamUlAkhyayormarmaNorviddhayoH, puruSo~asrakaphApUrNakoSThaH kramAt-yathAkramaM, naCyet|  tena stanarohite viddhe satyasRjA pUrNakoSThe naro naCyet, stanamUle viddhe kaphena pUrNakoSTho naCyet|

CArIrasthAnam

marmavibhAgaH adhyAyaH

apastambhAvuraH pArCve nADyAvanilavAhinI||15|| raktena pUrNakoSTho~atra CvAsAtkAsAcca naCyati||15||

urasaH pArCve dve nADyAvapastambhAkhye marmaNI|  anilavAhinI-vAtavahe|  atra marmadvaye viddhe raktena pUrNakoSThaH CvAsakAsAbhyAM vipadyate|

pRSThavaMCorasormadhye tayoreva ca pArCvayoH||16|| adho~aMsakUTayorvidyAdapAlApAkhyamarmaNI||16||  tayoH koSThe~asRjA pUrNe naCyedyAtena pUyatAm||17||

pRSThavaMCasya tathorasaH, anayormadhye-antarAle, tayoreva ca pRSTorasoH, ye pArCve, tayoruparibhAgayoraMsakUTayoradhaH, apAlApAkhye dve marmaNI vidyAt|  tayorviddhayo raktena koSThe pUrNe, pUyatAM yAtena-gatena, lohitena naCyet|  yAvadraktaM pUyatAM na yAtaM tAvajjIvati|  na tu raktakoSThapUraNamAtrAdeva mriyata iti bhAvaH|  

pArCvayoH pRSThavaMCasya CroNIkarNau prati sthite||17|| vaMCACrite sphijorUrdhvaM kaTIkataruNo smRte||18|| tatra raktakSayAtpANDurhInarUpo vinaCyati||18||

pRSThavaMCasya pArCvayoH-ubhayataH, pratiCroNIkarNau sthite|  vaMCACrite-vaMCaprativaddhe, sphijorUrdhvaM-upariSTAt, dve~asthinI kaTIkataruNe-etatsaMjJe dve marmaNI, smRte-ukte|  tatra-tasminmarmadvaye viddhe, raktakSayAtpANDurhInarUpo-vigatakAntiH san, naro vinaCyati|

pRSThavaMCaM hyubhayato yau sandhI kaTipArCvayoH||19||  jaghanasya bahirbhAge marmaNI tau kukundarau||19|| ceSTAhAniradhaHkAye sparCAjJAnaM ca tadvyadhAt||20||

pRSThavaMCasyobhayoH kaTipArCvayoryau sandhI jaghanasya bahirbhAge - nAntaH, tau kukundarau nimnAkArau sandhimamarNI|  tadvyadhAt-tayorvyadhAt, adhaHCarIre ceSTAhAniH-gamanAkuJcanaprasAraNAdAvadhaHkAyo~aCaktaH sampadyata ityarthaH|  tathA, sparCAjJAnaM-sparCAsaMvittirbhavati|  pRSThavaMCamubhayata iti "ubhasarvatasoH" ityAdinA dvitIyA|

pArCvAntaranibaddhau yAvupari CroNikarNayoH||20|| ACayaccAdanau tau tu nitambau taruNAsthigau||21|| adhaHCarIre Copho~atra daurbalyaM maraNaM tataH||21||

pArCvAntare-pArCvamadhye, nibaddhau-pratibaddhau lagnau, pArCvAntaranibaddhau yau, tathA CroNikarNayorupari-upariSTAt, mUtrAdInAM ya ACayAH-AdhArA bastyAdayaH, teSAM chAdanau, nitambau-nitambasaMjJau marmaviCeSau|  tau ca taruNAsthigau-taruNasaMjJe~asthni sthitAvityarthaH|  atra-asminmarmadvaye viddhe sati, adhaHkAye Copho bhavati|  tathA, daurbalyaM prakRtatvAdadhaHCarIra eva|  daurbalyaM-alpabalatvaM svavyApArAkSamatvam|  tato-daurbalyAdanantaraM, maraNaM bhavati|

pArCvAntaranibaddhau ca madhye jaghanapArCvayoH||22|| tiryagUrdhvaM ca nirdiSTau pArCvasandhI tayorvyadhAt||22|| raktapUritakoSThasya CarIrAntarasambhavaH||23||

pArCvayorantaraM-madhyaM, tatra nibaddhau-saMCliSTau, sandhI marmaviCeSau pArCvasandhI iti nirdiSTau|  tataCcaikasmin pArCvAntara ekaH sandhirdvitIyasmin pArCvAntare dvitIyaH sandhiH|  kva sthitau katham ?  jaghanasya pArCve jaghanapArCve, tayormadhye tiryagUrdhvaM ca|  evamekasmin jaghanapArCvamadhya ekaH sandhirdvitIyasmin dvitIyaH sthita iti|  tayorvyadhAt puMso raktapUritakoSThasya CarIrAntarasambhavaH-aparaCarIrotpattiH, maraNamityarthaH|

stanamUlArjave bhAge pRSThavaMCACraye sire||23|| bRhatyau, tatra viddhasya maraNaM raktasaGkSayAt||24||

stanayormUlaM-stanamUlaM  tasyArjave bhAge-spaSTa uddeCe, pRSThavaMCACraye sire-pRSThavaMCasyobhayapArCvapratibaddhe sire, bRhatyau-etatsaMjJe marmaNI|  tatra-marmadvaye, viddhasya maraNaM bhavati raktasaGkSayAt, nAnyathA|

bAhumUlAbhisambaddhe pRSThavaMCasya pArCvayoH||24|| aMsayoH phalake bAhusvApaCoSau tayorvyadhAt||25||

bAhvormUle bAhumUle,-yatra bAhU pratiSThitau|  mUle hi pratiSThA, vRkSamUlavat|  pRSThavaMCasya pArCvadvaye bAhumUlayorAbhimukhyena sambaddhe-saMCliSTe|  ke te ?  aMsayoH phalake|  asamAsanirdeCaCcchandonurodhAt|  phalakasya ca napuMsakatvaM lokACrayatvAlliGgasyeti|  aMsaphalakAkhye dve marmaNI|  tayorvyadhAt bAhusvApaCoSau bhavataH|   svApa iva svApaH, yathA suptasya niCcetanamaGgaM bhavati tathA bAhU aMsaphalake viddhe bhavataH|

grIvAmubhayataH snAvnI grIvAbAhuCirontare||25|| skandhAMsapIThasambandhAvaMsau bAhukriyAharau||26||

grIvAyA ubhayoH pArCvayoH snAvnI dve aMsAvucyete|  kva sthitau ?  grIvAbAhuCirontare|  grIvAyAstathA bAhvoH CirasaCca madhye teSAmantarAle sthitau|  kiM prayojanau?  skandhetyAdi|  aMsayoH pITha iva pIThe,-pratiSThAne, yatrAMsau tiSThataH|  skandhe cAMsapIThe ca, teSAM sambandhaH-prayojanaM, yayostAvevAMsau viddhau bAhvoH kriyA-AkuJcanaprasAraNAdikA, tAM harataH, tau bAhukriyAharau|

kaNThanADImubhayataH sirA hanusamACritAH||26|| catasrastAsu nIle dve manye dve marmaNI smRte||27|| svarapraNACavaikRtyaM rasAjJAnaM ca tadvyadhe||27||

kaNThanADyAH pArCvayordvayoH sirA yACcatasro hanvoH samACritAH, tAsu madhye dve sire nIle nAma dve marmaNI, manye nAma dve marmaNi smRte, tantrakRdbhiriti CeSaH|  tAsAM vyadhastadvyadhaH, tasmin tadvyadhe svarapraNACAdayo jAyante|   svarasya praNACaH svarapraNACaH,-svarahAniH|  athavA vaikRtyam, tacca prakRttvAtsvarasyaiva, svarabhAvAnyathAtvamityarthaH|  rasAjJAnaM-rasAnavabodhaH|
