AgamApagamakSobhamRdutAvedanoSmaNAm||10|| vaiSamyaM tatratatrAGge tAstAH syurvedanACcalAH||11|| pAdayoH suptatA stambhaH piNDikodveSTanaM CramaH||11|| viCleSa iva sandhInAM sAda UrvoH kaTIgrahaH||12|| pRSThaM kSodamivApnoti niSpIDyata ivodaram||12|| chidyanta iva cAsthIni pArCvagAni viCeSataH||13|| hRdayasya grahastodaH prAjaneneva vakSasaH||13|| skandhayormathanaM bAhvorbhedaH pIDanamaMsayoH||14|| aCaktirbhakSaNe hanvorjRmbhaNaM karNayoH svanaH||14|| nistodaH CaGkhayormUrdhni vedanA virasAsyatA||15|| kaSAyAsyatvamathavA malAnAmapravartanam||15|| rUkSAruNatvagAsyAkSinakhamUtrapurISatA||16|| prasekArocakACraddhAvipAkAsvedajAgarAH||18|| yugapadvyAptiraGgAnAM pralApaH kaTuvaktratA||18|| nAsAsyapAkaH CItecchA bhramo mUrcchA mado~aratiH||19|| viTsraMsaH pittavamanaM raktaSThIvanamamlakaH||19|| raktakoThodgamaH pItaharitatvaM tvagAdiSu||20|| niHCvAsavaigandhyamatitRSNA ca pittaje||20||

jvaranidAnam adhyAyaH

"sa0-AgamAdInAM vaiSamyamanilajvare liGgamiti yojyam| jvarasyAgamaH-santApArambhaH-tasya vaiSamyaM CiraHprabhRtInAmaGgAnAM na yugapatsantApaH, api tu kadAcidasya Cirasi pUrvamAgacchati kadAcidaMsayoH pAdayorveti| apagamo-jvarasya mokSaH, tasya vaiSamyaM-kadAcidasya pUrvaM pAdayoH santApamokSaH kadAcittrike kadAcicchirasi santApasya muktiriti| tathA, kSobhamRdutayorvaiSamyaM-kadAcittIvraH santApaH kadAcinmRduriti| vedanA jvarasya tAstAH, tAsAM vaiSamyaM-na yugapatsarvAGgINo vedanopalambhaH, api tu kvacit kadAcit kasmiMCcidaGga iti| tathA, jvarasya ya USmA-santApaH, tasyApi vaiSamyAt kadAcicchirasyasya santApa upalabhyate kadAcit pAdAdyanyatame~aGge| tatratatrAGge-bAhuCiraHprabhRtau, tAstA vedanAH-pAdayoH suptatAdyA vakSyamANAH, calAH-anavasthitAH syuH, vAyoCcalarUpatvAt| tA evAha-pAdayorityAdi| pAdayoH suptiH-niCcetanatvam, nakhakSatAdikamapi na cetayetAM tAvityarthaH| stambhaH-stabdhatA, tayoreva| piNDikayorudveSTanaM-udveSTaH| CramaH-khedaH| sandhInAM vicchedanamiva| UrvoH sAdaH-svakriyAyAmasamarthatvam| kaTyA grahaH-stambha iva| pRSThaM kSodamiva-saMkSuNNatAmiva, Apnoti, saMkSuNNasasyAdivat| niSpIDyata ivodaraM-piNyAkAdivat| chidyanta ivAsthIni-karapatrAdinA kASThAdivat| atiCayena pArCvagAnyasthIni chidyanta iva| tathA, hRdayasya grahaNam| vakSasaH-urasaH, prAjaneneva-pratodeneva, todo-vyathanam| skandhayormanthanaM-araNeriva| bAhvorbhedo-vidAraNamiva| aMsayoH pIDanaM-tailAdipIDanakASThairiva| hanvorbhakSaNe~asAmarthyam| tathA, jRmbhaNAdIni syuH| virasAsyatA-avyaktarasatvaM, mukhasya bhavati, yena madhurAdyanyatamaM rasaM na niCcinoti| athavA kaSAyarasatvaM vaktrasya| malAnAM-mUtrapurISAdInAM, apravartanaM-avisargaH| rUkSatvamaruNatvaM ca tvagAdInAM bhavati, rogasvabhAvAt| tathA, prasekAdayaH syuH| atha, arocakACraddhayoH ko viCeSaH| brUmaH| arocakena vaktrasthamapi na bhuGkte| aCraddhayA tu kevalaM nAbhilaSati mukhasthaM tu bhakSayatyeveti viCeSaH| viSAditA-viSaNNatvaM duHkhitatvam| romAdInAM harSo, vepathvAdayaCca vAtajvare syuH|
pittajvare yugapat-tulyakAlaM, aGgAnAM vyAptiH-CiraH-prabhRtInyaGgAni santApenaikakAlaM vyApyante| na tu vAtajvara ivAgamAdInAM vaiSamyamiti vyAptigrahaNena dyotayati| pralApaH-asambhaddhavacanasyoktiH| kaTuvaktratA-kaTukarasatvamAsye| tathA, nAsAyAmAsye ca pAkaH| tathA, CItecchAdayo~atra bhavanti| maNDalAkArA nirmukhAH piTikAH koThA ityucyante| nanu, doSAstrayo~api jvaraM nivartayantItyuktam| pittajvare ca pittena yuktasya kAyAgnerbhUyo vRddhyA bhAvyam, nAgnimAndyena, ""vRddhiH samAnaiH sarveSAM"" (hR. sU. a. 1|14) iti vacanAt| evaM cAgnimAndyAbhAvAt jvarasya sambhave~apyupapattirayuktA| naivam| svasthAnAccAlanenAgnermAndyApatteH| sthAnavaCAdvA~anyathAtvasyApi kriyAsAmarthyaM dRSTam| tathA cASTAGgasaGgrahe (?) (carake) CoSanidAne vakSyati (ca. ni. a. 6|5)- ""yo~aMCaH [ tasya ] CarIrasandhInAviCati tena [ asya ] jRmbhA jvaraCcopajAyate|"" ityAdi| tasmAtsa evAgniH kvacideva deCe paktaM Cakto bhavati, na sarvatra| uSNaguNena tu pittena yuktaH paktA bhavatyevoSNataraH| ata eva santApAdInadhikatarAn karotIti na kiJcidatrAnupapannam|"

A0 ra0-vAtajvaralakSaNamAha-AgamApagameti| AgamaH-utpattiH, apagamo- vinACaH,kSobhaH-Adhikyam,mRdutA-nyUnatvam, vedanA-buddhiH, USmA-vahniH, eSAM vaiSamyam| tatrAgamAdicatuSTayasya deCakAlayoraniyamaH| buddherbhrAntyA| USmaNo bubhukSA(kSayA)| vedanAH-vyathAH| calAH-bhUtvA bhUtvA vinaCyanti| yatra yatra yAsAM yAsAM sambhAvanAH, tatra tatra tAstAH| tadeva prapaJcayatyuttaragranthena| suptatA-sparCAjJAnam| stambhaH-sarvAGgeSu| sAdaH- svakAryAkSamatvam| kSodo_ viCIrNAvayavatvam| grahaH-avarodhaH| todo- nisvananavyathA| prAjanena- totreNa| aMsayoH- skandhabAhusandhyoH| arocako-jihvendriyApravRttiH| CraddhA-manaHpravRttiH| CuSkau-CleSmarahitau| viSAditA-glAniH|romaharSH-UrddhvaromatA|| aGgaharSaH-tvacaH kaNTakitvam| dantaharSo- dantarogeSUktaH| bhramo- bhramaNamivAGgasya| pittajvaralakSaNamAha-yugapadvyAptiriti| nAsApAko- nAsArogeSu| AsyapAko-mukharogeSu| mUrcchAmadau-madAtyayanidAnoktau|raktakoTho-raktavarNAni maNDalAni|

sa0-nidAnAni ca tAnyuktAni ca,- tiktoSaNAdIni vAtAdijvarakAraNAni, tairanupaCayo yasmin jvare sa evam| rogavRddhyA hi rogiNo duHkhAvahatvam| nanu, nidAnAnupaCaya ityetAvadastu| kimuktagrahaNena ? ucyate| uktagrahaNaM svanidAnagrahaNArtham| uktagrahaNamantareNa yAnikAnicinnidAnAni raktapittaCvAsAdInAM, teSAmanupaCaya ityevaM prApnuyAt| uktaCabdoccAraNasAmarthyAttu yAnyeva vAtajvara uktAni tAnyeva tatra jvare gRhyante, netarANi| evaM pittakaphAdijvarAdiSu| tasmAduktagrahaNaM kartavyam| viparItopaCAyiteti| upaCete~avaCyamityupaCAyi, viparItairupaCAyi-viparItopaCAyi, tasya bhAvo viparItopaCAyitA,-sukhAnubhandhi ArogyalakSaNA| kasmAdviparItaiH ? prakRtatvAnnidAnasyaiva| evaM jvaranidAnapratipakSabhUtaiH sarveSAM jvarANAmupaCayaH sukhAnubhandho viparItopaCAyiteti bodhyam| nanu, "nidAnoktAnupaCayaH" itIdamevAstu, kiM "viparItopaCAyitA" ityanena ? yasya hi nidAnoktAnupaCayaH, tasyAvaCyaM viparItopaCAyitayA bhAvyam| naivam| anaikAntikatvAt| tathA hi,-  atIsArAdiSu nidAnoktAnupaCaya upalabhyate| na ca sAmAvasthAyAM viparItaM saGgrAhyupaCete| api ca madyotthAnAM vikArANAM madyameva prasAdhakamityuktam| na caivaM "viparItopaCAyitA" iti ghaTate| tasmAnnyAyyamubhayorupAdAnam| evaM hi lakSaNaM samyaguktaM bhavati|

A0 ra0- uktAnAM jvarANAM upaCamamAha-nidAnoktAnupaCaya iti| nidAnoktani-doSakopanAni| viparItAni doSaCamanAni| upaCAyitA-upaCayaH|

sarvajo lakSaNaiH sarvairdAho~atra ca muhurmuhuH||27|| tadvacchItaM mahAnidrA divA jAgaraNaM niCi||27|| sadA vA naiva vA nidrA mahAsvedo~ati naiva vA||28|| gItanartanahAsyAdivikRtehApravartanam||28||  sACruNI kaluSe rakte bhugne lulitapakSmaNI||29|| akSiNI piNDikApArCvamUrddhaparvAsthirugbhramaH||29|| sasvanau sarujau karNau kaNThaH CUkairivAcitaH||30||  paridagdhA kharA jihvA guruH srastAGgasandhitA||30|| raktapittakaphaSThIvo lolanaM Ciraso~atiruk||31|| koThAnAM CyAvaraktAnAM maNDalAnAM ca darCanam||31|| hRdvyathA malasaMsaGgaH pravRttirvA~alpaCo~ati vA||32|| snigdhAsyatA balabhraMCaH svarasAdaH pralApitA||32|| doSapAkaCcirAttandrA pratataM kaNThakUjanam||33||

sa0-sarvebhyo jAto vAtapittakaphasamutthaH-sarvajaH, sarvairlakSaNairyuto bhavati| yathA,-atra ca-sannipAtajvare, dAho muhurmuhuH, tadvat-dAhavat punaH punaH, CItaM bhavati| ahani mahatI nidrA| rAtrau tu jAgaraNam| sadA vA-divase niCi ca, naiva veti dvayorapi naktaMdivasayornidrA na bhavati| tathA, bhahusvedo~atiCayena naiva vA svedaH| tathA,gItAdikAyA vikRtAyA IhAyAH- ceSTAyAH, pravartanam| tathA, nayane sAsre bhavataH| tathA, kaluSe rakte tathA kuTile| tathA, lulite pakSmaNI yayosta evam| tathA, piNDikAdiruk| bhramo-mohaH| karNau saCabdau sarujau-sapIDau, ca| kaNThaH CUkaiH-kiMSArubhiriva, vyAptaH| jihvA paridagdhA, tathA kharA-amRduH, tathA guruH| tathA, srastAGgasandhitvam| raktAdiSThIvanam| mUrdhno lolanaM-calanam| tathA, atiruk| koThAnAM CyAvaraktAnAM maNDalAnAM ca darCanam| naiva vetyatrApi yojyam| tathA, hRdi pIDA| malAnAM-mUtrapurISAdInAM, [ saMsaGgaH- ] apravRttiH| alpaCo vA pravRttiratiCayenAthavA| tathA, snigdhAsyatAdi bhavati|

sa0-turviCeSe| samAsAt-saGkSepAt, tu-punaH, saH-jvaro, dvividhaH| tadeva dvaividhyamAha-CArIro mAnasa ityekaM dvikam| saumyastIkSNa iti dvitIyam| antarACrayo bahirACraya iti tRtIyam| prAkRto vaikRta iti caturtham| sAdhyo~asAdhya iti paJcamam| sAmo nirAma iti SaSTham| iti dvaividhyameSAM dvikAnAm|

A0 ra0- aSTAnAM jvarANAM pratyekaM dvaividhyaSaTkamAha-samAsAditi| samAsAt-saGkSepAt| vistarAdanantabhedatvam|

sa0-CArIre jvare prathamaM CarIre tApo bhavati, paCcAnmanasIti pUrvaCabdasya sambandhiCabdatvAdgamyate| evaM mAnase jvare pUrvaM manasi tApo-duHkham, paCcAddehe tApaH-pIDAviCeSo jAyate|

A0 ra0- CArIrasya lakSaNamAha-pUrvaM CarIre iti| pUrvagrahaNAt paCcAnmanasi tApaH|     mAnasalakSaNamAha-manasi mAnasa iti| pUrvaM manasi paCcAccharIre tApaH|

A0 ra0- saumyasya lakSaNamAha-pavane yogavAhitvAditi| yogavAhI-sambandhanirvAhakaH, yena yujyate tadguNameva puSNAti|

dAhaH pittayute, miCraM miCre---------------------||48||

jvaranidAnam adhyAyaH

sa0-dAhaH pittasambandhe pavane yogavAhitvAdbhavet| ityevaM miCre-pittaCleSmayute pavane, yogavAhitvAcca pavanasya miCraM-dAhaCItaM bhavet, muhurdAho muhuH CItamiti| tadayaM saumyatIkSNavyAmiCrastRtIyo jvara iti vedyam| saumyastIkSNa iti dvaividhyakathanaM tu samAsAditi mantavyam| yogaM vahati tacchIlo yogavAhi, yena yena yukto bhavati tasya tasya svabhAvaM bhajata ityarthaH| evaM ca sati svayaM noSNo na ca CIto vAyurityabhyupagatam| tadevamiha yogavAhitvAt kaphena yukte vAyau CItaM bhavedityuktam, asau vAyuH CItaM karotItyarthaH| pittayukte~asmin dAho bhavet, asau dAhaM karotIti| evaM svayaM noSNo na CIta ityavatiSThate| "tatra rUkSo laghuH CItaH " ityatra ca CIta ityucyate| tadime vacasI parasparaM vyAjaghnAte| naivam| "tatra rUkSo laghu CItaH kharaH sUkSmaCcalo~anilaH|" (hR. sU. a. 1|11) ityatraivAyamarthastathA vyAkhyAto yathA na pUrvAparavyAhatatvaM bhavet| teneha punarna pratanyate|

A0 ra0- tIkSNalakSaNamAha-dAhaH pittayuta iti| pavane yogavAhitvAdityanuvartate| miCre-CleSmayute pittayute ca| miCraM-CItaM dAhaCca| tIkSNasyaivAyaM bhedaH, pRthaktve dvitvahAneH| dAhasya duHsahatvAt na saumyabhedaH|

nidAnasthAnam

-------------------------------antaHsaMCraye punaH||48|| jvare~adhikaM vikArAH syurantaH kSobho malagrahaH||49||

jvaranidAnam adhyAyaH

sa0-bahirvarge tu bahireva tApaH, na tvantare| apicetyantaH-kSobhamalagrahAvapyatra na sta iti samuccinoti| tatra ca bahirvege~ata eva susAdhyatA-sukhasAdhyatvaM, bhavati| antarACraye tu duHsAdhyatetyarthAduktaM bhavati|

A0 ra0- bahirACrayalakSaNamAha-bahireveti| bahireva tApo-nAntaH| susAdhyatA-sukhasAdhyatvam|

varSACaradvasanteSu vAtAdyaiH prAkRtaH kramAt||50|| vaikRto~anyaH sa duHsAdhyaH prAyaCca prAkRto~anilAt||50||

jvaranidAnam adhyAyaH

sa0- varSAdiSu triSu RtuSu yathAkramaM vAtAdyaistribhirdoSairyo jvaro jAyate sa prAkRtaH| varSAsu vAtajvaraH prAkRtaH, Caradi pittajvaro, vasante kaphajvaraH, iti paribhASyate| ata eva vAtaprakRtena yo jvaraH, pittaprakRteH pittena, CleSmaprakRteH CleSmaNeti, sa prakRtibhavatvena prAkRta ityucyate| vaikRto~anya iti| yo jvaro varSAdibhya Rtubhyo~anyatra kAle jAto varSAdiSvapi vA na yathAkramaM vAtAdyairjanitaH, sa yathoktaprAkRtalakSaNAdanyaH, sa vaikRta ucyate| sa ca duHsAdhyaH-kRcchrasAdhyaH| prAkRtastu susAdhya ityarthAdgamyate| prAya ityAdi| prAyo-bAhulyena, prAkRto~api yo jvaro~anilAjjAyate so~api duHsAdhyaH| prAyograhaNenaitad dyotayati| kadAciddaivAnukUlatvAtsusAdhya eva bhavati| nanu, varSAsva(Caradya)pi prAkRto~api jvaro yathA vikRtivijJAnIye kathitastathA~asAdhya eva| "jvaro nihanti balavAn" (hR. CA. a. 5|71) ityAdi| tadetatpUrvAparavyAhatamiva dRCyate| naivam| anayorvacasoH sAmAnyaviCeSarUpatvAt| tathA ceha sAmAnyenoktam, vikRtivijJAnIye tu viCeSeNeti| etadeva ca sphuTIkartuM vakSyati (Clo. 53)- "vikRtijJAne prAgasAdhya udAhRtaH|" iti|

A0 ra0- prAkRtalakSaNamAha-varSACaradvasanteSviti| varSAsu vAtajaH, Caradi pittajaH, vasante kaphajaH, prAkRto jJeyaH| vaikRtalakSaNamAha-vaikRto~anya iti| atha RtunA doSeNa vA Caradi vAtajaH, varSAsu kaphajaH, ityAdi vaikRto duHsAdhyo jJeyaH| prAkRtaCcAnilAjjAtaH| prAyograhaNAt kvacit susAdhyo~api| " ekamArgakriyArambhavyativRttermahAtyayAt|" ityadhikaM saGgrahe (ni. a. 2)| ekamArga ekakriyAkArambhaCca rogaH sukhasAdhyaH| vAtaje tveSAM vyativRttiH-viparyayaH| bahirmArgo~ayaM laGghanasAdhyo~ayaM saumyo~ayamityupacaryamANo~api vAtajo~antarmArgatvaM bRMhaNasAdhyatvaM tIkSNatvaM copaiti| vAtasyAnavasthitatvAt| mahAMCcAtyayaH-atikramaH, yadauSadhakAlamapi na pratIkSate| vAtasyACukAritvAt|

varSAsu mAruto duSTaH pittaCleSmAnvito jvaram||51|| kuryAt pittaM ca Caradi tasya cAnubalaM kaphaH||51|| tatprakRtyA visargAcca tatra nAnaCanAdbhayam||52|| kapho vasante tamapi vAtapittaM bhavedanu||52||

jvaranidAnam adhyAyaH

sa0-prAvRSi pavanaH [ duSTaH- ] kupitaH, pittaCleSmayuto jvaraM kuryAt| prAvRSi prAkRto jvaro vAtapradhAnaH pittaCleSmANau tvanubalatvena vAtasya sthitau, na tu sannipAta iva svayaM jvarakArakAvityarthaH|    sAmprataM Caradi prAkRtasya jvarasya doSabalAbalaM lakSayati-pittaM cetyAdi| pittaM Caradi [ duSTaM ] prAkRtaM jvaraM kuryAdityanuvartate| prAvRTsaJcitasya pittasya tadA kopasadbhAvAt| tasya ca pittasyAnubalaM-anubandhi balaM, kaphaH| anubalamivAnubalam| yathA,-kasyacit svatantrasya rAjJo gajaturagarathapuruSAdibalavato vairibhiH saha yudhyamAnasya paCcAdanyadbalaM tacchakteranubRMhaNArthamAgacchati, evaM svatantrasya pittasya jvaraM kurvato balopabhRMhaNaM Caradi kaphaH karoti| tatprakRtyeti tacchabdena varSACaradudbhUtau mArutajvarapittajvarau parAmRCyete| tayoH prakRtistatprakRtiH, tayA tatprakRtyA,- tatsvabhAvena, tatra-prAkRte jvare, anaCanAt-laGghanAt, bhayaM na 'bhavati' iti CeSaH| visargAcca varSACaradupalakSito hi kAlo visargaH saumyasvabhAvaH, asmAcca kAraNAttasminkAle jvara utpanne laGghanAt pratyavAyaCaGkA tathA na bhavati, yathA~anyasmin kAle jvara AdAnakAlasvabhAvAdvAtapittAnubalatvAccAnaCanAdbhayaM bhavatItyarthaH|        vasantakAle kapho duSTo jvaraM kuryAditi vartate| taM ca kaphamanu vAtapittaM bhavet, vAtapitte tasyAnubale bhavata ityarthaH| nanu, atra sAkSAtkaphasya kartRtvamucyate| kaphaSca saumyasvabhAvaH| tasmAdatra nAnaCanAdbhayamiti| taccAyuktam| tathAhi-varSACaradoH CleSmAnubalatvaM kAlaCca visargAkhya iti kAraNadvayasadbhAvAddhAtvapacayo na sambhAvyata eva| vasante tu kAlasyAgneyatvAdvAtapittAnubalatvAccAvaCyaMbhAvI dhAtvapacaya eva| tasmAdvasante~anaSanAdbhayaM CaGkyate| kecittu jvarasyAmACayasamutthatvAt kaphotthatvAccAtrApi kiJcinmAtramanaCanAdbhayaM nACaGkyata evetyAhuH|

A0 ra0- viruddhAviruddhopakramajJAnArthaM prAkRtAnAM samprAptirucyate| tatra vAtajasya-varSAsu mAruta iti| pittajasya-pittaM ca CaradIti| kaphajasya-kapho vasanta iti| "tatprakRtyA visargAcca tatra nAnaCanAdbhayam|" iti pittAjasyAviruddhopakramatvamuktam| tayoH-pittakaphayoH, prakRtiH-laGghanasAdhyatvam| visargaH-kAlabalavardhanatvam| varSAsu tvalpaM balaM doSaCca bRMhaNasAdhyaH| jvaraH pittaCleSmANau ca laGghanasAdhyAviti viruddhopakramatvam| vasante~anukSIyamANe~api madhyamaM balaM, vAtasya cAprAdhAnyaM, pradhAnayoH kaphajvarayoH pittasya ca laGghanasAdhyatvamityaviruddhopakramatvameva|

balavatsvalpadoSeSu jvaraH sAdhyo~anupadravaH||53||

sa0-balavatsu nareSu yauvanAdisampattyA tathA~alpadoSeSu yo jvaro jAyate, upadraveNa-kAsAdinA rahitaH, sa sAdhyaH-sAdhayituM CakyaH|

A0 ra0- sAdhyalakSaNamAha-balavatsvalpadoSeSviti| doSo -duSTanAma (?)| upadravA rugviniCcaye darCitAH (mA. ni. jva. Clo. 66, TI.) -  "CvAso mUrcchA~aruciCcchardistRSNAtIsAraviDgrahAH| hikkA kAso~aGgabhedaCca jvarasyopadravA daCa||" iti|

 sarvathA vikRtijJAne prAgasAdhya udAhRtaH||53||

jvaranidAnam adhyAyaH

sa0-sarvatheti yAdRCasyAturasya yAdRCo jvaro~asAdhyo bhavati tAdRCo, vikRtivijJAnIye CArIre (a. 5|71)- "jvaro nihanti balavAn" ityAdinA granthena prAk-pUrvamuktaH|

A0 ra0- asAdhyalakSaNamAha-sarvatheti| vikRtijJAne~adhyAye| prAk-CArIre sthAne| sarvathetyasAdhyaviCeSaNam, anupakrama ityarthaH| yApyaduHsAdhyayostu lakSaNaM svayamapyUhyam| udAhRto yathA (hR. CA. a. 5/71) - " jvaro nihanti balavAn gambhIro dairgharAtrikaH|| sapralApabhramaCvAsaH kSINaM CUnaM hatAnalam| akSAmaM saktavacanaM raktAkSaM hRdi CUlinam|| suCuSkakAsaH  pUrvahNe yo~aparAhNe~api vA bhavet| balamAMsavihInasya CleSmakAsasamanvitaH||" iti| vRnde tu (jvarAdhikAre Clo. 187) - " svedo lalATe himavAnnarasya CItArditasyaiti supicchilaCca| kaNThasthito yasya na yAti vakSo nUnaM yamasyaiti gRhaM sa martyaH||  mRtyuCca tasminbahupicchalatvAcchItasya jantoH paritaH saratvAt|" iti|

jvaropadravatIkSNatvamaglAnirbahumUtratA||54|| na pravRttirna viD jIrNA na kSutsAmajvarAkRtiH||54||

jvaranidAnam adhyAyaH

sa0-jvarasyopadravAH-pralApabhramAdayaH, teSAM tIkSNatvaM-tIvratA| tathA, bahumUtratvam| tathA, na pravRttiH-na purISasya pravartanam| viTpravRttAvapi hi pravRttiCabdaH prasiddhaH| yathA~anantaramadhunaivAdhItam (Clo. 32)- "pravRttirvA~alpaCo~ati vA|" iti| atha cedviT pravartate sA na jIrNA-pakvA na bhavati| tathA, na kSut-na bubhukSA| iyamaCeSA liGgasaMhatiH sAmajvarAkRtiH-sAmajvarasya lakSaNam| sahAmena vartate yo jvaraH sa sAmajvaraH, tasyAkRtiH| "USmaNo~alpabalatvena" (hR. sU. a. 13|25) ityAdyAmalakSaNam|

A0 ra0- sAmajvaralakSaNamAha-jvaropadravatIkSNatvamiti| na pravRttirviCaH| pravartamAnA~api viT na jIrNA-na pakvA|

 jvaravego~adhikaM tRSNA pralApaH CvasanaM bhramaH||55|| malapravRttirutkleCaH pacyamAnasya lakSaNam||55||

jvaranidAnam adhyAyaH

sa0-atiCayena jvaravegastRSNAdayaCceti pacyamAnajvarasya lakSaNam| pacyamAnajvarasya ca dvikeSvanirdiSTasyApIha kathanamatA(mAmA)ntarIyakatvAt| tathA hi-yAvatpacyamAnAvasthA na bhavati tAvatkathaM nirAmAvasthA syAt ? tasmAdyuktaH pacyamAnajvarasya nirdeCaH|

A0 ra0- atha pacyamAnajvaralakSaNamAha-jvaravego~adhika iti| pacyamAnasya pakvAntarbhAvAnna dvaividhyahAniH|

jIrNatA~~AmaviparyAsAtsaptarAtraM ca laGghanAt||56||

jvaranidAnam adhyAyaH

sa0-AmaCabdenAtra sAmajvaralakSaNamupalakSyate| tena sAmajvaroktalakSaNaviparyAsAt jvarasya jIrNatA vedyeti bodhyam| yathA-jvaropadravamRdutvaM glAniralpamUtratA pakvaviTpravRttiH kSudupagamanamiti, evaMrUpo viparyAsaH| tathA, "jvaravego~adhikaM" ityAdipacyamAnajvarAkRteCca viparyAsAt jIrNatA-pakvatA, lakSayitavyA| tathA hi-pacyamAnatAyAmapi sAmatA sambhAvyata eva| tathA, saptarAtraM ca laGghanAt| saptarAtramiti saptAnAM rAtrINAM samAhAra ityac samAsAntaH, atyantasaMyoge dvitIyA| tenAyamarthaH,-saptarAtrIrlaGghayitvA-ativAhya, tato~anantaraM yaH kAlo~aSTamadinAdistadA jvarasya jIrNatA-nirAmateti| tathA ca muniH (ca. ci. a. 3|272)- "saptAhena tu pacyante saptadhAtugatA malAH| nirAmaCcApyataH prokto jvaraH prAyo~aSTame~ahani||" iti| nanu, evaMsati saptarAtrAtipravRttireva nirAmajvaraliGgamastu, "jIrNatA~~AmaviparyAsAt" ityanena nArthaH| astyevaitat| kintu sannipAtajvare bahunA kAlena malapAko bhavati| tasmAttallakSaNArthaM "jIrNatA~~AmaviparyAsAt" ityapyuktam| yadyevaM "jIrNatA~~AmaviparyAsAt" ityastu, kiM "saptarAtraM ca laGghanAt" ityanena ? api ca tridoSaje jvare saptarAtrAtikramalakSaNaM liGgaM nopayujyate| tatra hyevaM paThyate (Clo. 61)- "vAtapittakaphaiH sapta daCa dvAdaCa" ityArabhya yAvat "CuddhyaCuddhyau jvaraH kAlaM dIrghamapyanuvartate||" iti| tasmAt "saptarAtraM ca laGghanAt" ityavAcyam| atrocyate| alpadoSo yo jvarastasyAmaviparyAsAt saptAhAdarvAgapi jIrNatocyate| yastu bahudoSo jvarastasya tu kRtasaptalaGghanasya jIrNatocyate| iti lakSaNadvayena pratyapAdi| ata eva ca tatra pathyamanujajJe| vakSyati hi (hR. ci. a. 1|38)- "ityayaM SaDaho neyo balaM doSaM ca rakSatA| tataH pakveSu doSeSu laGghanAdyaiH praCasyate|| kaSAyo doSaCeSasya" ityAdi| tasmAdetayorlakSaNayordvayorapyupAdAnaM nyAyyamiti sthitam| kharanAdenApyevamavAdi-"na ca niHsaptataiveha nirAmajvarakAraNam| cirAdapi hi pacyante sannipAtajvare malAH|| saptarAtrAtivRttiCca kSAmatAdi ca lakSaNam| tasmAttadubhayaM dRSTvA nirAmaM jvaramAdiCet||" iti| jIrNaH pakvaH purANa iti paryAyAH|

A0 ra0- nirAmajvaralakSaNamAha-jIrNateti| AmaviparyAsAt-jvaropadravamRdutvAdeH| saptarAtraM laGghanAditi madhyadoSaviSayam| bahudoSAlpadoSayostataH paraM pUrvaM ca darCanAt|

jvaraH paJcavidhaH prokto malakAlabalAbalAt||56|| prAyaCaH sannipAtena bhUyasA tUpadiCyate||57|| santataH satato~anyedyustRtIyakacaturthakau||57||

jvaranidAnam adhyAyaH

sa0-paJcaprakAro jvaro vakSyamANaH santatAdibhirbhedaiH prokto, 'munIndraiH' iti CeSaH| kutaH ? maletyAdi| malo-vAtAdiH| kAlaH-pUrvAhNAdiH| balaM ca balaM ca balamityekaCeSaH, balaM cAbalaM ca balAbalam, kAle balAbalaM kAlabalAbalam, saptamIti yogavibhAgAt samAsaH, malAnAM kAlabalAbalaM malakAlabalAbalam, tasmAt| dvibalaCabdo~atra nirdiSTo dvividhasambandhArthaH| ko~asau dvividhaH sambandhaH ? iti cet brUmaH| jvaraH paJcavidhaH kathito malakAlabalAt tathA malakAlabalAbalAt| tadayamatrArthaH,-santato jvaro malakAlabalAduktaH| tathA cAnantarameva santatalakSaNaM vakSyati (Clo. 58-59)- "malAbalino guravaH stabdhAH santataM niSpratidvandvA jvaraM kuryuH|" iti| tasmAdbalavanta eva doSAH santataM jvaraM kurvanti| viSamajvarACcatvAro malakAlabalAbalAdbhavanti| tathA ca viSamajvaralakSaNe~adhunaivAdhyeSyate (Clo. 64)- "alpo~api doSo dUSyAderlabdhvA~anyatamato balam| savipakSo jvaraM kuryAdviSamaM kSayavRddhibhAk||" iti| tasmAccatuSprakAro~api viSamajvaro malakAlabalAbalAdbhavati| kharanAdenApyuktam-"balibhiH sarvagaiH sAmai rasasrotovisAribhiH| niSpratyanIkairdoSairyaH santato jAyate jvaraH||" ityAdi| tathA tatraiva viSamajvare gaditam-"vyAdhikliSTasya' ityArabhya yAvat "balAbalaviCeSastu doSANAM sampravartate|" iti| tathA tatraiva coktam-"bhuvyutkramya yathAkAlaM bIjaM kAle prasUyate| tathA kAlakramAddoSaH kAle jvarakAro bhavet||" iti| prAyaCa ityAdi| bAhulyenAyaM santatAdijvaraH sannipAtAdbhavati| [ nanu, ] atra sannipAtenetyasAdhu| na hyanyaH kaCcitsantatAdivyatirikto jvaro~asti yamekadoSajaM dvidoSajaM vA parikalpayediti, tasmAdasadetat| ucyate| samaryAdayA doSagatyA ye santatAdayo jvarA utpadyante, ta ekadoSajAdaya upapadyante| ye punarviSamasamprAptisamutpannAH santatAdayaste sannipAtena| iti prAyaCaH sannipAteneti nyAyyametat| nanu, evaM sati vAtiko~ayaM paittiko~ayaM ClaiSmiko~ayamayaM dvAndvika iti kathaM vyapadeCaH ? ityAha-bhUyaseti| sannipAtodbhave~apyasmin santatAdau bhUyAn-adhiko doSaH, taddoSopalakSitAM saMjJAmAsAdayatItyarthaH, vAtajvaro~ayaM pittajvaro~ayamityAdi| turavadhAraNe, bhUyasaiva doSeNa vyapadeCo nAnyenApi| tataCcaivaM sannipAtotthaH santatAdijvara iti sthitam| ata eva tantrAntara evaM jagAda-"santato mArutAtprAyaH pittAt prAyastRtIyakaH| anyedyuCca kaphAtprAyaH sannipAtAccaturthakaH|| sannipAtakRtatvAttu duCcikitsyaCcaturthakaH|" iti| tathA ca-"pRSThe~anilakaphodbhUtaH CleSmapittodbhavastrike| CirasyanilasambhUto gRhNAtIha tRtIyakaH|| caturthakastu CleSmotthaH pratigRhNAti jaGghayoH| vAtikaH Ciraso~abhyeti dvidhaivAyaM svabhAvataH|| praskandhatastu vijJeyo viparItaCcaturthakaH|" iti|        atha tadeva paJcavidhatvamAha-santataH satato~anyedyustRtIyakacaturthakAviti| nanu, paJcavidho jvara ityanupapannam, SaSThasya caturthakaviparyayasya ca vakSyamANatvAt| atra brUmaH| caturthakAntargatatvAdadoSaH| plIhodare yakRdudaravat| tathA hi-aSTAvudarANIti, plIhodare ca yathA yakRdudarasyAntarbhAvAdaSTadhAtvam, evaM jvare caturthaka eva caturthakaviparyayasyAntarbhAvAt paJcadhAtvameva jvarasya sAdhu|

A0 ra0- uktAnAM jvarANAM pRthak paJcavidhatvamAha-jvaraH paJcavidha iti| malakAlabalAt santataH, satatAdayastvabalAt| abalaM-hInabalam| tatra yathottaraM jJeyam| prAyaCo grahaNAdaniyamo~api tena ca sannipAtena| vAtajvarAdivyapadeCastu vAtAdibhUyastvAt|

sa0-malA jvaraM kuryuH-utpAdayeyuH| kIdRCAH ? dhAtvAdisrotasAM vyApinaH| dhAtavaCca mUtraM ca CakRcca tAni vahanti nityaM yAni srotAMsi teSAM| malA ityanenaitaddyotayati| yadaiva vAtAdayo malinIkaraNasvabhAvAH syustadA santataM jvaraM kuryuH, na tu doSarUpA dhAturUpA vA| tathA, sarvAM-aCeSAM, tanuM tApayantaH-santApAdinA pIDayantaH, na punaH santApamAtramutpAdayantaH| tathA, tulyaiH-samAnaiH, dUSyAdibhirvarddhitAH-vRddhiM nItAH| AdiCabdena deCartuprakRtayo gRhyante| dUSyAH-rasAdidhAtavaH| te ca trayANAmapi doSANAM yathAyathaM tulyatvAdvarddhanahetavaH| deCartuprakRtayastu tulyakAlaM malaiH sarvairatulyA api bhavanti| prAyeNaikaikasya malasya caikaiko deCo vA RturvA prakRtirvA tulyA bhavati| ataH "tulyadUSyAdivarddhitAH" ityuktam| tathA ca, dhanvadeCo vAtasyaiva vRddhihetuH, tulyatvAt; kaphasya tvatulyatvAtkSapaNahetuH| AnupastulyatvAt kaphasya vRddhihetuH, vAtasya tvasamAnatvAtkSapaNahetuH| RtAvapyevaM cintyam| prakRtistrayANAM doSANAM tulyakAlaM vRddhiheturna sambhavati, viSamadoSajanitatvAt| ye tvevamavocan,-samAkhyA prakRtistulyatvAdeSAM malAnAmatra jvare varddhanaheturiti| te~api maivaM vocante(vacantvi)ti vacanIyAH| yato rogajananonmukhAnAM doSANAM nAsau vRddhihetuH, ArogyalakSaNatvAt| kimbhUtA doSAH ? balinaH, pratipakSairakhaNDitaCaktitvAt| tathA guravaH, sAmatvAt| stabdhAH-niCcalAH, UrdhvamadhaCcAniHsaraNAt| viCeSeNa rasACritAH| viCeSagrahaNaM malAnAM sarvadhAtvACritatvaM dyotayati| sakaladhAtusamACritA api bhavanti| atiCayena rasAkhyaM dhAtumACrityaite santataM kuryuH| tathA, niSpratidvandvAH-pratyanIkarahitAH| kIdRCaM jvaram ? suSThu duHkhena-kRcchreNa, soDhuM Cakyata iti suduHsaham|

raktapittakAsanidAnAm adhyAyaH

sa0-bhRCaCabdasyoSNAdibhirvidAhyantaiH sambandhaH| AdiCabdenAtra kSArAdayo gRhyante| bhRCoSNAdibhirannaiH pittalairatisevitairdravaM-dravasvabhAvaM, yat pittaM tat kupitaM-duSTaM, tathA raktaM kupitaM, tairevAtisevitaiH| atisevanaM cobhayathA bhavati,-cirakAlamabhyavahRtaistathA~atimAtrAbhyavahRtaiH| na kevalametairyAvat kodravoddAlakaiCcAnnaiH| tadityanena bhRCoSNAdIni parAmRCyante| tairyuktaiH-miCritaiH kodravoddAlakaiCcAnnairatisevitaiH kupitaM pittaM tathA raktaM ca bhavati| te-dve api raktapitte, mUrcchite-miCratAM gate, mithaH-parasparaM, tulyarUpatvaM-samavarNatvaM, Agamya-prApya, sarvAM tanuM-dehaM, vyApnuto-vyaCnuvAte| nanu, bhRCoSNAdInAM pittalatvAvyabhicArAt kimarthaM pittalairityuktam ? brUmaH| dADimAmalakasaindhaveSvamlalavaNAdiSu vyabhicArAt| tathAhi-dADimAmalakasaindhavAnyamlalavaNAnyapi pittaM na kurvate| api ca na kevalaM bhRCoSNAdiyuktaiH kupitaM  pittaM raktaM ca| yAvadanyairapi pittalairabhRCoSNAdisvabhAvairvrIhiprabhRtibhiratisevitaiH kupitaM pittaM ceti pratipAdanArthaM pittalairityuktam| nanu, evaM sati pittalairityeva nirdeCaH kartuM yukta ubhayAnugrahArthaH| tathA ca bhRCoSNAdIni tathA~anyAnyapyabhRCoSNAdIni vrIhiprabhRtInyevaM gRhItAni bhavanti| astyevaitat| kintu pittalatvasAmAnyAdgRhItAnAmapi bhRCoSNAdInAmupAdAnaM kRtamatiCayadyotanArtham| yathA bhRCoSNAdInyatiCayena pittaM raktaM ca kopayanti, na tathA~anyAni vrIhiprabhRtIni| ata eva kodravoddAlakau CItavIryAvapi bhRCoSNAdidravyayutau pittasya kartArau bhavataH| bhRCoSNAdInAmatipittalatvAt| nanu, pittasya dravamiti viCeSaNamayuktam, vyabhicArAbhAvAt| tathA ca tantrakRjjagau (hR. sU. a. 1|11)- "pittaM sasnehastIkSNoSNaM laghu visraM saraM dravam|" iti| atrocyate| pittamadravamapyasti| kathaM jJAyate ? granthakAravacanAt| tathA covAca tantrakRt (hR. sU. a. 12|90)- "pittaM paJcAtmakaM tatra pakvAmACayamadhyagam| paJcabhUtAtmakatve~api yattaijasaguNodayAt|| tyaktadravatvaM" ityAdi| tasmAt yaddravarUpaM pittaM tadbhRCoSNAdibhiH kupitaM raktapitte kAraNam, na punaryat tyaktadravatvaM-kaThinatAM prAptaM, iti pratipAdayituM dravagrahaNam|        nanu, yadi tulyarUpatvaM pittarakte prApte, tatkathamIdRCo nirdeCa upapadyate ? " adhogaM yApayedraktaM" (hR. ci. a. 2|2) iti| evamAdau hi raktasya pittasahitasyaiva nirdeCo yukto "raktapittamadhogaM yApayet" iti|

A0 ra0-atha raktapittaprakaraNam|  tatra nidAnamAha-bhRCoSNetyAdi|  bhRCoSNAda(dya)nyavidAhitvaM ca militaM kAraNam|  kodravAH-koradUSAH, uddAlakAH-vanyAH, teSAM tadyuktAnAm -vidAhiyuktAnAM, kAraNatvam|  "kodravaM hantyasRkpittaM karotyeva vidAhibhiH|" iti vacanAt|  annairityadanena hetutvam, na bahirlepAdinA|  pUrvaM pittalaiH kupitaM paCcAdbhRCoSNAbhirveditam|  dravagrahaNaM pAcakapittanivRttyartham|        samprAptimAha-te mitha iti|  te-pittarakte|  tulyarUpatvaM-raktavarNatvaM tulyaguNAt kadAciddharitAdivarNatvamapi|

pittaM raktasya vikRteH saMsargAddUSaNAdapi||3|| gandhavarNAnuvRtteCca raktena vyapadiCyate||3||

raktapittakAsanidAnAm adhyAyaH

sa0-pittaM raktena vyapadiCyate| yasmAt pittaM raktasya vikRtiH-vikAro, raktAdutpannamityarthaH| tathA coktam (hR. CA. a. 3|63) - "kaphaH pittaM malAH sveSu prasvedo nakharoma ca| sneho~akSitvagviCAmojo dhAtUnAM kramaCo malAH||" iti| tathA, saMsargAt-anyonyamiCrIbhAvAt| tathA, dUSaNAdapi-yasmAdraktaM pittenACveva dUSyate, tathA raktadUSaNaiH pittamapi dUSyate, tAtsthyAt| tathA ca granthaH (hR. sU. a. 11|27) - "yadekasya tadanyasya varddhanakSapaNauSadham|" iti| anye tu dhAtavo na tathA dUSyante yathA pittam| tathA coktam (hR. sU. a. 11|26)- "tatrAsthani sthito vAyuH pittaM tu svedaraktayoH|" iti| tathA, gandhavarNAnuvRtteCca| gandhaCca varNaCca gandhavarNau, tayoranuvRttiH-anukaraNaM gandhavarNAnuvRttiH| kasya gandhavarNo ? prakRtatvAdraktasya yAdRCau gandhavarNau tAdRCAvapi pittasya| evaM ca raktena tat vyapadiCyate| tasmAt " adhogaM yApayedraktaM" ityAdinirdeCo yukta eva|        nanu, raktasya CarIre svAbhAvikaM pramANamuktamaSTAvevAJjalayaH| prakopamApannaM tvADhakAdisaGkhyAtamapi dRCyate|

sa0-rogAdayaH CabdAH paryAyavAcinaH-ekArthA ityarthaH| nanu ca, eSAM rogAdiCabdAnAM pravRttinimittaM pratyarthabhedo~api dRCyate| yathA,-rujatIti rogaH, duHkhasya kartRtvAdduHkhasyAbhidhAyakaH| pApmeti kila sarve rogAH pApasya karmaNaH phalamiti kRtvA pApmetyucyate| "jvaraH pradhAno rogANAmuktaH" (ca. ci. a. 3|4)| prAdhAnyaM cAsya durupakramatvAdatiduHsahatvAcca| ata eva sarvakAyamanaHsantApakatvaM jvarasyAhuH| tathA, "jyAvayohAnau" ityasya dhAtorauNAdike varapratyaye sati jvaraCabdasyArthAntaratvamapyApatati| vividhamAdhiM-duHkhaM, AdadhAti CarIre manasi ceti-vyAdhiH| vikAro buddhIndriyamanaHCarIrANAM vikRtiM-anyathAtvaM, janayatItyarthaH| duHkhamityanenopatApakatvamanubhavaM gamayati| Amaya ityasyArthaH-kilA~~AmasamutthAH sarve vyAdhayaH| prAyeNa hi loko~akhila eva laulyAdadeCakAlApathyAtimAtrACI bhavati| tasya cAvaCyamAmasambhavAdbAhulyenAmasamutthA vyAdhayaH| bAhulyaM cAGgIkRtya CabdapravRttiH| yakSmeva yakSmA, yathA-"yakSmA rogasamUhAnAm" (ca. sU. a. 25|39, saM. sU. a. 13) ityuktaH| evaM sarvo~api rogo rogasamUha ityanena dyotayati| tathA ca, sarvo vikAra utpadyamAno~anekairvyAdhilakSaNabhUtaiCca yukta utpadyate| yathA,-jvarasyAlasyArocakAdayaH| AtaGka iti "taki kRcchrajIvane" ityasya dhAtorAGpUrvasya rUpam| rogopataptatvAddhi strIpAnabhojanAdibhyo nivRttAH kRcchreNa jIvanti| gada iva gado~anekakAraNajanyatvAt| yathA hi gado~anekakAraNajastathA gado~apIti gadaCabdasyArthaH| AbAdha iti AsamantAt kAyamanasorbAdhanaM-pIDetyarthaH| evaM pravRttinimittaM pratyarthabhedadarCanAt kathamuktaM paryAyavAcinaH iti| atrAcakSmahe| evamevaitat| kintu pIDAkAritvasAmAnyaM pravRttinimittamurarIkRtya paryAyavAcinaH ityuktam|

sa0-rogAdayaH CabdAH paryAyavAcinaH-ekArthA ityarthaH| nanu ca, eSAM rogAdiCabdAnAM pravRttinimittaM pratyarthabhedo~api dRCyate| yathA,-rujatIti rogaH, duHkhasya kartRtvAdduHkhasyAbhidhAyakaH| pApmeti kila sarve rogAH pApasya karmaNaH phalamiti kRtvA pApmetyucyate| "jvaraH pradhAno rogANAmuktaH" (ca. ci. a. 3|4)| prAdhAnyaM cAsya durupakramatvAdatiduHsahatvAcca| ata eva sarvakAyamanaHsantApakatvaM jvarasyAhuH| tathA, "jyAvayohAnau" ityasya dhAtorauNAdike varapratyaye sati jvaraCabdasyArthAntaratvamapyApatati| vividhamAdhiM-duHkhaM, AdadhAti CarIre manasi ceti-vyAdhiH| vikAro buddhIndriyamanaHCarIrANAM vikRtiM-anyathAtvaM, janayatItyarthaH| duHkhamityanenopatApakatvamanubhavaM gamayati| Amaya ityasyArthaH-kilA~~AmasamutthAH sarve vyAdhayaH| prAyeNa hi loko~akhila eva laulyAdadeCakAlApathyAtimAtrACI bhavati| tasya cAvaCyamAmasambhavAdbAhulyenAmasamutthA vyAdhayaH| bAhulyaM cAGgIkRtya CabdapravRttiH| yakSmeva yakSmA, yathA-"yakSmA rogasamUhAnAm" (ca. sU. a. 25|39, saM. sU. a. 13) ityuktaH| evaM sarvo~api rogo rogasamUha ityanena dyotayati| tathA ca, sarvo vikAra utpadyamAno~anekairvyAdhilakSaNabhUtaiCca yukta utpadyate| yathA,-jvarasyAlasyArocakAdayaH| AtaGka iti "taki kRcchrajIvane" ityasya dhAtorAGpUrvasya rUpam| rogopataptatvAddhi strIpAnabhojanAdibhyo nivRttAH kRcchreNa jIvanti| gada iva gado~anekakAraNajanyatvAt| yathA hi gado~anekakAraNajastathA gado~apIti gadaCabdasyArthaH| AbAdha iti AsamantAt kAyamanasorbAdhanaM-pIDetyarthaH| evaM pravRttinimittaM pratyarthabhedadarCanAt kathamuktaM paryAyavAcinaH iti| atrAcakSmahe| evamevaitat| kintu pIDAkAritvasAmAnyaM pravRttinimittamurarIkRtya paryAyavAcinaH ityuktam|

saGkhyAvikalpaprAdhAnyabalakAlaviCeSataH||9|| sA bhidyate, yathA~atraiva vakSyante~aSTau jvarA iti||9|| doSANAM samavetAnAM vikalpo~aMCAMCakalpanA||10|| svAtantryapAratantryAbhyAM vyAdheH prAdhAnyamAdiCet||10|| hetvAdikArtsnyAvayavairbalAbalaviCeSaNam||11|| naktaMdinartubhuktAMCairvyAdhikAlo yathAmalam||11||

sa0-sA ca-samprAptiH, saGkhyAdiviCeSeNa bhidyate,- saGkhyA ca vikalpaCca prAdhAnyaM ca balaM ca kAlaCca ta evam, teSAM viCeSaH saGkhyAvikalpaprAdhAnyabalakAlaviCeSaH, tasmAtsA samprAptirbahudhA sampadyate|
    tatra saGkhyAviCeSo yathA-[atraiva-]ihaiva, vakSyante~aSTau jvarAH, iti| evamanyatra paJca kAsAH, paJca CvAsAH, aSTau gulmAH, ityevamAdayaH saGkhyAviCeSAH samprAptibhedAH|
    doSANAM-vAtAdInAM, samavetAnAM-ekasmin vyAdhau saGghaTTitAnAM, yA aMCAMCakalpanA-bhAgena bhAgena kAryAnumeyena nirUpaNA, sa vikalpaH| aMCaCcAMCaCcAMCAMCau, tAbhyAM kalpanA-anekavidho viCeSaH| yathA-asmin vyAdhau vAtaH kupitaH kadAcidekena guNenAdhikena rUkSeNa kadAcillaghunA kadAcicchItena kadAciddvAbhyAM tribhirvA~adhikairduSyati| evaM pittaM kaTvamlAdinA kupitaM kadAcidekena guNena tIkSNena kadAciduSNena kadAciddvAbhyAM bahubhirvA~adhikairduSyati| evaM kaphe~api nirUpyam| tadevaMrUpo yo niCcayaH sa vikalpa iti| yataCcaivaM tataH sarveSu rogeSu tulyAH kopanaprakArA na bhavanti| tathA hi-rUkSAdayo guNA vAtasya sadA kopakAH, kintu kadAcit kasyacidguNasya prakRSTatvaM kopane kasyacinnyUnatvamiti| ata eva hetorgadAnantyaM cikitsAnantyaM ca| doSANAmiti bahuvacanopAdAnAdeva samavetAnAmityarthe labdhe samavetagrahaNaM pRthagdvandvasamastAnAmapi cAMCAMCakalpanA vikalpa ucyata iti pratipAdanArtham|
    svAtantryaM ca pAratantryaM ca, tAbhyAM vyAdheH prAdhAnyamAdiCet-jAnIyAt| tatra svatantrasya vyAdheH prAdhAnyam, yathA svanirdiSTopakramasAdhyatvAt| asvatantrasya vyAdheraprAdhAnyam, pradhAnavyAdhyupakrameNa prAyastasyApyupakramyatvAt| yadyapi prAdhAnyaviCeSAdasau samprAptirbhidyata ityuktam, tathA~apyaprAdhAnyaviCeSAdapyasau samprAptirbhidyata ityarthAduktaM bhavatyeva| prAdhAnyAprAdhAnyayoH parasparaM sApekSatvAt| tathA hi-aprAdhAnyaM prAdhAnyamapekSya vaktuM yujyate, apradhAnyaM cApekSya prAdhAnyamiti|

    kRtsnasya bhAvaH kArtsnyam| kArtsnyaM cAvayavACca kArtsnyAvayavAH| hetvAdinA kArtsnyAvayavAH| AdiCabdena prAgrUpAdayo gRhyante| balaM cAbalaM ca balAbale vyAdheH sambandhinI, tayorviCeSeNaM-viCiSTatA, balAbalaviCeSaNam| tadyathAsaGkhyena hetvAdikArtsnyAvayavairAdiCet| tatra pratirogaM yannidAnatvenopadiSTaM, tatkiM kArtsnyenAsya vyAdherutpAdakamutAvayavena ? evaM prAgrUpamapi| tathA lakSaNamapi kiM samastamasya vyAdherlakSyata utAvayavena ? upaCayo~apyasya vyAdheH santarpaNApatarpaNarUpaH, sa kiM kArtsnyena sukhAnubandhaM karotyutAvayavena ? tatra kArtsnyena yathA-raktaCAlyAdimAMsaghRtakSIradadhivasAmajjatailAdinA| avayavena tu-raktaCAlyAdimAMsAdyanyatamena caikaikena| tathA~apatarpaNarUpo~api yavaCyAmAkagavedhukakoradUSanIvAratakrAranAlAdiH, sa kiM kArtsnyena sukhAnubandhaM karotyutAvayavena yavAdinaikaikena ? evamanyadapi cintyam| yathA ca jvarasya-AmACayaM praviCya kiM kArtsnyenAthAMCena ? tathA~~Amamanugamya kiM kArtsnyenAthAMCena ? ityAdi| tadevaMbhUtairmalairayaM jvaro nirvartita ityevaM balAbalaviCeSaNamAdiCediti|

    naktaM ca dinaM ca RtuCca bhuktaM ca, tAni naktaMdinartubhuktAni| teSAmaMCAH-avayavAH, naktaMdinartubhuktAMCAH| vyAdheH kAlo vyAdhikAlaH| yathAmalaM-yathAdoSam| yo yasya doSasyAtmIyaH kAlastaM naktaMdinartubhuktAMCairvyAdhikAlamAdiCet| yathA-CleSmajvarasya rAtrimukhe pUrvAhNe vA vasante RtAvAhAre ca bhuktamAtre balalAbho bhavati| evaM mArutapittayorapi balalAbho nirUpyaH|

"sa0-AgamAdInAM vaiSamyamanilajvare liGgamiti yojyam| jvarasyAgamaH-santApArambhaH-tasya vaiSamyaM CiraHprabhRtInAmaGgAnAM na yugapatsantApaH, api tu kadAcidasya Cirasi pUrvamAgacchati kadAcidaMsayoH pAdayorveti| apagamo-jvarasya mokSaH, tasya vaiSamyaM-kadAcidasya pUrvaM pAdayoH santApamokSaH kadAcittrike kadAcicchirasi santApasya muktiriti| tathA, kSobhamRdutayorvaiSamyaM-kadAcittIvraH santApaH kadAcinmRduriti| vedanA jvarasya tAstAH, tAsAM vaiSamyaM-na yugapatsarvAGgINo vedanopalambhaH, api tu kvacit kadAcit kasmiMCcidaGga iti| tathA, jvarasya ya USmA-santApaH, tasyApi vaiSamyAt kadAcicchirasyasya santApa upalabhyate kadAcit pAdAdyanyatame~aGge| tatratatrAGge-bAhuCiraHprabhRtau, tAstA vedanAH-pAdayoH suptatAdyA vakSyamANAH, calAH-anavasthitAH syuH, vAyoCcalarUpatvAt| tA evAha-pAdayorityAdi| pAdayoH suptiH-niCcetanatvam, nakhakSatAdikamapi na cetayetAM tAvityarthaH| stambhaH-stabdhatA, tayoreva| piNDikayorudveSTanaM-udveSTaH| CramaH-khedaH| sandhInAM vicchedanamiva| UrvoH sAdaH-svakriyAyAmasamarthatvam| kaTyA grahaH-stambha iva| pRSThaM kSodamiva-saMkSuNNatAmiva, Apnoti, saMkSuNNasasyAdivat| niSpIDyata ivodaraM-piNyAkAdivat| chidyanta ivAsthIni-karapatrAdinA kASThAdivat| atiCayena pArCvagAnyasthIni chidyanta iva| tathA, hRdayasya grahaNam| vakSasaH-urasaH, prAjaneneva-pratodeneva, todo-vyathanam| skandhayormanthanaM-araNeriva| bAhvorbhedo-vidAraNamiva| aMsayoH pIDanaM-tailAdipIDanakASThairiva| hanvorbhakSaNe~asAmarthyam| tathA, jRmbhaNAdIni syuH| virasAsyatA-avyaktarasatvaM, mukhasya bhavati, yena madhurAdyanyatamaM rasaM na niCcinoti| athavA kaSAyarasatvaM vaktrasya| malAnAM-mUtrapurISAdInAM, apravartanaM-avisargaH| rUkSatvamaruNatvaM ca tvagAdInAM bhavati, rogasvabhAvAt| tathA, prasekAdayaH syuH| atha, arocakACraddhayoH ko viCeSaH| brUmaH| arocakena vaktrasthamapi na bhuGkte| aCraddhayA tu kevalaM nAbhilaSati mukhasthaM tu bhakSayatyeveti viCeSaH| viSAditA-viSaNNatvaM duHkhitatvam| romAdInAM harSo, vepathvAdayaCca vAtajvare syuH|
pittajvare yugapat-tulyakAlaM, aGgAnAM vyAptiH-CiraH-prabhRtInyaGgAni santApenaikakAlaM vyApyante| na tu vAtajvara ivAgamAdInAM vaiSamyamiti vyAptigrahaNena dyotayati| pralApaH-asambhaddhavacanasyoktiH| kaTuvaktratA-kaTukarasatvamAsye| tathA, nAsAyAmAsye ca pAkaH| tathA, CItecchAdayo~atra bhavanti| maNDalAkArA nirmukhAH piTikAH koThA ityucyante| nanu, doSAstrayo~api jvaraM nivartayantItyuktam| pittajvare ca pittena yuktasya kAyAgnerbhUyo vRddhyA bhAvyam, nAgnimAndyena, ""vRddhiH samAnaiH sarveSAM"" (hR. sU. a. 1|14) iti vacanAt| evaM cAgnimAndyAbhAvAt jvarasya sambhave~apyupapattirayuktA| naivam| svasthAnAccAlanenAgnermAndyApatteH| sthAnavaCAdvA~anyathAtvasyApi kriyAsAmarthyaM dRSTam| tathA cASTAGgasaGgrahe (?) (carake) CoSanidAne vakSyati (ca. ni. a. 6|5)- ""yo~aMCaH [ tasya ] CarIrasandhInAviCati tena [ asya ] jRmbhA jvaraCcopajAyate|"" ityAdi| tasmAtsa evAgniH kvacideva deCe paktaM Cakto bhavati, na sarvatra| uSNaguNena tu pittena yuktaH paktA bhavatyevoSNataraH| ata eva santApAdInadhikatarAn karotIti na kiJcidatrAnupapannam|"

A0 ra0-vAtajvaralakSaNamAha-AgamApagameti| AgamaH-utpattiH, apagamo- vinACaH,kSobhaH-Adhikyam,mRdutA-nyUnatvam, vedanA-buddhiH, USmA-vahniH, eSAM vaiSamyam| tatrAgamAdicatuSTayasya deCakAlayoraniyamaH| buddherbhrAntyA| USmaNo bubhukSA(kSayA)| vedanAH-vyathAH| calAH-bhUtvA bhUtvA vinaCyanti| yatra yatra yAsAM yAsAM sambhAvanAH, tatra tatra tAstAH| tadeva prapaJcayatyuttaragranthena| suptatA-sparCAjJAnam| stambhaH-sarvAGgeSu| sAdaH- svakAryAkSamatvam| kSodo_ viCIrNAvayavatvam| grahaH-avarodhaH| todo- nisvananavyathA| prAjanena- totreNa| aMsayoH- skandhabAhusandhyoH| arocako-jihvendriyApravRttiH| CraddhA-manaHpravRttiH| CuSkau-CleSmarahitau| viSAditA-glAniH|romaharSH-UrddhvaromatA|| aGgaharSaH-tvacaH kaNTakitvam| dantaharSo- dantarogeSUktaH| bhramo- bhramaNamivAGgasya| pittajvaralakSaNamAha-yugapadvyAptiriti| nAsApAko- nAsArogeSu| AsyapAko-mukharogeSu| mUrcchAmadau-madAtyayanidAnoktau|raktakoTho-raktavarNAni maNDalAni|

sa0-nidAnAni ca tAnyuktAni ca,- tiktoSaNAdIni vAtAdijvarakAraNAni, tairanupaCayo yasmin jvare sa evam| rogavRddhyA hi rogiNo duHkhAvahatvam| nanu, nidAnAnupaCaya ityetAvadastu| kimuktagrahaNena ? ucyate| uktagrahaNaM svanidAnagrahaNArtham| uktagrahaNamantareNa yAnikAnicinnidAnAni raktapittaCvAsAdInAM, teSAmanupaCaya ityevaM prApnuyAt| uktaCabdoccAraNasAmarthyAttu yAnyeva vAtajvara uktAni tAnyeva tatra jvare gRhyante, netarANi| evaM pittakaphAdijvarAdiSu| tasmAduktagrahaNaM kartavyam| viparItopaCAyiteti| upaCete~avaCyamityupaCAyi, viparItairupaCAyi-viparItopaCAyi, tasya bhAvo viparItopaCAyitA,-sukhAnubhandhi ArogyalakSaNA| kasmAdviparItaiH ? prakRtatvAnnidAnasyaiva| evaM jvaranidAnapratipakSabhUtaiH sarveSAM jvarANAmupaCayaH sukhAnubhandho viparItopaCAyiteti bodhyam| nanu, "nidAnoktAnupaCayaH" itIdamevAstu, kiM "viparItopaCAyitA" ityanena ? yasya hi nidAnoktAnupaCayaH, tasyAvaCyaM viparItopaCAyitayA bhAvyam| naivam| anaikAntikatvAt| tathA hi,-  atIsArAdiSu nidAnoktAnupaCaya upalabhyate| na ca sAmAvasthAyAM viparItaM saGgrAhyupaCete| api ca madyotthAnAM vikArANAM madyameva prasAdhakamityuktam| na caivaM "viparItopaCAyitA" iti ghaTate| tasmAnnyAyyamubhayorupAdAnam| evaM hi lakSaNaM samyaguktaM bhavati|

"sa0-rogANAM patI rogapatiH-sarvarogapradhAnaH| pApmA-pApasvabhAvaH| tathA, mRtyuH-sarvaprANinAM hi maraNenAsAveva yojayati yathA, na tathA~anye rogAH| sarvadhAtvApyAyakaM yadojastadaCanaM bhojanaM yasyetyojoCanaH| antako -mAraNahetusAmAnyAt| krodho-bhagavato maheCvarasya dakSApamAnitasya lokAnnididhakSorlalATAnnirgataH| ata evAha-dakSAdhvaradhvaMsI rudrordhvanayanodbhava iti| janmAntayormohamaya iti jvarasya santApAtmakatvaM liGgam, janmAntayoCca kvacitsantApAnupalabdhermohamaya ityuktam, mohasvabhAvAdevAnyajanmajaM karma prANI na smarati| yaCcApacArajaH-tathAvidhAdAhAravihArAdudbhUtaH, sa santApasvabhAvaH, sa ca krUro-duCcikitsyaH| nAnAyoniSu-hastyaCvagopakSyAdiSu ca, vividhairnAmabhirvartate| 
[yathA-""-pAkalastadyathebhAnAmabhitApo hayeSu ca| gavAM gokarNakaCcaiva pakSiNAM makarastathA|| vAntAdAnAmalarkaH syAdabjeSvindramadaH smRtaH| oSadhISu tathA jyotiCcUrNako dhAnyajAtiSu|| jaleSu nIlikA bhUmA vUSo nRNAM jvaro mataH| 'Rte devamanuSyebhyo nAnyo viSahate tu tam|| CeSAH sarve vipadyante tiryagyonyo jvarArditAH| karmaNA labhate janturdevatvaM mAnuSAdapi|| punaCcaiva cyutaH svargAnmAnuSyamabhipadyate| tasmAtsa devabhAvAcca sahate mAnavo jvaram' (su. u. a. 39|11)||"" iti| ] yathA-dantiCarIre pAkalo nAma jvaraH, aCvaCarIre~abhitApakaH, goCarIre gokarNakaH, pakSiCarIre makaraH, CvaCarIre~alarkaH, [ matsyeSvindramadaH, oSadhISu jyotiH, dhAnyeSu cUrNakaH, ] apsu nIlikA, [ bhUmAvUSaH, ] mAnuSeSu jvaraH, iti| nanu, yadi rudrordhvanayanodbhavaH, tarhyapacAraja iti kathamuktam ? brUmaH| pUrvaM kRtayuge lalATajalocanAdutpanno jvaraH| tretAyuge tu samprApte parigrahadoSAddharmasya pAdo~antarhita ityapacAreNAsau prathamaM prANiSUdbhUto~apacAraja ityucyate| kaliyuge~apyannapAnauSadhAdyapacAreNa jAta ityapacAraja ucyate, iti na kiJcidatrAyuktam|"

"sa0-tatreti nirdhAraNe, teSvaSTasu jvareSu madhye nijAnAM jvarANAmutpattirnirdhAryate| malAH-vAtAdayaH, svaiH svaiH pradUSaNaiH-kopanaiH, duSTAH-kupitAH, jvaraM nirvartayanti-utpAdayanti| tatra yathA-vAtastiktAdibhiH, pittaM kaTukAdibhiH, kaphaH svAdvAdibhiH, evaM saMsarge sannipAte ca cintyam| AgantunA ca kenacit prakupitA doSA jvaraM nirvartayanti| yadyapi cAgantujvarastaddhetukaH, tathA~api tatrApi vAtAdaya eva hetavaH| na hi vAtAdIn vimucya vyAdheH samudbhavaH kathamapi sambhAvyate| etAvAMstu viCeSaH,-doSaje vyAdhau pUrvaM vAtAdayaH kupyanti paCcAtkAyasya pIDA bhavati| Agantuke tu vyAdhau pUrvaM CarIrasya vyathA bhavati paCcAdvAtAdikopa iti| kayA~~AnupUrvyA jvaraM nirvartayanti ? ityAha-AmACayamityAdi| AmACayaM praviCya-nAbhistanAntare sthitvA, tathA~~AmaM-pUrvoktalakSaNalakSitaM, anugamya tena cAmenAnugatAH srotAMsi-rasAdivAhIni, pidhAya -chAdayitvA, tathA jvalanaM paktisthAnAdbahirnirasya-niSkAsya| paktigrahaNamatra jATharAgnerniHsandehena grahaNArtham, anyathA trayodaCAnAmagnInAM madhyAt katamaM jvalanaM sthAnAdbahirnirasyeti sandihyeta| tena ca-nirastavahninA, saha-ekalolIbhUtAH, sakalaM vapurabhisarpantastapanto gAtramatyuSNaM kurvanto jvaraM nirvartayanti| atyuSNagrahaNenaivaM pratipAdayati,-atyuSNagAtratvenaiva jvarasambhavaH, noSNagAtramAtreNa| tathA ca nirAmayasyApi hi prANino jIvato gAtramuSNaM bhavatyeva| nanu, vAyukRte jvare vAyoryogavAhitvAt pittakRte~api jvare pittasya vahninA samAnaguNatvAt santApopalabdhiryuktA| CleSmajvare tu CleSmaNo vahnipratipakSatvAt kathamiva santApakatvaM yuktam ? iti kecit| atrocyate| svabhAvAdupapannametat| jvarasya hyayamacintyaH svabhAvaH, yenAvaCyaM santApamutpAdayati| evaM vAtasyAmUrtittve~api gulmAdiSu CyAvAruNatvopalabdhiH| tasmAdvyAdhInAmevaM svabhAvaviCeSAnnyAyyamevedam|
 
yata eva srotaHpidhAnaM tata eva hetoH svedo na jAyate| prAyograhaNAt kvacitpittajvarAdau svedo jAyata evetyarthaH| tathA cAnantarameva tantrakRdadhIte (Slo. 20)- ""svedo niHSvAsavaigandhyaM"" ityAdi|"

sa0-tasya-jvarasya, prAgrUpam| AlasyaM-vAGmanaHkAyakarmasvanudyamaH| suCrute coktam| yathA (SA. a. 4|52)- "sukhasparCaprasaGgitvaM duHkhadveSaNalolatA| Caktasya cApyanutsAhaH karmaNyAlasyamucyate||" iti| aratiH-ekatrAnavasthitiCcetasaH| tathA, aGgagurutvam| AsyavairasyaM-vaktravirasatA| aruciH-annAbhilASAbhAvaH| jRmbhA-jRmbhaNam|  sahAsreNa varteta iti sAsre, Akule akSiNI yasya sa evam, tasya bhAvaH sAsrakulAkSitA| aGgamardaH-aGgabhaGgaH| avipAkaH-annasyAvipaktiH| alpaprANatA-stokabalatvam| tathA, bahunidratA| "tvatalorguNavacanasya puMvadbhAvo vaktavyaH" ityatra puMvadbhAvaH| romaharSo-romAJcaH| vinamanaM-aGgAnAM vinAmaH| piNDikayorudveSTanaM-udveSTaH| klamo-glAniH| hitasya-gurupitrAdeH, upadeCAsteSu, akSAntiH-asahanatvam, tadupadiSTaM na kSamate| prItirityAdi| amlAdiSu dravyeSu prItiH-bhaktiH| svAduSu bhakSyeSu-madhureSu dravyeSu, dveSo bhavati| tathA, bAleSu-CiCuSu sakalalokavallabheSvapi, jvarasvabhAvAddveSo bhavati| tathA, tRD bhRCaM-tRSNA~atyartham| CabdAdiSvanimittataH-kAraNaM vinA, sajvarasya prItyaprItI jAyete| kadAcidapriyamapi CabdaM na dveSTi, kadAcit priyamapi veNuvINAdijanitaM dveSTi| evaM CItArto~api kadAcidagniM dveSTi, kadAcidaCItArto~apyagnimabhilaSati| evaM CItAdiSvapi yojyam| evaM prAgrUpaM-avyaktaliGgam|

sa0-etasya cAnu (tadanu)- prAgrUpANAM paCcAt jvarasya vyaktatA-sphuTatA bhavet, spaSTaliGgotpattiH| vAtajvaro~ayaM pittajvaro~ayaM CleSmajvaro~ayaM saMsargajo~ayaM sannipAtajo~ayamiti vyaktIbhavati|

"sa0-AgamAdInAM vaiSamyamanilajvare liGgamiti yojyam| jvarasyAgamaH-santApArambhaH-tasya vaiSamyaM CiraHprabhRtInAmaGgAnAM na yugapatsantApaH, api tu kadAcidasya Cirasi pUrvamAgacchati kadAcidaMsayoH pAdayorveti| apagamo-jvarasya mokSaH, tasya vaiSamyaM-kadAcidasya pUrvaM pAdayoH santApamokSaH kadAcittrike kadAcicchirasi santApasya muktiriti| tathA, kSobhamRdutayorvaiSamyaM-kadAcittIvraH santApaH kadAcinmRduriti| vedanA jvarasya tAstAH, tAsAM vaiSamyaM-na yugapatsarvAGgINo vedanopalambhaH, api tu kvacit kadAcit kasmiMCcidaGga iti| tathA, jvarasya ya USmA-santApaH, tasyApi vaiSamyAt kadAcicchirasyasya santApa upalabhyate kadAcit pAdAdyanyatame~aGge| tatratatrAGge-bAhuCiraHprabhRtau, tAstA vedanAH-pAdayoH suptatAdyA vakSyamANAH, calAH-anavasthitAH syuH, vAyoCcalarUpatvAt| tA evAha-pAdayorityAdi| pAdayoH suptiH-niCcetanatvam, nakhakSatAdikamapi na cetayetAM tAvityarthaH| stambhaH-stabdhatA, tayoreva| piNDikayorudveSTanaM-udveSTaH| CramaH-khedaH| sandhInAM vicchedanamiva| UrvoH sAdaH-svakriyAyAmasamarthatvam| kaTyA grahaH-stambha iva| pRSThaM kSodamiva-saMkSuNNatAmiva, Apnoti, saMkSuNNasasyAdivat| niSpIDyata ivodaraM-piNyAkAdivat| chidyanta ivAsthIni-karapatrAdinA kASThAdivat| atiCayena pArCvagAnyasthIni chidyanta iva| tathA, hRdayasya grahaNam| vakSasaH-urasaH, prAjaneneva-pratodeneva, todo-vyathanam| skandhayormanthanaM-araNeriva| bAhvorbhedo-vidAraNamiva| aMsayoH pIDanaM-tailAdipIDanakASThairiva| hanvorbhakSaNe~asAmarthyam| tathA, jRmbhaNAdIni syuH| virasAsyatA-avyaktarasatvaM, mukhasya bhavati, yena madhurAdyanyatamaM rasaM na niCcinoti| athavA kaSAyarasatvaM vaktrasya| malAnAM-mUtrapurISAdInAM, apravartanaM-avisargaH| rUkSatvamaruNatvaM ca tvagAdInAM bhavati, rogasvabhAvAt| tathA, prasekAdayaH syuH| atha, arocakACraddhayoH ko viCeSaH| brUmaH| arocakena vaktrasthamapi na bhuGkte| aCraddhayA tu kevalaM nAbhilaSati mukhasthaM tu bhakSayatyeveti viCeSaH| viSAditA-viSaNNatvaM duHkhitatvam| romAdInAM harSo, vepathvAdayaCca vAtajvare syuH|
pittajvare yugapat-tulyakAlaM, aGgAnAM vyAptiH-CiraH-prabhRtInyaGgAni santApenaikakAlaM vyApyante| na tu vAtajvara ivAgamAdInAM vaiSamyamiti vyAptigrahaNena dyotayati| pralApaH-asambhaddhavacanasyoktiH| kaTuvaktratA-kaTukarasatvamAsye| tathA, nAsAyAmAsye ca pAkaH| tathA, CItecchAdayo~atra bhavanti| maNDalAkArA nirmukhAH piTikAH koThA ityucyante| nanu, doSAstrayo~api jvaraM nivartayantItyuktam| pittajvare ca pittena yuktasya kAyAgnerbhUyo vRddhyA bhAvyam, nAgnimAndyena, ""vRddhiH samAnaiH sarveSAM"" (hR. sU. a. 1|14) iti vacanAt| evaM cAgnimAndyAbhAvAt jvarasya sambhave~apyupapattirayuktA| naivam| svasthAnAccAlanenAgnermAndyApatteH| sthAnavaCAdvA~anyathAtvasyApi kriyAsAmarthyaM dRSTam| tathA cASTAGgasaGgrahe (?) (carake) CoSanidAne vakSyati (ca. ni. a. 6|5)- ""yo~aMCaH [ tasya ] CarIrasandhInAviCati tena [ asya ] jRmbhA jvaraCcopajAyate|"" ityAdi| tasmAtsa evAgniH kvacideva deCe paktaM Cakto bhavati, na sarvatra| uSNaguNena tu pittena yuktaH paktA bhavatyevoSNataraH| ata eva santApAdInadhikatarAn karotIti na kiJcidatrAnupapannam|"

A0 ra0-vAtajvaralakSaNamAha-AgamApagameti| AgamaH-utpattiH, apagamo- vinACaH,kSobhaH-Adhikyam,mRdutA-nyUnatvam, vedanA-buddhiH, USmA-vahniH, eSAM vaiSamyam| tatrAgamAdicatuSTayasya deCakAlayoraniyamaH| buddherbhrAntyA| USmaNo bubhukSA(kSayA)| vedanAH-vyathAH| calAH-bhUtvA bhUtvA vinaCyanti| yatra yatra yAsAM yAsAM sambhAvanAH, tatra tatra tAstAH| tadeva prapaJcayatyuttaragranthena| suptatA-sparCAjJAnam| stambhaH-sarvAGgeSu| sAdaH- svakAryAkSamatvam| kSodo_ viCIrNAvayavatvam| grahaH-avarodhaH| todo- nisvananavyathA| prAjanena- totreNa| aMsayoH- skandhabAhusandhyoH| arocako-jihvendriyApravRttiH| CraddhA-manaHpravRttiH| CuSkau-CleSmarahitau| viSAditA-glAniH|romaharSH-UrddhvaromatA|| aGgaharSaH-tvacaH kaNTakitvam| dantaharSo- dantarogeSUktaH| bhramo- bhramaNamivAGgasya| pittajvaralakSaNamAha-yugapadvyAptiriti| nAsApAko- nAsArogeSu| AsyapAko-mukharogeSu| mUrcchAmadau-madAtyayanidAnoktau|raktakoTho-raktavarNAni maNDalAni|

sa0-nidAnAni ca tAnyuktAni ca,- tiktoSaNAdIni vAtAdijvarakAraNAni, tairanupaCayo yasmin jvare sa evam| rogavRddhyA hi rogiNo duHkhAvahatvam| nanu, nidAnAnupaCaya ityetAvadastu| kimuktagrahaNena ? ucyate| uktagrahaNaM svanidAnagrahaNArtham| uktagrahaNamantareNa yAnikAnicinnidAnAni raktapittaCvAsAdInAM, teSAmanupaCaya ityevaM prApnuyAt| uktaCabdoccAraNasAmarthyAttu yAnyeva vAtajvara uktAni tAnyeva tatra jvare gRhyante, netarANi| evaM pittakaphAdijvarAdiSu| tasmAduktagrahaNaM kartavyam| viparItopaCAyiteti| upaCete~avaCyamityupaCAyi, viparItairupaCAyi-viparItopaCAyi, tasya bhAvo viparItopaCAyitA,-sukhAnubhandhi ArogyalakSaNA| kasmAdviparItaiH ? prakRtatvAnnidAnasyaiva| evaM jvaranidAnapratipakSabhUtaiH sarveSAM jvarANAmupaCayaH sukhAnubhandho viparItopaCAyiteti bodhyam| nanu, "nidAnoktAnupaCayaH" itIdamevAstu, kiM "viparItopaCAyitA" ityanena ? yasya hi nidAnoktAnupaCayaH, tasyAvaCyaM viparItopaCAyitayA bhAvyam| naivam| anaikAntikatvAt| tathA hi,-  atIsArAdiSu nidAnoktAnupaCaya upalabhyate| na ca sAmAvasthAyAM viparItaM saGgrAhyupaCete| api ca madyotthAnAM vikArANAM madyameva prasAdhakamityuktam| na caivaM "viparItopaCAyitA" iti ghaTate| tasmAnnyAyyamubhayorupAdAnam| evaM hi lakSaNaM samyaguktaM bhavati|

sarvajo lakSaNaiH sarvairdAho~atra ca muhurmuhuH||27|| tadvacchItaM mahAnidrA divA jAgaraNaM niCi||27|| sadA vA naiva vA nidrA mahAsvedo~ati naiva vA||28|| gItanartanahAsyAdivikRtehApravartanam||28||  sACruNI kaluSe rakte bhugne lulitapakSmaNI||29|| akSiNI piNDikApArCvamUrddhaparvAsthirugbhramaH||29|| sasvanau sarujau karNau kaNThaH CUkairivAcitaH||30||  paridagdhA kharA jihvA guruH srastAGgasandhitA||30|| raktapittakaphaSThIvo lolanaM Ciraso~atiruk||31|| koThAnAM CyAvaraktAnAM maNDalAnAM ca darCanam||31|| hRdvyathA malasaMsaGgaH pravRttirvA~alpaCo~ati vA||32|| snigdhAsyatA balabhraMCaH svarasAdaH pralApitA||32|| doSapAkaCcirAttandrA pratataM kaNThakUjanam||33||

sa0-sarvebhyo jAto vAtapittakaphasamutthaH-sarvajaH, sarvairlakSaNairyuto bhavati| yathA,-atra ca-sannipAtajvare, dAho muhurmuhuH, tadvat-dAhavat punaH punaH, CItaM bhavati| ahani mahatI nidrA| rAtrau tu jAgaraNam| sadA vA-divase niCi ca, naiva veti dvayorapi naktaMdivasayornidrA na bhavati| tathA, bhahusvedo~atiCayena naiva vA svedaH| tathA,gItAdikAyA vikRtAyA IhAyAH- ceSTAyAH, pravartanam| tathA, nayane sAsre bhavataH| tathA, kaluSe rakte tathA kuTile| tathA, lulite pakSmaNI yayosta evam| tathA, piNDikAdiruk| bhramo-mohaH| karNau saCabdau sarujau-sapIDau, ca| kaNThaH CUkaiH-kiMSArubhiriva, vyAptaH| jihvA paridagdhA, tathA kharA-amRduH, tathA guruH| tathA, srastAGgasandhitvam| raktAdiSThIvanam| mUrdhno lolanaM-calanam| tathA, atiruk| koThAnAM CyAvaraktAnAM maNDalAnAM ca darCanam| naiva vetyatrApi yojyam| tathA, hRdi pIDA| malAnAM-mUtrapurISAdInAM, [ saMsaGgaH- ] apravRttiH| alpaCo vA pravRttiratiCayenAthavA| tathA, snigdhAsyatAdi bhavati|

doSe vibaddhe naSTe~agnau sarvasampUrNalakSaNaH||34|| asAdhyaH------------------------------------------||34||

sa0- [ nanu, ] doSe vibhaddha ityekavacanamayuktam| doSANAM hyatra ca bhahutvAdbahuvacanaM nyAyyaM syAt| atrocyate| jAtyabhiprAyAdadoSaH| jAtyAkhyAyAmekasya bahutvasiddherdoSa ityukte bahutvaM gamyate| yathA-niSpanno yava iti| tasmAddoSe vibaddha iti yuktam| naSTe~agnAvityasat| sarvajvareSveva hyagninACasya prAgabhidhAnAt| tasmAdayuktametaducyate| na| viCeSAbhiprAyAt| kAmaM sarvajvareSvagninACa uktaH| asmiMstu sAnnipAtike viCeSeNAgninACa ityabhiprAyaH| doSe-vAtapittakaphamUtrapurISAdike, vibaddhe-apravRttiCIle, agnau naSTe sati, sarvasampUrNalakSaNaH sannipAto~asAdhyaH-sAdhayitumaCakyaH|

-------------so~anyathA kRcchro bhavedvaikalyado~api vA||34||

sa0-anyathA-asampUrNalakSaNatvena, saH-jvaraH, kRcchro bhavet vaikalyado vA bhavet|

A0 ra0- kRcchrasAdhyasannipAtajvaralakSaNamAha-anyathA kRcchra iti| anyathA-sAdhyalakSaNaviparyaye| vACabdAt kaCcidvaikalyamadatvA~api nivartate| ata eva yasya rogasya yAvanti lakSaNAnyucyante tAvadbhiH samuditairniCcIyata iti na jJAtavyam| kintu yAvadbhirasAdhAraNyaM tAvadbhireveti| lakSaNAntaroktistu sukhAsAdhyAdibhedajJAnArtham |

anyacca sannipAtottho yatra pittaM pRthak sthitam||35|| tvaci koSThe~athavA dAhaM vidadhAti puro~anu vA||35|| tadvadvAtakaphau CItaM, dAhAdirdustarastayoH||36||

sa0-anyaCabdArtho~anyadityayaM nipAtaH| aparo~ayaM sannipAtottho jvaraH| yatra sannipAte pittaM vAtakaphAbhyAM pRthak-bhinnaM, sthitaM sat tvacyathavA kadAcit koSThe dAhaM karoti| katham ? puro~anu vA,-pUrvaM paCcAdvA| athaveti sthAnaviCeSAbhidhAyipadasamIpe SrUyamANaM sthAnaviCeSe vikalpaM karoti| puro~anuvetyatra kAlaviCeSAbhidhAyipadasamIpe CrUyamANaM kAlaM vikalpayati| tatra cAyaM viCeSaH-tvaci sthitaM bahiradhikaM dAhaM karoti, antaralpam| koSThe tu sthitamantaradhikam, bahiH svalpamiti| tadityanena pittaM parAmRCyate| [tadvat- ] pittena tulyam| yathA,-pittaM pRthak sthitaM tvaci koSThe~athavA dAhaM karoti puro~anu vA, tathaiva vAtakaphau tvaci koSThe~athavA puro~anu vA CItaM vidadhataH, iti dvividho~ayaM sannipAtaH| tayoH-CItAdidAhAdyoH sannipAtayormadhye, yo dAhAdiH sannipAtaH sa dustaraH-kRcchrasAdhya ityarthaH| kecittu CItAdiH CItArto dAhAdirdAhArta iti dvidhA (caturdhA) sannipAtaM samagiran|

A0 ra0- amiSrIbhUtadoSajasannipAtajvaramAha-anyacceti|  sa caturdhA,-tvaggatapittakoSThagatavAtakaphajaH, tvaggatavAtakaphakoSThagatapittajaCceti dvau, pittakAryapUrvako vAtakaphakAryapUrvakaCceti| tau pRthakdvidheti| tayormadhye dAhAdiH pittakAryapUrvako dustaraH| tatrApi koSThagatapittakAryapUrvaka iti  jJeyam|

varSACaradvasanteSu vAtAdyaiH prAkRtaH kramAt||50|| vaikRto~anyaH sa duHsAdhyaH prAyaCca prAkRto~anilAt||50||

sa0- varSAdiSu triSu RtuSu yathAkramaM vAtAdyaistribhirdoSairyo jvaro jAyate sa prAkRtaH| varSAsu vAtajvaraH prAkRtaH, Caradi pittajvaro, vasante kaphajvaraH, iti paribhASyate| ata eva vAtaprakRtena yo jvaraH, pittaprakRteH pittena, CleSmaprakRteH CleSmaNeti, sa prakRtibhavatvena prAkRta ityucyate| vaikRto~anya iti| yo jvaro varSAdibhya Rtubhyo~anyatra kAle jAto varSAdiSvapi vA na yathAkramaM vAtAdyairjanitaH, sa yathoktaprAkRtalakSaNAdanyaH, sa vaikRta ucyate| sa ca duHsAdhyaH-kRcchrasAdhyaH| prAkRtastu susAdhya ityarthAdgamyate| prAya ityAdi| prAyo-bAhulyena, prAkRto~api yo jvaro~anilAjjAyate so~api duHsAdhyaH| prAyograhaNenaitad dyotayati| kadAciddaivAnukUlatvAtsusAdhya eva bhavati| nanu, varSAsva(Caradya)pi prAkRto~api jvaro yathA vikRtivijJAnIye kathitastathA~asAdhya eva| "jvaro nihanti balavAn" (hR. CA. a. 5|71) ityAdi| tadetatpUrvAparavyAhatamiva dRCyate| naivam| anayorvacasoH sAmAnyaviCeSarUpatvAt| tathA ceha sAmAnyenoktam, vikRtivijJAnIye tu viCeSeNeti| etadeva ca sphuTIkartuM vakSyati (Clo. 53)- "vikRtijJAne prAgasAdhya udAhRtaH|" iti|

A0 ra0- prAkRtalakSaNamAha-varSACaradvasanteSviti| varSAsu vAtajaH, Caradi pittajaH, vasante kaphajaH, prAkRto jJeyaH| vaikRtalakSaNamAha-vaikRto~anya iti| atha RtunA doSeNa vA Caradi vAtajaH, varSAsu kaphajaH, ityAdi vaikRto duHsAdhyo jJeyaH| prAkRtaCcAnilAjjAtaH| prAyograhaNAt kvacit susAdhyo~api| " ekamArgakriyArambhavyativRttermahAtyayAt|" ityadhikaM saGgrahe (ni. a. 2)| ekamArga ekakriyAkArambhaCca rogaH sukhasAdhyaH| vAtaje tveSAM vyativRttiH-viparyayaH| bahirmArgo~ayaM laGghanasAdhyo~ayaM saumyo~ayamityupacaryamANo~api vAtajo~antarmArgatvaM bRMhaNasAdhyatvaM tIkSNatvaM copaiti| vAtasyAnavasthitatvAt| mahAMCcAtyayaH-atikramaH, yadauSadhakAlamapi na pratIkSate| vAtasyACukAritvAt|

varSAsu mAruto duSTaH pittaCleSmAnvito jvaram||51|| kuryAt pittaM ca Caradi tasya cAnubalaM kaphaH||51|| tatprakRtyA visargAcca tatra nAnaCanAdbhayam||52|| kapho vasante tamapi vAtapittaM bhavedanu||52||

sa0-prAvRSi pavanaH [ duSTaH- ] kupitaH, pittaCleSmayuto jvaraM kuryAt| prAvRSi prAkRto jvaro vAtapradhAnaH pittaCleSmANau tvanubalatvena vAtasya sthitau, na tu sannipAta iva svayaM jvarakArakAvityarthaH|    sAmprataM Caradi prAkRtasya jvarasya doSabalAbalaM lakSayati-pittaM cetyAdi| pittaM Caradi [ duSTaM ] prAkRtaM jvaraM kuryAdityanuvartate| prAvRTsaJcitasya pittasya tadA kopasadbhAvAt| tasya ca pittasyAnubalaM-anubandhi balaM, kaphaH| anubalamivAnubalam| yathA,-kasyacit svatantrasya rAjJo gajaturagarathapuruSAdibalavato vairibhiH saha yudhyamAnasya paCcAdanyadbalaM tacchakteranubRMhaNArthamAgacchati, evaM svatantrasya pittasya jvaraM kurvato balopabhRMhaNaM Caradi kaphaH karoti| tatprakRtyeti tacchabdena varSACaradudbhUtau mArutajvarapittajvarau parAmRCyete| tayoH prakRtistatprakRtiH, tayA tatprakRtyA,- tatsvabhAvena, tatra-prAkRte jvare, anaCanAt-laGghanAt, bhayaM na 'bhavati' iti CeSaH| visargAcca varSACaradupalakSito hi kAlo visargaH saumyasvabhAvaH, asmAcca kAraNAttasminkAle jvara utpanne laGghanAt pratyavAyaCaGkA tathA na bhavati, yathA~anyasmin kAle jvara AdAnakAlasvabhAvAdvAtapittAnubalatvAccAnaCanAdbhayaM bhavatItyarthaH|        vasantakAle kapho duSTo jvaraM kuryAditi vartate| taM ca kaphamanu vAtapittaM bhavet, vAtapitte tasyAnubale bhavata ityarthaH| nanu, atra sAkSAtkaphasya kartRtvamucyate| kaphaSca saumyasvabhAvaH| tasmAdatra nAnaCanAdbhayamiti| taccAyuktam| tathAhi-varSACaradoH CleSmAnubalatvaM kAlaCca visargAkhya iti kAraNadvayasadbhAvAddhAtvapacayo na sambhAvyata eva| vasante tu kAlasyAgneyatvAdvAtapittAnubalatvAccAvaCyaMbhAvI dhAtvapacaya eva| tasmAdvasante~anaSanAdbhayaM CaGkyate| kecittu jvarasyAmACayasamutthatvAt kaphotthatvAccAtrApi kiJcinmAtramanaCanAdbhayaM nACaGkyata evetyAhuH|

A0 ra0- viruddhAviruddhopakramajJAnArthaM prAkRtAnAM samprAptirucyate| tatra vAtajasya-varSAsu mAruta iti| pittajasya-pittaM ca CaradIti| kaphajasya-kapho vasanta iti| "tatprakRtyA visargAcca tatra nAnaCanAdbhayam|" iti pittAjasyAviruddhopakramatvamuktam| tayoH-pittakaphayoH, prakRtiH-laGghanasAdhyatvam| visargaH-kAlabalavardhanatvam| varSAsu tvalpaM balaM doSaCca bRMhaNasAdhyaH| jvaraH pittaCleSmANau ca laGghanasAdhyAviti viruddhopakramatvam| vasante~anukSIyamANe~api madhyamaM balaM, vAtasya cAprAdhAnyaM, pradhAnayoH kaphajvarayoH pittasya ca laGghanasAdhyatvamityaviruddhopakramatvameva|

balavatsvalpadoSeSu jvaraH sAdhyo~anupadravaH||53||

sa0-balavatsu nareSu yauvanAdisampattyA tathA~alpadoSeSu yo jvaro jAyate, upadraveNa-kAsAdinA rahitaH, sa sAdhyaH-sAdhayituM CakyaH|

A0 ra0- sAdhyalakSaNamAha-balavatsvalpadoSeSviti| doSo -duSTanAma (?)| upadravA rugviniCcaye darCitAH (mA. ni. jva. Clo. 66, TI.) -  "CvAso mUrcchA~aruciCcchardistRSNAtIsAraviDgrahAH| hikkA kAso~aGgabhedaCca jvarasyopadravA daCa||" iti|

 sarvathA vikRtijJAne prAgasAdhya udAhRtaH||53||

sa0-sarvatheti yAdRCasyAturasya yAdRCo jvaro~asAdhyo bhavati tAdRCo, vikRtivijJAnIye CArIre (a. 5|71)- "jvaro nihanti balavAn" ityAdinA granthena prAk-pUrvamuktaH|

A0 ra0- asAdhyalakSaNamAha-sarvatheti| vikRtijJAne~adhyAye| prAk-CArIre sthAne| sarvathetyasAdhyaviCeSaNam, anupakrama ityarthaH| yApyaduHsAdhyayostu lakSaNaM svayamapyUhyam| udAhRto yathA (hR. CA. a. 5/71) - " jvaro nihanti balavAn gambhIro dairgharAtrikaH|| sapralApabhramaCvAsaH kSINaM CUnaM hatAnalam| akSAmaM saktavacanaM raktAkSaM hRdi CUlinam|| suCuSkakAsaH  pUrvahNe yo~aparAhNe~api vA bhavet| balamAMsavihInasya CleSmakAsasamanvitaH||" iti| vRnde tu (jvarAdhikAre Clo. 187) - " svedo lalATe himavAnnarasya CItArditasyaiti supicchilaCca| kaNThasthito yasya na yAti vakSo nUnaM yamasyaiti gRhaM sa martyaH||  mRtyuCca tasminbahupicchalatvAcchItasya jantoH paritaH saratvAt|" iti|

jvaropadravatIkSNatvamaglAnirbahumUtratA||54|| na pravRttirna viD jIrNA na kSutsAmajvarAkRtiH||54||

sa0-jvarasyopadravAH-pralApabhramAdayaH, teSAM tIkSNatvaM-tIvratA| tathA, bahumUtratvam| tathA, na pravRttiH-na purISasya pravartanam| viTpravRttAvapi hi pravRttiCabdaH prasiddhaH| yathA~anantaramadhunaivAdhItam (Clo. 32)- "pravRttirvA~alpaCo~ati vA|" iti| atha cedviT pravartate sA na jIrNA-pakvA na bhavati| tathA, na kSut-na bubhukSA| iyamaCeSA liGgasaMhatiH sAmajvarAkRtiH-sAmajvarasya lakSaNam| sahAmena vartate yo jvaraH sa sAmajvaraH, tasyAkRtiH| "USmaNo~alpabalatvena" (hR. sU. a. 13|25) ityAdyAmalakSaNam|

sa0-AsannaM vivRtaM cAsyaM-mukhaM, yeSAM rasavAhinAM srotasAM tAnyevam| teSAM bhAva AsannavivRtAsyatvam| tasmAddhetostatra praviSTena doSeNa CIghraM sarvasya vapuSaH-CarIrasya, vyAptirjAyate| tena-kAraNena doSeNACu sarvaCarIravyAptilakSaNena, santatAkhyo jvaraH satato-nirantaro, bhavati| viparItaH prakRtatvAtsantatena viSamo-viSamasaMjJaH, satatAdijvaro viparIto bhavati-na nirantaraM jvarayati| kasmAdviparItaH ? viparyayAt| etaduktaM bhavati,-sthUlAnyAsannAni vivRtAsyAni ca rasavAhIni srotAMsi| dUratarANi saMvRtAsyAni sUkSmatarANi ca raktavAhIni| tairdoSaCcireNa tathA asAkalyena kAyaM vyApnuvan vicchinnakAlaM jvaraM karoti| ata evAha (Clo. 70)- "ahorAtrasya sa dviH syAt" ityAdi| tato dUratarANi saMvRtatarAsyAni ca mAMsavAhIni srotAMsi| tAni ciratareNa prApnoti doSaH| na caitaiH srotobhiH sAkalyena yugapaddehamanuvyApnoti| ato~anena kAraNenAsAvanyasmin dine jvaraM nirvartayatyanyedyuHsaMjJam| tenAsau satatAdapi viprakRSTo bhavati| tato~api sUkSmatarANi saMvRtataramukhAni ca medovahAni| tAni ciratareNa doSaH prApnoti| na ca tairaCeSadehaM vyApnoti| ato~asAvanena kAraNena yathAkramamanyadinamekaM hitvA tRtIye~ahni tRtIyako bhavati| tato~apyanenaiva viprakRSTatamena krameNa dinadvayaM hitvA caturthako bhavati| evaM caturthakaviparyayaCca| saGgrahe~apyAkhyat (ni. a. 2)- "sUkSmasUkSmatarAsyeSu dUradUratareSu ca| doSo raktAdimArgeSu CanairalpaCcireNa yat|| yAti dehaM ca nACeSaM bhUyiSThaM bheSaje~api ca| kramo~ayaM tena vicchinnasantApo lakSyate jvaraH||" iti|        adhunA viSamajvarasya svarUpaM pratipAdayannAha-viSama iti| viSamo-viSamasaMjJo jvaro, viSamArambhakriyAkAlo bhavati| ArambhaCca kriyA ca kAlaCca ArambhakriyAkAlAH| viSamA ArambhakriyAkAlA yasya sa evam| tatra viSama Arambho yathA,-kaCcitpUrvaM mUrdhAnamArabhyAgacchati, kaCcitpRSTham, kaCcijjaGghAbhyAmiti| viSamakriyo yathA,-kaCcicchItakRt, kaCciddAhakRditi| viSamakAlaCca yathA,- kaCcitpUrvAhNe samAgacchati, kaCcinmadhyAhne, kaCcidaparAhNe, kaCcinniCIthe, iti| tathA, anuSaGgavAn-dIrghakAlAnubandhI|

A0 ra0- santatAdInAM santatatvAdau yuktimAha-AsannavivRtAsyatvAditi| AsannamAmACayam| AmACayastho hi doSo jvaraM karoti| AsannatvAdACuprAptiH| vivRtAsyatvAdasaMvalitapraveCaH| A...............srotasyAdAmACayaM yAtItyakhaNDitatvaM santatasya| satate tvAmACayaraktasrotaso yAtAyAte rasastrotasA khaNDitatvam|  evamuttareSUttarottaraM khaNditatvam| viparItaH-khaNDitaH| viparyayAt-dUrasaMvRtAsyatvAt| viSamArambhaH-kadAcicchItapUrvaH kadAciddAhapUrvaH, kadAcicchirasaH kadAcitpAdataH| viSamakriyaH-kadAcillaGghanasAdhyaH kadAcidbRMhaNasAdhyaH| viSamakAlaH-kadAcitpUrvAhNe kadAcidaparAhNe| anuSaGgavAn-upacaryamANo~api bahUni dinAnyavatiSThate| saGgrahe tu vistareNa yuktiruktA (ni. a. 2) - " sUkSmasUkSmatarAsyeSu dUradUratareSu ca| doSo raktAdimArgeSu CanairalpaCcireNa yat|| yAti dehaM ca nACeSaM bhUyiSThaM bheSaje~api ca| kramo~ayaM tena vicchinnasantApo lakSyate jvaraH|| viSamo viSamArambhakriyAkAlo~anuSaGgavAn| yathottaraM mandagatirmandaCaktiryathAyathA|| kAlenApnoti sadRCAn sa rasAdIMstathA tathA| doSo jvarayati kruddhaCcirAcciratareNa ca|| bhUmau sthitaM jalaiH siktaM kAlameva pratIkSate| aGkurAya yathA bIjaM doSabIjaM ruje tathA|| vegaM kRtvA viSaM yadvadACaye lIyate~abalam| kupyatyAptabalaM bhUyaH kAle doSaviSaM tathA|| evaM jvarAH pravartante viSamAH santatAdayaH|" iti|

sa0-bhRCaCabdasyoSNAdibhirvidAhyantaiH sambandhaH| AdiCabdenAtra kSArAdayo gRhyante| bhRCoSNAdibhirannaiH pittalairatisevitairdravaM-dravasvabhAvaM, yat pittaM tat kupitaM-duSTaM, tathA raktaM kupitaM, tairevAtisevitaiH| atisevanaM cobhayathA bhavati,-cirakAlamabhyavahRtaistathA~atimAtrAbhyavahRtaiH| na kevalametairyAvat kodravoddAlakaiCcAnnaiH| tadityanena bhRCoSNAdIni parAmRCyante| tairyuktaiH-miCritaiH kodravoddAlakaiCcAnnairatisevitaiH kupitaM pittaM tathA raktaM ca bhavati| te-dve api raktapitte, mUrcchite-miCratAM gate, mithaH-parasparaM, tulyarUpatvaM-samavarNatvaM, Agamya-prApya, sarvAM tanuM-dehaM, vyApnuto-vyaCnuvAte| nanu, bhRCoSNAdInAM pittalatvAvyabhicArAt kimarthaM pittalairityuktam ? sa0-UrdhvaM-UrdhvagaM raktapittaM, sAdhyam| yasmAtkAraNAt kaphAdadhikAjjAyate| tacca virecanasAdhanam| sAdhyate~aneneti sAdhanaM,-cikitsitam| tacca-UrdhvagaM raktapittaM, bahvauSadham| bahu auSadhaM yasya tadbahvauSadhaM,-anekasAdhanam, madhurakaSAyatiktadravyasAdhyatvAt| apica, yasmAdvirekaH pittasya varauSadham| tathA coktam (ca. sU. a. 25|40) - "virecanaM pittaharANAm|" iti| yaCca [ tatra- ] tasminnUrdhvage raktapittAkhye vyAdhau, kapho~anubandhI| tasya-anubandhinaH kaphasya, virecanaM CuddhikRt-CodhanaM karoti| ato hetorUrdhvagaM raktapittaM sAdhyam| kaSAyAH-svarasakalkaCRtaCItaphANTAkhyAH, te svAdavo~api hitAH, vyAdhipratipakSatvAt| na tu doSapratipakSatAdvAreNa, doSasamAnatvAtteSAm| athavA kecana makuSThataNDulIyAdisambandhino vyAdhipratipakSAstathA rUkSatvAddoSapratipakSA iti CleSmaNo~api hitAH| apiCabdAttiktAdayo~api| viCuddho-vAtAdyadUSitaH, CleSmA yasya sa tasya| kimu-kiMpunaH, tiktAH kaSAyACca ye svarasAdayaste~apyasya-Urdhvagasya raktapittAkhyasya vyAdherathavA tadvato narasya viCuddhaCleSmaNo, hitAH| vyAdhipratipakSatvAddoSapratipakSatvAcca ye nisargAt-svabhAvAt, kaphaghnAH|

sa0-adho yApyaM-adhogaM raktapittaM yApyam| kasmAt ? yasmAccalAt-vAtAdadhikAt, 'utpadyate' ityadhyAhAryam| tacca-adhogaM raktapittaM, pracchardanasAdhanam| pracchardanaM-vamanaM, sAdhanaM-cikitsitaM, yasya tadevam| tathA, alpamauSadhaM-cikitsitaM, yasya tadalpauSadham, nordhvagaraktapittavadbahvauSadham| katham ? ityAha-yasmAdayaM rogaH pittapradhAnaH| pitte ca vamanaM na varauSadhaM-CreSThamauSadhaM na bhavati| kaphe hi vamanaM pradhAnamuktam| alpauSadhatve dvitIyaM hetumAha-kaSAyACcetyAdi| tasya-adhogasya raktapittasya, madhurA eva kevalaM kaSAyA hitAH-pathyAH, na tiktAH kaSAyACca, teSAM vAtakopakAraNatvAt| tathA, asya calo-vAyuH, yo~anubandhI-anubalatvena sthitaH, tasyApi vAyorna tat-vamanaM, CAntaye-CAntyartham|

kaphamArutasaMsRSTamasAdhyamubhayAyanam||13|| aCakyaprAtilomyatvAdabhAvAdauSadhasya ca||13|| na hi saMCodhanaM kiJcidastyasya pratilomagam||14|| CodhanaM pratilomaM ca raktapitte bhiSagjitam||14|| evamevopaCamanaM sarvaCo nAsya vidyate||15|| saMsRSTeSu hi doSeSu sarvajicchamanaM hitam||15||

sa0-ubhayAyanaM-mArgadvayaprapannaM, kaphamArutasaMsRSTamasAdhyaM-sAdhayitumaSakyam|      asAdhyatve hetudvayamAha-aCakyaprAtilomyatvAdityAdi| anulomaviparItaH-pratilomaH, tasya bhAvaH prAtilomyam| aCakyaM-kartumaCakyaM prAtilomyaM yasya raktasya tadaCakyaprAtilomyam| tasya bhAvo~aCakyaprAtilomyatvam| tasmAdubhayAyanaM raktapittamasAdhyam| abhAvAdauSadhasya ca,-etadyogyauSadhAsampatteScaitadasAdhyam|      nanu, kathamevamucyate ? ityAha-na hItyAdi| hi-yasmAt, tadasya saMCodhanaM pratilomagaM na kiJcidasti| yacca pratilomagaM saMCodhanaM tadraktapitte bhiSagjitaM-auSadham| tacca tathAbhUtamauSadhaM na sambhavati yattatra saMCamanArthaM dIyate| yadyadhomArgApekSayA dIyate tadAnImUrdhvabhAgapravRttaM raktaM pravRddhaM sampadyate| athordhvamArgApekSayA virecanamupayujyate tadA~adhogaM raktapittaM varddhate| evamasya pratilomagamauSadhaM CodhanaM na sambhavati| tasmAdauSadhasyAbhAvaH| bhiSagjitamiti bhiSakCabdAt kaNDvAdiyagantAnniSThA iTca| svabhAvAccAyaM bheSajavAcI|      nanu, ubhayAyanasya raktapittasya saMCodhanarUpamauSadhaM mA bhavatu| CamanarUpaM tvauSadhamasya CamAya bhaviSyatIti "abhAvAdauSadhasya ca" ityayuktamuditam, ityACaGkyAha-evamevetyAdi| yathA Codhanamasya-ubhayAyanasya, CamanAya na sambhavati tathA Camanamapi yadauSadhaM tadapyetasya CamanaM na sambhavati|      kuto hetoH ? ityAha-saMsRSTeSvityAdi| hi-yasmAt, saMsRSTeSu triSu doSeSu yatsarvajicchamanaM taddhitam| tacca santarpaNApatarpaNarUpatvAddvividham| tatra yadi santarpaNaM bRMhaNaM CamanamadhomArgapravRttaraktapittadoSApekSayA mArutaCAntyarthamupayujyate tadA tacchAntiM kurvato raktapittavikArakaraNasya CleSmaNo vRddhaye sampadyate| athApatarpaNamUrdhvabhAgapravRttadoSApekSayA kaphaCAntyarthamupayujyate tadAnIM tasya CAntiM kurvato~adhogaraktapittasya kAraNaM vAyuM prakopayet| na cobhayAtmakamekaM nRsiMharUpavat Camanamasti yatprayojitamubhayAyanasya SamanAya syAt| tasmAdubhayAyanamasAdhyam|

sa0-bhRCaCabdasyoSNAdibhirvidAhyantaiH sambandhaH| AdiCabdenAtra kSArAdayo gRhyante| bhRCoSNAdibhirannaiH pittalairatisevitairdravaM-dravasvabhAvaM, yat pittaM tat kupitaM-duSTaM, tathA raktaM kupitaM, tairevAtisevitaiH| atisevanaM cobhayathA bhavati,-cirakAlamabhyavahRtaistathA~atimAtrAbhyavahRtaiH| na kevalametairyAvat kodravoddAlakaiCcAnnaiH| tadityanena bhRCoSNAdIni parAmRCyante| tairyuktaiH-miCritaiH kodravoddAlakaiCcAnnairatisevitaiH kupitaM pittaM tathA raktaM ca bhavati| te-dve api raktapitte, mUrcchite-miCratAM gate, mithaH-parasparaM, tulyarUpatvaM-samavarNatvaM, Agamya-prApya, sarvAM tanuM-dehaM, vyApnuto-vyaCnuvAte| nanu, bhRCoSNAdInAM pittalatvAvyabhicArAt kimarthaM pittalairityuktam ? brUmaH| dADimAmalakasaindhaveSvamlalavaNAdiSu vyabhicArAt| tathAhi-dADimAmalakasaindhavAnyamlalavaNAnyapi pittaM na kurvate| api ca na kevalaM bhRCoSNAdiyuktaiH kupitaM  pittaM raktaM ca| yAvadanyairapi pittalairabhRCoSNAdisvabhAvairvrIhiprabhRtibhiratisevitaiH kupitaM pittaM ceti pratipAdanArthaM pittalairityuktam| nanu, evaM sati pittalairityeva nirdeCaH kartuM yukta ubhayAnugrahArthaH| tathA ca bhRCoSNAdIni tathA~anyAnyapyabhRCoSNAdIni vrIhiprabhRtInyevaM gRhItAni bhavanti| astyevaitat| kintu pittalatvasAmAnyAdgRhItAnAmapi bhRCoSNAdInAmupAdAnaM kRtamatiCayadyotanArtham| yathA bhRCoSNAdInyatiCayena pittaM raktaM ca kopayanti, na tathA~anyAni vrIhiprabhRtIni| ata eva kodravoddAlakau CItavIryAvapi bhRCoSNAdidravyayutau pittasya kartArau bhavataH| bhRCoSNAdInAmatipittalatvAt| nanu, pittasya dravamiti viCeSaNamayuktam, vyabhicArAbhAvAt| tathA ca tantrakRjjagau (hR. sU. a. 1|11)- "pittaM sasnehastIkSNoSNaM laghu visraM saraM dravam|" iti| atrocyate| pittamadravamapyasti| kathaM jJAyate ? " adhogaM yApayedraktaM" (hR. ci. a. 2|2) iti| evamAdau hi raktasya pittasahitasyaiva nirdeCo yukto "raktapittamadhogaM yApayet" iti|

A0 ra0-atha raktapittaprakaraNam|  tatra nidAnamAha-bhRCoSNetyAdi|  bhRCoSNAda(dya)nyavidAhitvaM ca militaM kAraNam|  kodravAH-koradUSAH, uddAlakAH-vanyAH, teSAM tadyuktAnAm -vidAhiyuktAnAM, kAraNatvam|  "kodravaM hantyasRkpittaM karotyeva vidAhibhiH|" iti vacanAt|  annairityadanena hetutvam, na bahirlepAdinA|  pUrvaM pittalaiH kupitaM paCcAdbhRCoSNAbhirveditam|  dravagrahaNaM pAcakapittanivRttyartham|        samprAptimAha-te mitha iti|  te-pittarakte|  tulyarUpatvaM-raktavarNatvaM tulyaguNAt kadAciddharitAdivarNatvamapi|

sa0-nakSatrANAM-aCvinyAdInAM, tathA dvijAnAM-brAhmaNAnAM ca, yo rAjA-candraH, tasya purA-pUrvaM, abhavat| pUrvakalpe hi rohiNyAmatisaktasya candrasya CvaCuraM dakSamanRtavAdena vaJcayato~apamAnitaduhitRsnehavaCAdudbhUtakrodhAt prajApaterdakSataH rAjayakSmA~abhavaditi CrUyate| tasmAdrAjJo yakSmA rAjayakSmetyucyate SaSThIsamAsavyutpattyA| yacca-yasmAcca, rAjA ca yakSmA ca-rAjAca rogANAM madhye anekarogAnIkaparivRtatvena yakSmA ca, tato rAjA cAsau yakSmA ca rAjayakSmA~abhimato munInAmiti CeSaH| tathA dehaCcauSadhaM ca, tayoH kSayaH, tasya kRtiH-kAraNaM, tato dehauSadhakSayakRteH kSaya ityucyate| anena cAsya vyAdherbahukAlasthAyitvaM dyotayati| kilAyaM vyAdhirbahutaraM kAlamavatiSThate na ca CAntiM gacchati| yAvaddehaH kSIyate, auSadhAnyapi kSIyante, na punarayaM vyAdhiH, iti dehauSadhakSayakRteH kSaya ityucyate| tatsambhavAcca saH| tadityanena dehauSadhakSayaH pratyavamRCyate| sa sambhavo-janma, yasyAsau tatsambhavaH, tasmAdapi kSaya ityucyate| evamanyo~api yo vyAdhirdehauSadhakSayakArI, so~api kSayAkhyasya vyAdheH sambhavaH-kAraNam, tasmAjjAyata ityarthaH| rasAdInAM CoSaNAt CoSa iti bhaNyate| rogetyAdi| bahuSu rogeSu madhye rogatvenaiSa eva bhrAjate, tasmAdrogarADityucyate|

A0 ra0-nAmanirvacanamAha-nakSatrANAmiti|  rAjJaH-candrasya, yakSmA-rogo, rAjayakSmA|  athavA, rogANAM rAjA yakSmA ceti rAjayakSmA|  dehamauSadhaM ca kSiNotIti kSayaH|  athavA, CukrAdikSayAt sambhavatIti kSayaH, kAryakAraNayorabhedopacArAt|  rasAdayo dhAtavaH CuSyantyaneneti CoSaH| [rAja]vadrogeSu rAjata iti rogarAT|

A0 ra0-hetucatuSTayamAha-sAhasamiti|  ojaH-CukramalaH|  sneho-majjamalaH|

tairudIrNo~anilaH pittaM kaphaM codIrya sarvataH||5||   CarIrasandhInAviCya tAn sirACca prapIDayan||5||   mukhAni srotasAM ruddhvA tathaivAtivivRtya vA||6||   sarpannUrdhvamadhastiryagyathAsvaM janayedgadAn||6||

sa0-taiH-sAhasAdibhiH, udIrNo~anila idamidaM kurvan yathAsvaM gadAn janayet| udIrNaH-ulbaNaH pittaCleSmabhyAmadhikaH| ata eva pittamudIrya-svasthAnAccyAvayitvA, tathA kaphaM sarvataH-sarvasmAt udIrya, tathA CarIrasandhIn-daCAdhikaCatadvayasaGkhyAtAn Atreyamatena tu dvisahasrasaGkhyAtAn, AviCya-teSAmantaH-praveCaM kRtvA, tAMCca-sandhIn, prapIDayan-prakarSeNa mardayanniva, tathA sirA api sakalaCarIragAH prapIDayan, tathA~anyeSAM srotasAM mukhAni-dvArANi ruddhvA, tathaiva tAni vA ativivRtya-prasArya srotomukhAni| sarpannityAdi| UrdhvaM sarpan vAyuH pInasAdIn vyAdhIn janayet, adhaH sarpan viDbhraMCaM viTCoSaM vA kuryAt, tiryak sarpan pArCvarujaM vA kuryAt, iti yathAsvaMCabdasyArthaH|

A0 ra0-samprAptimAha-tairiti|  taiH-hetubhiH|  sarvata AviCya-sUkSmeSvavayaveSu praviCya|  tAn-sandhIn|  prapIDayan-saGkocayan|  srotasAM-prANAdivAhinAM trayodaCAnAM, mukhAni-dvArANi, rudhvA~ativivRtya vA|  tathaiva-yenaiva prakAreNAtisaMvRtatvaM tenaivAtivivRtatvam|  prakAraCca-kaphapittAbhyAM saha saJcAraH|  tau hi kadAcidvAtaM rundhAte, kadAcittena niHsAryete|  yathAsvaM-UrdhvaM sapta pInasAdIn, adho dvau viDrodhAtisArau, tiryak trIn chardipArCvaCUlajvarAn|  yadyapi chardiH koSThage, sandhige jvaraH, tathA~api tiryaggativiCeSatvAdavirodhaH|

rUpaM bhaviSyatastasya pratiCyAyo bhRCaM kSavaH||7||   praseko mukhamAdhuryaM sadanaM vahnidehayoH||7||   sthAlyamatrAnnapAnAdau CucAvapyaCucIkSaNam||8||   makSikAtRNakeCAdipAtaH prAyo~annapAnayoH||8||   hRllAsaCchardiraruciraCnato~api balakSayaH||9||   pANyoravekSA pAdAsyaCopho~akSNoratiCuklatA||9||   bAhvoH pramANajijJAsA kAye baibhatsyadarCanam||10||   strImadyamAMsapriyatA ghRNitvaM mUrddhaguNThanam||10||   nakhakeCAtivRddhiCca, svapne cAbhibhavo bhavet||11||   pataGgakRkalAsAhikapiCvApadapakSibhiH||11||   keCAsthituSabhasmAdirACau samadhirohaNam||12||   CUnyAnAM grAmadeCAnAM darCanaM CuSyato~ambhasaH||12||   jyotirgirINAM patatAM jvalatAM ca mahIruhAm||13||

sa0-tasya-rAjayakSmaNaH, bhaviSyataH utpitsoH, rUpaM-agrarUpaM, pratiCyAyAdi| vahneH sadanaM-pAkAsAmarthyam| dehasya sAdo-nirbalatA| sthAlyamatrAnnapAnAdInAM CuddhAnAmapyaCucidarCanamiti tadAnIM puruSasya mithyAjJAnaM jAyata ityarthaH| pANyoravekSA-bhUyasA svapANI paCyati| bAhvoH pramANajijJAsA-kiyatpramANau me bAhU iti jJAtumicchati| kAye-CarIre Cobhane~api, baibhatsyadarCanamiti mithyAjJAnaM tadAnIM rogasvabhAvAdasyotpadyate| mUrdhraH-mastakasya, guNThanaM-vastrAdinA saJchAdanam| svapne ca tasya yakSmiNaH pataGgAdibhirabhibhavo bhavet-pataGgAdyaiH parAbhUyate| pataGgaH-kITabhedaH| tathA, keCAdirACiSvadhirohaNaM tathA CUnyagrAmadeCAdInAM darCanaM svapne bhavet|

A0 ra0-pUrvarUpamAha-rUpaM bhaviSyata iti|  bhRCaM kSavaH-nAsArogeSu|  sadanaM-svakAryAkSamatvam|  sthAlI-yatrAnnaM pacyate|  amatraM-yatrAnnaM bhujyate|  pANyoravekSA-kIdRCau me pANI iti jijJAsA|  baibhatsyadarCanaM-sundareSvasundaratvabuddhiH|  ghRNitvaM-sakRpatvam|  pataGgAbhibhavAdayo jvaladvRkSadarCanAntAH [ svapne bhavanti ]|

pInasaCvAsakAsAMsamUrddhasvararujo~aruciH||13||   UrdhvaM, viDbhraMCasaMCoSAvadhaH, cchardiCca koSThage||14||   tiryaksthe pArCvarugdoSe, sandhige bhavati jvaraH||14||   rUpANyekAdaCaitAni jAyante rAjayakSmiNaH||15||

sa0-aMsau ca mUrddhA ca svaraCca teSAM rujo~aMsamUrddhasvararujaH| pInasaCca CvAsaCcAMsamUrddhasvararujaCca tAH, tathA aruciH, ityUrdhvaM-Urdhvasthite doSe, bhavati| arucereSaH pRthagupanyAsaH prAdhAnyakhyApanArthaH| yathA,-asmin vyAdhAvatibhayAvaho~arucyAkhya upadravo na tathA pInasAdaya iti| adhaHsthite doSe viCaH-purISasya, bhraMCasaMCoSau viDbhraMCasaMCoSau bhavataH| "viDbhraMCo-bhinnavarcastvaM, viTCoSo-baddhaviTkatA|" etayoCca parasparaM viruddhatvAnna tulyakAlaM sambhavaH| tasmAtkadAcidviDbhraMCaH kadAcidviTCoSo bhavati| chardistu koSThasthite doSe syAt| tiryaksthe doSe pArCvaruk bhavati| sandhige jvaro bhavati| etAni pInasAdInyekAdaCa rUpANi CoSiNa utpadyante| munistvevamavocat (ca. ci. a. 8|23)- "pratiCyAyaM jvaraM kAsamaGgamardaM Cirorujam| CvAsaM viDbhedamaruciM pArCvaCUlaM svarakSayam|| kurute cAMsasantApamekAdaCaM" ityAdi|

A0 ra0-rUpamAha-pInaseti|  skandharuk mUrddharuk svararuk ceti trINi|  viDbhraMCasaMCoSayorvaikalpikatvAdekAdaCatvam|  vaGgasene tu (rAjayakSmAdhikAre Clo.9) "bhaktadveSo jvaraH CvAsaH kAsaH CoNitadarCanam|  svarabhedaCca jAyante SaDrUpe rAjayakSmaNi||' iti|

teSAmupadravAn vidyAtkaNThoddhvaMsamurorujam||15||   jRmbhAGgamardaniSThIvavahnisAdAsyapUtitAH||16||

sa0-teSAM-ekAdaCasaGkhyAnAM pInasAdInAM pUrvotpannAnAM, kaNThoddhvaMsAdIn paCcAdutthitAn saptopadravAn jAnIyAt| "vyAdherupari yo vyAdhirbhavatyuttarakAlajaH| upakramavighAtI ca sa hyupadrava ucyate||" ityupadravalakSaNam|

A0 ra0-upadravAnAha-teSAmiti|  uddvaMso-vaikalyam|  teSAmiti rUpaprAdhAnyArtham, na svatantre pInasAdAvamI upadravAH|
