sa0-pUrvavadatra vyAkhyA| AdiCabdena svarabhedAdInAM grahaNam|

atha rAjayakSmanidAnam||1||   anekarogAnugato bahurogapurogamaH||1||   rAjayakSmA kSayaH CoSo rogarADiti ca smRtaH||1||

sa0-anekaiH jvarAtIsArAdibhiH, parivRtaH| tathA, bahUnAM rogANAM-gulmAtIsArAdInAM, purogamaH-pradhAnaCca| yathA hi rAjA prAk paCcAt rathebhACvajanairanugamyate, tathA~ayaM rogo rogaiH| rAjayakSmetyAdayaCcatasraH saMjJAH|

A0 ra0-atha rAjayakSmaprakaraNam|  tasya nAmacatuSTayamAha-anekarogAnugata iti|

nakSatrANAM dvijAnAM ca rAjJo~abhUdyadayaM purA||2||   yacca rAjA ca yakSmA ca rAjayakSmA tato mataH||2||   dehauSadhakSayakRteH kSayastatsambhavAcca saH||3||   rasAdiCoSaNAcchoSo rogarAT teSu rAjanAt||3||

sa0-nakSatrANAM-aCvinyAdInAM, tathA dvijAnAM-brAhmaNAnAM ca, yo rAjA-candraH, tasya purA-pUrvaM, abhavat| pUrvakalpe hi rohiNyAmatisaktasya candrasya CvaCuraM dakSamanRtavAdena vaJcayato~apamAnitaduhitRsnehavaCAdudbhUtakrodhAt prajApaterdakSataH rAjayakSmA~abhavaditi CrUyate| tasmAdrAjJo yakSmA rAjayakSmetyucyate SaSThIsamAsavyutpattyA| yacca-yasmAcca, rAjA ca yakSmA ca-rAjAca rogANAM madhye anekarogAnIkaparivRtatvena yakSmA ca, tato rAjA cAsau yakSmA ca rAjayakSmA~abhimato munInAmiti CeSaH| tathA dehaCcauSadhaM ca, tayoH kSayaH, tasya kRtiH-kAraNaM, tato dehauSadhakSayakRteH kSaya ityucyate| anena cAsya vyAdherbahukAlasthAyitvaM dyotayati| kilAyaM vyAdhirbahutaraM kAlamavatiSThate na ca CAntiM gacchati| yAvaddehaH kSIyate, auSadhAnyapi kSIyante, na punarayaM vyAdhiH, iti dehauSadhakSayakRteH kSaya ityucyate| tatsambhavAcca saH| tadityanena dehauSadhakSayaH pratyavamRCyate| sa sambhavo-janma, yasyAsau tatsambhavaH, tasmAdapi kSaya ityucyate| evamanyo~api yo vyAdhirdehauSadhakSayakArI, so~api kSayAkhyasya vyAdheH sambhavaH-kAraNam, tasmAjjAyata ityarthaH| rasAdInAM CoSaNAt CoSa iti bhaNyate| rogetyAdi| bahuSu rogeSu madhye rogatvenaiSa eva bhrAjate, tasmAdrogarADityucyate|

A0 ra0-nAmanirvacanamAha-nakSatrANAmiti|  rAjJaH-candrasya, yakSmA-rogo, rAjayakSmA|  athavA, rogANAM rAjA yakSmA ceti rAjayakSmA|  dehamauSadhaM ca kSiNotIti kSayaH|  athavA, CukrAdikSayAt sambhavatIti kSayaH, kAryakAraNayorabhedopacArAt|  rasAdayo dhAtavaH CuSyantyaneneti CoSaH| [rAja]vadrogeSu rAjata iti rogarAT|

sAhasaM vegasaMrodhaH CukraujaHsnehasaGkSayaH||4||   annapAnavidhityAgaCcatvArastasya hetavaH||4||

sa0-sAhasaM-kAyena vAcA vA~ayathAbalamArambhaH| vegasaMrodho-vAtaviNmUtrAdInAmunmukhIbhUtAnAM dhAraNam| CukraM ca ojaCca snehaCca teSAM saGkSayo-vinACaH| atra snehaCabdena dehasneho grAhyaH, dehaCabdalopaM kRtvA~ayaM nirdiSTaH| tathA ca muniH (ca. ci. a. 8|2)- "dehasnehaparikSayAt" iti| tathA, annapAnayoryathACAstraM yo vidhistasya tyAgo-anyathAsevanamanyathA~abhyavahAraH| tasya-rAjayakSmaNaH, catvAraH sAhasAdayo hetavaH| pAThAdeva catuHsaGkhyAtve labdhe caturgrahaNaM niyamArtham| yadyapi sAhasAdaya ete pratyekamanekaprakAratayA bhinnAH, tathA~api sAhasAdicatuSTayaM nAtikrAmantItyarthaH|        tathA~asmin rAjayakSmAkhye sAhasaje vegasaMrodhaje CukraujaHsnehasaGkSayaje~annapAnavidhityAgaje vA caturvidhe viCeSeNa pavano hetuH|

sa0-doSaiH-vAtapittakaphaiH, kapholbaNatvAt srotodvAreSu ruddheSu-pihiteSu satsu, rasaH svasthAna eva vidahyamAno-na samyagraktatAM prApnuvan, tAMstAn-anekAn kaNThoddhvaMsAdIn, upadravAn kuryAt| kimbhUtairdoSaiH ? kapholbaNaiH-CleSmAdhikaiH| ata eva kaphAdhikatvAt sahopalepena CleSmalepena saha vartante sopalepAH, taistathAvidhairdoSaistadAnIM mandAnalatvaM kriyate| tenaiva ca mandAnalatvena hetunA dhAtUSmasu-rasAdyagniSu, alpakeSu-atiCayenAlpeSu| evamanekakAraNasadbhAvAdrasaH svasthAna eva vidahyamAnaH-pittakAriNIM madhyamAM pAkAvasthAmanubhavan samyak pAkamagacchan, yathocitAn vikArAMstAMstAn kurvan, mAMsAdIn-mAMsaprabhRtikAn dhAtUn, agacchan-aprApnuvan, vidahyamAnatayA raktatAmApannaH, tadasRk cordhvaM pradhAvati-UrdhvaM prasarpati, kevalaM niSThIvanasahitaM vA| tasmAt kSayiNo na tanmAMsAdidhAtupuSTaye|        kiJcAsmAdapi hetoH sa raso na dhAtupuSTaye| [yat-] yasmAt, [annaM] pacyate-annaM sArakiTTatvaM nIyate, annapaktraiva-jATharAgninA, koSTha eva-AmapakvACayAkhye| ubhayatrevakAro~avadhAraNe| koSTha eva-na dhAtuSu, jATharAgninaiva-na dhAtvagnibhiH, iti| yata evaM tato~asmAt-prAGnirUpitAddhetukadambakAt, prAyo malatAM-Adhikyena mUtrapurISatAM, prAptamannaM naiva dhAtupuSTaye~alaM-samartham| dhAtupuSTigrahaNenaitatsUcayati,-abhinavamRtkumbhajalalavasyandananyAyena sUkSmasrotonupraveCitayA so~annaraso dhAtvApyAyanamAtraM karotyeva, anyathA varSagaNAnubandhi jIvitaM kSayiNo na sambhAvyeta| tasmAddhAtusthitimAtraM bhavati na tu dhAtupoSaNamiti sthitam|        rasaH-ubhayarUpo~annaraso dhAturaso vA, asya-kSayiNaH, nikaTasya raktadhAtorna puSTaye, mAMsadhAtorviprakRSTasya tu kuta eva syAt ? evaM na sambhAvyata ityapiCabdArthaH|         nanu, yadyevaM tatkathamanyebhyo dhAtubhyo viCeSeNa dhAraNasvabhAvebhyo vinA kSayI jIvet? ityACaGkyAha-upastabdha iti| saH-kSayI, CakRtA-purISeNa, kevalamupastabdhaH-kRtAvaSTambho, vartate-prANiti, pUrvoktanyAyena kiJcidAhArarasApyAyitairdhAtubhirdhAraNasvabhAvairdhRtamAtraH| nanu, "vidahyamAnaH svasthAne rasastAMstAnupadravAn| kuryAdagacchanmAMsAdInasRk cordhvaM pradhAvati||" ityanena raktasya sattA pradipAditA| "raso~apyasya na raktAya" ityanena kSayiNo raktasyAbhAvaH pratyapAdi| tadime vAkye parasparaM vyAghnAte| atrocyate| nAnayorvAkyayoH parasparaM virodhaH| yataH " asRk cordhvaM pradhAvati" ityanena na taddhAturUpatAM prAptamuktam| kintarhi ? rasasya vidahyamAnatayA svasthAnasthitasya raktadhAtvACayamagacchato raktodbhUtiruktA| anenaivAbhiprAyeNottaratra vAkye "raso~apyasya na raktAya" ityuvAca| anena hi raso dhAturUpAya raktAya CoSiNo na sampadyate iti pratyapAdi|

sa0-tIkSNAdibhirdaCabhirguNairmandAdInojasaH sambandhino guNAn saGkSobhya-samantAdduSTatAmApAdya, ceto vikriyAM-vikAraM nayati, Adye made| nanu, tIkSNAdibhirmandAdInityetAvadevAstu, kiM daCabhirdaCetyanena? pAThAdeva hi daCasaGkhyA~avagamiSyate| astyetat| kintu sarvaireva tIkSNAdibhiH sarvAnapi mandAdIn saGkSobhya ceto vikriyAM madyaM nayati, na tu kiyadbhirapi tIkSNAdibhiH kiyata eva mandAdIn, iti pratipAdanAya saGkhyAgrahaNam| utkarSatAratamyatastvastyeva viCeSaH, tena sarvatra made naiva tulyaH kSobha iti vedyam| Adye ca made yathAsvaM prabodhajanake pumAn sthito madyapAnAttAdAtvikaM sukhaM samadhigacchatItyanuktamapi sambhAvyate| tathA ca muniH (ca. ci. a. 24|64)- "paJcasvartheSu kAnteSu yA ratiH prathame made| yUnAM vA sthavirANAM vA tasyA nAstyupamA bhuvi||" iti|

-------------dvitIye tu pramAdAyatane sthitaH||4|| durvikalpahato mUDhaH sukhamityadhimucyate||4||

sa0-anantaraM dvitIye tu made sthitaH-prAptaH, svArthairduSTaistaistairvikalpairhataH-puruSArthAdvinaSTaH, ata eva mUDhaH-kAryAkAryAnabhijJaH, sukhamityadhimucyate-sukhamiti jJAnena prathamamadotpannena tadAnImadhimucyate-adhikaM kRtvA tena sukhena parityajyate| tAdAtvikamAdyaM sukhaM nAnubhavati, ojaso vihatatvAt| anye tvAhuH,-avamucyate-niCcinoti sukhametadityabhiniviCate| kimbhUte made sthitaH ? pramAdAyatane, pramAdAnAM-sAhasAnAmihAmutra cACubhahetUnAM, [ Ayatane- ] sthAne|

madhyamottamayoH sandhiM prApya rAjasatAmasaH||5||   niraGkuCa iva vyAlo na kiJcinnAcarejjaDaH||5||

sa0-madhyamottamayoH-dvitIyatRtIyayoH, sandhiM prApya-antaraM labdhvA, puruSo rAjasatAmaso na kiJcidaCubhaM nAcaret-api tu sarvamaCubhamAcaret| rAjasasahitastAmaso rAjasatAmasaH| CAkapArthivAditvAt madhyama (uttara) padalopI samAsaH, rAjaso vA tAmaso vetyarthaH| rAjasatAmasagrahaNAt sAtvikaH puruSo nedRCImavasthAM prApnotIti gamayati| niraGkuCa iva vyAlaH| yathA,-vyAlo-duSTahastI, jaDo-badhiraH, tathA niraGkuCo, na kiJcidaCubhaM nAcaret, unmArgapravRttatvAt| tantrAntare caivamuktam-"sAtvike CaucadAkSiNyaharSamaNDanalAlasaH| gItAdhyayanasaubhAgyasuratotsAhakRnmadaH|| rAjase duHkhaCIlatvamAtmatyAgaM sasAhasam| kalahaM sAnubandhaM ca karoti puruSe madaH|| aCaucanidrAmAtsaryAgamyAgamanalolatAH| asatyabhASaNaM cApi kuryAdvai tAmase madaH||" iti| vyAlagrahaNAdyaH CuddhasvabhAvo hastI sa sRNirahito~api kadAciddhastyArohaCabdaCravaNAt kAlocitaM saGketamupalabhya yuktamAcaratyeveti, ato vyAlo niraGkuCa iti dvitayamupanyastam| tejasaH kiJciccheSatvAt nindyAmimAmavasthAM prAptaH|

iyaM bhUmiravadyAnAM dauHCIlyasyedamAspadam||6|| eko~ayaM bahumArgAyA durgaterdeCikaH param||6|| niCceSTaH Cavavacchete tRtIye tu made sthitaH||7|| maraNAdapi pApAtmA gataH pApatarAM daCAm||7||

sa0-avadyAnAM-nindyAnAM, iyaM-madAvasthA, bhUmiH-AkaraH| tathA, dauHCIlyasya-asamAhitatvasya, idaM-madAvasthAntaraM, AspadaM-AvasathaH| eko~ayaM-madaviCeSo, bahumArgAyAH-anekamukhAyA durgateH, paraM kRtvA deCikaH-AcAryaH|tRtIye-uttame made, sthito narastejaso vihatatvAt niCceSTaH-ceSTayA kAyavAGmanolakSaNayA rahitaH, ata eva Cavavacchete-mRtAnukalpaH svapiti| evaM ca satyasau pApAtmA maraNAdapi pApatarAmavasthAM prAptaH| yato mRto maraNAtsamanantarameva CarIrAntaraM prApya sukhAdIn vindate| tRtIyAM madAvasthAM prAptastu puruSo~aparaCarIrAprApterna kathaJcit sukhAdyanubhavatIti maraNAdapyasya nikRSTatvam|

dharmAdharmaM sukhaM duHkhamarthAnarthaM hitAhitam||8|| yadAsakto na jAnAti kathaM tacchIlayedbudhaH||8||

sa0-yasminnAsakto-yadAsakto, dharmAdIn na jAnAti| tat-tathAvidhaM madyaM, budho-matimAn, kathaM CIlayet-abhyaset| tatra dharmo-dAnAdhyayanadevagurupUjAdikaH| adharmo-hiMsAdiH| sukhaM-AhlAdako~anubhavaH| duHkhaM-upatApaH| arthaH-ubhayalokahitam| anarthaH-ahitam| CIlayedityanena tatrAsaktiM niSedhati, na tu madyapAnamapi|

madye moho bhayaM CokaH krodho mRtyuCca saMCritAH||9|| sonmAdamadamUrcchAyAH sApasmArApatAnakAH||9|| yatraikaH smRtivibhraMCastatra sarvamasAdhu yat||10||

sa0-madye~atipIte mohAdayaH saMCritAH-ACritAH, madyAtipAnAdanantaraM mohAdInAM sadbhAvAt| athavA kimatra bahunA~abhihitena| yatra-yasmin madye, smRtervibhraMCo-lopaH, tatra yatkiJcidvidyate tatsarvamasAdhu-aCobhanam| yatraujasau na vihatirhRtprabodhaCca sa prathamo madaH| yatrAlpA vihatirojasaH sa madhyamaH| yatra sarvasyaujasau vihatiH sa uttamaH| tathA ca muniH (ca. ci. a. 24|35) - "ojasyavihate pUrvo hRdi ca pratibodhite| madhyamo vihate~alpe tu vihate tUttamo madaH||" iti|

ayuktiyuktamannaM hi vyAdhaye maraNAya vA||10|| madyaM trivargadhIdhairyalajjAderapi nACanam||11||

 athAto~arCasAM nidAnaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-vyAkhyA pUrvavat|

arivatprANino mAMsakIlakA viCasanti yat||1|| arCAMsi tasmAducyante gudamArganirodhataH||1|| doSAstvaGmAMsamedAMsi sandUSya vividhAkRtIn||2|| mAMsAGkurAnapAnAdau kurvantyarCAMsi tAn jaguH||2||

sa0-anena sarveSAmapyarCasAM gudameDhrAdijAnAM sAmAnyena samprAptyAkRtI nirUpayati| doSAH-vAtAdayaH, tvaGmAMsamedAMsi dUSayitvA~apAnAdau yanmAMsAGkurAn kurvanti tAnarCAMsi jaguH, tantrakRta iti CeSaH| AdiCabdena karNanAsAdInAM grahaNam| kimbhUtAn mAMsAGkurAn ? vividhAkRtIn-nAnAsaMsthAnAn|

sahajanmottarotthAnabhedAddvedhA samAsataH||3|| CuSkasrAvivibhedAcca----------------------||3||

sa0-tAni ca samAsataH-saGkSepato, dvedhA-dviprakArANi| katham ? ityAha-sahetyAdi| saha janmanA, sahajanma cottaraM ca sahajanmottare, tayorutthAnaM sahajanmottarotthAnaM, tena bhedo-viCeSaH, tasmAt| kAniciccharIreNa saha jAtAni kAnicijjanmottarabhAvIni| tathA, CuSkasrAvivibhedAcca dvedhA,-kAnicicchuSkANi kAnicitsrAvINi|

----------------------gudaH sthUlAntrasaMCrayaH||3|| ardhapaJcAGgulastasmiMstisro~adhyardhAGgulAH sthitAH||4|| valyaH, pravAhiNI tAsAmantarmadhye visarjanI||4|| bAhyA saMvaraNI tasyA gudauSTho bahiraGgule||5|| yavAdhyardhaH pramANena romANyatra tataH param||5||

sa0-sthUlAntraM saMCrayaH-ACrayo, yasya sa evaMvidho gudaH| sthUlaM yadantraM tatra pratibaddha ityarthaH| kiMpramANo~asau ? ardhapaJcAGgulaH| ardhenonAni paJca-ardhapaJca| CAkapArthivAditvAtsamAsaH| ardhapaJca aGgulAni yasya so~ardhapaJcAGgulaH,-sArdhacaturaGgulaparimANaH| tasmin-gude, tisro valyaH-trisaGkhyAH sthitAH| kiMparimANAH ? adhyardhAGgulAH, adhikamardhamaGgulaM pratyekaM parimANaM yAsAM tA evam| atha tAsAM-tisRNAm, arthAnugatAni nAmAnyAha-tatra-malapravAhaNAdantaH-antare sthitA valI, pravAhiNIti kathyate| madhye-madhyasthitA valI, malasya pravahato bahirvisarjanAt visarjanIti bhaNyate| gudasya bAhye sthitA malasya saMvaraNAt saMvaraNItyucyate| tasyAH-saMvaraNIsaMjJAyA valeH, aGgule-tatparimANe, bahiH-bAhye, gudauSThaH sthitaH| pramANena-parimANato, gudauSThau yavAdhyardhaH-sArdhayavapramANaH| tato-gudauSThAt, paraM-parato bahiH, romANyatra gude, jAyante|

tatra hetuH sahotthAnAM valIbIjopataptatA||6|| arCasAM, bIjataptistu mAtApitrapacArataH||6|| daivAcca, tAbhyAM kopo hi sannipAtasya tAnyataH||7|| asAdhyAnyevamAkhyAtAH sarve rogAH kulodbhavAH||7||

sa0-tatreti nirdhAraNe, sahajottarakAlabhAviSvarCaHsu madhye, sahotthAnAmarCasAM hetuH valIbIjopataptatA| valyAH-sambandhi bIjaM-CukrArtavAMCo, yasmAtsA valI utpadyate| upataptasya bhAva upataptatA,-arCovikArakaraNasamarthairvAtapittakaphaiH pIDanaM, balIbIjasyopataptatocyate| sA ca bIjopataptiH-bIjopatApo, mAtApitrapacArataH| mAtA ca pitA ca mAtApitarau, tayorapacAraH-aparAdha AhAravihArAdikRtaH, tasmAt| tathA daivAt-tathAvidhAt prAkkRtAdaCubhakarmaNo, bIjopataptiH| tAbhyAM-mAtApitrapacAradaivAbhyAM, yasmAtsannipAtasya kopaH, tasmAttAni-arCAMsi, asAdhyAni| evaM-anena prakAreNa, prANinAM sarve rogAH kulodbhavA AkhyAtAH| bIjopataptatvAdasAdhyA ityarthaH|

CuSkANi vAtaCleSmabhyAmArdrANi tvasrapittataH||9||

sa0-"CuSkasrAvivibhedAcca dvidhA" (Clo. 3) ityuktam| tatra CuSkANi prAyeNa vAtakaphAbhyAM vyastasamastAbhyAm| yAni tvArdrANi tAnyasrapittataH, tathaiva vyastasamastAbhyAM bhavanti|

doSaprakopahetustu prAguktastena sAdite||10|| agnau, male~atinicite, punaCcAtivyavAyataH||10|| yAnasaGkSobhaviSamakaThinotkaTakAsanAt||11|| bastinetrACmaloSThorvItalacailAdighaTTanAt||11|| bhRCaM CItAmbusaMsparCAtpratatAtipravAhaNAt||12|| vAtamUtraCakRdvegadhAraNAttadudIraNAt||12|| jvaragulmAtisArAmagrahaNICophapANDubhiH||13|| karCanAdviSamAbhyaCca ceSTAbhyo, yoSitAM punaH||13|| AmagarbhaprapatanAdgarbhavRddhiprapIDanAt||14|| IdRCaiCcAparairvAyurapAnaH kupito malam||14||  pAyorvalISu taM dhatte tAsvabhiSyaNNamUrtiSu||15|| jAyante~arCAMsi-------------------------------||15||

sa0-prAk-pUrvaM sarvarogavidAne, doSaprakopahetuH [ ukto-] darCitaH| tena-doSaprakopakAraNena, vahnau sAdite-mandatvaM gamite| agnimAndyAdAhAraH samyakpAkamagacchan bhUyasA malatvenaiva sampadyate| tata idamAha-male~atinicite| male-purISAkhye, atinicite-pravRddhe mAMsAGkurajananayogye, vAyurapAnAkhyaH pAyoH sambandhinISu valISu, taM malaM nicitaM dhatte| taddeCamalavyatisamparkAttA valayo~abhiSyaNNamUrtayaH praklinnadehAH sampadyante| tAsu cAbhiSyaNNamUrtiSvarCAMsi jAyante| ityuttarakAlajAnAmarCasAM samprAptiH| tathA ca kena vAyuH kupito malaM dhatte ? ityAha-punaCcAtivyavAyata ityAdi| punariti nirdeCAt pUrvoktena hetunA vAyuH kupitaH, tathA~ativyavAyAdibhiH kupita iti gamayati| bastyAdInAM ghaTTanena sambandhaH| pratatAtipravAhaNena doSAdivegAnAM pravartanam| vAtamUtraCakRdvegAnAM tUdIraNamihoktamiti pravAhaNodIraNayordvayorupAdAnam| jvarAdibhiH karSaNAditi yojyam| viSamAbhyaCca ceSTAbhya iti sAhasAdiviSamAcaraNAdikAbhyaH| yoSitAM punariti punaHCabdena pUrvoktebhyaH prakArebhyaH prakArAntaramAmagarbhaprapatanAdikaM gRhyate| IdRCairaparairapyanirdiSTairiha tatprakopahetubhirvAyuH kupita iti yojyam|

-----------------tatpUrvalakSaNaM mandavahnitA||15|| viSTambhaH sakthisadanaM piNDikodveSTanaM bhramaH||16|| sAdo~aGge netrayoH CophaH CakRdbhedo~athavA grahaH||16|| mArutaH pracuro mUDhaH prAyo nAbheradhaCcaran||17|| saruk saparikartaCca kRcchrAnnirgacchati svanan||17|| antrakUjanamATopaH kSAmatodgArabhUritA||18|| prabhUtaM mUtramalpA viDaCraddhA dhUmako~amlakaH||18|| CiraHpRSThorasAM CUlamAlasyaM bhinnavarNatA||19|| tandrendriyANAM daurbalyaM krodho duHkhopacAratA||19|| ACaGkA grahaNIdoSapANDugulmodareSu ca||20||

sa0-teSAmarCasAM pUrvalakSaNaM tatpUrvalakSaNaM mandavahnitetyAdikaM CakRdgrahaparyantam| atra ca pUrvalakSaNamadhye "CakRdbhedo~athavA grahaH" iti nirdiSTam, kasyacitpuruSasyotpitsuSvarCaHsu bhinnavarcastvaM kasyacidbaddhavarcastvamityathavACabdasyArthaH| mAruta iti sAmarthyAdapAnAkhyaH, prAyo-bhUyiSThaM kRtvA, nAbheradhaCcaran-gacchan, pracuro bhavati| tathA, mUDho-mUDha iva mUDhaH| kriyAmAtmIyAM hitveva vartamAnaH| tathA, saruk-saCUlaH| tathA, saha parikartena vartate saparikartaH| chindanniva kRcchrAnnirgacchati, svanan-CabdAyamAnaH| tathA, antrakUjanAdikaM bhavati| tathA ca grahaNIdoSAdiSvACaGkA bhavati|

 etAnyeva vivarddhante jAteSu hatanAmasu||20|| nivartamAno~apAno hi tairadhomArgarodhataH||21|| kSobhayannanilAnanyAn sarvendriyaCarIragAn||21|| tathA mUtraCakRtpittakaphAn dhAtUMCca sACayAn||22|| mRdgAtyagniM tataH sarvo bhavati prAyaCo~arCasaH||22|| kRCo bhRCaM hatotsAho dInaH kSAmo~atiniSprabhaH||23|| asAro vigatacchAyo jantujuSTa iva drumaH||23|| kRtsnairupadravairgrasto yathoktairmarmapIDanaiH||24|| tathA kAsapipAsAsyavairasyaCvAsapInasaiH||24|| klamAGgabhaGgavamathukSavathuCvayathujvaraiH||25|| klaibyabAdhiryataimiryaCarkarACmaripIDitaH||25|| kSAmabhinnasvaro dhyAyanmuhuH SThIvannarocakI||26|| sarvaparvAsthihRnnAbhipAyuvaGkSaNaCUlavAn||26|| gudena sravatA picchAM pulAkodakasannibhAm||27|| vibaddhamuktaM CuSkArdraM pakkvAmaM cAntarA~antarA||27|| pANDu pItaM haridraktaM picchilaM copaveCyate||28||

sa0-etAnyeva-grahaNIdoSAdIni, hatanAmasu-arCaHsu, jAteSu vivarddhante-vRddhimApnuvanti|    taiH-arCobhiH, adhomArgarodhAdapAno nivartamAna UrdhvaM pravRttaH sarvA(anyA)nanilAn-samAnodAnavyAnaprANAn, sarvendriyaCarIragAn pratyAharaNarUpatayA kSobhayan-saMrambhAn kurvan, tathA mUtrAdIn, tathA dhAtUn-rasAdIMCca, sACayAn-sahAdhAreNa vartamAnAn, kSobhayannagniM mRdgAti-mandIkaroti| tataH-agnimArdavAdikAt kAraNAt, prAyeNArCaso-durnAmavAn, kRCAdikaH syAt| arCasa ityatra "arCaAditvAt" ac| vigatacchAyo drumo jantujuSTaH patraughavirahAdyathA chAyArahitaH, tathaivArCasaH CobhArahita iti CleSopamAlaGkAraH| tatheti na kevalaM pUrvoktairupadravairgrastaH, api tu kAsAdibhirapItyarthaH| klaibyetyAdi| aCmaripIDita ityatra "GyApoH" ityAdinA bahulavacanAddhrasvaH| athavA, 'aCmani pIDitaH' iti pAThaH| kSAmo bhinnaCca svaro yasya sa evam| tathA, dhyAyan-cintAvyAptaH| tathA, niSThIvanAdibhiryutaH| tathA, gudena picchAM pulAkodakasannibhAM sravatA vibaddhAdikamupaveCyate| aprAptapAkaM dhAnyaM pulAkaCabdavAcyam| AgamaH-"dhAnyaM pulAko~aniSpannam" iti| athavA, pulAkaH-kutsitaM dhAnyam, tasyodakena tulyAm| anye tu yavagodhUmAdisvedaH pulAkodakamityAhuH, tena tulyAm| vibaddhamuktamiti kadAcidudAvRttaM kadAcidanudvRttaM bhavati|
